rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi snying po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi snying po kun nas snang ba'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas
kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi shugs thub par dka' ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba
snyed dang lhan gcig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnas nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad spos kyi lda ldi dang dra bas kun tu 'brel bar

byin gyis rlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi lda ldi dang dra ba chen pos kun tu 'brel bar byin gyis rlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyud thams

cad me tog thams cad kyi lda ldi dang / phreng ba'i dra bas kun tu 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'khor thams cad phreng ba dang lda ldi dang / se mo do'i dra bas kun nas 'brel bar
byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'og gi 'jig rten rdo rje thams cad kyi phreng bas yongs su gzung bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshul
thams cad nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi dra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gos sna tshogs kyi lda ldis kun nas yongs su blangs shing

bzung bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi lus kyi phreng ba dang lda ldi mang po'i dra bas kun nas 'brel bar mngon par bsgrub pa dang / zhing thams cad nor bu rin po

che dpal gyi 'od zer gyi lda ldi dang / phreng ba'i dra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rin po che rnam par snang ba'i lda ldi dang / dra bas kun tu 'brel bar byin gyis

brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gzhi nor bu rin po che seng+ge yid du 'ong ba'i phreng ba dang / lda ldi'i dra bas yongs su bzung bar byin gyis brlab pa byed cing / myi mjed kyi 'jig rten
gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ lho phyogs su brten te/ nor bu rin po che 'gro ba la rnam par snang

ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng+ge'i khri nor bu rin po che phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi dra ba'i rgyan gyis kun nas brgyan

pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas bskyil mo dkrung bcas te 'khod do/ /nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed

kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i ri rab rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan mar mye zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes sgron ma'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems

dpa' dpal kun nas 'phags pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil

'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad bdug spos kha dog sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs su ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis

rgyas par gang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad spos kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par gang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings

thams cad bdug spos kha dog dang dri du ma dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par gang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad spos kha dog sna tshogs dang

ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par gang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po mdangs 'byung bas thams cad kyi rdul gyi

kha dog dang 'dra ba'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par gang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sna

tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par gang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rin po che'i rgyal po rdo rje'i snying po kha dog sna tshogs

can/ rgyan rnam pa tha dad pa'i yul dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par gang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che 'dzam
bu'i chu klung 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang ba'i yul dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par gang ba dang /

nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chos kyi dbyings thams cad rab tu snang ba'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi kun nas khyab par byin gyis brlab

pa dang / sems can gyi khams kyi yul thams cad nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan rab tu snang ba'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed

kyis rgyas par gang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi nam mkha' rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rab tu snang bar yongs su ston cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i

sgra 'byin pa'i ri rab kyi sprin gyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par gang ba dang / phyogs bcu thams cad rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po byang chub pa'i 'od

dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rgyas par 'gengs pa byed cing / myi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas bcom ldan 'das gang na
ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ nub phyogs su brten te/ khang pa brtsegs pa spos kyi rgyal po thams cad kyi lhun dang ldan pa mu tig gi dra bas kun nas

khyab pa dang / seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che lha'i dbang po rab tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ rin po che gser gyi dra bas kun nas brgyan pa dang / yid bzhin gyi

nor bu rin po che cod pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlab nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i

rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i gos yongs su snang ba zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i dpal rnam par snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang

chub sems dpa' chags pa myed pa'i dpal gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang
nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i snam bu'i sprin gyi rgyan gyi brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i gos kha

dog ser po dang / mdog ser po'i sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i gos spos sna tshogs kyis dri zhim por byas pa'i sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pa rgyan gyis

brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i rgyal po nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings nor bu rin po che gser gyi mdog
shin tu 'bar ba'i sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che 'bar ba'i gos kyi sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa
dang / nam mkha'i dbyings nor bu rin po che skar ma thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sna tshogs su gyur pa'i gos kyi sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings phyogs
bcu kun nas nor bu rin po che'i snam bu khra bo'i rdo rje ltar snang ba'i sprin gyis yongs su rgyas par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings phyogs bcu kun nas rin po che'i rgyal po rnam

par snang ba'i dpal rab tu 'bar ba'i 'od dang ldan pa'i gos kyi sprin gyis yongs su rgyas par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings phyogs bcu kun nas nor bu'i rgyal po snang ba shin tu gsal bas

phyogs kyi dbyings rnam par snang ba'i gos kyi sprin gyis yongs su rgyas par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i rgyan gyi gos kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog par byin
gyis brlab pa byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ byang

phyogs su brten te/ rin po che'i rgyal po rgya mtsho yongs su 'byung ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri bai DUr+ya'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge mdzes

pa'i dra bas yongs su brgyan pa dang / rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan mgo la thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas bskyil mo dkrung bcas te 'khod do/ /byang dang shar gyi phyogs

'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad du mdzes pa'i rin po che 'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu

'gyed pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs pa'i sprin gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su shin tu 'phrul ba'i smon lam zla ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'
'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam

klas pa thams cad rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyi kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs
par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad bdug spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas
pa thams cad tsan dan gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas
khebs par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyi kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
'byam klas pa thams cad rdo rje'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad gser gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin
gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad gos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi
khams 'byam klas pa thams cad pad mo brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba
der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas byang dang shar gyi phyogs 'tshamasu brten te/ nor bu rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa sgo chos kyi dbyings thams cad la mngon

par blta ba dang / seng+ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po spos mtshungs pa myed pa'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas rin po che'i khang pa'i me tog gi dra bas yongs su brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po
mdzod sna tshogs kyi dra ba'i cod pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas skyil mo dkrung bcas te 'khod do/ /shar dang lho'i phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya

mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi sprin gyis brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa klu dbang gi rgyal po'i sangs

rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi 'od 'phro ba dang ldan pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan gcig
tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i sprin gyis kun tu khyab
par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad rin po che mtha' yas pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad de bzhin gshegs
pa'i mdzod spu'i kha dog gi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad ni rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi
sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad pad+mo'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad nor bu'i rgyal po rin po
che'i shing gi yal ga'i dkyil 'khor lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun nas khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor lta bu'i 'od kyi

dkyil 'khor gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i

dbyings thams cad nyi ma'i kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad zla ba dang / skar ma'i tshogs kyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil
'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la
phyag 'tshal nas/ shar dang lho'i phyogs 'tshams su brten te/ rin po che rdul dang bral zhing rnam par snang ba phun sum tshogs pa'i me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri rin po che'i

seng ge'i rdo rje'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che'i 'od zer rab tu 'bar ba'i dra bas yongs su brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas skyil

mo dkrung bcas te 'khod do/ /lho dang nub kyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che nyi
ma rab tu snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo'i ye shes kun tu snang ba'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams

cad rnam par 'thor ba'i ye shes rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas/ 'khor

gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas me tog 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dkye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rol mo'i 'od 'phro

ba'i sprin nam mkha' ltar yangs pa rab tu dkye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas nor bu rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dkye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas

rin po che'i gos 'od 'phro ba'i spos dang / bdug spos sna tshogs kyi rnam par bdug pa'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dkye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas klus rnam par sprul pa'i

glog gi 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dkye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer dkye ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu

dkye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas nor bu rin po che gser rab tu 'bar ba 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dkye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rin po che'i rgyal po

dpal gyi snying po 'bar ba 'od 'phro ba'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dkye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas nor rin po che de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa rgya mtsho ltar dus gsum gyi rgyud rab tu snang ba'i
tshul dang ldan pa'i 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dkye ba byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/
'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ lho dang nub kyi phyogs 'tshams su brten te/ nor bu rin po che chen po 'od zer gyi dra ba phyogs kun nas mngon par gzhol ba'i thig les

chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rab tu snang ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che spos kyi sgron ma 'od 'phro ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ rin po che'i rgyal po dri ma

med pa'i snying po'i dra bas yongs su brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po sems can thams cad rab tu 'dzud pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa'i cod pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlab

nas skyil mo dkrung bcas te 'khod do/ /nub dang byang gi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams

rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi ri bo kun nas rnam par snang ba'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i smon lam ye shes dpal

zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags
te/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du de bzhin gshegs pa de thams cad kyi sku'i gzugs rnyan gyi sprin du dkye ba dang /
mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / las thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i gzugs rnyan gyi sprin kun tu bkye ba dang / mtshan

dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du byung bas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi las kyi gzugs rnyan gyi sprin kun tu bkye ba dang / mtshan
dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi
lus kyi gzugs rnyan gyi sprin kun tu bkye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs
rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i tshogs kyi gzugs rnyan mang po'i sprin kun tu bkye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas
dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sngon gyi spyod pa'i gzugs rnyen mang po'i sprin kun tu bkye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i
sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du byung ba'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs rnyan rab tu bkye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang
po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po byang chub dang / byang chub kyi shing gi
gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu bkye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas
thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzugs rnyan mang po'i sprin kun tu bkye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du 'byung
ba'i 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs rnyan gyi sprin kun tu bkye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus
gsum du byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa thams cad kyi gzugs rnyan gyi sprin kun tu bkye ba dang / skad cig skad cig tu nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing mi
mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ nub dang byang gi phyogs

'tshams su brten te/ rin po che'i rgyal po phyogs kun nas rnam par snang ba'i snying po seng ge'i khri rin po che 'gro ba rnam par snang ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas me tog 'od thub pa
med pa'i 'od dra bas yongs su brgyan pa dang / rin po che 'od kun tu snang ba'i cod pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas bskyil mo dkrung bcas te 'khod do/ /'og

gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par
snang ba zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes nam mkha' lta bur chags pa myed pa'i dpal rgyal mtshan rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par

'thor ba'i ye shes kyi rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi

dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad dang sgra dang dbyangs dang nges pa'i tshig mngon par bsgrub pa rgya mtsho rab tu brjod pa dang / dus gsum

gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra rab tu bsgrag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs

rab tu bsgrag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi sgra rab tu bsgrag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa'i
dkyil 'khor zhing thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu bsgrag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshul

rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu bsgrag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad snying po byang chub tu gshegs pa bdud kyi dkrugs ma rnam par 'thor ba dang / snying po byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang /

rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad pa'i dbyangs rgya mtsho rab tu bsgrag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / mdo sde'i tshul dang ming rgya mtsho'i dbyangs kyi sprin gyi 'brug
sgra bsgrag pa dang / 'gro ba 'dug pa thams cad dus la bab pa'i 'khor los 'dul ba'i chos kyi tshul dang thabs kyi sgra rab tu bsgrag pa dang / ye shes thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir smon

lam ji ltar btab pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i khyad par dang dus dang thabs dang / chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu bsgrag par byed cing / myi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom
ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ 'og gi phyogs su brten te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzhal myed khang gzugs brnyan
rab tu snang ba rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi mdzod khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri rin po che thams cad kyi gzugs kyi pad mo'i snying po yongs su gzungs ba dag mngon par sprul nas/
rin po che'i snying po byang chub thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan rab tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi gcod pan mgo la bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlab nas/ skyil mo dkrung

bcas te 'khod do/ /steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi zad
pa shin tu ston pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor kun tu snang ba'i dbyangs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi smon lam gyi gzhi rab tu
rtogs pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang
nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad dang / yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang /
tshig gi lam thams cad dang / gos dang smad yog thams cad nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor thams cad dang / bdag dang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang / sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i

de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa thams cad dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lung bstan pa dang / lung ma bstan pa ma byon pa thams cad dang / da ltar byung ba phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas

kyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad na bzhugs pa rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mdzad pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho dang / len pa dang sbyin pa'i dngos po thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan dang mtshan

dang dpe byad bzang po dang / ba spu'i sgo dang lus thams cad dang / yan lag dang nying lag dang tshig gi lam dang gos dang smad yogs thams cad la rab tu snang bar rnam par bstan pa dang / tshul khrims kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu snang bar yongs su bstan pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yan lag dang nying lag thams cad

thub pa rab tu bstan pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi brtson 'grus dang drag shul dang / rnam par gnon

pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsam gtan rgya mtsho yongs su tshol zhing rab tu bsgrub pa dang ldan pa'i

sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i tshul yongs su bsgrub cing / chos yongs su tshol ba dang ldan pa dang /
bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing shin tu zhe non pa'i lus dang po'i gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs par bya bas sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa

dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lam la 'gro ba thams cad mngon par mos par byed pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar

gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo yongs su dag pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su

bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu grub pa dang / rnam par dman pa dang / rnam par dag par byas pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar
gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyi sprin gyis rgyas par bkang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan
pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa byed cing / myi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang

bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ steng gi phyogs su brten te/ rdo rje'i dbang po sna tshogs thams cad kyis rgyan gyi snying po can gyi khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng+ge'i khri rdo rje dang /

in dra nI la'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che thams cad rab tu 'bar ba'i dra bas kun nas brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i
mtshan dbyangs su sgrog pa'i phreng ba rab tu 'phyang ba dang / mgo la rin po che'i cod pan thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis rlabs nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do// //

sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po lnga pa/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'khor dang bcas par byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang smon lam

gyis byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung nas zhal du lta ba/ ye shes yongs su dag pa'i myig dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang / mdo sde'i tshul gyis
gsung rgya mtsho la rna ba yongs su gzhol ba/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang rab tu thob par bya ba la dam pa'i pha rol tu bgrod par phyin pa'i mchog thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi drung du 'dong ba/ skad cig skad cig tu yongs su bstan par rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad lus gcig gis rgyas par dgang ba'i lus dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du lus mngon par 'byung zhing rnam par snang ba/ rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khams gcig tu snang zhing khongasu chud par yang dag par
ston pa'i lus dang ldan pa 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba dang / 'dul ba'i dus la sdod par gzhol ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra ba spu'i
bu ga thams cad nas rab tu sgrog pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ sems can gyi khams thams cad sgyu ma lta bur yongs su shes pa rab tu thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mig yor lta bur khong du chud

pa/ srid pa'i rgyud du skye ba thams cad rmi lam lta bu shes par byung ba las dang rnam par smyin pa thams cad gzugs rnyan lta bur shes pas rnam par dag pa/ ye shes mngon par grub pa thams cad smig rgyu
lta bur mngon par shes pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad sprul pa lta bur khong du chud pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa/ mi 'jigs pa'i
khyu mchog dang / seng ge'i nga ros rnam par gnon pa/ so so yang dag par rig pa myi zad pa'i rgya mtshor zhugs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad rgya mtshor zhugs pa/ chos kyi nges pa'i tshig gi ye
shes rab tu thob pa/ chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'
thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par dkrug pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/ dus gsum thams cad shes pa'i stobs
la rab tu gnas pa/ chos thams cad la ye shes sgrib pa med pa rab tu thob pa/ gnas myed pas nam mkha'i spyod yul dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa len pa myed pa/ nam mkha'
lta bu'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/ srid pa thams cad myi dmyigs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul can/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
tha myi dad pa'i ye shes kyi sgor zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gcig nas gcig tu gzung ba'i rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba dang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud thams cad du skyes pa'i lus

yongs su ston pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dbyibs phra ba dang / rgya che ba dang yangs pa dang / dog pa sna tshogs rab tu rtogs pa shin tu phra zhing rgya chen po yang dag par gzud pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa/
dmyigs pa rgya chen po shin tu phra bar shes pa dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang sems kyi skad cig la 'grogs pa rab tu thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rlabs kyi ye shes

kyi lus dang ldan pa/ phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du mgo rmongs pa myed pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa sems kyi skad cig gis phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pas rgyas par 'gengs pa sha stag
ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis de lta bu'i yon tan tshad myed pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sha stag gis dze ta'i tshal thams cad yongs su rgyas par gyur kyang / nyan

thos chen po shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u gal gyi bu dang 'od srungs chen po dang / nam 'gru dang rab 'byor dang / 'gag med dang / mos pa dang / ka ta'i bu dang / byams gang gi bu la stsogs pas dze ta'i tshal

na 'khod bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag ma mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi bkod pa de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa dang /

sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul dang / sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen po dang / sangs rgyas sbyong ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
dag pa yang ma mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa'i yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'ongs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'dus pa dang / byang chub sems
dpa' kun nas tshogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' nye bar 'ongs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i phyogs su 'khod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i seng ge'i khri bkod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i khang pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par

spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par brtse ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par bsgyings pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa

dang byang chub sems dpa'i de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lung bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su smin par gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon du 'dor ba dang /
byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi lus rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi lus yongs su rdzogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi lus rnam par dmigs pa dang / byang chub
sems dpa'i gzugs kyi lus yongasu grub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan phun sum tshogs pa yongasu dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor kha dog mtha' yas pa'i bkod pa dang /

byang chub sems dpa'i 'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu 'gyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa'i sprin kun tu 'gyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i phyogs kyi dra ba rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'

spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par sprul pa yang ma mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mi mtshungs pa'i phyir te/ de dag gis ni sngon sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i
dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bstsagaso/ /de dag la ni sngon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi yon tan dang / bkod pa

yongs su dag pa yang dag par bstan pa ma mdzad do/ /de dag la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par brjod pa ma mdzad do/ /de dag gi ni sngon 'khor ba na

'khor ba'i tshe sems can rnams/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba ma byas so/ /de dag gis ni gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rab tu bzhag

pa ma byas so/ /de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung rgyun myi gcad pa'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin no/ /de dag ni sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir brtson pa ma yin no/ /de dag gis ni byang chub sems
dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul ba ma byas so/ /de dag gis ni sngon 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/ 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi sa la dmigs par ma
byas so/ /de dag gis ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar bstsags pa ma byas so/ /de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu ma

bsgrubs so/ /de dag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pa'i mngon par shes pa khong du ma chud do/ /de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa'i mig gi lam gyi rnam par dmigs

par bya ba 'jig rten las 'das pa thun mong ma yin pa'i byang chub tu dmigs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam chen po las byung ba khong du ma chud do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kun gyis ni
byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes sna tshogs yongs su 'dzin lags kyis/ rnam par dmigs pa thun mong ma yin pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlab las byung ba'i sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i chos nyid kyi grub pa/

byang chub sems dpa' 'du shes sna tshogs yongasu 'dzin pa byin gyis rlob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i shugs chen po rnam par 'phel bar byed pa khong du ma chud do/ /de bas na nyan thos chen po mchog gi

gzung dang / bzang po'i gzung la sogs pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de mi mthong mi thos so/ /mi shes so/ /khong du mi chud do/ /mi rtogaso/ /mi rig go/ /yid mi ches so/ /mi sems so/ /

rnam par myi lta'o/ /rtogs par mi lta'o/ /nges par mi sems so/ /nye bar mi sems so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul te nyan thos kyi spyod yul ma yin no/ /de bas na nyan thos chen po de dag

dze ta'i tshal de nyid na 'khod kyang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mi mthong ngo / de dag la de dang 'thun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba med do/ /de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong du

de lta bu'i ye shes kyi myig rnam par ma dag go/ /dmyigs pa chung ngu la rgya chen po'i byin gyis rlabs kyis 'jug tu ting nge 'dzin de lta bu med do/ /de dag shes pa dang / khong du chud par bya ba 'am/ rtogs par
bya ba 'am/ rgyas par dgang par bya ba 'am/ 'jug par bya ba 'am/ rnam par lta ba 'am/ nyams su myong bar bya ba 'am/ gnan pa 'am/ rnam par gnan pa 'am/ gzhan gyis thos par bya ba 'am/
bstan par bya ba 'am/ smos par bya ba 'am/ yang dag par bstan par bya ba 'am/ bstabs par bya ba 'am/ sbyin par bya ba 'am/ de la sems can rnams yongs su bskul bar bya ba 'am/ sbyar bar

bya ba 'am/ rab tu 'god par bya ba 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i chos nyid la sems can dgod par bya bar yang de dag la de lta bu'i rnam par thar pa myed do/ /de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul med do/ /de lta bu'i khyu

mchog gi mthu med do/ /de lta bu'i stobs med do/ /de lta bu'i gnas med do/ /de lta bu'i 'du shes med do/ /de lta bu'i myig gi mthu med do/ /de lta bu'i ye shes med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni de ltar nyan thos kyi theg

pa las byung ba nyan thos kyi lam gyis yongs su grub pa/ nyan thos kyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa/ nyan thos kyi 'bras bu la gnas pa/ bden pa snang ba shes pas nges par rtog pa/ yang dag pa'i

mtha' la gnas pa/ shin tu zhi ba'i mthar thug pa/ snying rje chen po'i bsam pa med pa/ 'jig rten thams cad la myi lta mi sdod pa/ rang gi don grub pa dag ste/ de dag ni dze ta'i tshal de nyid du kun nas 'dus te

'khod la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga dang g.yas g.yon dang / snam na bcom ldan 'das la mngon du lta bar gnas kyang / dze ta'i tshal der sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong bar ma gyur to/ /

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thams cad mkhyen pa yang dag par ma bsgrub pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par ma bsdus pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la yang dag par ma zhugs pa dang /
thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la smon lam yang dag par ma btab pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par ma bsgrub pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongasu ma bsgoms pa dang /

thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ma sbyangs pa de dag gis ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa de la 'jug cing rtogs par bya ba 'am/ blta zhing khong du chud par bya bar mi nus so/ /

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' rigs dang ldan pa rnams kyi mig gi lam gyis blta ba yin gyis/ nyan thos kyi myig gi blta ba ma yin no/ /de bas na nyan thos chen po de dag dze ta'i tshal

de nyid na 'khod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'dus pa yang mthong bar ma

gyur to/ /de 'ang 'di lta ste dper na/ gang ga'i chu klung chen po'i ngogs pha rol tshur rol du yi dgas bkres pa dang / skom pas rab tu mnan pa gcer bu/ gos myed pa/ lus kyi mdog dang kha dog tshig cing mtshungs

pa rlung dang nyi mas bskams pa/ bya rog mang pos gtses ba/ spyang ku dang / was tho btsam pa/ brgya stong mang po kun nas 'dus kyang / gang ga'i chu klung chen po myi mthong ste/ sgrib pa'i las gyi sgrib pa'i
phyir la las ni bskams te chu med par mthong ngo / /la las ni thal bas yongs su gang bar mthong ngo / /de bzhin du nyan thos chen po gnas brtan de dag dze ta'i tshal de nyid na 'khod kyang thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid dang mi 'thun pa'i phyogs ma rig pa'i ling thog gis myig kun nas khebs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sa yis dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus yongasu ma bzung ba'i phyir/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag ma mthong ma shes so/ /'di lta ste dper na 'dun ma chen po 'dus pa'i skye bo mang po'i dbus su myi la la zhig gnyid kyi myos te/ log par gyur nas de gnyid kyis

log pa'i rmyi lam du gnas te de nyid na lha'i grong brdal brgya byin gyi gnas blta na mdzes pa dang / ri rab kyi steng shing dang bcas pa/ bza' shing gi ra ba'i 'khor dang bcas pa/ lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig

brgya stong gis gang ba/ lha'i bu khrag khrig brgya phrag stong snyed gnas pa na lha'i me tog sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang / yid bzhin gyi shing lha rdzas kyi gos dang mu tig gi phreng ba dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang /

se mo do sna tshogs mang po 'byin pa dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs rlung gis yongs su bskyod cing sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong la snyan pa 'byin pa'i sil snyan gyi shing mang po dang / dga' ba'i rtse mo

bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs mthong bar gyur la/ lha'i bu mo mang pos glu blangs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rol mo byas pa'i sgra yid du 'ong zhing snyan pa thos par gyur to/ /bdag nyid kyang de na 'dug pa snyam byed la/

lha rdzas kyi bkod pas klubs pa'i gnas de dag thams cad mthong bar gyur kyang / skye bo'i tshogs mang po de dag gis gnas de nyid na 'khod bzhin du mi mthong / ye shes khong du mi chud do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/

de ni skyes bu gnyid kyi log pa de nyid kyi rmi lam gyis blta ba yin gyi/ gnas de nyid na 'khod kyang skye bo mang po de dag gis blta ba ma yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi

dbang po byang chub la mngon par mos pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs rgya chen po dang / rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs ma nor bar shin tu bstsags pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon lam shin tu mngon

par bsgrub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thams cad la shin tu zhugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam bkod pa chen po dang ldan pa la shin tu gnas pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi chos

nyid dang / yan lag rnam pa thams cad du shin tu rdzogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i khyad par dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i

sa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par spyod pa thams cad la rnam par rtse ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul thams

cad la chags pa myed par rnam par spyod pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa de dag mthong zhing khong du chud la nyamasu myong bar gyur kyang /

nyan thos chen po mchog gi zung dang / bzang po'i zung la stsogs pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa'i myig myed pas mthong bar ma gyur shes par ma gyur to/ /'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po kha ba can sman

gyi 'byung gnas kyis gang ba la sngags dang / rig sngags dang / sman gyi tshul dang / blang ba'i rgyus shes shing rig sngags grub pa'i skyes bu gnas pa/ sman gyi cho ga thams cad shes pa sman blang ba'i las

byed kyang / ri bo'i dbang po de nyid la gnas pa'i phyugs dang / ba lang dang ra lug 'tsho ba dang / rngon pa dang de ma yin pa'i myi sman gyi tshul myi shes pa gzhan dag gis/ sman de dag gi cho ga dang / sman gyi ro dang mthu
dang yon tan dang byin dang / thabs dang 'phrod pa mi shes so/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi yul la zhugs pa byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul gyi
byung ba/ de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul de dag mthong yang nyan thos chen po mchog gi zung dang / bzang po'i zung la stsogs pa rang gi dgos pas tshim par
gyur pa/ gzhan gyi dgos pa yal bar gzhog pa/ btang snyoms can de dag dze ta'i tshal de nyid na gnas kyang / tshe 'di la bde bar spyod pas bde zhing dga' bar gnas pa/ las phar de bzhin gshegs

pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul de dag khong du mi chud do/ /'di lta ste dper na/ sa chen po rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas phun sum tshogs pa/ gter brgya stong du mas gang ba rin po che

sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas yongs su gang ba 'di la'ang rin po che'i 'byung gnas dang / gter gyi rgyus la mkhas shing byang ba'i myi rin po che brtag pa'i gtsug lag gis blo shin tu byang ba gter gyi gtsug

lag dang rgyus dang / dan rtags gya nom par lob pa/ bsod nams rgya chen po'i stobs kyis brten pa de dag de las rin po che ci 'dod par blangs shing / bdag kyang yongasu tshim par byed pa dang / pha dang ma la'ang legs
par rim gror byed/ bu pho smos kyang legs par gso bar byed cing / de ma yin pa'i sems can rgan pa dang / na ba dang / dbul ba dang / nyam nyes pa dang / kha zas dang / gos kyis myi 'byor pa rnams la
sdud cing khyab par bgo bsha' byed la/ nor gyi dga' ba sna tshogs nyams su myong bar byed kyang / sems can rin po che'i 'byung gnas dang / gter gyi rgyus myi shes pa bsod nams ma byas pa/

rin po che la shes pa'i myig yongs su ma dag pa/ de dag de nyid ni 'khod kyang / rin po che'i 'byung gnas dang / rin po che'i gter de dag khong du myi chud myi shes pas rin po che'ang blang du med do/ /rin po
che'i don kyang byar med do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul bsam gyis myi khyab pa la ye shes kyi myig shin tu rnam par dag pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i

ye shes kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la zhugs pa/ de dag dze ta'i tshal na 'khod cing sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong la chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug cing ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya

yongasu bsgrub ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa dang / rim gro la brtson zhing dam pa'i chos yongasu bzung ba la mngon par brtson te/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can de dag yongasu sdud kyang / nyan thos chen po
de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po kun nas 'dus pa de lta bu'ang ma mthong ma shes so/ /'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig

myig gnyis gos kyis bkab ste/ rin po che'i gling du phyin par gyur na/ des rin po che'i gling der phan tshun 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang 'dug pa dang nyal ba byas kyang rin po che'i 'byung gnas de mi mthong ngo / /

rin po che'i shing dang gos kyi rin po che dang / spos rin po che dang / rin po che thams cad kyang mi mthong la/ rin po che de dag gi spyod yul lam/ rin thang ngam/ yongs su spyod pa'i rgyus kyang mi shes pas/ de ni rin po

che de dag len kyang mi len la/ rin po che'i don kyang nyams su myong bar myi byed do/ /gang gi mig la sgrib pa med pa de dag gis ni de dag thams cad mthong zhing shes so/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos rin

po che'i gling chen por phyin pa de dag gis bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rgyan tu gyur pa mngon du gyur te/ dze ta'i tshal na bzhugs shing sangs rgyas kyi rnam par
'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su ston pa mthong yang nyan thos chen po de dag /de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung de nyid na gnas shing spyod kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin
gyi yul rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul de dag ma mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs mang po de lta bu'i rin po che'i 'byung gnas chen po yang mthong bar ma gyur to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang / cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mi 'thun pa'i phyogs kyi ma rig pa'i gos kyis

ye shes kyi myig bkab pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi mig yongs su dag pa de lta bu med do/ /de dag gis chos kyi dbyings gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa la 'jug pa de lta bu khong du mi chud do/ /

'di lta ste dper na/ mig yongs su dag pa rdul dang bral bas rab tu snang ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba rab rib dang / mun pa thams cad dang mi 'grogs pa yod de/ de myi la la zhig gis thob par gyur na/ de rdul dang

bral bas rab tu snang ba dang ldan pa'i mig yongs su dag pa dang ldan pas mtshan mo mun pa'i mun nag shin tu gnag par gyur pa'i nang na sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong kun nas 'dus pa dang / cho ga

dang spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan zhing mun pa'i rab rib kyis mig yongs su 'khrug par gyur pa myi'i khrod na 'dug cing rnam par rgyu la phan tshun 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs

kyis spyod kyang mi de dag gis skyes bu spyod lam sna tshogs kyi spyod pa de mi mthong mi shes so/ /skyes bu des ni 'gro ba'i tshogs chen po spyod lam dang tshogs sna tshogs kyis rnam par spyod pa/ phyogs

tha dad du mngon par bltas pa/ dbyibs kyi rnam pa tha dad pa kha dog gi rnam pa tha dad pa dmigs pa'i tshul tha dad pa thams cad kyang mi mthong ba myed do/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems

dpa'i tshogs kyi 'khor mnga' ba/ rnam par dag cing chags pa mi mnga' ba'i spyan dang ldan pas 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen cing gzigs te/ sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang cho 'phrul

chen po bstan pa mdzad kyang / nyan thos chen po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par sprul pa'i cho 'phrul chen po de dag mthong bar ma gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs chen po de lta bu yang mthong bar ma gyur to/ /'di lta ste dper na/ dge slong la la zhig skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi dbus su sas khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa 'am/
chus khyab pa 'am/ mes khyab pa 'am/ rlung gis khyab pa 'am/ sngon pos khyab pa 'am/ ser pos khyab pa 'am/ dmar pos khyab pa dang / dkar pos khyab pa 'am/ lhas khyab pa 'am/ sems can sna tshogs kyi

lus kyis khyab pa 'am/ sgra dbyangs kun gyi khyab pa 'am/ dmigs pa thams cad kyi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na 'gro ba mang po'i tshogs de dag gi chu'i phung po de mi mthong ngo / /me'i

snang ba de yang mi snang ngo / /sems can sna tshogs kyi lus kyis khyab pa dang / dmyigs pa thams cad kyi khyab pa'i bar du yang mi mthong ste/ ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs shing rnam par spyod
pa rnams ni ma gtogaso/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi yul gyi rnam par sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag yongasu bstan pa mdzad na nyan thos chen po
de dag gi mthong zhing shes par ma gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam la zhugs pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul de dag mthong ngo / /khong du chud do 'di lta ste dper na/

sku 'grub pa'i myi ni mig gnyis bskus ma thag tu/ skye bo mang po thams cad kyi lus mi mthong ngo / /des ni 'gro 'am 'dug gam/ 'greng yang rung ste/ 'gro ba mang po thams cad mthong ngo / /de bzhin du
de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten las 'das par 'gro ba thams cad kyi yul las yongasu 'das pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul du zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi mig gi

shes par bya ba des 'gro ba thams cad gzigs kyang nyan thos chen po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag ma mthong ngo / /'di lta ste dper na/ myi'i tsher 'grogs pa'i lha rtag tu rjesu
'brang ba ni/ des myi de mthong yang myis lha de mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul la zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kun nas 'dus pa chen po'i dbusu

sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po yongasu bstan pa mdzad kyang / nyan thos chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil
'khor gyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag kyang ma mthong ngo / /ma shes so/ /'di lta ste dper na/ dge slong sems can thams cad la dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu bgrod par phyin pa'i 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog

pa la snyoms par zhugs pa ni shes pa med la tshor ba med pas dbang po drug gi kyang bya ba gang yang nyams su mi myong ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa'ang ma yin la 'jig rten gyi tha snyad thams cad gnas de

yod kyang snyoms par zhugs pa de nyid kyi byin gyis rlabs pa dang mthus des mi shes myi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du nyan thos chen po de dag dze ta'i tshal de na'ang rnam par spyod la de dag la dbang po drug kyang yod de/ de bzhin

gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang / cho 'phrul de dag mthong bar ma gyur/ khong du chud par ma gyur shes par ma gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i

cho 'phrul chen po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag kyang khong du ma chud ma mthong ma shes so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni zab cing yangs la tshad med de/ blta bar
dka' zhing rtogs par dka' ste/ khong du chud par dka' la 'jig rten thams cad las yongasu 'das pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ nyan thos dang / sangs rgyas thams cad

kyi myi 'dus pa'o/ /de bas na nyan thos chen po de dag dze ta'i tshal de nyid na 'khod cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung na spyod kyang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag dang byang chub sems dpa'i

tshogs chen po de dag kyang ma mthong ngo / /dze ta'i tshal 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par dag pa'i yon tan dang / rgyan yongasu 'dus pa de 'ang ma mthong ma shes so/ /

de ni snod du ma gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzad kyis smon lam gyi gtsug gi 'od zer rab tu snang bas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa
'di dag smras so/ /ltos shig sems can dam pa yi/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bsam mi khyab/ /rgyal bas sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul pa/ dze ta'i tshal chen 'dir bstan to/ /rang byung rnams kyi byin
gyis rlabs/ /bgrang du med par 'byung ba la/ /sangs rgyas chos tshul mi shes pa'i/ /'jig rten kun kyang mgo rmongs so/ /chos kyi rgyal po'i cho 'phrul dag /tshad med bsam gyis mi
khyab cing / /shin tu zab pa 'byung ba ni/ /de la 'jig rten 'bab mi nus/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kha dog mdog /mtshan gyis shin tu rnam par klubs/ /yang dag sangs rgyas bskyed pa
yis/ /chos rab de dag mtshan nyid myed/ /rnam 'phrul mtha' dang dbus myed pa/ /tshig gi lam gyis rjod dka' ba'i/ /rnam 'phrul shin tu zab pa dag /rgyal bas dze ta'i tshal du bstan/ /
rgyal sras bdag nyid che ba'i rnams/ /zhing rnams bsam yas bye ba nas/ /rgyal ba'i zhal ltar mos dga' ste/ /kun nas 'dus pa'i tshogs la ltos/ /smon lam yongasu phun sum tshogs/ /
smon lam spyod pa chags myed pa/ /de dag bsam pa shes par ni/ /'jig rten kun gyis mi nus so/ /de dag sems dang spyod yul dang / /spyod pa dag kyang nyan thos dang / /rang rgyal thams
cad yongs kyis kyang / /rnam pa kun tu shes mi nus/ /rgyal sras shes rab chen po rnams/ /gzhan gyis thub dka' pham byed la/ /dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan ma 'dres shing / /ye shes sa la
gzhol gyur pa/ /ting 'dzin dpag tu tshad myed la/ /grangs chen mnyam par bzhag pa rnams/ /chos dbyings thams cad rgyas bkang zhing / /rnam par 'phrul pa kun kyang ston/ /de nas byang chub
sems dpa' thub par dka' ba'i brtson 'grus kyi shugs kyi rgyal pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis/ phyogs bcur rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /
bsod nams snying po shes rab che/ /byang chub spyod pa'i tshul rtogs shing / /'jig rten kun la bde byed pa'i/ /bde gshegs sku las skyes pa ltos/ /yid gzhungs blo gros mtha' yas shing / /
shin tu mnyam bzhag sems ldan pa/ /mtha' dang dbus med zab pa yi/ /ye shes rgya chen spyod yul can/ /rgyan rab mang pos mdzes byas pa'i/ /dze ta'i nags tshal rgya che ba/ /byang chub sems
dpas kun rgyas shing / /bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i gnas gyur pa/ /gnas med mi gnas gyur pa rnams/ /phyogs rnams bcu nas kun 'dus te/ /pad+mo'i stan la 'khod pa dag /rgya mtsho mang la
blta ba gyis/ /gnas myed len pa med pa rnams/ /spros pa med cing myi rten la/ /rdul bral chags pa'i sems med pa/ /chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba dang / /ye shes rgyal chen rab dpa' ba/ /
rdo rje'i sems ni mi g.yo zhing / /grub pa med pa'i chos rnams la/ /mya ngan 'da' bar gang ston pa/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing mang bye ba rnams/ /grangs kyi myi chod kun nas 'dus/ /yang dag sangs rgyas
drung du lhags/ /gnyis kyi 'du shes rnam par spangs/ /rang 'byung shAkya seng ge yis/ /rnam par 'phrul pa 'di dag mthong / /de yi byin rlabs dam pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag lhags/ /
sangs rgyas chos la byed pa myed/ /chos dbyings gzhi la'ang de bzhin te/ /tha snyed tsam du yongs 'byed pa'i/ /pha rol phyin pa rgyal ba'i sras/ /chos kyi dbyings la dbyer med pa'i/ /
mtha' la thug pa de dag gnas/ /tshig rnams yongs su zad med pas/ /chos la dbye ba'ang rab tu 'byed/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'phags pa'i gzi brjid rgyal pos/
sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /ltos shig sems can dam pa yi/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor shin tu yangs/ /
dus dang dus myin mkhyen mdzad cing / /sems can rnams la chos kyang ston/ /mu stegs ldan pa tshogs 'dus pa'i/ /rgol ba thams cad rab tu 'joms/ /sems can bsam pa ji
bzhin du/ /rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston/ /phyogs na mi bzhugs bde gshegs rnams/ /sangs rgyas yul gyi rjes su bzhud/ /tshad myed pa dang tshad yod pas/ /thub pa chen po 'das pa myin/ /
nyi ma mkha' las 'gro ba ni/ /nyin par bgrang bar mos pa byed/ /de bzhin mkhyen pas mkhas ston pa/ /dus gsum chags pa med pas brjod/ /zla ba nya ba'i mtshan mo la/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
'phags par snang / /de bzhin chos dkar yongs rdzogs pa'i/ /mgon po rnams kyang mthong ba yi/ /bar snang namakha'i dbyings 'di las/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rgyu ba na/ /gar yang thogs pa med par
'gro/ /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul de bzhin no/ /ji ltar nam mkha'i phyogs rnams kyi/ /zhing rnams kun la mi gnas pa/ /de bzhin 'jig rten sgron ma yi/ /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul shes par bya/ /
ji ltar sa ni 'jig rten na/ /lus can kun gyi gnas yin pa/ /'jig rten sgron ma'i 'jig rten na/ /chos kyi 'khor lo de ltar gnas/ /ji ltar rlung ni chags med par/ /mkha' las mgyogs
par rab rgyu ba/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas chos nyid kyang / /'jig rten khams su rab tu rgyu/ /ji ltar chu yi phung po la/ /zhing rnams bgrangs pa kun gnas pa/ /de bzhin dus gsum sangs rgyas kyang / /
ye shes tshogs la rab tu gnas/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi snying po chags pa med pa'i rgyal pos/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe

tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /ji ltar rdo rje ri dang brag /zang yag shin tu mtho yangs pa/ /ji ltar 'jig rten kun skyob pa'i/ /sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags pas mtho/ /ji ltar rgya mtsho'i chu chen
dag /tshad med rnyog pa med pa ltar/ /sangs rgyas mthong ba'ang de bzhin te/ /'jig rten kun gyi skom pa gcod/ /rgya mtsho chu las 'phags pa yi/ /ri bo ri rab ci 'dra ba/ /de bzhin 'jig rten sgron ma
yang / /chos kyi mtsho las mngon par 'phags/ /rin chen kun gyi 'byung gnas kyis/ /rgya mtsho rgyas pa ji bzhin du/ /rang byung ye shes de bzhin te/ /mi zad skad cig rab mkhyen pa/ /mgon po'i ye
shes shin tu zab/ /tshad med de bzhin bgrang du myed/ /de bas sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul pa/ /bsam gyis mi khyab tshad med ston/ /sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid ston pa yi/ /sgyu mkhan mkhas pa ji lta ba/ /
da ltar sangs rgyas mkhyen dbang yang / /rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu ston/ /yid bzhin nor bu rnam dag pa/ /bsam don rdzogs byed ji lta ba/ /de bzhin bsam pa dag pa la/ /rgyal ba smon lam
rdzogs pa mdzad/ /'od snang gsal ba byed pa yi/ /rin chen rnam snang ji lta ba/ /de ltar thams cad mkhyen dag pa/ /'gro ba'i bsam pa gsal bar mdzad/ /ji ltar phyogs la mngon blta'o/ /
rin chen zur brgyad rab gnas pa/ /de bzhin chags med sgron ma yang / /chos dbyings rab tu snang ba mdzad/ /chu dang rin chen 'od gsal ba/ /ji ltar dri med chu 'dang byed/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas
mthong bas kyang / /'gro ba'i dbang po dag par 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su smon lam rab tu 'phrul ba'i zla ba'i rgyal pos/ sangs rgyas kyis
byin gyis rlabs kyi phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /phyogs 'di in dra nI la yi/ /kha dog mdog gcig byas pa ltar/ /sangs rgyas mthong
bas skye dgu rnams/ /de bzhin byang chub mdog tu 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rdul phran re re la/ /rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs rnams/ /tshad myed gzhal du med pa ston/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnam
dag mdzad/ /de ni rmad byung shin tu zab/ /mtha' yas bsgrub par dka' ba ste/ /blo ldan ye shes yul de la/ /'jig rten rnams ni 'bab mi nus/ /byang chub sems dpa' bsgrubs don du/ /
bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / /sangs rgyas tshul gyis rnam sbyangs pa'i/ /chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa ston/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams mtha' yas pa/ /blo ldan bskor ba'i
sangs rgyas kyis/ /kun nas gang bar gyur pa yang / /rgyal ba de la ston pa mdzad/ /chos kun mnga' sgyur ston pa ste/ /shAkya'i khyu mchog skyes par gyur/ /de yi cho 'phrul tshad med pas/ /
'di dag rab tu byung ba yin/ /brtan pa'i spyod pa sna tshogs rnams/ /tshad med rnam par gzigs kun nas/ /rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' yas pa/ /tshad med gzi can ston pa mdzad/ /
'jig rten mgon po rgyal sras rnams/ /chos kyi dbyings la slob pa mdzad/ /chos rnams thams cad yongs la yang / /chags med ye shes spyod yul 'gyur/ /skyes bu dbang po'i byin rlabs
kyis/ /cho 'phrul brgya dang rab ldan zhing / /'jig rten thams cad rnam sbyong ba'i/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /sems can gtso bo'i yul la yang / /ye shes dkyil 'khor yongs sbyongs shing /
shes rab chen po'i klu chen rnams/ /'jig rten thams cad 'grel bar 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi don gyi blo gros gzi brjid rgyal pos/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ /
phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /drang srong dam pa'i mchog rnams kyi/ /dus gsum nyan thos gang byung ba/ /de dag kun gyis bde gshegs kyis/ /gshegs
thabs 'jog 'deg mi shes so/ /dus gsum ma lus thams cad kyi/ /ma nor rang rgyal gang byung ba/ /de dag gis kyang mgon po yi/ /gshegs thabs 'jog 'deg mi rig go/ /ma rig mun pas
bsgribs pa rnams/ /khyi ltar ltung la rgyus pa yi/ /sems can de 'dra kun gyis ni/ /mgon po myi shes smos mi dgos/ /rgyal ba tshad mas gzhal ba myin/ /de ni shes par mi nus te/ /sangs rgyas
chags myed ye shes can/ /tshig gi lam las shin tu 'das/ /zla ba nya rgyas 'od mnga' ba/ /brtan pa mtshan gyis rnam par bris/ /de ni bskal pa dpag yas par/ /rnam 'phrul thogs med
spyod pa mdzad/ /tshul sgo re res sangs rgyas la/ /shin tu mnyam bzhag bsam byas kyang / /bskal pa bye ba bsam yas pa/ /brjod du med pa zad gyur gyi/ /rang byung rnams kyi yon tan ni/ /
phyogs gcig cha yis mthar myi phyin/ /sangs rgyas de yi zhal bltas kyang / /sangs rgyas chos ni bsam myi khyab/ /gang zhig de la smon byed cing / /gang zhig yid kyis dga' mos pa/ /de dag
kun gyi de 'dra ba'i/ /spyod yul blta dka' 'thob par 'gyur/ /bsod nams ye shes mtha' yas dang / /tshogs can yangs pas rnam gnon la/ /dri med blo ldan sems gnas pa/ /de dag 'di yi tshul
la 'jug /de dag smon lam rgya che bas/ /sems dang sdom pa rgya che ste/ /rgyal ba'i spyod yul thob gyur cig /byang chub rgya chen gnon par 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi

dkyil 'khor rnam par 'thor ba'i ye shes rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal pos/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ /de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /chags med ye shes
sku mnga' bas/ /rang byung rnams ni sku med de/ /bsam yas ye shes yul mnga' bas/ /de dag bsam par mi nus so/ /phrin las dkar po bsam yas pas/ /sangs rgyas sku rab bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /de la
'jig rten gsum gyi mgon/ /mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos mdzes/ /chos kyi dbyings kyis rnam sbyangs pas/ /'jig rten kun tu snang ba mdzad/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sgo yin te/ /ye shes kun gyis
gnas chen no/ /chags pa thams cad rnam spangs pas/ /rdul med spros pa mi mnga'o/ /ye shes 'od zer rab 'gyed pas/ /'jig rten kun tu nyi ma 'dra/ /khams gsum thams cad rnam sbyongs pas/ /
srid pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par gcod/ /byang chub sems dpa' bsgrub pa mdzad/ /byang chub 'byung gnas de bzhin no/ /kha dog mtha' yas ston mdzad kyang / /kha dog kun la gnas pa med/ /
sems can kun gyis bsam yas pa'i/ /kha dog tshad med yongs su ston/ /skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas kyi/ /byang chub bsam yas sbyangs pas na/ de yis ye shes mthar phyin par/ /rtag par
sus kyang mi nus so/ /ye shes bstan pa zad myi shes/ /rang bzhin rnam par 'gyur ba med/ /de la dus gsum rgyal ba kun/ /skad cig gcig gis rab tu brjod/ /rtag par las gzhan yongs btang ste/ /
shes ldan byang chub don gnyer bas/ /sems la sems shes bya ba yang / /de la sems skye myed par bsam/ /gang gi sangs rgyas bskyed pa yi/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams bsam mi khyab/ /de dag brjod
pa'i yul ma yin/ /shin tu zab pas tshig lam spangs/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzad kyi smon lam dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyis/ /sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyi phyogs
bcur rnam par bltas te/ /de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /dran pa rmongs myed dag pa rnams/ /chos 'dzin shin tu nges rtogs shing / /blo gros bsam gyis mi khyab la/ /byang chub rgya
mtsho myi zad pa/ /de dag yid ni 'di la nges/ /de dag spyod pa'i spyod yul yin/ /de dag shes pa 'dir myi g.yo/ /de dag 'di la the tsom chad/ /de dag skyo bar myi 'gyur te/ /de dag yid kyang zhum mi
'gyur/ /sangs rgyas chos la rab gzhol bar/ /de dag sems kyang rab tu 'byung / de dag dad pa rting tshugs shing / /yang dag 'phags pa rab tu bskyed/ /dmigs med gnas pa med pa yi/ /ye shes
'di la de dag dga'/ /bskal pa bye bar bstsags pa yi/ /yongasu rdzogs pa'i dge ba'i chos/ /ye shes 'di 'dod mtshungs pa med/ /de dag thams cad yongs su bsngo/ /'khor ba'i nang na rgyu ba yang / /
'khor ba dag la gnas pa myin/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams rab rtogs pas/ /sangs rgyas yul la rab tu brtse/ /sems can khams ni ji snyed du/ /'jig rten phun sum tshogs rgyu ba/ /de dag thams cad
brtan pas spangs/ /sangs rgyas phun sum tshogs la gnas/ /sangs rgyas rtag tu 'byung gyur kyang / /'jig rten don myed rab tu gnas/ /chags med spyod pa de dag ni/ /rtag tu sems can don la gnas/ /
de dag spyod pa mtshungs med de/ /lus can kun gyis bsam mi khyab/ /'jig rten bde ba kun sems pas/ /de dag sdug bsngal rnam par bzlog /'jig rten kun la snying brtse zhing / /byang chub ye shes
rnam dag pas/ /de dag 'jig rten snang bar 'gyur/ /'jig rtan thams cad rab tu 'grol/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par grol ba'i rgyal pos/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs
kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /bskal pa bye ba phrag brgyar yang / /sangs rgyas sgra ni rab bkod na/ /the tsom thams cad gcod pa yi/ /dam pa'i
mthong ba ci zhig smos/ /chos kun thugasu chud rtogs pa/ /'jig rten gsum po'i bsod nams stegs/ /sems can thams cad rnam sbyong ba'i/ /'jig rten sgron ma mthong gi dga'/ /sems can gtso bo

ma smad pa'o/ /gzugs kyi sku ni mthong gyur na/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig tu/ /ngoms shing tshim pa skyer mi btub/ /myi'i dbang po'i sku gzugs la/ /rgyal ba'i sras rnams lta lta zhing / /rang gi dge
ba'i chags myed pa/ /gzhan don brtson pa byang chub bsngo/ /thub pa chen po'i gzugs kyi sku/ /de las so so yang dag rig /chags myed ye shes 'byung gyur bas/ /de ni sangs rgyas byang chub bsngo/ /
sems can bsam yas tshad myed pa/ /snang bar mdzad de theg chen la/ /btsud nas thub pa med pa'i mchog /byang chub dam par lung yang bstan/ /bsod nams chen po'i rang bzhin zhing / /ye shes dkyil

'khor shar cing byung / /'jig rten tshad myed kun tu snang / /bsod nams phung po rnam 'phel mdzad/ /sdug bsngal dra ba rab tu gcad/ /ye shes phung po rnam par spyod/ /gang gis rgyal ba bsnyen bkur ba/ /
de dag ngan song 'jigs pa med/ /rkang gnyis dam pa mthong gyur na/ /shin tu yangs pa'i sems skye ste/ /'di snang gsal ba'i shes rab mthu/ /grangs med de bzhin skye bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas skyes
bu'i mchog mthong zhing / /byang chub dam par nges par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur bya zhes/ /de dag kun kyang nges par sems/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi smon lam gyi

gzhi rab tu rtog pas/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlab kyi de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smraso/ /yon tan mtha' yas phun ldan pa/ /shAkya'i khyu mchog thub mthong nas/ /yongasu bsngo ba byed pa'i sems/ /
theg pa che la rnam par dag /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /thugs rje che mnga'i brten pa rnams/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bskal pa
khrag khrig phrag brgyar yang / /sems can don la brtson mdzad pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rnams la lus can rnams/ /kun gyis lan glan cis kyang nus/ /ngan song gsum po mi zad par/ /bskal pa bye bar
bcos bla yi/ /chags pa thams cad bzlog mdzad pa'i/ /ston pa mi mthong ma yin no/ /sems can kun gyi rgyud rnams na/ /sdug bsngal phung po ji yod pa/ /ma lus nyams su bzod nus kyi/ /
sangs rgyas mi mthong ma yin no/ /'jig rten 'di dag thams cad na/ /tha dad ngan song rgyud yod pa/ /de dag yun ring gnas bla yi/ /sangs rgyas mi mthong ma yin no/ /sems can dmyal ba re re
yang / /bskal pa tshad med gnas bla yi/ /mtha' yas rgyal bas brnyes pa yis/ /byang chub mchog las ring gnas myin/ /ci zhig phyir ni ngan song du/ /yun ring gnas par 'dod chen na/ /rgyal ba'i
dbang po mthong ba ni/ /ye shes 'phel ba'i rgyur 'gyur phyir/ /rgyal ba 'jig rten mchog mthong na/ /sdug bsngal thams cad 'chad par 'gyur/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyod yul gyi/ /
ye shes khong du chud par 'byung / /sangs rgyas myi yi mchog mthong zhing / /sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur/ /byang chub gang gis 'thob pa yi/ /bsod nams tshad med 'phel bar 'gyur/ /
sangs rgyas mthong bas sems can rnams/ /the tsom yid gnyis chad par 'gyur/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten gyi/ /bsam pa'ang yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la rnam par bltas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pa 'di nyid de bas kyang rnam par dbye

ba dang rgya cher brjod pa dang / gsal bar bya ba dang rab tu brjod pa dang / yang dag par bstan pa dang / shin tu snang bar bya ba dang / rab tu gsal bar bya ba dang man ngag bstan pa'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul
nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pas/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid dang sems can gyi khams mnyam pa nyid dang / 'jig rten thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang las kyi rgyud thams

cad mnyam pa nyid dang sems can gyi bsam pa mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can gyi mos pa mnyam pa nyid dang chos kyi snang ba mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i dus mnyam pa nyid dang /
'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po mnyam pa nyid kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa/ 'di nyid byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bstan pa'i tshul bcus yang dag par
rab tu ston te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings thams cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams la/ sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa bstan pa dang /
'di lta ste/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i skal par de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rjes su brjod pa bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/

sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su skye ba dang / mtha' dang dbus myed pa'i mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgo rgya mtsho yongs su brjod cing bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste nam mkha'i

dbyings kyi klas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun snying po byang chub la mngon du gyur pa'i gnas dang / 'di lta ste dus gsum

gyi sangs rgyas kyi sku dang 'od zer sprul pa ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas/ sems skad cig la rab tu bkye zhing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par dgang ba bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du sangs
rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho gzhi mnyam par byin gyis rlabs cing lus gcig gi rgyas par dgang ba bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste dmigs pa'i gzhi thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi rnam par sprul pa dus gsum

thams cad yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur ba'i byin gyi rlabs yang dag par bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams la/ dus gsum gyi zhing gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i sangs rgyas
kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / bskal pa rgya mtsho yongs su bshad cing bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas rab tu brjod pa
phyi ma'i mthar byin gyis rlabs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'byung ba bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i seng ge'i khri dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor

gyi dkyil 'khor dang / snying po byang chub kyi rgyan tha myi dad pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa tha myi dad pa rab tu bskor ba/ phyi ma'i mthar byin gyis rlabs pa bstan pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar seng+ge

rnam par bsgyings pa/ ting nge 'dzin 'di la bstan pa bcu po de dag la stsogs pa shin tu bstan pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ni
de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul lo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i 'di nyid kyi don gyi phyogs
bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal du lta zhing 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi
khyab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dbus med pa la rnam par bltas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab par gzhol ba la rnam par ltas
nas ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sgyu ma'i chos nyid la rnam par bltas te/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas mnyam pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rnam par bltas nas/ mtha' dang dbus med pa'i

ngag gi lam dang nges pa'i tshig dang / chos kyi tshul thams cad la rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /ba spu gcig la rgya mtsho rgal ba'i zhing / /zhing kun shin tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam/ /
de nas sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor/ /kun gyis yongs bskor sangs rgyas gdan la bzhugs/ /spu gcig rtse la zhing mang rgya mtsho rnams/ /snying po byang chub pad+mo'i gdan gnas pas/ /

chos dbyings rgya chen yongs su rgyas bkang zhing / /shing drung dam pa kun na mgon po snang / /zhing rnams kun gyi rdul phran rab mang rnyed/ /rgyal ba spu rtse gcig la yongs zhugs pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'i
'khor los yongasu bskor/ /kun kyang bzang po'i spyod pa ston pa mdzad/ /zhing mchog gcig na rgyal ba bzhugs gyur kyang / /byang chub sems dpa'i sprin mang mi zad pa/ /de dag phyogs bcu ma lus
thams cad nas/ /'byam klas zhing kun bkang zhing kun kyang 'ong / /zhing rnams bye ba'i rdul phran mnyam pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rgya mtsho'i 'od/ /phyogs bcu'i chos dbyings rgyas pa
kun bkang zhing / /ston pa de la kun kyang 'khor nas ldang / /zhing rnams kun tu gzugs rnyan rab tu ston/ /chos kyi rgyal po rgyal ba'i ye shes mtsho/ /de dag kun kyang bzang po'i spyod la gnas/ /
sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor du nye bar 'dong / /'byam klas zhing rnams kun na 'khod spyod cing / /byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba rab gnas te/ /chos kyi sprin mnyan dpa' bo de dag ni/ /
zhing gcig du yang bskal pa bye bar spyod/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par byed/ /chos kyi gangs chen mtsho spyod rnam par snang / /smon lam rgya mtsho kun la rab tu 'jug /de dag
sangs rgyas sa yi spyod yul gnas/ /rgyal ba'i chos rnams gzhan dang gzhan 'byung ba'i/ /de dag kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa shes/ /sangs rgyas yon tan legs pa rgya mtsho dang / /rnam par
'phrul pa rgya chen yangs la 'jug /bde gshegs chos dbyings kun tu rgyas bkang zhing / /zhing rnams kun gyi rdul phran ji snyed pa'i/ /sku yi sprin rnams rtag tu 'gyed mdzad cing / /
chos kyi char gyis byang chub rab la 'khod// //sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po drug pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
sems dpa' de dag sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa 'di nyid la de bas kyang bstan te/ 'god pa mdzad pa'i don du smyin mtshams kyi mdzod spu'i nang na chos kyi dbyings sgo
kun nas rnam par dmigs pas dus gsum snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer chen po 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa bkye ste/
phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad snang bar mdzad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' dze ta'i tshal du tshogs pa de dag gi
chos kyi dbyings thams cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'i khong du chud pa'i/

sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba dag la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi mying du bya ba kha dog sna tshogs dang / rnam pa sna tshogs su rnam par dag pa dang / zhing sna tshogs dang /
dbyibs sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' snying po byang chub tu phyin te/ seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyis shin tu
mchod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis kun nas bskor ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar mthong ste/ la la ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du

myed pa tsam du shin tu yangs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na/ chos kyi dbyings rgyas par khyab pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mthong ngo / /la la na ni lha'i gnas na 'dug /
la la na ni klu'i gnas na 'dug /la la na ni gnod sbyin gyi gnas na 'dug /la la na ni lha ma yin gyi gnas na 'dug /la la na ni nam mkha' lding gi gnas na 'dug /la la na ni mi'am ci'i
gnas na 'dug /la la na ni lto 'phye chen po'i gnas na 'dug /la la na ni mi'i dbang po'i nang na 'dug /la la na ni mi'i 'jig rten gyi grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong brdal dang ljongs dang /
khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag na rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dang / spyod lam sna tshogs dang / lus sna tshogs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnam par dmyigs pa sna tshogs dang /
ting nge 'dzin gyi mngon par shes pa sna tshogs dang / rigs dang rgyud sna tshogs su byung ba dang / kha dog rnam par dmyigs pa sna tshogs dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs dang / 'od zer
gyi dra ba dkye ba sna tshogs dang / dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs dang / gtam gyi skyes bu'i gzhi sna tshogs dang / bstan pa'i gzhi sna tshogs dang / tshig dang yi ge dang nges pa'i
tshig sna tshogs kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs na chos ston pa mthong bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/
nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa phyogs bcu na rnam par gnas pa/ phyogs kyi rgyud mtha' yas par 'dus pa/ phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du gtogs pa/ chos sna tshogs
kyi sgo dang ldan pa/ phyogs kyi mying du bya ba sna tshogs su gtogs pa/ phyogs sna tshogs kun tu gzhol ba/ phyogs cha rnam pa tha dad par gtogs pa/ phyogs sna tshogs kyi rjes
su song ba/ phyogs rgya mtsho sna tshogs su gtogs pa 'di lta ste/ shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang /
shar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub dang byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi zhing gi lhun gyi phyogs dang / sems can
gyi lus kyi phyogs dang / sems can gyi mying du bya ba'i phyogs dang / sngon gyi mtha'i mur thugs pa'i phyogs dang / phyogs bcu'i da ltar byung ba'i phyogs dang / nam mkha'i khongs thams
cad du skra'i rtse mo shin tu phra ba dgod pas dmigs pa'i phyogs dang / zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i phyogs la 'jug pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyogs
dang / las kyi 'du byed sna tshogs kyis yongs su grub pa'i phyogs dang / skra'i rtse mo gcig la mtha' dang dbus med pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mying du bya bar gtogs pa'i phyogs kyi
khongasu chud pa'i dus gsum gyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid du gzhol bas/ kun tu gtogs pa'i 'gro ba thams cad tha mi dad pas/ sems can thams cad kyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa la mnyam
pa'i sgra dbyangs su gyur pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems la gzugs brnyan rab tu snang bar gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'phrul ba/ sems can thams cad
kyi lus la mngon par lta ba/ dmyigs par bya bas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'gro ba'i tshul dang ldan pa/ bskal pa thams cad la ye shes tha myi dad pa zhing thams cad la kun tu snyoms
pas sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba de bzhin du gzugs mngon sum du bstan pa rnam par dmigs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang
dag par stan pas/ sems can thams cad 'dul ba rgyun mi 'chad pa mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni sngon/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis dge ba'i spyod pa bskal ba mnyam pa dang /
