bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yongs su bsdus pa mthong ba dang mnyam pa dang / rjes su dran pa bsnyen bkur bas yongasu smyin par byas pa dag go/ /sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la btsud pa dag go/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag gi drung du gshegs pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa bas yongasu bsdus pa dag ste/ de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba bskal pa
mnyam pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su smyin par 'gyur ba'i thabs kyis shin tu bzung ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa
chos kyi dbyings ltar yangs shing nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs par gyur pa dag kyang mthong zhing khong du chud par gyur pa yin te/ la la ni chos kyi sku la 'jug go/ /la la ni
gzugs kyi sku la 'jug go/ /la la ni sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su bsgrub pa la 'jug go/ /la la ni pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa la 'jug go/ /la la ni spyod pa'i
dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa'i rgyan la 'jug go/ /la la ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa yi rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug go/ /la la ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug go/ /
la la ni sangs rgyas rnam par spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin tha myi dad pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug go/ /la la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang myi bsnyengs pa la 'jug go/ /la la ni sangs rgyas kyi

so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho la 'jug go/ /de dag la stsogs pa sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la 'jug ste mos pa sna

tshogs dang lam sna tshogs dang / sgo sna tshogs dang 'jug pa sna tshogs dang / 'bab pa sna tshogs dang rnam pa sna tshogs dang / rjes su 'brang ba sna tshogs dang phyogs sna tshogs dang snod sna tshogs dang yul

sna tshogs dang / 'jig rten sna tshogs dang khong du chud pa sna tshogs dang / tshogs sna tshogs dang rnam 'phrul sna tshogs dang / thabs sna tshogs dang ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyis sangs rgyas kyi rnam par
'phrul pa rgya mtsho de dag la 'jug go/ /ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyis 'jug pa 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kun nas brgyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting
nge 'dzin dus gsum thams cad la thogs pa med par yul snang bar byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi tha myi dad pa'i ye shes snang ba dang / byang chub

sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gyi dbyings la 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin nam mkha'i dbyings su snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin
gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'thob pas rnam par 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi snyengs pa mi mnga' ba'i rgyan gyis rnam par gnon cing rnam par bsgyings pa dang /

byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad kyi klong gi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings thams cad du thogs pa med par sgra sgrog pas rgyas par

'gengs pa'i zla ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyi brgyan pa'i 'od kyi byang chub sems dpa' de dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par
'phrul pa rgya mtsho de dag la rab tu 'jug go/ /byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi rgyal po'i thabs chags pa myed pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmyigs pa

thams cad la sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rnam par lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyud thams cad du tha myi dad pa'i lus snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs

pa'i sku tha dad pa'i yul la 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten thams cad kyi rgyud kyi rjes su 'jug pa snying rje chen po'i snying po can dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos
thams cad kyi gnas la brten pa'i byin gyis rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu zhi la rab tu zhi bas kun tu snang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
sprul pa bzang po dmigs su med pas/ kun tu 'phrul pa'i gzugs brnyan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin zhing thams cad yongs su 'du ba'i byin gyis rlabs dang / byang chub sems

dpa'i ting nge 'dzin zhing thams cad du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad du dbang po'i kha dog gis rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub
sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad du khyad du 'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor chags pa med pa'i rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
bskyed pa las byung ba'i byin gyis rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad la nan tan gyi 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmyigs pa ma lus
pa thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pa mngon par bsgrub pas/ phyi ma'i mthar byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho
la 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyi ma'i mthar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs yang dag par 'dzin pa'i byin gyis rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
phyogs bcu'i zhing rgya mtsho da ltar byung ba thams cad yongs su dag par mos pa'i byin gyis rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas thams cad dang
rnam par spyod cing 'grogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmyigs pa thams cad la chags pa med pa'i mthar 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten gyi khams

thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu byin gyis rlobs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skur 'phrul pa mngon par sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dbang po

rgya mtsho rdo rje'i dbang po lta bu thams cad khong du chud pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sku gcig pa'i snying po'i byin gyis rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin

sems kyi skad cig gcig gi cha la chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad khong du chud pas khom par gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings thams cad du zhing 'byam klas pa sgrub pa

yongs su ston pa'i byin gyis rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin spyi'u tshugasu gzhi la rnam par spyod pa'i byin gyis rlabs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams

cad kyi sems can gyi lus tha mi dad par byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ye shes kyi klong thams cad la mngon sum du yang dag par gzhol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge

'dzin chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mtshan nyid yongs su shes pas rab tu 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum sems kyi skad gcig la tha myi dad pa'i dkyil 'khor dang byang chub

sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyi rang bzhin dam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i

ye shes kyi rnam par gnon pa'i seng ge dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmyigs pa thams cad chos kyi dbyings su shes pa'i mig gi dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin stobs
bcu'i rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pas yang dag par rtsom pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dmigs pa thams cad kun nas mthong ba'i mig gi dkyil 'khor dang byang chub sems

dpa'i ting nge 'dzin kha dog thams cad dkyil 'khor gyis 'gro bar shin tu mdzes pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin glong mi g.yo ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i

ting nge 'dzin chos gcig la chos thams cad yongs su 'du bar ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos gcig gi tshig gi lam la nges pa'i ngag gi rab tu 'byed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag

bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul ba rgya mtsho de dag la rab tu 'jug go/ /byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi

rgyal mtshan byin gyi rlabs kyi chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum gyi mu la mthar thug pa med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bskal pa thams cad khong du chud

pas tha myi dad pa'i ye shes dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin tshul shin tu phra bas stobs bcu khong du chud pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin mi 'phrog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa

bskal pa thams cad du mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyogs thams cad kun tu shugs kyis mngon du thar pa'i sprin dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon par 'tshang

rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin tshor ba thams cad kyis reg pa med pas bde ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgyan thams cad du

nam mkha'i rgyan mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin skad cig skad cig tu 'gro ba snyed kyi sprul pa'i gzugs rnyan gyi sprin mngon par sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin

de bzhin gshegs pa'i zla ba'i 'od nam mkha' ltar rdul dang bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nam mkha' ltar byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin

chos thams cad la dbang po'i rgyan rab tu snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad kyi don rnam par 'byed pa'i sgron ma dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin stobs bcu'i dkyil
'khor snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dpal gyi rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad gcig tu 'dres pa'i snying
po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin skad cig skad cig la brtsams pa thams cad mthar phyin par byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsod nams mi zad pa'i snying po dang /

byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa mthong ba'i yul rab tu snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad la rdo rje'i seng ge ltar rab tu gnas pa dang /

byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa yongs su bstan pas rdul phra rabs kyi dmigs pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi mnyan pa'i nyi ma gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum gcig tu spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad rang bzhin gyi rab tu zhi bar
sgra dbyangs kun tu sgrogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba'i sa mtshams 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa

thams cad kyi gnas kyi pad mo'i tshal rab tu rgyas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gnas myed pa'i chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' la rnam par lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyogs gcig

tu phyogs bcu rgya mtsho yongs su sdud pa'i klong dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi thams cad kyi sgor 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos rgya mtsho thams
cad dang ldan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can thams cad la 'od rab tu 'gyed pas/ rab tu zhi ba'i lus su 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad gcig
gcig la mngon par shes pa dang / smon lam thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rtag par thams cad kun tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i byin gyis rlabs

dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyan cig tu khong du chud par 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad dran pa'i rang bzhin gyi rab tu
snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad du khyad par chen po dang ldan pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig gcig
gis chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul mtha' yas pa rang gi lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings tshul gcig gis chos thams cad tshul gcig par

rnam par dgod pa'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo gzi brjid kyi byin rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can gyi khams mig

'phrul lta bu yongs su bsdu ba'i smon lam dang / spyod pa byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi thams cad tha myi dad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin pad+mo'i byin

rnam par 'phrul pas kun tu rnam par gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi rgyud khong du chud pas mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin lus

sems can thams cad la mngon par byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtshor 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad yongs su 'byed pa'i tshul

mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba'i gzhi tha dad pa thams cad khong du chud pas mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin snying rje chen po'i mdzod tha dad pa'i

snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin nyid du rtogs pa'i mtha' la 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam

par thar pa'i pho brang la rnam par lta bas seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa dang / de dag la stsogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi lam la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i
rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho de dag la rab tu 'jug go/ /sems kyi skad cig
re re la chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs par 'jug pa'i tshul gyis sngon bskal pa mnyam par spyad pa yang rjes su dran no/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag dze ta'i tshal

du phyin cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na 'khod pa/ seng ge'i khri rin po che sna tshogs kyi pad mo'i snying po can 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba dang mnyam par
yangs pa la 'khod pa/ ye shes dang mngon par shes pa chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba/ ye shes dang mngon par shes pa rno ba dang ldan pas rjes su thob pa/ ye shes kyi kun tu
rnam par dpyod pa/ shes rab kyi 'byung gnas kyi rigs su byung ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mngon du gyur pa/ ye shes kyi mig rab rib med pa dang ldan pa/ sems can gyi kha lo bsgyur
ba'i rang bzhin thob pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba/ rtag tu rnam par rtogs pa med par chos la spyod pa/ chos kyi dmigs pa thams cad rab tu rtogs pa/
chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis zhi bar dmigs pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad shin tu zhi bas/ gnas tha dad pa med pa la rab tu gzhol ba/ 'jig rten tha dad pa thams cad du rab tu zhugs pa/
gnas med par zhing thams cad du 'dong ba/ chos kyi gnas thams cad la brten pa med par chos thams cad bla gab med pa'i gzhal med khang du phyin pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongasu smyin par bya ba dang /
gdul ba la zhugs pa sems can thams cad la bde ba'i lam ston pa/ ye shes dang rnam par thar pa shin tu 'phags pa'i gnas kyi spyod yul can/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin pa'i
ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa/ srid pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa/ 'gro ba thams cad la yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par ston pa/ chos rgya mtsho shes rab snang ba'i dkyil 'khor

can/ ting nge 'dzin gangs chen mtsho dang ldan pa'i dkyil shin tu mnyam par bzhag cing / snying rje chen po rab tu sems pa/ chos kyi tshul sgyu ma'i rnam pa 'di lta bu rab tu rtogs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams
thams cad la myig lam lta bur zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba thams cad myig yor lta bur khong du chud pa/ sgra skad dang dbyangs thams cad sgra snyan lta bur rnam par rig pa/ chos thams
cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes sprul pa lta bur rab tu rtogs pa/ khyad par du 'phags pa'i smon lam shin tu bstsags pa/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor kun nas rnam par dag pa'i mkhas pa
dang ldan pa/ sems shin tu zhi zhing rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa gzungs kyi rgyud thams cad kyi yul dang ldan pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis dogs pa myed par kun nas rab tu gnon pa
chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas kyi mthar phyin pa'i myig dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la dmyigs pa med par rnam par spyod pa rab tu thob pa/ shes rab rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa la rnam par spyod
pa/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol tu song ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs dang / shugs thob pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'gro ba thams cad kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dbang du gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don mkhas pa la phyin ci log myed pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ chos kyi

mdzod dbye ba'i cho ga la mkhas pa/ nges pa'i tshig shes pa la mngon par mkhas pa ma spobs pa'i stobs dang / chos kyi sprin zad myi shes pa dang ldan pa/ mi 'jigs pas khyu mchog dang seng ge'i nga ro 'byin pa/
gnas med pa'i chos kyi dga' ba la dga' bas mos pa/ chos thams cad la rab rib myed pa'i myig gis lta ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa'i zla bar gyur pa/ shes
rab kyi dkyil 'khor gyis bden pa'i tshul thams cad la rnam par spyod pa'i 'od zer can/ ye shes kyi rdo rje bsod nams kyi khor yug du gyur pa/ dper bya ba thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/
chos thams cad la dbang po dang ye shes kyi myu gu rab tu skyes pa/ dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa/ bdud thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan rab tu snyol ba la dpa' ba ye shes mtha' yas pa'i
dkyil 'khor gyi gzi brjid can/ 'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la shes rab sgrib pa myed par zad pa dang / myi zad pa'i mtha'i ye shes
kyis rnam par sangs rgyas pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i kun gyi mthar phyin pa la gnas pa/ mtshan ma myed pa la rnam par lta ba'i ye shes kyi myig mngon sum can/ byang chub sems dpa'i
spyod pa thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i rgyu la mkhas pa/ myi gnyis pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang ldan pa 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad la rnam par blta ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyud
gnas myed pa la thams cad du gzugs brnyan snang bar gyur pa/ chos thams cad la mun pa dang rnam par bral ba ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor mun pa myed pa la rab tu zhugs pa/ phyogs kun tu
chos gyi snang ba rab tu bkye ba/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing mchog tu gyur pa/ thos pa dang mthong ba dang / smon lam don yod pa'i zla ba/ bsod nams kyi ri rab 'jig rten thams
cad las mngon par 'phags pa/ phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad tshar gcod pa la shin tu dpa' ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sgra skad dang dbyangs kyi nga ro 'byin pa/ sangs rgyas thams
cad kyi sku mthong bas myi ngoms pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan gyi dbang sgyur ba dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba gdul ba dang 'thun pa'i lus su byin gyis rlob pa/ zhing 'byam klas pa thams
cad du lus gcig gis rgyas par 'gengs pa/ mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa/ thogs pa myed par 'gro ba'i ye shes chen po'i theg pa'i gru dang ldan pa/ ye shes
kyi dkyil 'khor gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad du lus rab tu snang ba/ ye shes kyi nyi ma 'gro ba thams cad du shar ba/ 'gro ba thams cad bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dga' ba'i kha dog dang ldan pa/
'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / dbang po rab tu rtogs pa'i ye shes can/ chos thams cad sgrib pa myed pa'i yul khong du chud pa/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin skye ba myed pa rnam par rig pa

phra ba dang yangs pa phan tshun du yongs su bsdu ba la dbang sgyur ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zab mo'i tshul nges par rtogs pa/ don zab mo'i tshig dang / yi ge'i tha snyad la mkhas pa/ tshig dang yi ge dang /
don myi zad pa rab tu brjod pa/ mdo sde rgya mtsho thams cad tshig gcig du chud par rab tu ston pa/ gzugs dang ye shes kyi lus rgya chen po byin gyis rlob pa/ bskal pa mtha' yas par yongs su
'dzin pa'i gzungs dang ldan pa'i byin gyi rlabs can/ sems kyi skad cig gcig gis bskal pa brjod du myed par gnas pa/ rab tu rtogs pa'i ye shes can/ sems kyi skad cig gcig
gis dus gsum shes pas/ 'jig rten thams cad mngon par shes pas/ chos kyi gzugs kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa dran zhing spobs pa 'gro ba thams cad kyis shes
par 'gyur ba'i thabs kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba las phyir myi ldog pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pa/ gya nom par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa
chags pa myed pa'i mtha'i chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba'i ye shes la mngon par mkhas pa/ chos thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul la ye shes kyis rnam par rtse ba/
dmyigs pa thams cad rgyan bzang por byin gyis rlob pa/ chos kyi dbyings phyogs myed pa la phyogs kyi rjes su 'brang bas rab tu zhugs pa phyogs thams cad rnam par dbye bas chos kyi dbyings la yang dag

par gzhol ba shin tu phra ba ste/ yangs pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba la byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba/ rang bzhin kha dog myed pa las kha dog thams cad yongs su ston pa/ phyogs gcig la yang dag par
gzhol ba de lta bu'i yon tan dang ye shes mtha' yas pas yang dag par bskyed de/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi snying po dang ldan par gyur pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod pa bsngags pa
bskur ba tshig dang yi ge mi zad pas yon tan dang legs pa brjod du myed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dze ta'i tshal du 'dus te/ 'khod pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la 'jug pa/
de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis rab tu snang bar gyur pa/ de dag gi lus thams cad dang / khang pa brtsegs pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod de dag dang / byang chub sems
dpa'i stan de dag dang / dze ta'i tshal thams cad nas kyang / dga' ba chen po'i shugs rab tu thob pa'i chos nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos snang ba bsam gyis myi khyab pa rab tu
thob pas dga' ba'i shugs las byung ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i rgyan mngon par 'thon nas/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas pa khyab par gyur to/ /'di lta ste sems kyi skad cig
re re la 'od zer gyi dra ba'i sprin shin tu yangs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa mngon par 'thon te/ phyogs bcu rgyas pa khyab par gyur to/ /rin po che sna tshogs kyi dril
bu'i sprin mngon par 'thon te/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yon tan dang legs pa rab tu brjod pa'i sprin gyi nga ro rjes su bsgrags pas phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ /dmyigs pa
thams cad las 'gro ba thams cad rol mo'i sprin mngon par 'thon te/ sems can thams cad kyi las dang rnam par smin pa rol mo'i sgra snyan par blangs bas rjes su sgrog cing phyogs bcu rgyas pa khyab par
gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston pa'i tshul gyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
thams cad kyi smon lam gyi sgra dbyangs rab tu sgrog pas phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa dang / rnam par 'phrul ba'i sprin mang po mngon par 'thon
nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi dbyangs rjes su brjod cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos
rnam par brgyan pa'i sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ zhing thams cad du 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas skye ba gcig nas/ gcig tu brgyud pa rab tu brjod cing phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ /
dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa'i snying po byang chub kyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyan byung ba yongs su
ston cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ /dmyigs pa thams cad las klu'i dbang po'i las kyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ spos sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bebs

shing phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ /'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po lus dang 'dra ba'i sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa yongasu brjod pa byed cing /
phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ /zhing yongs su dag pa rin po che thams cad kyi rang bzhin yongs kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mngon par ston cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ /de dag la stsogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byin gyi brlabs dang / chos kyi snang ba rgya mtsho bsam gyis

myi khyab pa rab tu thob pa'i chos nyid kyis rgyan chen po rnam par sprul pa'i sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal
gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis rnam par 'phrul pa de dag yongs su ston pa byed cing phyogs bcur rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /dze ta'i tshal du sangs
rgyas byin gyis rlabs/ /mtha' yas rgya chen yongs su byung la ltos/ /dmigs pa kun las lus kyi sprin chen rnams/ /mngon par 'thon zhing phyogs rnams kun tu khyab/ /bde gshegs sras po rnams
kyi sna tshogs brgyan/ /kha dog mtha' yas rgya chen rnam dag pa/ /stan dang dmyigs pa yongs su bcas pa la/ /de dag thams cad gzugs brnyan 'byung ba snang / /rgyan rnams sna tshogs rin chen 'od
'phro'i sprin/ /bde gshegs sras po rnams kyi spu rtse las/ /sangs rgyas gsung rnams rab tu sgrog byed cing / /zhing rnams kun gyi dbyings su khyab par 'phro/ /tshangs pa'i dbang po'i gzugs 'dra lus
rnams dang / /spyod lam rab tu zhi ba dag pa'i gzugs/ /zhing gi me tog kun las mngon 'thon te/ /bsam gtan yan lag brjod cing kun tu 'dong / /kun tu bzang po 'dra ba'i rgyal ba'i sras/ /
mtshan rab dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa'i lus/ /grangs myed bsam yas bde gshegs ba spu las/ /sprul pa de 'dra thogs pa myed par 'byung / /bde gshegs sras po dus gsum byung ba rnams/ /yon tan rgya

mtsho'i legs pa brjod pa dag /rgya mtsho che mnyam rgyan sprin de dag kun/ /dze ta'i tshal na gnas shing rab tu brjod/ /phyogs rnams kun gyi sems can yongs kyi las/ /rgya mtsho chen po sna tshogs ma lus
par/ /dze ta'i tshal gyi shing gi gzugs rnams kyi/ /gseb nas byung bar gyur pa kun tu grag /dus gsum byung ba'i rgyal ba thams cad kyi/ /zhing rnams kun gyi ma lus rnam 'phrul ba/ /zhing rnams
rgya mtsho'i rdul snyed de dag kyang / /so so'i dmyigs kyis dmyigs par 'gyur ba snang / /sangs rgyas phyogs kyi zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i sprin/ /spu rtse re rer sna tshogs rnam phye ba'i/ /sangs
rgyas gnas rnams skad cig re rer yang / /de dag la yang sangs rgyas sprin mang bzhugs/ /'gro dang mnyam par phyogs rnams kun bkang zhing / /sems can thabs kyis yongs su smyin par byed/ /de dag 'od

las spos kyi 'od 'phro dang / /me tog phal chen rgya mtsho'i sprin kyang 'byung / /mkha' ltar tshad myed rin chen gzhal myed khang / /ma lus rgyan rab kun gyis rnam mdzes pa/ /de dag thams cad phyogs rnams

kun khyab byed/ /zhing dang snying po byang chub de bzhin no/ /dus gsum byung ba'i rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis/ /kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i rnam tshul du/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam par dag byas pa'i/ /rgyan
rab sna tshogs 'gro ltar tshad myed pa/ /phyogs rnams dus gsum kun tu gang byung rnams/ /bskal pa rgya mtsho chen por rnam sbyangs pa/ /de dag kun kyang dze ta'i nags tshal gyi/ /bar snang mkha' la

gzugs brnyan tshul du snang / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis/ rgyud shin tu snang bar byas pa de dag las/ byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang / snying rje chen po'i sgo sangs

rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du zhugs par gyur nas/ de dag de bas kyang 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang / yongs su bsdu ba'i don du zhugs par gyur te/ de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa de dag gi

ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang / 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par 'thon par gyur te/ 'od zer de dag gi sgo re re nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' 'phrul ba'i sprin 'jig rten gyi

dbang po thams cad dang 'dra ba'i lus dang / 'gro ba thams cad la mngon par lta ba'i lus dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / 'phrod pa'i lus dang ldan pa mngon par 'thon te/ mngon
par 'thon nas kyang / phyogs thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings rgyas par bkang nas/ sems can thams cad yang dag par skul zhing yongs su smyin par bya ba dang / gdul bar byed do/ /lha'i gnas na shi
'pho ba yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skye ba yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / rmi lam
yongs su bstan pa'i sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis sems can yongs su bskul ba byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyis 'byung
ba'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su bskyod pa'i sgo dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan bya ba dang /

rab tu bsgrub pa'i sgo dang / yan lag dang nying lag gcod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi lam gyi dkyil 'khor

snang ba rab tu brjod pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su btsal ba'i phyir/ chos kyi tshig dang yi ge re re'i phyir/ lus grangs myed pa yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi drung du 'gro zhing chos thams cad yongs su dri nga ba'i sgo dang / dus la ji ltar 'bab pa dang / bsam pa ji ltar 'bab bzhin du 'gro ba'i drung du 'gro zhing thams

cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su smyin par 'gyur ba thob par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho snang ba'i rnam par dmyigs par bya ba'i sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad bdud dang /
phas kyis rgol bas myi tshugs pa'i stobs kyi rgyal mtshan yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / bzo thams cad shes shing mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i shes pa'i sa bon yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / 'gro ba thams
cad las khyad par du 'phags par shes shing mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i khyad par shes shing mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i
ye shes kyis yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po la 'jug pa'i dbang po nyon mongs pa dang / bag chags sna tshogs yang dag par gzhom pa la shes shing mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i

ye shes kyis yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / de dag la stsogs pa sems can thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i thabs dang bsdu ba'i sgo/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin

tu phra ba snyed kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag sems can thams cad kyi gnas su phyin par snang ste/ la la ni lha'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni klu'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni

gnod sbyin gyi gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni dri za'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni lha ma yin gyi gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni nam mkha' lding gi gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /

la la ni mi 'am ci'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni lto 'phye chen po'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni tshangs pa'i dbang po'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni mi'i gnas su phyin par

snang ngo / /la la ni gshin rje'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni yi dgas kyi gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rten thams cad du phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni yi
dgas kyi skye gnas kyi rgyud thams cad du phyin par snang ngo / mthong bas 'dul ba'i sems can dang / thos pas 'dul ba dang rjes su dran pas 'dul ba dang / dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis 'dul
ba dang / mying gi chu klung gi sgras 'dul ba dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis 'dul ba dang / 'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu 'gyed pas 'dul ba dang / sems can rnams kyi bsam pa'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin

du yongs su smyin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i phyir snying rje chen po tha myi dad pa dang / smon lam tha myi dad pa dang / ye shes tha myi dad pa dang / sems can yongs su bsdu ba tha myi dad pa'i tshul du byang chub
sems dpa' de dag 'dze ta'i tshal nas rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad dang / sems can gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad du rgyas
par 'gengs par byed par snang yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung nas myi g.yo ste/ la la ni rang gi gnas dang khang pa brtsegs pa dang / stan dang 'khor dang bcas pas/ phyogs bcu
rgyas par byed par snang yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung nas myi g.yo'o/ /la la ni sprul pa'i sprin rab tu 'gyed par snang ngo / /la la ni sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba'i don du
gcig pa gnyis su myed par 'gro bar snang yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nas myi g.yo'o/ /la la ni dge sbyong gi gzugs/ la la ni tshangs pa'i gzugs/
la la ni rtul zhugs can thams cad kyi cha byad dang / cho ga dang chu zheng gi gzugs/ la la ni sman pa'i gzugs/ la la ni tshong pa'i gzugs/ la la ni nyan pas 'tsho ba'i gzugs/ la la ni gar
mkhan gyi gzugs/ la la ni lha khyer ba'i gzugs/ la la ni bzo thams cad dang ldan pa'i gzugs su grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor

du phyin par snang ste/ dus kyi dbang gis dus kyi rjes su 'brang zhing mying dang gzugs dang lus mngon par bsgrub pa tha dad pa dang / lus kyi kha dog dang dbyibs tshul dang 'dra ba dang dbyangs rnam pa tha dad pa

dang / skad rnam pa tha dad pa dang / spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / gnas rnam pa tha dad pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad myig 'phrul lta bur shes pa dang / bzo'i 'khor

thams cad rab tu brjod pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi shes pa brjod pas snang ba'i sgron ma dang / bde ba thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis brgyan pa dang / las thams cad snang bar byed pa'i 'od dang ldan
pa dang / phyogs thams cad theg pa la gnas pas rab tu sbyong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu snang ba la spyod cing / sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba

dang / gdul ba'i don du grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang ljongs dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i gnas dag du phyin par snang ngo / /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gnas pa myed pa'i khang pa

brtsegs pa na 'dug 'dug pa las bskal pa 'thun pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lag na rdo rje dag dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi nyams blta ba la brtson zhing sangs
rgyas thams cad bsnyen bkur bar smon pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha dag dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyis rjes su 'brang ba'i rkang gis 'gro ba'i ris su gtogs pa'i lha

dag dang / chos mnyan pa la mngon par mos pa'i sa'i lha dag dang / snying rje chen po la brtson pa'i lus dang / mtsho dang mtshe'u dang / rdzing bu dang khron pa dang / chu klung gi lha dag dang / shes rab kyi

'od snang bas rab tu gsal ba'i me'i lha dag dang / rin po che'i gcod pan thogs pa'i rlung gi lha dag dang / chos kyi phyogs snang bar khong du chud pa'i phyogs kyi lha dag dang / ma rig pa'i mun pa gsal

ba la brtson pa'i mtshan mo'i lha dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma mngon par bsgrub pa la brtson pa'i nyi ma'i lha dag dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi nam mkha' brgyan pa la brtson pa'i nam
mkha'i lha dag dang / 'gro ba thams cad srid pa'i rgya mtsho las bsgral bar brtson pa'i gangs chen mtsho'i lha dag dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du tshogs yang dag par bstsags pa la brtson zhing /
dge ba'i rtsa ba'i spo mngon par 'phags pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i ri'i lha dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi lus brgyan par brtson zhing sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kha dog dang byin gyis rlabs la smon cing
brtson pa'i chu klung gi lha dag dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems kyi grong rdal yongs su bskyang bar brtson pa'i grong gi lha dag dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyi grong khyer du smon cing mos
pa'i klu'i dbang po dag dang / sems can thams cad yongs su bsrung ba la zhugs pa'i gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dag dang / sems can thams cad kyi dga' ba'i shugs rnam par

'phel bar bya ba la brtson pa'i dri za'i dbang po dag dang / yi dgas kyi rgyud thams cad rnam par bzlog pa la brtson pa'i grul bum gyi dbang po dag dang / sems can thams cad srid pa'i rgya mtsho nas gdon pa'i
smon lam gyis zhugs pa'i nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dag dang / 'jig rten thams cad las 'phags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / stobs yongs su bsgrub par smon lam yongs
su bskyed pa'i lha ma yin gyi dbang po dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthong bas dga' bar gyur cing / lus rab tu 'dud pa'i lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dag dang / 'khor ba las skyo ba'i yid

dang ldan zhing ngor blta ba'i lha'i dbang po dag dang / rim gro chen po rab tu byed cing lus rab tu 'dud pa'i tshangs pa'i dbang po dag dang / lhan cig tu de dag gis rim gro chen pos mngon par bstod de
mchod cing / de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa'i rgyan phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba lan brgya phrag
du ma zhig tu byas nas/ mchod pa rnam pa du mas mchod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas phyir byung nas/ lho phyogs logs su yul rgyu zhing song ngo // //sangs rgyas rmad ga cad
ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po bdun pa/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/
byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan phun sum tshogs pa de 'dra bas/ dze ta'i tshal nas byung ste/ lho phyogs logs su 'gro ba mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du gyur te/ bdag kyang 'jam
dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang lhan cig du yul rgyu zhing 'gro snyam nas/ de dge slong drug bcu tsam gyis bskor cing mdun du byas te/ rang gi gnas nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste/
bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du bskor ba byas
nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas phyir byung ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dge slong lhan cig tu spyod pa rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon par gsar du zhugs pa
sha stag ste/ 'di ltar dge slong rgya mtsho'i blo dang / legs par byin pa chen po dang / bsod nams kyi 'od dang / bu chen po dang kun khyab sbyin pa dang / rnam dag spyod pa dang /

lha'i dpal dbang po'i blo gros dang / tshangs pa'i dam pa dang / dge slong zhi ba'i blo gros dang / de dag la stsogs pa'i dge slong drug bcu rtsam kun kyang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i
rtsa ba bskyed pa/ mos pa zab mor gyur pa/ dad pa'i myig yongs su dag pa/ sems rgya chen pos yongs su spyod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi phyogs kyi rnam par blta ba la mthu yod pa/ chos
kyi ngo bo nyid dang / rang bzhin nges par rtogs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ gzhan la phan par gyur pa'i blo can/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan la mngon par mos pa/ 'jam dpal

gzhon nur gyur pas chos bstan pas 'dul ba sha stag dang 'grogs shing mdun du byas te sngon du bdar nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus de ltar lam

du zhugs te/ 'dong ba'i tshe dge slong de dag kun la bltas nas/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i blo la smras pa/ rgya mtsho'i blo byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyi lus mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos rnam par brgyan cing /
yongs su dag pa/ lha dang mir bcas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag cing sems can tshad med pa'i dga' ba yongs su bskyed pa dang / 'od zer gyi dra ba'i rgyan sems

can dpag tu med pa'i sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / 'khor phun sum tshogs pa sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su bzung ba dang / lam gyi rgyan 'gro na lam myigs mangs ris su gnas pa dang lam
rnam par gnon pa'i rgyan phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la mngon par lta bas gnas pa dang / bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyan g.yas g.yon nas gter chen por mngon par 'thon pa dang sngon

gyi sangs rgyas la rim gro byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang rgyu mthun pas/ shing gi gseb thams cad nas rgyan mang po 'byung ba dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad la mchod pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par 'bebs

shing btud de phyag 'tshal ba dang / phyogs bcu nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor mang po bkye ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu sgrog cing spyi bor 'char ba

la ltos shig ces/ de dag la sogs pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa lam du zhugs pa'i yon tan gyi rgyan tshad med pa dag /dge slong de dag la yongs su bstan to/ /brjod do bshad

do/ /smos so/ /bkrol lo/ /rab tu brjod do/ /rnam par phye'o/ /gsal bar byas so/ /de ltar gnas brten sha ri'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i yon tan ci tsam du brjod pa de tsam du dge slong de dag gi sems rnam

par dag par gyur to/ /rab tu dang bar gyur to/ /dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar gyur to/ /mos pa skyes par gyur to/ /de dag gis sems rgyud las su rung bar gyur to/ /dbang po rab tu dang bar gyur to/ /yid

bde ba rnam par 'phel bar gyur to/ /yid mi bde ba rab tu byung bar gyur to/ /sems kyi skyon dang bral bar gyur to/ /sgrib pa thams cad phyir ldog par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas blta ba la mngon par mos par gyur to/ /

sangs rgyas kyi chos la sems rab tu gzhol bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po yongs su dag par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i shugs skye bar gyur to/ /snying rje chen po 'byung bar gyur to/ /

pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor gnon par gyur to/ /snying rje chen po yongs su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rgya mtsho yongs su snang bar gyur to/ /de ltar de dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mos

pa'i shugs thob par gyur nas 'di skad 'dzer to/ /mkhan po bdag cag kyang skyes bu dam pa de'i drung du phyin par mdzad du gsol zhes nas/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu dge slong de dag dang 'grogs te/

'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der song nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal dge slong 'di dag ni khyod la blta bar 'dod pa dag go/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong de dag dang /
'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i phyogs de tsam dang bcas par glang po'i lta stangs kyi gzi dang ldan par khyab par bltas pa dang / de yi rjes la dge slong de dag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur

gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so/ /skyes bu dam pa khyod mthong ba dang / khyod la phyag 'tshal ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dang bdag cag gi dge

ba'i rtsa ba gzhan khyod kyis mkhyen pa dang / mkhan pos thugs su chud pa dang / gang yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas mngon du gzigs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ khyod ci 'dra ba de 'dra

bar gyur te/ rnam pa 'di 'dra ba'i lus thob par shog shig /rnam pa 'di 'dra ba'i dbyangs dang / rnam pa 'di 'dra ba'i mtshan dang / 'di lta bu'i rnam par 'phrul pa dag kyang khyod ji lta ba bzhin du thob par shog

shig ces dge slong de dag gis de skad du smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /dge slong dag yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa bcu dang ldan pa'i rigs
kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la zhugs pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i lta smos kyang ci dgos kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa yang gnon par 'gyur ro/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bstsags pa las phyir mi ldog cing yongs su mi

skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / chos thams cad btsal ba la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad sbyor ba la yongasu mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang /
byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa la yongasu mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / dus gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad du 'jug pa la yongs su mi skyo ba'i
sems bskyed pa dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho rgyas par dgang zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la/ yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams
cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / zhing dang bskal pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrub pa la yongs su mi skyo ba'i

sems bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sbyar bas sems can gcig yongs su smin par bya ba'i tshul du sems can thams cad yongs su smin
par bya bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gcig yongs su bsgrub pa la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa'o/ /dge slong dag yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa bcu po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i rigs
kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'khor ba'i rgyud thams cad las phyir ldog par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgyud
thams cad las gyen du 'phags par 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa thams cad las phyir yongs su 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dang rgyud du 'byung
bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam la yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan gyi nan tan la rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /byang
chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs la yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad rab tu
'dul bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnon par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa dang shin tu nye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas dge slong de dag gis chos kyi tshul 'di thos nas/
sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par mthong ba la chags pa med pa'i mig gi yul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/ /de'i mthus phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa/

de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mthong bar gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi 'gro ba'i rgyud du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma lus pa mthong bar gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi

sems can rnams kyang ma lus par mthong bar gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang rnam par phye ba sna tshogs su mthong bar gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag na rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed yod pa de dag

kyang bgrangs ba'i tshul gyis rab tu shes par gyur to/ /sems can de dag gi rin po che'i gnas dang / longs spyod de dag kyang mthong bar gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho

yang thos par gyur to/ /chos bstan pa de dag kyang tshig dang yi ge dang nges pa'i tshigs dang skad dang ming dang brdas yongs su shes par gyur to/ /sems can de dag gi sems dang dbang po dang bsam pa la
yang mi dmigs par lta bar gyur to/ /sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'i tshe rabs bcu yang rjes su dran par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi chos kyi 'khor lo bcu'i nges pa'i tshig mngon
par bsgrub pa la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ /bstan pa'i tshul mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la yang dag
par rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ /rjes su bstan pa'i tshig mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi so so yang dag par rig pa'i tshul mngon par bsgrub

pa bcu la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ /ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu/ byang chub kyi sems kyi yan lag stong phrag bcu yang yongasu rdzogs par gyur to/ /ting nge 'dzin stong phrag bcu yang yongasu non par gyur to/ /

pha rol tu phyin pa'i yan lag stong phrag bcu yang rnam par dag par 'gyur te/ snang ba chen po rab tu thob cing shes rab chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi snang bar gyur pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa

bcu rab tu thob par gyur to/ /de ltar mngon par shes pa'i myu gu gzhon zhing shin tu phra ba thob ste/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa brtan pa la gnas pa de dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa'

kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la yang dag par bskul nas rab tu bkod do/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la rab tu gnas pa de dag smon lam chen po'i rgya mtsho la zhugs shing mngon par
sgrub par gyur to/ /de ltar smon lam chen po rgya mtshos mngon par bsgrub pa'i sems rnam par dag pas lus yongasu dag pa rab tu thob par gyur to/ /lus rnam par dag pas lus yang ba rab tu thob par

gyur to/ /de ltar lus rnam par dag pa dang lus yang bas mngon par shes pa'i sgo de dag shin tu yangs par byed pas/ mi nyams shing rjes su 'brang ba'i mngon par shes pa rab tu thob par gyur to/ /mngon par

shes pa de thob pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa'i drung nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir phyogs bcur yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i 'phrin
las kyi sprin mngon par bsgrub par gyur to/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ dge slong de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod nas mthar gyi yul rgyu zhing lho phyogs

logasu skyid pa'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i grong rdal chen po gang na ba der logasu song ste/ phyin nas grong rdal chen po skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi shar phyogs logs na nags tshal chen po stsal sna tshogs kyis
rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan ces bya ba sngon gyi sangs rgyas bzhugs bzhugs pa'i mchod rten sems can smin par byed pa'i don du/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs zhing mtha' yas par ming gi sgra rjesu

grag pa dang / sngon cad bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe/ yongasu btang bar dka' ba du ma yongasu btang ba ste/ sa'i phyogs de na lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma
yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mchod pa la brtson pa'i gnas yod pa der 'khor dang bcas te phyin nas der

'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ mdo sde chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rab tu snang bar bya ba zhes bya ba mdo sde bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu 'byung bar bstan to/ /de bstan pa'i tshe rgya mtsho chen po nas klung bye

ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma nye bar lhags te/ de dag gi chos kyi tshul de thos nas/ klu'i rgyud la rnam par smod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan la mos par gyur nas klu'i rgyud rnam par zlog ste/

lha dang mir skye ba yongs su 'dzin par gyur nas/ der klu stong phrag bcu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /chos bstan pa'i tshe sems can gyi khams mtha' yas

pa dang dbus med pa theg pa gsum gyis dus gzhan dang gzhan du rnam par 'dul bar gyur to/ /de nas skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi mi rnams kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal du phyin te/

sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyan sna tshogs kyi mchod rten gyi gzhi 'di nyid na rnam par spyod do zhes thos nas/ dge bsnyen tshong dpon shes rab chen po la sogs pa dge bsnyen pha dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / khye'u dang bu mo

mang po dag so so nas 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas te/ skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal nas byung nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong ngo / /de la dge bsnyen shes rab chen po ni dge bsnyen

bzang pos byin dang / lhas byin dang bsod nams 'od dang / grags pa'i lha dang grags pas byin dang / zla ba'i dpal dang zla ba dga' ba dang / blo gros bzang po dang / blo gros chen po dang / sgra gcan bzang po dang dge

bsnyen bzang po'i dpal dang / de dag la sogs pa dge bsnyen lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun du byas te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos
phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de la dge bsnyen ma shes rab chen mo ni/ dge bsnyen ma 'od bzang mo dang / lus bzang mo
dang / dge ba yod pa dang / dge ba'i dpal dang / zla ba'i dpal dang / zla ba'i 'od dang / dpal gyi 'od dang / dpal bzang mo dang / dge bsnyen ma mig bzang mo dang / de dag la sogs pa dge bsnyen
ma lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun du byas te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhon
nur gyur pa la lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de la tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang ni/ tshong dpon gyi bu brtul zhugs bzang po dang / tshul khrims bzang po dang / ngang tshul

bzang po dang / rnam par gnon pa bzang po dang / bsam pa bzang po dang / blo gros bzang po dang / blo bzang po dang / mig bzang po dang / lag pa bzang po dang / tshong dpon gyi bu 'od bzang po dang / de dag la

sogs pa tshong dpon gyi bu lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun du byas te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal

gzhon nur gyur pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de la khyim bdag shes rab chen po'i bu mo dge ba bzang mo ni bu mo bzang mo dang / yid du 'ong ba'i bzhin dang / brten pa'i blo gros

dang / dpal bzang mo dang / tshangs pas byin dang / dpal gyi 'od dang / bu mo 'od bzang mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun du byas te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong nas/ 'jam dpal
gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur

gyur pas skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal nas skyes pa dang / bud med dang khye'u dang bu mo de dag 'dus te/ 'khod par shes nas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa'i byin gyis zil gyis mnan te byams
pa chen po'i byin gyis tshim par byas nas/ snying rje chen po'i byin gyis chos bstan pa mngon par bsgrubs te/ ye shes kyi byin gyis sems dang bsam pa rnam par phye nas/ so so yang dag par rig pa chen

pos chos bstan par dga' ste/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la bltas so/ /tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs shes bya ba ci'i phyir nor bzang shes bya zhe na/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs zhes bya ba de thog ma ma'i

mngal du zhugs ma thag tu khyim de'i 'khor kun nas rnam par phye ba'i rin po che sna bdun gyi sdong po mthon par gyur to/ /rin po che'i sdong po de dag gi 'og na rin po che'i gter bdun yod de/ gser dang dngul dang

bai DUr+ya dang / shel dang mu tig dmar po dang / a sma gar ba dang / mu sa ra gal pa dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi rin po che'i sdong po de dag kyang gter de dag nas skyes te/ sa'i gzhi brtol nas mngon par mthon par

gyur to/ /de yan lag dang nying lag thams cad yongasu rdzogs te/ zla ba bcu lon nas btsas pa dang / de'i tshe gter chen po bdun po de dag kyang chu zheng dang rngams su khru bdun tsam du sa'i steng nas mngon par

'phags te/ snang bar gyur nas rnam par snang zhing mdzes par gyur to/ /khyim der rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod lnga brgya yang byung bar gyur te/ 'di ltar mar gyi snod dang / til mar gyi snod dang sbrang rtsi'i snod dang mar

sar gyi snod dang / gzhan dag kyang so so nas yo byad sna tshogs thams cad gyi yongasu gang ba dag ste/ 'di ltar rdo rje'i snod spos sna tshogs kyi yongasu gang ba dang / spos kyi snod gos sna tshogs kyis yongasu gang ba dang /
man shel gyi snod kha zas dang / spyan gzigs sna tshogs ro mchog du zhim pas yongs su gang ba dang / nor bu'i snod rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang / gser gyi snod dngul sil mas yongs

su gang ba dang / dngul gyi snod gser phyes gang ba dang / phra men gyi snod nor bu rin po che bai DUR+Yas yongs su gang ba dang / shel gyi snod mu sa ra gal pas yongs su gang ba dang / mu sa ra gal pa'i
snod rin po che shel gyi yongs su gang ba dang / a sma gar ba'i snod mu tig dmar pos yongs su gang ba dang / mu tig dmar po'i snod a sma gar bas yongs su gang ba dang / nor bu rin po che skar

ma'i rgyal mtshan gyi snod rin po che chu dang gi yongs su gang ba dang / nor bu rin po che chu 'dang gi snod nor bu rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan gyi yongs su gang ba dang / de dag la sogs pa rin po che'i snod lnga

brgya 'thon par gyur to/ /tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs de btsas ma thag tu khyim dang bang ba dang mdzod thams cad du nor dang 'bru dang dbyig dang / gser dang rin po che sna tshogs kyi char mngon par bab par gyur to/ /
de la bram ze'i ltas pa dang / pha dang ma dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis 'di btsas ma thag tu nor mang po phun sum tshogs pa 'byung bar gyur pas na/ nor bzang nor bzangs shes de ltar ming du btags te/
tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs de ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas so/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o/ /mos pa rgya chen po dang ldan pa'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang ba'i bsam pa
can no/ /lus dang ngag dang yid kyi spyod pa kha na ma tho ba med pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i lam yongs su sbyangs pa la rab tu brtson pa'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pa la mngon par mos pa'o/ /
sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi snod du gyur pa'o/ /bsam pa'i nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'o/ /byang chub kyi sems chags pa med pa yongasu rdzogs pa'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas
tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la bltas te/ dga' ba'i gtam byas nas de la 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsdu zhing /
mthon par bya ba las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa'i thams cad shes par bya ba las kyang

brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang sprul pa'i rgyun las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
gzugs kyi sku'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnam par dag pa las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sku'i yongasu grub pa las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung rnam

par phye ba las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rgyan rnam par dag pa las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid las kyang brtsams te/ chos kyang bstan
par gyur to/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag chos dang mthun pa'i gtam gyi bstan te/ yang dag par bskul nas spro ba bskyed
de/ dga' bar byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du btsud de/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su dran par byas nas/ skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal de'i
sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos bstan pas/ byin gyis brlabs ste bde bar byas de de nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa las

rnam pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / che ba nyid thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mos shing brtson pas phyi bzhin du 'brang ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la/

tshigasu bcad de mngon par bstod do/ /blo gros chen po mtha' yas spyod yul can/ /khyod kyi mthus ni sems can sman slad du/ /bdag kyang byang chub mchog tu zhugs par gyur/ /de la nges pa gang mchis bdag las gson/ /

dga' ba'i chu bkang 'obs kyis kun nas bskor/ /nga rgyal dregs pa'i ra ba mtho bar brtsegs/ /sems can lam rgyud sgo rnams btsud cing gdungs/ /de 'dra'i khyim ni srid gsum ming ldan che/ /de ni gti mug ma rig

gzings pas khebs/ /'dod chags zhe sdang me lces rab tu gdungs/ /rtag par bdud kyi dbang po'i dbang gyur pas/ /de la byis pa ma rig rten kyang 'cha'/ /sred pa'i sgrog dang zhags pa shin tu glags/ /g.yo dang sgyu yi skyon
gyi mtho brtsams shing / /the rtsom yid gnyis dag gis mig mdongs pa/ /log pa phyin phyogs lam la rab tu zhugs/ /phrag dog ser sna'i thag pas btags shing bcings/ /yi dgas byol song sems dmyal

mi khom rgyu/ /rga shi na dang skye bas rab tu mnar/ /mgo rmongs lam rgyud 'khor lo kun tu 'khor/ /de la khyod kyi thug rje rnam dag pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor ye shes 'od zer snang ba mdzad/ /nyon mongs rgya mtsho skom
par shar te 'phags/ /nyi ma 'dra bas bdag la snang ba mdzod/ /byams pa bsgoms pas dkyil 'khor rdzogs shing nya/ /bsod nams zla 'od bde ba'i zer 'gyed pa/ /sems can kun gyi gnas su shar gyur kyi/ /

zla ba nya ba lta bus bdag snang mdzod/ /dkar mthu thams cad yongs bstsags dkor mnga' zhing / /chos dbyings mkha' la chags pa med mnga' ba/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rin chen sngon 'dres pas/ /rgyal por gyur
pas bdag la bstan du gsol/ /byang chub theg pa'i smon lam mthu' mnga' ste/ /bsod nams ye shes shin tu yang bstsags shing / /sems can kun la phan pa'i don zhugs pa'i/ /ded dpon chen

pos bdag kyang bskyang du gsol/ /bzod pa brtan zhing sra ba'i go mnabs te/ /ye shes spyan mnga' thugs rje'i phyag ring bas/ /bdud kyi dmag dpung tshogs rnams mngon 'gyur bar/ /dpa' ba chen pos bdag gis

bsil yang mdzod/ /chos kyi ri rab spo la brtan zhugs shing / /ting 'dzin mchog gi lha mos kun nas bskor/ /nyon mongs sgra can lha min 'dul mdzad pa/ /brgya byin gyur pas bdag kyang gzigs su gsol/ /byis
pa'i gnas gyur khams gsum khang pa na/ /nyon mongs las rnams rnam par bsal ba mkhyen/ /rgyu yi sa dang lam rgyud 'khor rmongs par/ /me mar 'dra bas bdag kyang shul bstan gsol/ /ngan 'gro'i lam rnams

rnam par bzlog mdzad cing / /bde bar 'gro ba'i lam rnams rnam sbyong ba/ /'jig rten kun gyi lam gyi rgyud las 'das/ /bdag la'ang thar pa'i sgo ni bstan du gsol/ /rtag dang bdag dang bde bar 'du shes ldan/ /log

'dzin sgo re'i skyabs kyis skyabs gyur kyis/ /bden pa'i ye shes spyan rno mchog mnga' bas/ /thar sgo bdag la'ang myur du dbye bar gsol/ /yang dag log pa'i lam la mkhas gyur cing / /lam gyi rgyus dang tshul
la bsnyengs mi mnga'/ /lam rnams kun gyis 'dul ba thugs su chud/ /bdag la byang chub shul ni bstan du gsol/ /yang dag lta ba sa yi thang la zhugs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan chab
kyis bkrun/ /sangs rgyas chos legs me tog char 'bebs pa/ /byang chub shul ni bdag la bstan du gsol/ /rgyal ba gang 'das ma byon gang rnams dang / /da ltar byung ba'i rgyal ba snang
mdzad pa/ /sems can gtso bo legs par gshegs pa'i phyogs/ /de yang lam sgron mdzad pas bdag bstan gsol/ /las kyi 'khrul 'khor tshul la mi bsnyengs pa/ /chos theg shing rta'i 'khrul 'khor

mkhyen gyur cing / /ye shes theg pa'i tshul la rnam nges pa/ /byang chub theg pa bdag la bshad du gsol/ /mos shing smon pa'i 'khor lo mu khyud can/ /bzod pa rdo rje snying rje srog shing brtan/ /dad pa'i gnya'
shing rin chen legs spras pa'i/ /byang chub theg la bdag kyang skyon du gsol/ /gzungs rnams kun gyi rnam dag dkyil 'khor can/ /byams pa brtsegs pa dga' bas rab brgyan pa/ /so so yang dag
rig pa'i dril 'phring can/ /theg mchog bzang po bdag la bstan du gsol/ /tshangs pa'i spyod pa'i lam gyis mngon par brgyan/ /ting 'dzin bud med khrag khrig kun nas rgyu/ /chos kyi rnga yi dbyangs
chen char bsgrags pa/ /theg pa'i dam pa bdag la bstan tu gsol/ /bsdu ba bzhi yi mi zad mdzod ldan pa/ /ye shes rin chen yon tan phreng gi brgyan/ /khrel yod dul ba'i 'phreng bas mchog bsdams pa'i/ /
theg pa dam pa bdag la bstan tu gsol/ /sbyin pa'i 'od zer dkyil 'khor bzang po can/ /tshul khrims tsan dan snying rje'i byug ldan zhing / /bzod pa'i zer gyi mtshan rnams dam sbyar ba'i/ /theg pa'i
mchog la myur du bdag bzhag gsol/ /sems can thams cad 'dul las mi ldog pa/ /bsam gtan ting 'dzin grong khyer mthor sgron cing / /shes rab thabs gnyis 'byor 'thun 'gro rgyu ba'i/ /
chos kyi thegs pa'i mchog la bdag bzhag gsol/ /smon lam 'khor los lam gyi 'khor sbyong ba/ /chos kyi gzungs dam mthu brtan che ldan zhing / /ye shes 'khrul 'khor legs sbyangs legs

byas pa'i/ /chos kyi theg pa de la bdag skyon gsol/ /kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas rab sbyangs shing / /sems can lta bas rgyu la thogs med pa/ /kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas gnon gyur pa'i/ /ye shes thegs pas
bdag la btud du gsol/ /de nas brtan pas rdo rje bzhin gnas pa/ /ye shes sgyu mas legs sbyangs legs byas shing / /sgrib dang chags pa thams cad gcod pa yis/ /bzang po'i theg la bdag kyang

skyon bar gsol/ /'gro mnyam dri med shin tu yangs gyur pas/ /sems can thams cad skyobs pas bde bsgrub cing / /chos dbyings shin tu rgya chen rnam snang ba'i/ /byang chub theg la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol/ /

sdug bsngal phung po rab 'byung gcod byed pa/ /nyon mongs las kyi dul mang sbyong sel cing / /bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba kun 'joms pa'i/ /chos kyi theg la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol/ /phyogs rnams kun tu ye
shes rab snang ba/ /chos dbyings nam mkha' rnam par klubs byed cing / /sems can kun gyi bsam pa rdzogs pa yi/ /chos kyi theg la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol/ /rnam dag mkha' ltar tshad med mi zad pa/ /
sred dang ma rig lta ba'i skyon med cing / /sems can kun la phan par rab gnas pa'i/ /chos kyi theg la bdag kyang skyon du gsol/ /rlung chen langs pa'i shugs kyi shugs ldan pas/ /smon lam mthu' yis

'jig rten kun 'dzin cing / /zhi ba'i gnas rab kun sar skyel byed pa'i/ /chos kyi theg la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol/ /sa chen bzhi yi stobs rnams dang ldan pa/ /snying rje'i mthu dang shugs kyis khur khyer zhing / /ye

shes lo thog 'gro ba nyer 'tsho ba'i/ /theg pa'i mchog la bdag kyang skyon du gsol/ /nyi ma lta bur 'gro ba nyer 'tsho zhing / /bsdu ba rab yangs 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor can/ /gzungs kyi stobs mchog dag pa'i 'od
bzang ba'i/ /ye shes nyi ma bdag la bstan du gsol/ /bskal pa mang po du mar rab rlabs pas/ /rgyu yi tshul dang sa kun mkhas gyur pa/ /gang gis 'dus byas grong khyer gzhom 'gyur ba'i/ /
shes brtan rdo rje 'phags pas bdag la bstsal du gsol/ /sangs rgyas legs kun bslab pa phun sum gyis/ /ye shes rgya mtsho yangs pa gang zhig la/ /tshad med rgya mtsho'i blo mang brlab gyur pas/ /de
legs ci 'dra 'phags pas bka' bstsal gsol/ /gang na yang dag spyan mnga' khyod bzhugs shing / /ye shes rgyal po'i cod pan legs brgyan te/ /chos kyi dbu thod dam pas dbu bcings pas/ /chos kyi

rgyal po'i pho brang bdag kyang ston/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas glang po'i lta stangs kyi bltas te/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang zhing byang chub sems dpa'i lam yongasu rdzogs par bya bar 'dod de/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu dri

bar bsam pa legs so/ /rigs gyi bu 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsnyen cing bsten pa dang / rim gror bya ba 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongasu grub par 'gyur ba'i gzhi yin te 'di ni 'thun

pa'i rgyu yin gyis/ rigs kyi bu de bas na khyod kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur bas yongasu ma skyo bar gyis shig /nor bzangs kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i

spyod pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar nan tan du bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brtsam par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad par bgyi/ ji
ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su sbyang bar bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub

sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rjes su 'brang
bar bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la lhag par dmigs par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgyas par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems
dpas kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba rgya cher bstan du gsol/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ /

dge ba'i bsod nams gang chen mtsho/ /de ltar khyod ni nga yi drung du nyer phyin te/ /snying rje snying rtse rgya chen gyi yid ldan byang chub dam pa tshol ba legs/ /'gro ba thams cad dgrol don du spyod pa/ /mtshungs med don du smon

lam rab 'debs shing / /'gro ba kun gyi skyabs 'gyur ba/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa tshul 'di yin/ /byang chub sems dpa'i brtan pa rnams/ /'khor ba'i nang na skyo med yid kyis spyod byed pa/ /de dag kun tu

bzang po yi/ /spyod pa thub med chags med 'thob par 'gyur/ /bsod nams 'od can bsod nams dpal/ /de ltar khyod ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la/ /'gro la phan phyir smon byed pa/ /bsod nams rgya mtsho dge

zhing dag pa'i mtshan/ /mtha' dang dbus med tshad med pa'i/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sangs rgyas kun kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ /dran pa'i mthu dang stobs kyi kyang / /de dag chos kyi sprin kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/ /

de ltar khyod kyis phyogs bcu yi/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun tu rgyal ba mthong nas kyang / /byang chub spyod pa'i don gyi phyir/ /de dag kun la smon lam rgya mtsho dag byed 'gyur/ /'jig rten gtso la
slob byed cing / /gang rnams sangs rgyas sa la gnas ni btsal byas shing / /'di tshul rgya mtshor zhugs gyur pa/ /de dag kun kyang thams cad gzigs par 'gyur/ /khyod ni 'byam klas zhing kun tu/ /

bskal mang zhing rdul snyed du kun tu bzang po yis/ /spyod pa'i dam pa spyod byas shing / /byang chub dam pa zhi ba 'thob par 'gyur/ /zhing rnams mtha' dang dbus med pa'i/ /ma lus kun tu bskal pa rgya mtshor spyad par

gyis/ /kun tu bzang po'i spyod mchog phyir/ /smon lam rgya chen yongasu rdzogs par byos/ /khyod ni smon lam thos gyur nas/ /sems can khrag khrig dga' ba yongasu skyes gyur cing / /kun tu bzangs po'i ye shes

kyis/ /byang chub mchog tu smon pa byed la ltos/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshigasu bcad pa de dag smras nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces bsgo'o/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod bla na med pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu btsal bar sems dpa' legaso legs so/ /rigs kyi bu 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
tu sems bskyed pa de lta bu'i sems can yang rab tu dkon te/ de bas kyang gang gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu

tshol ba de lta bu'i sems can ni ches dkon no/ /rigs kyi bu de bas na byang chub sems dpas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir/ yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen las gdon mi za bar rtogs
pa thob par gyis shig /dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su btsal ba la yongs su skyo ba'i yid med par gyis shig /dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta ba la ngoms pa med par gyis shig /dge ba'i bshes

gnyen gyis bstan pa la 'thun par 'dzin par gyis shig /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa la khong khro ba med par gyis shig /rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ yul mi mo gya nom
mchog ces bya ba yod de/ de na mgul legs pa zhes bya ba'i ri zhig yod pa de la/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i

spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brtsam par bya ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyod par

bya ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / ji ltar yongasu dag par bya ba dang / ji ltar 'dug par bya ba dang / ji ltar mngon par bsgrub par bya ba dang / ji ltar rjesu 'brang bar bya ba

dang / ji ltar dmigs par bya ba dang / ji ltar rgyas par bya ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dris shig dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen

des khyod la kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor ston to/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dga' rang ste/ mgu zhing nyams bde la tshims zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang

pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas te/ lan brgya stong du mar phyir bltas te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen yid du 'ong ba'i sems
dang ldan pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi mthong mi bzod de/ gdong mchi mas gang bar ngu zhing 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang

mthar gyis yul mi mo gya nom mchog ces bya ba der song ste phyin nas/ yul mi mo gya nom mchog nas rnam par brgyus te/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas byung zhing las rgya chen pos byin gyis rlabs pa'i longs
spyod yid du 'ong ba la yongs su spyod cing ri mgul legs pa gang na ba der phyin nas/ mgul legs pa'i ri la 'dzegs te/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal tshol tshol zhing / shar phyogs logs su byung ngo / /

de bzhin du lho dang nub dang byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshamasu yang byung ste/ bla 'og tu zha zhing dge slong sprin gyi dpal tshol

tshol ba las des zhag bdun lon pa dang / dge slong sprin gyi dpal ri rtse cig gi sman ljongs na 'chag cing 'dug pa mthong nas/ de dge slong sprin gyi dpal gang na ba der song ste/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal
gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pas

thugs su chud par mdzad du gsol/ bdag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji

ltar nan tan du bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brtsam pa dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyad par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba

dang / ji ltar yongs su dag par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar 'jug par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar rjes su 'brang bar bgyid pa dang / ji ltar mngon par bsgrub par bgyid pa dang / ji ltar lhag par dmigs par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar
rgyas par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa khyod ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdam ngag

dang / rjes su ston pa mdzad ces thos nas/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba bdag la bstan du gsol/ de skad ces smras pa dang /

dge slong sprin gyi dpal gyis tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i
spyod pa yongs su 'dri ba leg go legaso/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su btsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul yongs su btsal ba dang / byang

chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba rnam par dag pa yongasu btsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam rnam par dag pa yongs su btsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya chen po'i rnam par dag pa yongs su btsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa
rnam par dag pa yongs su btsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i snang ba'i snying rje'i rgyud yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems

dpa'i 'gro ba'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'dus byas dang /
'dus ma byas kyi skyon dang / 'jigs pas mi gos pa'i rgyud yongs su btsal ba 'di ni dka'o/ /shin tu dka'o/ /rigs kyi bu kho bo ni mos pa'i stobs kyi dbang gis mig gi blo gros dang /
dad pa'i mig rnam par dag pas kun tu mngon par lta ba'i ye shes kyi 'od snang ba/ phyin phyogs med pa dang / yul kun la thog pa med cing bsgrub pa med pa thams cad dang bral ba'i lhag mthong
la mkhas pa dang / mig gi yul kun nas yongs su dag pa'i lus rnam par dag pa dang / phyogs kyi rgyud 'byam klas pa thams cad du mngon par 'dud pa'i lus kyis 'dud pa la mkhas pa dang /
sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi stobs kyis phyogs kyi rgyud thams cad nas mngon du gzigs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong ste/ 'di ltar shar phyogs

kyi de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas gnyis dang bcu dang / sangs rgyas brgya dang / sangs rgyas stong dang / sangs rgyas brgya phrag stong dang / sangs rgyas bye ba dang / sangs rgyas bye ba brgya

dang / sangs rgyas bye ba stong dang / sangs rgyas bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa dang / dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa/ bsam gyis myi khyab

pa mtshungs pa med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pas mtshams med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du myed pa dag kyang mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang
mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong dang / stong gnyis pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi

rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong / de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed

dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye

ba phrag brgya'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag

khrig brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag kyang mthong ste/ shar phyogs logasu ji lta ba bzhin du lho phyogs

dang nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang bla'i phyogs

kyi de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang mthong ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag kyang mthong ba'i bar du ste/ phyogs re rer
rnam par bltas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa kha dog sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / dbyibs sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / khyu mchog gi mthu dang / rnam par rol pa

sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / 'od zer gyi dra ba snang ba kha dog du ma can dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa rab tu 'gyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing

rnam par dag pa dang / pho brang dang rgyan sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / sku tshe'i tshad rnam par dag pa rnam pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / 'gro ba'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs par mdzad pa dang /

mngon par 'tshang rgya ba rnam par dag pa'i sgos rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog dang seng ge'i nga ro rnam par sgrog pa mang po mthong ngo / /de ltar rigs
kyi bu kho bos ni sgo kun nas dmigs pa thams cad rnam par rig pa la yang dag par gzhol ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'di thob par zad na/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam
par dag pa gang gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing pho brang rnam par dag pa'i rgyan mngon par mthong bas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo kun
nas snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu thob pa dang / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs par de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas rnam par dag pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo 'gro ba thams
cad du sgro btag pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu tshad med pa'i rjes su 'brang bas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo/ stobs kyis sgro btags pa rab tu 'thob pa
dang / gang gis chos mnyan pa'i rnam pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i 'phrin las blta bas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo chos kyi sgro btags pa rab tu 'thob pa dang gang

gis phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad kyi sangs rgyas rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa la 'dug pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo phyogs rnam par snang ba'i snying po rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i
rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba rab tu phra bar dmigs shing 'jugs pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo phyogs thams cad du 'jug pa rab tu thob pa dang / bskal pa thams
cad du de bzhin gshegs pa mthong zhing rnam par dmigs pa dang mi bral bas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo bskal par btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis dus thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa
mthong zhing 'grogs pa dang mi 'bral bas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo dus su sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas mngon par 'phags shing zil gyi
