mi non pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su mthong zhing rnam par rig pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo zhing du sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor
rang gi sems dang bsam par yang dag par gzhol bas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo dus gsum du sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis dmigs pa thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa
gcig tu rgyud pa yang dag par tshogs pa mthong zhing dmigs pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo dmigs par sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis skad gcig cig la 'jig rten gyi
khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba rnam par dmigs pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo zhi bas sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis
nyin gcig tu gnas thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gshegs par rnam par dmigs pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo 'brel bas sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis
de bzhin gshegs pa re re skyil mo dkrung du bzhugs pas kyang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas par khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku rnam par 'jug pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo shin tu

yangs pas sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis skra'i rtse mo gcig la sangs rgyas brjod du med pa byung ba mnyes par bya ba la 'jug pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo shin tu phra bas sgro
btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / skad gcig cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing / rnam par 'phrul pa ston pa rnam par dmigs pas/ gang gis sangs rgyas rjes su

dran pa'i sgo kun tu sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / sangs rgyas byung ba thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pas gang gis sangs rgyas rjes su dran
pa'i sgo bgos par sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / rang gis sems dang bsam pa la bltas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad snang ba rab tu thob pas na/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo
sems kyis sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyis las rnam pa ji lta bur bstsags pa'i gzugs brnyan yongs su ston pas/ gang gis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo las kyi
sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad pad mo'i tshal gyis rgyas par sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa rgya chen po ston pa/ phyogs kun tu mngon sum du dmigs
pas/ gang gis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo rnam par 'phrul pas sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs brnyan gyi sprin dbyangs sgrogs pas chos kyi dbyings
dang nam mkha' kun nas snang ba/ gang gis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo nam mkha'i sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan song /

rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na phyogs kyi ljongs rgya mtsho'i sgo zhes bya ba yod pa de na/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin ces bya ba 'dug gi/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i

spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig dang / rigs kyi bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen des khyod la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs dang / rgyu yongs su ston par 'gyur ro/ /tshogs kyis rgya chen po

yang khong du chud par byed do/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs dang / shugs rgya chen po yang yongs su bskyed par byed do/ /byang chub kyi sems kyi tshogs dang rgyu rgya chen po yang yongs su brjod par 'gyur ro/ /theg pa

chen po rab tu thob pa dang / snang bar 'gyur ba rgya chen po yang bskyed par byed do/ /pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshogs kyi stobs rgya chen po yang rab tu ston par byed do/ /spyod pa rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i tshul rgya chen po yang

rab tu ston par 'gyur ro/ /smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor rgya chen po yang yongs su sbyongs bar 'gyur ro/ /sgo kun nas 'byung ba'i rgyan rgya chen po yang rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur ro/ /snying rje chen po'i stobs rgya

chen po yang yongs su 'phel bar byed do/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi dge slong sprin gyi dpal gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal la lan brgya stong du mar
g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ lan brgya stong du mar phyir bltas nas/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal gyi drung du song ngo // //
sangs rgyas rmad ga gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po brgyad pa'o/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag de bzhin rjesu

bsam pa dang / ye shes snang ba de rjes su dran par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa de rnam par dpyad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul de rjesu sbyang ba dang byang chub

sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i tshul de lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor de la mngon par mos pa dang / sangs rgyas blta ba'i phyogs de la mngon par spro bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas rgya mtsho de la rjes su

bsam pa dang / sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa de rjes su dran par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul rtogs par bya ba de khong du chud par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi nam mkha' de la rjes su blta bar byed

cing / mthar gyis phyogs kyi ljongs rgya mtsho'i sgo gang na ba dang / dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gang na ba der phyin nas/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i
sprin la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi mdun du 'dug te thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa bdag ni bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par zhugs te/ bla na med pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho la 'jug par 'tshal na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi rgyud las phyir ldog cing de bzhin
gshegs pa'i rigasu 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rgal zhing thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgya mtshor 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / byis pa so so'i skye bo'i sa las gyen du 'phags
par 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba'i rgyud las ldog par 'gyur zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyud du 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /

'khor ba'i rgya mtsho rgyud kyi 'khor lo las phyir ldog cing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / smon lam gyi 'khor lor 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu 'joms zhing sangs rgyas

kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ba thams cad rab tu ston pa dang / srid pa'i rgya mtsho yongasu skems shing snying rje chen po'i mtsho rnam par 'phel bar byed pa dang / mi khom pa dang ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang log par

ltung ba thams cad kyi sgo gcod cing / mtho ris dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo 'byed pa dang / khams gsum gyi grong khyer gyi sgo rnam par gcod cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pho brang gi sgo rnam par 'byed pa dang /

yo byad thams cad kyi sred pa rnam par spong zhing 'gro ba thams cad bsdu ba'i smon lam yongs su skyed par 'gyur ba ma 'tshal lo/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyis tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs

la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legaso legaso/ /rigs kyi bu dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa'i sems can rnams ni byang

chub tu sems bskyed kyang mi skye ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sgo kun tu snang ba rab tu thob pa dang / thabs kyi snying po dang ldan pa'i lam gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes snang bas rab tu snang bar 'gyur ba dang / bsod
nams kyi rgya mtsho'i tshogs rgya chen po bstsags pa dang / dkar po'i tshogs thams cad kyi rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad bkur bas yongasu skyo ba med pa
dang / lus dang srog la 'phangs pa mi brtsi ba dang / dngos por 'dzin pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / mtho dman med pa'i sa ltar sems mnyam pa dang / rang bzhin gyi snying rje che zhing byams
par sems pa dang ldan pa dang / srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad du gnas par 'dug pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la mngon par mos pa'i sems can rnams byang chub tu sems skye

ste/ 'di lta bu sems can thams cad yongs su bskyob pa'i phyir snying rje chen po'i sems dang 'gro ba thams cad la snyoms par nan tan du bya ba'i phyir byams pa'i sems dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug

bsngal gyi phung po zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bde ba'i sems dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad las rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir phan pa'i sems dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las yongasu bsrungs ba'i phyir snying brtse ba'i
sems dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir chags pa med pa'i sems dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par dgang ba'i phyir/ rgya chen po'i sems dang nam mkha'i dbyings kun tu
gzhol zhing kun tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir mtha' yas pa'i sems dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i phyir dri ma med pa'i sems dang / dus gsum gyi dmigs pa

ma lus par ye shes kyis rgyas par dgang ba'i phyir rnam par dag pa'i sems dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir ye shes kyi sems kyang skye bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu

kho bos ni phyogs kyi ljongs rgya mtsho'i sgo 'dir lo bcu gnyis su rgya mtsho chen po 'di la dmigs te/ mngon du byas nas 'di ltar rgya mtsho rgya che zhing tshad med pa la rjes su bsam pa dang / dri ma med cing dang
ba dang / zab cing gting dpag dka' ba dang / bags kyi gzhol zhing legs par gnas pa dang / rin po che'i 'byung gnas du mas rnam par brgyan pa dang / chu'i phung po tshad med pa dang / kha dog

rnam pa tha dad pa mang zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'byung ba mtha' yas pa'i gnas su gyur pa dang srog chags mang po sna tshogs kyi rten du gyur pa dang / sprin chen po'i char yongs su 'dzin pa dang /

gang zhig 'bri bar 'gyur ba med pa la rjes su sems par byed cing gnas te/ rigs kyi bu de la kho bos 'di snyam du bsam mo/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgya mtsho chen po 'di bas kyang 'phags par rgya che la 'di bas

kyang yangs shing 'di bas kyang tshad med pa la/ 'di bas kyang ngo mtshar dang ldan pa la la zhig yod dam snyam ste/ de ltar kho bo tshul bzhin du bsam pa yid la byed pa la brtson par gnas pa ste/ rgya mtsho

chen po'i 'od kyi gzhi las pad mo chen po nor bu rin po che in+d+ra nI la thub pa med cing rdo rje lta bur sra ba'i chu ba can/ nor bu rin po che bai DUR+Ya dran pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gis gser ltar dri

ma med pa'i lo ma rgya chen po can/ dus dang mthun pa'i tsan dan gyi snying po'i rgyan gyi brgyan pa/ rin po che a sma gar ba'i ze ba can/ rgya mtsho tsam du yangs shing rgya che ba lha ma yin gyi dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus

sdong po'i lhun nas bzung ba/ rin po che sna tshogs brgya phrag stong gi dra bas kun nas g.yog pa/ klu yi dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus spos kyi chu'i char mngon par phab pa/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po brgya

stong phrag bcus dar dang rin po che'i lda ldi dang se mo do mang po bcus bzung zhing rab tu sbyangs pa mi 'am ci'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus phan pa'i sems kyis kun nas blta ba/ lto 'phye chen po'i

dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus 'khor nas mngon par 'dud pa/ srin po'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus lus 'dud cing mngon par mchod pa/ dri za'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus rol mo dang glu sna tshogs snyan

pas bstod cing mchod pa/ lha'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / spos dang phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /

lha'i dbang pos sprin gyi char mngon par phab pa/ tshangs pa'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus spyi bos nas gtugs te/ phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha brgya stong phrag bcus thal mo sbyar cing phyag bya

ba/ mi'i dbang po 'khor lo bsgyur ba brgya stong phrag bcus rin po che bdun gyis bsu zhing mngon par mchod pa/ rgya mtsho'i lha brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par mthon cing phyag bya ba/ nor bu rin po che skar ma'i ngang
tshul brgya stong phrag bcus 'od zer gyi rgyan gyis rab tu snang bar byas pa/ nor bu rin po che bsod nams kyis dag pa brgya stong phrag bcus mkhos su phebs par 'brel bas rab tu brgyan pa/ nor bu rin

po che rnam par snang ba brgya stong phrag bcus snying po rab tu gsal bar byas pa/ nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po brgya stong phrag bcus dpal chen po shin tu 'bar bar byas pa/ nor bu rin po che'i

mdzod snang ba brgya stong phrag bcus mtha' yas par snang bar byas nas/ nor bu rin po che 'dzam bu'i chu klung brgya stong phrag bcus yongs su ston par gnas pas rab tu brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che rdo rje

seng ge brgya stong phrag bcus thub pa med par brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che nyi ma'i snying po brgya stong phrag bcus rgya cher gsal bar bsgrub pa/ nor bu rin po che 'bar ba brgya stong phrag bcus kha dog
sna tshogs su brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po brgya stong phrag bcus mi zad pa'i rgyan dang 'od 'bar bar byas pa byung ste/ pad+ma chen po de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten las
'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba/ /byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pas yongs su brten pa'o/ /phyogs thams cad du mngon par dmigs su yod pa'o/ /sgyu ma'i rnam pa chos kyi byung ba'o/ /rjen

pa'i dri ma med pa las byung ba'o/ /nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul gyi brgyan pa'o/ /rmi lam lta bu'i chos nyid kyis yongs su byung ba'o/ /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i chos kyi tshul gyis rgyas btab pa'o/ /
chags pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul dang ldan pa'o/ /phyogs kyi khams kun tu chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi yul brjod pa dang 'thun pa ste/ de'i rnam pa dang yon

tan dang dbyibs dang / kha dog dang rgyan gyis mthar phyin pa ni bskal pa brgya stong grangs med par yang khong du chud par mi nus te/ pad mo chen po de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyil krung du bzhugs
pas khyab cing yongs su rgyas par mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de yang 'di nas bzung ba nas/ srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar gyis mtha' klas par mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa de'i gdan
gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang mthong / /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / mtshan phun sum tshogs
pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / dpe byad bzang po sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu' dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yi mdog rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / spyi gtsug ltar mi mthong ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / ljags yangs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang mthong ngo / /

sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos so/ /stobs tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang mi bsnyengs pa'i rgyan rnam par dag pa

bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa'i stobs mngon par bsgrub pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang rjes su sheso/ /sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang dag par bsgrub pa bsam gyis mi khyab

pa yang rjes su dran no/ /mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang mthong ngo / /chos kyi sprin gyi 'brug sgra mngon par bsgrags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang
yongs su bstan pa rnam par dmigs pa'i gnas dang / rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang thos so/ /g.yas g.yon kyi sku'i rnam pa tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sems can gyi don dang
dgos pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa yongs su grub par 'gyur ba'ang mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang phyag g.yas pa brkyang zhing kho bo'i mgo la byug nas/ chos kyi rnam grangs kun nas myig
ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rab tu brjod pa chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi dang / rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad rab tu snang ba chos thams cad kyi dkyil
'khor la yang dag par gzhol zhing snang bar byed pa/ zhing gi dkyil 'khor dang rnam par dag pas yongs su snang ba/ phas kyi rgol ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'thor ba bdud gyi dkrugs ma'i
dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu 'joms pa/ sems can gyi khams thams cad shin tu tshim par byed pa/ sems can thams cad kyi thibs po rab tu snang bar byed pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji

lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i 'khor lo'i rgyud dang / mthu snang bar byed pa yang dag par bstan te/ kho bos yang kun nas mig gi chos kyi rnam grangs de blangaso/ /bzung ngo spel to

bsams so/ /de ltar bzung ba de la'ang bri na ni snag tsha rgya mtsho chen po'i phung po tsam dang / smyi gu'i phung po ri rab ri'i rgyal po tsam zad par gyur kyang chos kyi rnam grangs de las le'u re re dang sgo re re dang chos kyi tshul
re re dang chos kyi tshig rnam par phye ba re re las kyang zad pa'am/ 'grib pa'am/ 'byam pa'am/ mthar thug pa'am/ mtha' zad par 'gyur ba dmigs par mi rung ngo / /rigs kyi bu de ltar bdag gi

lo bcu gnyis tshang bar chos kyi rnam grangs kun nas mig ces bya ba 'di la nyi ma gcig gcig yang thos pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig khong du chud do/ /zhi ba'i sgo'i gzungs

kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs ba zhig la zhugaso/ /glong mtha' yas pa'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig la yang dag par 'jug go/ /sa la rnam par spyod cing rjes su rtog par byed pa'i gzungs

kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig rnam par bsgoms te rnam par dbye ba byas so/ /gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig yongs su blangaso/ /pad mo'i rgyan gyis

gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig mngon par bsgrubaso/ /dbyangs kyi tshul gyi gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig yang dag par bshad do/ /nam mkha'i snying po'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u

grangs med pa zhig rab tu phye ba'o/ /skar ma brtsegs pa'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig shin tu rgyas par byas so/ /rgya mtsho snying po'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig yongs

su bkod do/ /kho bo'i drung du shar phyogs log nas lha dang mi'i dbang po'am/ klu dang klu'i dbang po'am/ gnod sbyin dang gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'am/ dri za dang dri za'i dbang po dang / lha ma yin dang lha ma yin gyi

dbang po'am/ nam mkha' lding dang nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'am/ mi'am ci dang mi'am ci'i dbang po'am/ lto 'phye chen po'am lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'am/ mi dang mi'i dbang po'am/ tshangs pa dang tshangs

pa'i dbang po'am/ sems can gang su 'ongs kyang rung ste/ de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa snang ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kun nas mig ces bya ba 'di nyid la rab tu

bkod cing btsud de/ de dag kun kyang kun nas mig gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid la mos par byaso/ /rtog tu btsud do/ /yongasu bstan to/ /yang dag par brjod do/ /yongs su gsal bar byas so/ /rnam par phye'o rgyas par byaso/ /

mngon par bstan to/ /rnam par bkrol lo rab tu phye'o/ /shin tu snang bar byas so/ /de ltar shar phyogs la ji lta ba de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang /

shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang bla'i phyogs nas sems can gang su 'ongs kyang rung ste/ kun la yang snga ma bzhin no/ /rigs

kyi bu de ltar kho bos ni chos kyi rnam grangs gcig cig shes par zad na/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam yongs su dag pa dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang /

bskal pa thams cad du gnas pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang / stobs bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir sems can rgya mtsho thams cad
la zhugs pa dang / stobs bcu'i ye shes chags pa med pa'i snang ba yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho la zhugs pa dang / yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul
ba'i dus la mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho la zhugs pa dang / zhing thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubaso/ zhing rgya mtsho thams
cad la zhugs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod cing rim gro byed pa'i stobs kyi sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang / ye shes rnam par rig pas chos rgya mtsho thams
cad la zhugs pa dang / nan tan dang ldan pas yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang / brjod pa thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir/ 'gro ba'i skad rgya
mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa rnams kyi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan song / rigs kyi bu 'di nas dpag tshad drug bcu 'das pa'i lho phyogs kyi gnas 'di nyid na/ lang ka'i

gnas rgya mtsho'i ngogs shes bya ba yod de/ de na dge slong shin tu brtan pa zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu sbyang bar bya ba dris shig de nas tshong

dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/

dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdam ngag de dang / kun nas mig gi chos kyi rnam grangs de yang rjesu dran par byed cing de bzhin gshegs

pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de yang rjes su bsam pa dang / chos kyi tshigs dang yi ge'i sprin de dag kyang yongasu bzung ba dang / chos kyi sgo rgya mtsho'i tshul de dag la'ang 'jug par bya ba dang chos kyi tshul de dag

la'ang rnam par blta ba dang / chos kyi le'u dang glong gi tshul de dag la 'jug par bya ba dang / chos kyi nam mkha' de la yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba dang / chos kyi dkyil 'khor de yang rjesu sbyang bar bya ba dang /

chos rin po che'i gling de yang rjesu sems shing mthar gyis lang ka'i gnas rgya mtsho'i ngogs shes bya ba gang na ba der phyin nas/ dge slong shin tu brtan pa mthong bar dga' zhing shar phyogs su bltas so/ /

de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang bla dang

'og tu dge slong shin tu brtan pa mthong bar dga' ste/ kun tu bltas pa dang / des dge slong shin tu brtan pa nam mkha'i dbyings la lha brgya stong grangs med pas yongasu bskor cing phan tshun du 'chags pa

mthong ngo / /nam mkha'i dbyings de yang lha'i dbang po rnams kyi dge slong shin tu brtan pa la mchod pa'i las su bya ba'i phyir/ lha rdzas kyi me tog sil ma'i sprin gyis yog pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sprin gyi sgra dang /

dar gyi ba dan grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par mthong ngo / /klu'i dbang po rnams kyi nam mkha' de la a ga ru nag po'i spos mngon par 'thul ba'i sprin shin tu mtho ba las 'brug sgra bsam gyis mi

khyab pa 'byung bar byas pa mthong ngo / /mi'am ci'i dbang po rnams kyis nam mkha' la lha rdzas kyi ngag snyan pa'i rgyud kyi bstod pa'i rol mo brdung ba dang / dkrol ba dang glur blang ba'i dbyangs thams cad

sbyar cing blangs pa thos par gyur to/ /lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po rnams kyi nam mkha' de la gos shin tu phra zhing mdog bzang ba'i sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag yid dga' bas bkye ba de dge slong shin tu brtan pa

la dad cing mos pa'i gzugs su phyung ba mthong ngo / /lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams kyis kyang nam mkha' de la nor bu rin po che'i sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa byin gyis rlabs te/ yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab

pa'i rgyan snang ba dang ldan par snang bar byas so/ /mthong ngo / /nam mkha' lding gi dbang po mang po yang myi yi gzugs dang mdog dang dbyibasu 'khod cing nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i bu mos kun nas bskor te/

brtsod pa med pa la dga' zhing thal mo sbyar te gnas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mthong ngo / /gnod sbyin gyi dbang po brgya stong 'khor dang bcas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang nam mkha' de la shin tu
mi sdug pa'i gzugs su dge slong shin tu brtan pa la byams pa'i mthu dang ldan par 'khod pa mthong ngo / /srin po'i dbang po brgya stong 'khor dang bcas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang nam

mkha' de la dge slong shin tu brtan pa yongasu bsrung ba byed cing kun tu rgyu ba mthong ngo / /tshangs pa'i dbang po brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang nam mkha' de la thal mo sbyar cing dga' ba yid

du 'ong ba'i tshig gi rgyud kyi bstod pa rab tu brjod pa mthong ngo / /gnas gtsang ma'i lha brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang nam mkha' de la dge slong shin tu brtan pa la mchod pa'i las su bya

ba'i phyir thal mo sbyar cing gzhal med khang na gnas pa mthong ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi dge slong shin tu brtan pa la de ltar nam mkha'i dbyings la 'chags cing 'dug pa mthong nas
dga' rangs te mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ dge slong shin tu brtan pa la thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos btsal bar bgyid pa dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu bsgrub

par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu bsdu bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu bstan par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems

dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos bsgom par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rjesu 'brang bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu brtul
bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu bsgom par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par dag par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar
byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu sbyang bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos khong du chud par bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems
dpa' rnams la gdam ngag dang rjesu bstan pa mdzad do/ /zhes bdag gi thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos la nan tan du bgyi ba/ ji ltar nan tan bgyis na yang dag pa

ji lta ba bzhin dang / skol bar mi 'gyur ba'i slad du sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / tshul gcig tu 'gyur ba'i slad du byang chub sems

dpa' mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / ye shes rtogs par 'gyur ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos dang mi 'bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi don yongs su thob par bgyi ba'i slad du byang
chub sems dpa'i smon lam thams cad dang mi 'bral ba dang / bskal pa thams cad du gnas pas yongasu mi skyo bar bgyi ba'i slad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang mi 'bral ba dang 'jig rten
gyi khams thams cad yongasu dag par bgyi ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par dgang ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad rnam

par dmigs par bgyi ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sprul pa lta bus srid pa'i rgyud thams cad du skye shing shi 'pho ba'i skye

mched rang gi lus kyis nyams su myong bar bgyi ba'i slad du 'dus byas kyi gnas dang mi 'bral ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yongasu gzungs ba'i slad du chos mnyan pa dang mi 'bral ba

dang dus gsum gyi ye shes khong du chud cing rjesu 'brang bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ ye shes snang ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ba de bdag la bstan du gsol/ de skad ces smras pa dang / dge slong shin tu brtan pas tshong

dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /de ltar khyod kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos dang rang byung gi chos 'dri ba legaso/ /
legaso/ /rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa thog pa med pa'i sgo thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i sgo de kho bos blangs te/

yongasu bzung nas rjesu 'brang zhing rnam par dbye ba dang / rnam par dpyad pa dang rnam par brtag pa dang snang bar bya ba dang / rab tu snang bar byas pas thog pa med pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i ye shes snang ba thob

bo/ /de thob pas kho bo ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sems can thams cad kyi skye ba dang 'chi 'pho yongasu shes par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /

sngon gyi gnas rjesu dran par bya ba'i sgor 'jug pa la thogs pa med do/ /phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par 'gro ba thams cad dang 'grog par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi 'gro ba thams cad rnam

par rig par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sems can thams cad kyi sgra skad dang / kun rdzob yongasu shes par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sems can thams cad kyi the tsom gcad par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /

sems can thams cad kyi dbang po tha dad pa khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i dus su 'gro bar bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /nyin mtshan dang

skad gcig dang yud tsam dang thang gcig dang / dus kyi ming du bya ba khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /dus gsum rgya mtsho'i rgyud du 'jug par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing

rang gi lus kyi rgyas par gang bar bya ba la thog pa med do/ /de ni de ltar dngos po med pa la gnas shing mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul thob pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu dngos po med pa la gnas shing mngon par 'du

bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul de'i byin gyis kho bo nam mkha'i dbyings 'di las phan tshun du 'gro zhing 'dug pa dang / sems pa dang spyod lam sna tshogs su spyod do/ /mi snang bar byed do/ /snang bar byung ngo / /

du ba thul bar byed do/ /me lce 'bar bar byed do/ /gcig tu gnas shing mang por bsgyur ro/ /mang por byas shing gcig tu bsgyur ro/ /snang ba dang mi snang ba'ang nyamasu myong bar byed do/ /rtsig pa la'ang thag thog med pa dang rab

la'ang thag thogs med par 'gro ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bya bzhin no/ /nam mkha' la skyil mo dkrung gis 'gro ste/ dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin no/ /sa la yang bye'u zul dang steng du 'byung bar byed do/ /

dper na chu la bya ba bzhin no/ /chu la yang bying ba med par 'gro ste/ dper na sa la bya ba bzhin no/ /du ba 'thul ba dang / me lce 'bar ba byed de/ dper na me'i phung po chen po bzhin no/ /sa yang yongasu g.yo

bar byed do/ /nyi ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis de ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing de ltar mthu che la/ de ltar gzi brjid che ba yang lag pas kun nas yongs su nyug go/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar dag tu yang lus kyi

dbang bsgyur ro/ /'jig rten spos kyi dud pa na bun du chags pa'i sprin gyi dkyil 'khor kun nas khebs par byas shing rab tu 'bar bar byed do/ /rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin gyi dra bas 'jig rten kun

nas khebs par byas shing / 'gro ba thams cad dang 'dra ba'i sprul pa'i sprin rab tu 'gyed do/ /kha dog mtha' yas pa'i 'od kyi dra ba'i sprin rab tu bkye zhing phyogs kun tu 'ang 'gro ste/ 'di ltar shar phyogs su 'gro'o/ /

lho phyogs dang nub phyogs dang byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang bla'i
phyogs su yang 'gro'o/ /sems kyi skad cig re re zhing yang shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'da'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams gnyis dang bcu yang 'da'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams brgya dang /

'jig rten gyi khams stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams

bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig rgya phrag stong dang 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dang 'jig rten gyis

khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mtshungs pa med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu mtha' yas pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mu med pa

dang 'jig rten gyi khams mtshungs pa med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang 'da' bar byed de/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig bzhugs

shing 'tsho bzhes la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'jams klas pa de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyogs de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de dang de

dag dang 'jig rten gyi khams yongasu 'du ba de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khamasu bya ba de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sgo de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi

khams gyi bskal par bya ba de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su 'jug pa de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi snying po byang chub rnam par bkod pa de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gyi

'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dang de dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag las de bzhin gshegs pa re re zhing yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa rdul shin tu

phra ba snyed kyi lus sna tshogs dang / lus re re zhing yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mchod pa'i sprin gyi char 'bebs shing spyan sngar 'gro'o/ /de dag tu phyin nas kyang me tog

thams cad dang spos thams cad dang / phreng ba thams cad dang phye ma thams cad dang / byug pa thams cad dang na bza' thams cad dang / rgyal mtshan thams cad dang lha'i ba dan thams cad dang bla re thams cad dang / dra ba thams

cad dang gzugs thams cad kyis mchod pa rgyun ma chad par byed do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gang ji snyed du gsungs pa dang / bstan pa dang / brjod pa dang / yang dag par bshad pa dang / yang dag par smos pa

dang yongs su brjod pa dang / man ngag du gsungs pa dang / shin tu bstan pa dang rab tu brjod pa de dag thams cad kyang shes shing 'dzin to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa ji snyed

pa de dag thams cad kyang rjes su dran no/ /shar phyogs su ji lta ba de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi

phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs su yang 'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'da'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams gnyis dang bcu yang 'da'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams brgya nas 'jig

rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang 'da'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho bzhes la/

'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa de dang de dag nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dang de dag na chos ston pa de dag kun kyang mthong ngo / /de bzhin
gshegs pa de dag la'ang me tog thams cad nas gzugs thams cad kyi bar gyi mchod pa byed do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gang ji snyed du gsungs pa nas/ rab tu brjod pa'i bar de dag

thams cad kyang yongs su shes shing 'dzin to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang rjes su dran no/ /sems can gang gis kho bo

mthong bar 'gyur pa dang / gang dang 'grogs par gyur pa de dag kun kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro/ /sems can phra mo 'am rags pa'am ngan pa'am bzang ba'am

bde ba'am mi bde ba gang ji snyed cig kho bos mthong bar gyur pa de dag kun la yang yongasu smin par bya ba dang / 'dul ba'i dus las mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir/ khong du de dag gi lus kyi tshad dang mnyam par

lus byin gyis brlobs bo/ /sems can ji snyed cig kho bo'i drung du 'ong ba de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun tu 'gro ba 'di dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rnam par
gnon pa don yod pa la rab tu gzhog go/ /rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i sgo kun tu 'gro ba de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa dang / rim gro rab tu sbyor ba

sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / 'thun pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po'i ngang tshul can/ theg pa chen po'i ngang tshul can/ byang chub sems dpa'i

lam dang mi 'bral ba'i ngang tshul can/ thogs pa med pa'i ngang tshul can/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa'i snying po chud mi gson pa'i ngang tshul can/ byang chub kyi sems yongs su mi gtong ba'i ngang tshul can/

sangs rgyas kyi chos la lhag par dmigs pa'i ngang tshul can/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba'i ngang tshul can/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i ngang tshul can/ 'jig rten thams cad la

mi gnas pa'i ngang tshul can/ chud mi gson pa'i ngang tshul can/ mnyam pa'i ngang tshul can/ ma god pa'i ngang tshul can/ glag med pa'i ngang tshul can/ ma 'dres pa'i ngang tshul can/ rnyogs pa med pa'i

ngang tshul can/ 'gyod pa med pa'i ngang tshul can/ rnam par dag pa'i ngang tshul can/ byang chub sems dpa' rdul dang bral ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod pa nus re skan/ /song rigs kyi bu lho

phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ dra byi la'i grong rdal rdo rje'i grong khyer can bya ba yod de/ de na dra byi la'i sprin ces bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa

la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi dge slong rab tu brtan pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas

phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ yang dag par bltas nas dge slong shin tu brtan pa'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs chos kyi dad pa'i shugs dang / byin gyis gnon pa/ sangs rgyas
yid la bya ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad pa la rab tu brtson pa/ dus gsum snang bas sems snang bar gyur pa smon lam chen po yid la byed pa dang ldan pa sems can gyi
khams thams cad yongasu bskyab pa'i thabs la zhugs pa/ 'dus byas kyi dge ba thams cad la mi gnas pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs par bya ba la
brtson pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su sbyang ba'i smon lam las mi g.yo ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na gnas pa med par gnas pa chos kyi snang ba de rjes su dran

par bya ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rjes su dran par bya ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rigs yongs su brjod pa byed cing / mthar gyi dra byi la'i grong rdal rdo rje'i grong khyer du phyin nas/ dra byi la'i sprin yongs

su tshol tshol ba las/ grong khyer gyi khyams shig na chos bstan pa'i don du seng ge'i khri la 'dug cing / srog chags stong phrag bcu tsam zhig la chos kyi rnam grangs yi ge'i 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyan ces bya ba yongasu

ston cing 'dug pa mthong ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi dra byi la'i sprin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dra byi la'i sprin la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas
nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa bdag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub

sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan tu bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub kyi sems srid pa'i lam rgyud thams cad che ba mi 'tshal ba dang / ji ltar yongasu skyo

ba ma mchis shing / bsam pa gtan par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar thub pa ma mchis shing lhag pa'i bsam pa yongasu skyo ba ma mchis shing snying rje chen po'i stobs yang dag pa skye bar 'gyur ba dang ji ltar sgo kun nas rnam

par dag cing gzungs kyi stobs gnon par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar ma rig pa'i rab rib dang sgrib pa rnam par 'thor zhing / shes rab kyi 'od chos thams cad la rab rib ma mchis pa'i snang ba skye bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar

don dang chos dang nges pa'i tshig dang spobs pa la mkhas pa la dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs shing / so so yang dag par rig pa'i stobs gnon par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor lo

tha mi dad pa yang dag par 'dzin cing dran pa'i stobs yongs su gnon par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar chos thams cad kyi phyogs rigs pa'i snang ba rjes su rtog cing / rig pa'i stobs rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar byang

chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs chos thams cad kyi don rnam par gdon mi za bar rab tu dbye ba la brtson pas 'grub par 'gyur ba ma 'tshal to/ /de nas dra byi la'i sprin gyis byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro bya ba'i phyir

seng ge'i khri de la langs te babs nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la lus thams cad kyis phyag byas nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la gser gyi me tog gi phung pos mngon par gtor to/ /nor bu rin po che rin

thang med pa mang po dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma dam pas kyang mngon par gtor to/ /gos tshon sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas kha dog bsgyur ba brgya stong phrag du mas kyang mngon par bkab bo/ /spos kyi me tog kha dog rnam pa

tha dad cing yid du 'ong la blta na sdug pa mang pos kyang mngon par gtor nas mchod pa'i rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan dag gi kyang / mchod pa dang rim gro dang / bkur stir dang sti stang cher byas te/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor

bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legaso legaso/ /rigs kyi bu gang gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gdung mi gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa yin no/ /'dod chags dang bral ba'i rigs yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du rnam par rig par bya ba la brtson
pa yin zhing rgyud thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba la zhugs pa yin/ sems can gyi rigs thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / 'dul ba la sta gon du gnas pa yin/ chos kyi rigs
thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin brtag pa la brtson pa yin/ las kyi rigs thams cad dang mi 'gal bar gnas pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rigs thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bya ba
la rab tu brtson pa yin smon lam thams cad rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir yangs dag par zhugs pa yin/ dus gsum gyi rgyud thams cad ye shes kyi khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa yin mos pa'i rig shin tu
brtan par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa yin te/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mang po thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa yin/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag par dgongs pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
dang mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa yin/ 'phags pa thams cad kyi rjesu dgyes par bya ba yin/ tshangs pa'i dbang po thams cad kyis mngon par dga' bar byas pa yin/ lha'i dbang po thams cad kyis yang dag par

mchod pa yin/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po thams cad kyi yongasu bsrung ba yin/ srin po'i dbang po thams cad kyi rim gror byas pa yin/ klu'i dbang po thams cad kyi bsu ba yin/ mi 'am ci'i dbang po thams cad
kyis mngon par bstod pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi yang dag par bsngags pa yin/ des ni sems can gyi khams thams cad kyang ngan song gi lam rgyud gsum po yongs su gcad pa dang mi khom

pa dang / ngan 'gro'i lam thams cad bzlog pa dang / dbul ba'i lam thams cad las yang dag par bzla ba dang / lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba dang mi 'bral

ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po nyan pa dang / 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi yan lag yongs su dag par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba'i rgyud yongs su bsgrub pa

dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam snang ba thob par bya ba dang byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes khong du chud par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas par bya bas dbugs phyin par byas pa yin/ rigs
kyi bu de la bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dka' ba byed pa ste/ 'byung bar dka' zhing mthong bar dka' ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can rnams la bag dro bar
byed pas pha dang ma lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rgyan tu gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sdug bsngal gyis mnar ba rnams la skyabs su gyur
pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir gnas su gyur pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'jigs pa sna tshogs kyis gtses pa rnams la dpung gnyen
du gyur pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'gro ba thams cad ngan song gsum du ltung ba las yongs su rton pa'i phyir rlung gi dkyil 'khor lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can
thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pas sa lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bsod nams rin po che'i mdzod mi zad pa'i gter dang ldan pas rgya mtsho lta bu'o/ /byang chub
dpa' rnams ni ye shes kyi 'od kyi snang bar byed pa'i phyir nyi ma lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa bas shin tu mtho bas ri rab lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni
snying po byang chub tu ye shes kyi zla ba 'char bar 'gyur ba'i phyir zla ba lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdud kyi sde thams cad rab tu 'joms pas dpa' bor gyur pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'

rnams ni rang byung gi chos kyi grong khyer du phyin par byed pas rtul phod pa lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi bdag la byams pa'i rlan yongasu skem pas me lta bu'o/ /byang
chub sems dpa' rnams ni chos kyi sprin rgya chen po'i char mngon par 'bebs pas sprin lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can gyi dbang po dad pa la stsogs pa'i myu gu rnam par 'phel bar

byed pas char pa lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chos kyi rgya mtsho'i 'gram yongasu ston pas mnyan pa lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las yang dag

par sgrol ba'i phyir zam pa lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi mngon par bgrod par bya ba'i phyir mu stegs lta bu'o/ /de ltar dra byi la'i sprin gyis tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs
kyi mdun du 'dug ste/ tshig gi rgyud de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yongs su bsngags pa byas nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la legaso zhes bsngags so/ /de ltar de nas byang chub sems

dpa' yang dag par dga' bar bya ba'i phyir tshig brjod pa'i tshe/ kha'i sgo nas 'od 'phro ba'i phung po rnam pa 'di lta bu byung ste/ 'od 'phro ba'i phung po des stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par

gang bar gyur nas/ lha dang lha rdzu 'phrul chen po'am/ klu dang klu rdzu 'phrul chen po'am/ gnod sbyin dang gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul chen po'am/ dri za dang dri za rdzu 'phrul chen po'am/ lha ma yin dang lha ma yin rdzu

'phrul chen po 'am/ nam mkha' lding dang nam mkha' lding rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ mi'am ci dang mi 'am ci rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ lto 'phye chen po dang lto 'phye chen po rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ mi dang mi rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ /mi ma yin pa dang mi ma yin pa rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ tshangs

pa dang tshangs pa rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ sems can gang sus mthong yang rung ste/ snang ba des yongs su snang bar byas pa de dag dra byi la sprin gyi drung du 'ongs so/ /de nas de ltar dra byi la sprin gyi
bsam pa byin gyis rlabs shing thal mo sbyar te/ gnas pa lus dang sems sim par gyur pa/ dga' ba rgya chen po skyes pa sri zhu chen po la gnas pa/ nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan bcom pa/ g.yo rgyu dang

bral ba/ dbang po rnam par dang bar gyur pa de dag la dra byi la'i sprin gyis chos kyi rnam grangs yi ge'i 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyan ces bya ba de nyid rgya cher yang dag par bstan te/ khong du chud pa dang rtogs pa dang shes

pa dang rig par byas so/ /de thos nas kyang de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /de nas de'i phyir chos gyi stan la 'dug nas/ tshong dpon gyi
bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu kho bo ni dbyangs dang ldan pa'i gzungs thob pa ste/ de'i mthu kho bos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lha rnams kyi lha'i

skad kyang shes so/ /de bzhin du klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / tshangs pa rnams kyi tshangs pa'i skad sna

tshogs kyang shes so/ /lha rnams kyi lha'i skad sna tshogs kyang shes so/ /de bzhin du klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma

yin pa dang / tshangs pa rnams kyis tshangs pa'i skad sna tshogs kyang shes so/ /lha rnams kyi lha'i skad gcig pa yang shes so/ /de bzhin du klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding

dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / tshangs pa rnams kyis tshangs pa'i skad gcig pa yang shes so/ /lha rnams kyi lha'i skad tha dad pa yang shes so/ /de bzhin du klu dang gnod

sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / tshangs pa rnams kyi tshangs pa'i skad tha dad pa yang shes so/ /byol song gi skye gnas su skyes pa'i sems
can rnams kyi brda dang skad dang ming tha dad pa kyang shes so/ /sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi skad dang / ming rnams kyang shes so/ /gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sems can rnams kyi skad
dang ming rnams kyang shes so/ /'phags pa'i skad dang ming rnams kyang shes so/ /'phags pa ma yin pa'i skad dang ming rnams kyang shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshig dang brda'
nges pa'i ngag sems can gyi bsam pa bzhin du 'byung ba yang shes so/ /sems can gyi skad re re la yang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag dang gsung

rgya mtsho sems can thams cad kyi ming dang gtam gyi sgra dang / tshig du ldan pa yang rtogs shing khong du chud do/ /ji ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sems can rnams kyi brda

dang nges pa'i tshig dang skad dang ming rgya mtsho la 'jug cing shes pa/ de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa med

pa kun tu mtha' yas pa mu med pa/ sa mtshams med pa gzhal du med pa/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dang / de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams

dang shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa dang brjod du

med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar gyi sems can rnams kyi brda dang / nges pa'i tshigs dang skad dang ming rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug cing shes te/ 'di ltar lha rnams kyi lha'i skad kyang sheso tshangs pa rnaMs

kyis tshangs pa'i skad kyi bar du'ang shes so/ /rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzugs snang ba dbyangs dang ldan pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi

brda'i rnam pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi skad dang / ming rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi ming shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang 'gro ba sna

tshogs kyi brjod pa rab tu bkod pa dang / rnam par spyod pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / tshig thams cad kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / tshig lhur blangs te bstan pa rgya

mtsho la zhug pa de dag dang / dus gsum gyi dmyigs pa thams cad dmigs pa gcig tu rnam par spyod pa rgya mtsho gangs chen mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / tshig gi brtsegs te bstan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / tshig
gnyis nas brtsegs te bstan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / tshig rab tu phye ste bstan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / chos thams cad rab tu dbye bas 'dul ba'i tshul bstan pa rgya
mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad rgya mtsho la zhugs de dag dang / dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i rgyan thams cad la zhugs pa de dag dang / yi ge'i 'khor lo'i

mthar phyin par bya bas rab tu dbye ba las byung ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na yul nags tshal na gnas pa zhes bya ba yod de/

de na tshong dpon gtang brjod ces bya ba 'dug gi de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i phyogs la brtson par bya ba dang / ji ltar 'brang bar bya ba dang / ji ltar sems nges par bzhag

par bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ dra byi la sprin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos kyi rim gro byas nas/ dad pa'i mtshan nyid rtsa ba tshugs pa la rab tu

rtogs pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen las 'ongs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang dag par lta zhing gdong mchi mas gang bar ngus te/ dra byi la sprin la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas
nas/ yang dang yang bltas te phyag 'tshal zhing dra byi la sprin gyi drung nas song ngo // //sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dgu pa/ de nas tshong dpon

gyi bu nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs snang ba dbyangs dang ldan pa'i rgyan de nyid la rjes su bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skad kyi tshul rgya mtsho de nyid la 'jug par bya ba dang / byang chub
sems dpa'i tshul phra mo la 'jug pa de nyid rjes su dran par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems rnam par byung bas/ rnam par dag pa de nyid kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems
dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bag chags bsdu zhing bsgrub pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yongasu smin par bya ba'i sgo de nyid rnam par byang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis
sems can bsdu ba'i ye shes de nyid shin tu byang bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa'i stobs rnam par bya ba de nyid brtan par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i

stobs de nyid nye bar brtan par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa'i rgyud de nyid yongs su sbyangs par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems de nyid gdon mi za bar dge bar bsam pa dang byang

chub sems dpa'i yid dam chen po de nyid mthar phyin par byed cing / tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs yid dam la brtan zhing smon lam gyi sems kyis yongs su skyo ba med pa'i rgyud kyi rgyan dang ldan pa/ phyir mi ldog
pas rnam par gnon pa'i brtson 'grus can/ yid kyis brtul ba las mi bzlogs pa/ dad pa mi 'phrogs pa'i stobs dang ldan pa/ rdo rje mthu bo che mi phyed pa'i sems dang ldan pa dge ba'i bshes
gnyen thams cad kyi gdam ngag 'thun par len pa/ shes rab kha ma bab pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa la mngon du gyur pa/ ye shes rnam par dag pa'i spyod yul thog pa kun nas
lta ba'i ye shes kyi tshul snang ba dang ldan pa/ sa'i gzugs kun nas snang ba rab tu thob pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi'i bye brag la mngon sum du gyur pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ gzhi kun la brtan pa'i
rgyan rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin rnam par dmigs pa gnas med pa dang / bdag gi med pa gnyis su med pa'i spyod yul la rab tu brtson pa/ 'du shes thams cad las 'da' bar byed pa'i ye shes kyi sgo

rnam par dag pa/ chos kyi phyogs dang gzhi tha dad pa'i phyogs la so sor rtogs pa med pa 'jig rten gyi gzhi dang phyogs kyi bye brag las phyir mi ldog pa/ chos kyi gzhi dang phyogs kyi bye brag las phyir mi ldog pa

sangs rgyas kyi phyogs dang gzhi tha dad pa mthong ba dang / rnam par rig par bya ba la gzhol ba'i dus kyi phyogs dang gzhi'i bye brag khong du chud pa'i ye shes can/ chos kyi 'khor lo yid du 'ong bas yang dag par
bsgrub pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ ye shes kun nas snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par snang bas sems gsal bar byas pa/ yid kyi yul lus kun dang ldan pa'i sa la zhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye

shes snang bas rgyud shin tu snang bar byas pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dad pa'i dba' rlabs kyi shugs kyis rab tu rlob pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos pa'i shugs dang 'bral ba med pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i

byin gyis brlabs kyi byin du rlab pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad rang gi sems kyi rgyud khong du chud pa'i 'od kyi snang bar gyur pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra ba thams cad rang gi lus kyi rgyas par gang ba'i smon lam dang chos kyi

dbyings thams cad rang gi lus su yang dag par bsdu ba dang / mngon par bsgrub pa la brtson pa/ de mthar gyi song song ste/ lo bcu gnyis kyis yul nags tshal na gnas par phyin nas/ de nas tshong dpon btang brjod de
btsal te mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang lus thams cad kyis phab ste/ phyag 'tshal nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa bdag de ring dge ba'i bshes gnyen
dang mjal bar gyur pa ni bdag gis 'thob par bgyi ba legs par thob bo/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni mthong bar dka' ba'o/ /'byung bar dka' ba'o/ /mjal bar dka' ba'o/ /
bgrod par dka' ba'o/ /bsnyen bkur bgyi bar dka' ba'o/ /mnyes par bgyi bar dka' ba'o/ /'grogs par dka' ba'o/ /rim gro bgyi bar dka' ba'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni rjesu 'brang bar dka' ba lags

na/ de lta bu'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'grogs pa de ring bdag gis thob par gyur to/ /'phags pa bdag gi 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad bsnyen bkur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la rim gro bgyi ba
dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhal blta ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par dmigs par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam pa nyid thob par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon

lam khong du chud par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag par bsgrub pa'i ye shes snang bar bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas

thams cad rang gi lus su mngon par bsgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag par bsgrub pa rang gi spyod pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mngon

sum du rtogs par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs dang mi bsnyengs pa yongasu dag par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bston pa mnyan pas mi ngoms par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi chos bstan pa mnyan cing blang bar bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bstan pa yang dag par gzungs bar bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bstan pa rnam par dbye bar bgyi
ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bstan pa yongs su gzung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / tshul gcig tu 'gyur bar bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang bskal bar

mnyam par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa yongs su dag par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / byang chub

sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi mdzod rab tu thob par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams

cad kyi chos kyi gter dang mdzod mi zad pa'i ye shes snang ba thob par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi gter dang mdzod khong du chud par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mdzod

tshad med pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying rje chen po'i gter dang mdzod sems can 'dul ba'i mthar phyin par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par
'phrul ba'i gter dang / mdzod rnam par dmyigs par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang gis gter dang / mdzod rang gi sems kyis dbang du bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'

thams cad kyi rnam par dag pa'i gter dang / mdzod rnam pa thams cad du brgyan par bgyi ba'i slad du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ 'phags pa de lta bu'i sems kyis bdag

'dir mchis so/ /bsam pa de lta bu dang yid la smon pa de lta bu dang / mngon par dga' ba de lta bu dang / sems pa de lta bu dang gdon mi 'tshal bar bsgrub par bsam pa de lta bu dang / spyod yul mngon du bgyi ba de lta bu dang / tshul khong

du chud par bgyi ba la mos pa de lta bu dang / rnam par dag pa la gzhol ba de lta bu dang / rnam par dpyad pa'i bsam pa de lta bu dang / rab tu gzhol ba'i sems de lta bu dang / dge ba'i sbyor ba de lta bu dang / mngon du

'gyur ba'i dbang po de lta bus bdag 'dir mchis te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdam ngag dang / rjesu ston pa mdzad cing tshul ni nye bar ston pa mdzad/ rtogs par bgyi ba ni snang bar mdzad lam ni
bston par mdzad/ mu stegs la ni 'joms par mdzad/ chos kyi sgo ni rnam par 'byed pa mdzad/ the tsom ni yongs su gcod par mdzad/ nir nur ni sel bar mdzad/ yid gnyis kyi zug rngu ni 'byin par mdzad/
dogs pa'i dri ma ni sbyong bar mdzad/ sems kyi thibs po ni snang bar mdzad/ sems kyi dri ma ni yongs su sel bar mdzad/ sems kyi rgyud ni rab tu dang bar mdzad/ sems kyi g.yo sgyu ni yongasu
sel bar mdzad/ sems kyi gdung ba ni yongasu sim par mdzad/ 'khor ba las ni sems rnam par bzlog par mdzad/ mi dge ba'i las ni phyir bzlog par mdzad/ sems can dmyal ba
las ni ldog par mdzad/ gnas dang ni bral bar mdzad/ mngon par zhen pa las ni gyen du bskyod pa mdzad/ chags pa thams cad las ni yongs su 'grol bar mdzad/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du

ni bsgrub pa mdzad/ chos kyi grong rdal du 'jug par bgyi ba'i slad du ni mngon du gyur par mdzad/ snying rje chen po la ni rab tu bsgrub pa mdzad/ byams pa chen po la ni rab tu gzhog pa mdzad/ byang chub
sems dpa'i spyod pa la ni rab tu sbyor ba mdzad/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bsgom pa la ni mdzud pa mdzad/ rtogs par 'gyur ba'i sgo la ni gnas par mdzad/ rang bzhin nges par rtogs pa la ni gzhog
par mdzad/ stobs dang ldan pas ni khyab par mdzad/ 'gro ba thams cad mnyam pa nyid du ni sems rnam par dbye ba mdzad do/ /zhes thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang
chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la brtson par bgyi/ ji ltar sbyar bar bgyi/ ji ltar brtson par bgyis na/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par 'gyur ba bdag la bstan du gsol/ de nas

tshong dpon btang brjod kyi de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba gzungs kyi sgo klong mtha' yas pa sngon du 'gro ba la/
sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yang dag par bsams shing ye shes snang ba nye bar bsgrubs pas snyoms par
zhugs so/ /tshong dpon btang brjod de ltar snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu gzugs kyi lus yongs su dag pa 'di lta bur gnas par 'gyur te/ lus yongs su dag pa de'i mthus phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang bcas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas/ 'od rnam par dag pa dang bcas/ sngon gyi

spyod pa la zhugs pa dang bcas/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas/ smon lam gyi tshogs dang bcas/ spyod pa dang 'byung ba'i rgyan rnam par dag pa dang bcas/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya

ba yongs su ston pa dang bcas/ chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu ston pa dang bcas/ sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang bcas/ chos kyi mu'i mthar thugs pa dang bcas par kun kyang lus kyi khongasu chud cing

'dus par snang ste/ de dag phan tshun ma 'dres pa dang / phan tshun mchod pa dang / phan tshun shin tu rnam par phye ba dang / phan tshun shin tu rnam par gnas pa dang / tshul sna tshogs su zhugs pa dang yang dag pa

ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgyan sna tshogs can mnga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa dang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par

'phrul pa sna tshogs yongasu ston par snang ngo / /theg pa sna tshogs rnam par dgod pa mdzad pa dang / smon lam gyi sgo sna tshogs yongs su brjod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams la la na ni dga' ldan gyi pho brang du

skyes shing sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad par snang ngo / /la la na ni dga' ldan gyi pho brang nas 'pho ba dang / la la na ni yum gyi sku na bzhugs shing rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs yongasu ston pa dang / la la

na ni skye ba dang / la la na ni byis pa'i rtsed mo ston pa mdzad pa dang / la la na ni btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa dang / la la na ni mngon par 'byung ba dang / la la na ni snying po byang chub tu gshegs te/

rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan chen pos bdud kyi sde pham par mdzad pa dang / la la na ni lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri zas yongs su bskor cing tshangs pa'i dbang pos chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba gdab

pa dang / la la na ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mdzad pa dang / la la na ni sems can thams cad kyi gnas na bzhugs pa dang / la la na ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar snang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams

la la na ni de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa rnams kyi ring bsrel rnam par dgod par snang ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi zhing la la na ni lha dang mi rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la rgyan gyi klubs

pa byed par snang ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sems can gyi ris rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi 'jig rten gyi rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi lam rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can

gyi skye gnas rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi bsam pa'i rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang sems can

ci la mos pa'i rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi dbang po'i rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang / dus kyi rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi las kyi bye brag rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi las mi mthun pa rnam

pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi 'jig rten rnam par dbye ba rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi tshul lam dang spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa la spyod pa dang / sems can rgya mtsho bsam pa dang sbyor ba'i rnam pa tha dad pa dang dbang po

mi 'thun pa sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / bag chags sna tshogs bag la nyal bar gyur pa'i sems can 'byam klas pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs yongasu bstan pa

dang / yul sna tshogs kyi nges pa'i tshig dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag dang gsung rnam pa sna tshogs su bsgrags pa dang / mdo sde sna tshogs kyi tshul rab tu brjod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnam pa tha dad pa'i rgyud dang so so yang

dag par rig pa'i tshul gyi gzhung sna tshogs dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa'i ming rgya mtsho'i rgyud rnam pa sna tshogs dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog dang seng+ge'i nga ro rab tu bsgrag pa dang / sems can gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba sna

tshogs bstan pa'i cho 'phrul yongasu bstan pa dang / dran pa'i sgo sna tshogs can shin tu bstan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa'i seng+ge'i nga ro sna tshogs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos

kyi 'khor lo'i mthu phyung ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mtha' dang dbus med pa mtha' yas par rnam pa tha dad pa phan tshun mchod pa dang / rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs yang pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil

'khor shin tu phra bar 'dus pa dang / dpag tshad cig gi tshad tsam dang / dpag tshad bcu'i tshad tsam dang / dpag tshad brgya'i tshad tsam nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang

brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi tshad tsam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / sgra skad thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro bas chos ji snyed du

bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang / tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi thoso blangaso/ /yang dag par gzung ngo bsamaso/ /sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag kyang mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyu mchog

gi mthu phyung ba de dag kyang mthong ngo / /de nas tshong dpon btang brjod dran zhing shes bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu kho bo ni de bzhin gshegs

pa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yongasu blangs shing 'dzin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i rgyan de la rtog cing dpyod

pa'i tshe/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzam bu chu klung gi mdog dang ldan pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skar ma'i dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba byang chub sems

dpa' rnam par snang ba'i snying po la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa'ang mig lam du snang ngo / /lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams stobs thams cad kyi shugs dang ldan pa na/

de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos kun tu rnam par yangs pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa'i rgyal po la stsogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams

cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa'ang mig lam du snang ngo / /nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams spos thams cad kyi 'od dang ldan pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab

mar me'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i sems la stsogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo / /

byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyis khams ngur smrig gi rgyal mtshan na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje rab tu 'dul ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i gom pas
rnam par gnon pa la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam na snang ngo / /byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams

rin po che thams cad rab tu 'bar ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi dmyigs pa'i spyan rnam par dmigs pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa med par shin tu
sprul pa la stsogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo / /shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi

'od zer rab tu snang ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos kyi mar me zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi tha dad pa'i dpal gyi rgyal po la

stsogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa'ang mig lam du snang ngo / /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams nyi ma'i 'od zer ltar snang ba na

de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgo kun nas ye shes rnam par snang ba'i dbyangs zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' me tog gis 'od kun nas 'phro bar gtsug phud rab tu 'phyang
ba la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa'ang mig lam du snang ngo / /nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi rgyan yid du

'ong ba'i dge ba'i snying po na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho tshad med pa'i 'od ces bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' lus kyi 'od zer thogs pa med pa'i
gzi brjid rgyal po blo gros la stsogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa'ang mig lam du snang ngo / /'og gis phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po

che'i seng+ge snang zhing 'bar ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer chos kyi dbyings su snang ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings 'od 'phro zhing rnam
par snang bar byung ba'i blo gros la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa'ang mig lam du snang ngo / /steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyis khams

mtshan gyi 'od rnam par snang ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan grags pa thogs pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba byang chub sems
dpa' stobs dang / brtson 'grus thogs pa med pa'i brtson 'grus la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa'ang mig lam du snang ngo / /
rigs kyi bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag la sogs pa/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed

mthong yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang 'dir mi byon/ kho bo yang der 'gro ba med de nam 'dod pa de na bde ba yod pa'i 'jig rten gyis khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang ba mtha' yas pa bzhugs pa'ang

mthong ngo / /tsan dan yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang ba rdo rje bzhugs pa'ang mthong ngo / /spos dri yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang rin chen bzhugs
pa yang mthong ngo / /pad mo yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang ba rin chen pad mo bzhugs pa'ang mthong ngo / /gser yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin

gshegs pa 'od snang zhi ba bzhugs pa'ang mthong ngo / /mngon par dga' ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa mi bsgul ba bzhugs pa'ang mthong ngo / /shin tu brten pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs
pa seng ge bzhugs pa'ang mthong ngo / /me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar snang ba'i 'jig rten gyis khams na de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros zla ba bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo / /rin chen dpal gyi dad pas

brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo / /rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bos ni phyogs gang dang gang na 'jig rten gyi khams gang dang gang gi de bzhin

gshegs pa gang dang gang mthong bar 'dod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag kyang mthong ngo / /dus gang dang gang du dmigs pa gang dang gang la sngon gyi spyod pa gang dang gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'dod pa dang /

rnam par 'phrul pa gang dang gang gi don dang / sems can 'dul ba gang dang gang gis don du de bzhin gshegs pa gang dang gang mthong bar 'dod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag kyang mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de

dag kyang 'dir gshegs pa ma yin/ bdag kyang der phyin pa ma yin no/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ga las kyang byon pa med par shes la rang gis lus las kyang gar yang 'gro ba med

par shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam par dmigs pa yang rmi lam lta bur shes la/ rang gis sems rnam par dmigs pa yang rmi lam dang 'dra bar rgyu bar shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam
par dmigs pa yang gzugs brnyen lta bur shes la rang gi sems rnam par dmyigs pa yang chu'i snod gsal ba lta bur shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam par dmigs pa yang sgyu mas byas
pa'i gzugs lta bur shes la rang gis sems rnam par dmyigs pa yang sgyu ma lta bur shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung yang sgra brnyan ri'i brag cha lta bur brjod par shes la rang gi sems

rnam par dmigs pa yang sgra brnyen lta bur shes pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni rang gi sems kyi byin gyis brlabs las 'byung ngo / /zhes bya bar rjesu rtog shing khong du chud do/ /
sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa thams cad kyang rang gis sems kyi byin gyis brlabs so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi brlabaso/ /sems can thams cad yongasu smin
par bya ba dang / gdul ba yang rang gis sems kyi byin gyis brlabs so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyis brlabs so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

kyi grong khyer du phyin par bya ba yang rang gis sems kyi byin gyis rlabaso/ /rnam par thar pa bsam gyi mi khyab pas rnam par brtse ba yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyis brlabaso/ /sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par

'tshang rgya ba yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi brlabaso/ /chos kyi dbyings kun nas 'dus par khyu mchog gi mthu dbyung zhing rnam par 'phrul pa yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyis brlabaso/ /bskal pa thams cad

shin tu phra bar bsdu ba'i ye shes kyang rang gis sems kyi byin gyis brlabaso zhes bya bar khong du chud cing rjesu rtogaso/ /rigs kyi bu de la kho bo 'di snyam du sems te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis ni rang

gis sems nyid nye bar brten par bya'o/ /bzod pas rang gi sems nyid yongs su brlab par bya'o/ /sgribs pa'i chos rnams las ni rang gi sems nyid yongasu sbyang bar bya'o/ /brtson 'grus kyis ni rang gi sems
nyid yongs su brtan par bya'o/ /bzod pas ni rang gis sems nyid mnyam par bya'o/ /ye shes khong du chud par byas pas ni rang gi sems nyid gzhol bar bya'o/ /shes rab kyi ni rang gi sems nyid
yongasu sbyang bar bya'o/ /dbang rnams la ni rang gi sems nyid mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas dang nyan thos mnyam pa nyid la ni rang gis sems nyid rgyas par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
stobs bcus ni rang gis sems nyid snang bar bya'o snyam mo/ /rigs kyi bu kho bo ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i rgyan 'di shes te/ blangs shing yongasu
'dzin par mdzad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa chags pa med par rnam pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum du

zhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/ mya ngan las 'da' ba myed pa'i mtha' la gnas pa'i rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgo'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa/ gzhi kun nas phyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin

gyi spyod yul gyi tshul shes pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du lus rnam par bkram pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul tha myi dad pa la rnam par spyod pa/ phyogs thams cad du mngon par phyogs pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa/

phyir phyogs myed pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par lta ba de dag gi lus la 'jig rten gyi khams thaMd 'jig cing 'du bar snang yang de dag la bdag dang 'jig rten gyi khamasu gnyis kyi 'du shes myed pa de dag gi

spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ /song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi 'dzam bu gling gi mgo 'gebs pas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal

mtshan ces bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis

tshong dpon btang brjod kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshong dpon btang brjod la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang yang bltas te/ tshong dpon btang brjod kyi yon
tan grangs myed pa la snyan par brjod de/ brtag pa dang / mos par bya ba dang / mi btang bar bya ba sems shing ngus te smre sngags bton nas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen sdug par sems shing dge ba'i bshes
gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen bkur bar mos pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bsgo ba dang / myi 'gal bar byed pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dge ba'i bshes
gnyen la rag lus par rjes su blta ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rjes su bsam pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la g.yo sgyu med par spyod pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi sems kyi

dbang du 'gro bar bya ba dang ldan pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams gdon pa thams cad yongs su spong bar byed pas ma tsam du sems/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bskyed pas pha tsam du sems shing tshong dpon btang

brjod kyi drung du song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs tshong dpon btang brjod kyis bstan pa de la rjes su sems shing / tshong dpon btang brjod kyi gdams ngag la nan tan du bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i

rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes snang ba bsam gyis myi khyab pa rjesu dran par bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings la 'jug cing 'bab pa bsam gyis mi

khyab pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su 'du bar bya ba'i tshul bsam gyis myi khyab pa la 'jug par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis myi khyab

pa'i rjesu blta bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bsdu ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mos par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyi rgyan rjes su sbyang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin

dang / rnam par thar pa'i rnam par dgod pa dang / khyu mchog gis mthu phyung ba bsam gyi myi khyab pa la yongs su brtag pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa la sgrib pa myed pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa la

'jug pa la/ byang chub sems dpa'i las la bsam pa shin tu brtan pa de la nan du bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i las dang / smon lam gyi brgyud bsam gyis myi khyab pa de'i rjes su spyod cing mthar gyis 'dzam
bu'i gling gi mgo 'gebs pas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba gang na ba der phyin nas/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan tshol tshol ba las/ 'chag sa'i gnas shig gi 'chag pa'i mthar thug ste/

ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba myed cing myi g.yol byed pa myed cing lus drang por bsrang ste/ dran pa mngon du byas nas ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis myi khyab
par rnam par 'phrul zhing g.yas g.yon dang / steng logs su lus mtha' yas la tshad myed cing bsam gyis myi khyab pa spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba/ kha dog du ma'i lus dang ldan pa sems kyi skad cig

re re la kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa tshad myed pa yongasu ston pa de/ de de ltar mnyam par bzhag cing zab la zhi ste/ g.yo ba myed cing dmyigs pa myed la dga' bas lus mtho bar gyur pa de'i ba spu'i sgo thams cad
