nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa rab tu 'gyed par byed cing 'dug pa mthong ngo / /rnam par thar pas rnam par 'phrul pa de'i mthus sems kyi skad

cig re re la sems can thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa sbyar ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi
sdug bsngal gyi phung po rnam par bzlog pa dang / ngan song gi lam thams cad yongs su gcad pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bde ba'i lam gyi sgo 'byed ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs

pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi myi shes pa'i sgrib pa rnam par gtor ba dang sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod pa'i phyir rnam par 'phrul pa'i bye brag rnam pa sna tshogs
mtha' yas pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing de'i rkang pa'i mthil gnyis nas/ tshongs dpon gyi tshogs bkur sti dang / rim gro sna tshogs byed pa 'jig rten gyi khams

thams cad du gtogs pa'i tshong dpon dang 'dra ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa lhag pa'i yul la spyod pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis lus shin tu klubs pa/ thor tshugs dang gtsug gi rin po che dang gcod pan sna tshogs

thogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byis pa bye ba 'phyes pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa byung ba mthong ngo / /bram ze dang khyim bdag mang po bza' btung rnam pa mang po dang / ro'i yan lag
sna tshogs su sbyar ba thams cad dang / rgyan thams cad dang / gos thams cad dang / me tog thams cad dang / phreng ba thams cad dang / spos thams cad dang / byug pa thams cad dang / 'dod pa'i yo byad
thams cad dang / rin po che thams cad dang / gnas thams cad dang / snod rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad dang / yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyis sems can dbul po rnams yongasu bsdud
cing / 'gro ba sdug bsngal ba rnams dbugs dbyung ba dang / sems can gyis sems tshim par bya ba dang / sems can gyis bsam pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang / sems can rnams byang chub tu yongasu
smyin par byed cing phyogs bcu bkang ste/ 'dong ba mthong ngo / /pus mo'i lha nga gnyis nas rgyal rigs mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / bram ze mkhas pa'i gzugs dang 'jig rten na mkhas pa'i gzugs
dang / bzo sna tshogs la mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / mi'i 'gro ba'i rgyud na mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las kyis tshul dang / rgyus la gsal zhing

mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / 'jig rten gyi slob dpon du bya bar mkhas pa'i gzugs cha byad rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa/ dbyibs dang rgyan rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa/ yid du 'ong ba'i tshig mang po brjod pas/
yid mi bde ba'i sems can rab tu dga' bar byed cing chos kyi nor gyis dbul ba'i sems can rnams la phan gdags pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams bde bar bya ba dang / log par ltung ba'i
sems can rnams mngon par gdon pa dang / theg pa'i gru la nyam nyes su gyur pa'i sems can rnams dbugs dbyung ba dang / 'jigs pa'i sems can rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i

sgra kun grags par bya ba dang / sdig pa las bzlog pa'i sgra yongs su bsgrag pa dang / dge ba'i chos yang dag par blang ba la sems can gzung ba dang / don spyod pa la sems can dgod pa dang / dga' ba'i

shugs yongs su bskyed pa dang / snyan par smra ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po yongs su brjod pa dang / 'jig rten la don 'thun par bsgrub pa ston par byed cing phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste 'dong ba mthong ngo / /lte
ba'i dkyil 'khor nas drang srong mang po 'gro ba thams cad kyi lus kyi dbyibs su 'khod pa/ pags pa dang shun pa'i gos gyon pa ril ba thogs pa/ gzugs dang cha byad dang dbyibs sna tshogs can spyod

lam rab tu zhi ba dag kyang byung nas/ steng gi bar snang las sangs rgyas kyi yon tan brjod pa byed cing / chos kyi sgra yongs su bsgrags pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra brjod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge

'dun yongs su bstan pa dang / tshangs pa'i spyod pa yongs su brjod pa dang / dbang po dben pa la sems can dgod pa dang / rang bzhin myed pa'i don rab tu brtag pa dang / ye shes kyi don la 'jig rten rab tu dgod
pa dang / 'jig rten gyi gtsug lag gi rnam pa yongs su brjod pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis 'byung ba'i lam gyis tshul rab tu bstan pa dang / mthar gyis bya ba'i las
la sems can rab tu dgod pa byed cing / phyogs bcu bkang ste 'dong ba mthong ngo / /rtsib logs gnyis nas/ klu'i bu mo 'jig rten rgyu ba thams cad kyis grangs dang mnyam pa/ lus kyis dbyibs
bsam gyis myi khyab pa du ma dang ldan pa byung ste/ klu'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa yongs su bstan pa dang / spos kyi sprin gyi rgyan bsam gyis myi khyab pa nam mkha'i dbyings la byin
gyis brlabs pa dang / me tog gi sprin gyi brgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad brgyan pa dang / phreng ba'i sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan gyis nam mkha'i dbyings thams
cad rnam par klub pa dang / rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i rgyan gyis/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad yongs su khebs par bya ba dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin bsam gyis

mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / rin po che'i lha'i ba dan gyi sprin bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / rin po che'i phyang 'phrul sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / cher bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che

dam pa'i sprin gyi char 'bab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / rin po che'i se mo do sna tshogs dang / me tog gi sprin gyi char bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i brgyan dang / rin po che'i khri la bskyil mo

dkrung du 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char bsam gyi khyab pa 'bebs pa'i rgyan dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i bu mo mang po chos kyi glu snyan

pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi sprin gyi char 'bebs pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / rin po che'i pad mo ze ba mtho ba mu tig gis dra bas brgyan pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi 'bru'i sprin gyi char rnam par 'thor

ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / rin po che'i cod pan gyi sprin nor bu rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ 'od zer gyi sprin mtha' yas pa'i char 'bebs pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i rgyan dang /

lha'i lus kyi sprin gyi me tog dang / phreng ba dang / bdug pa dang / rgyan dang / lha'i ba dan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / lha'i bu mo mang po'i lus kyi sprin thal mo sbyar te/ gser gyi me tog snyim pas
'thor pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yon tan dang / legs pa thams cad du bstod pa'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra 'byin cing char 'bebs pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan nam mkha'i dbyings la byin gyis

rlob cing / spos kyi phung po'i sprin rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog du 'dug pa/ bdug spos kyi na bun dang sprin shin tu rgya che bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor mngon par khebs par bya ba
dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad rab tu rgyan pa dang / sems can thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pas skad cig skad cig tu chos kyi dbyings thams

cad rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo / /mthong ka'i dpal gyis be'u nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ lha ma

yin gyi sgyus rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyi myi khyab pa rab tu ston cing chu 'dzin chen po yongs su bskyab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong rab tu bskyod pa dang / ri'i rgyal po chen po thams cad 'bab
par bya ba dang / lha'i gnas thams cad yongs su spyod pa dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad zil gyis gnan pa dang / bdud kyi sde thams cad rab tu gdul ba dang / nga rgyal dang rlom pa dang dregs

pa thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang / gnod par sems pa'i sems bzlog cing dga' bar bya ba dang / the tsom pa'i sems phyir bzlog par bya ba dang / sems can rnams kyi myi dge ba'i chos rab tu zhi bar bya ba

dang / nyon mongs pa'i ri rnam par gtor ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i thab mo shin tu zhi bar bya ba dang / lha ma yin gyi sgyus rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rnam par rtse ba sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams skyo bar bya

ba dang / sdig pa las gyen du bskyod pa dang / 'khor bas 'jigs par bya ba dang / srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad nas gyen du bskyod de gnas myed pa la rab tu gnas par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi sems la
sems can rnams rab tu dgod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu dgod par

bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa la rab tu bzung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshul snang ba yongs su bskyed pa dang / chos kyi tshul rnam par dgod pa sna tshogs kyi

sems kyi skad cig re re zhing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs par byed pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo / /rgyab kyi gzhung nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas mang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med

pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can bdag tu mngon par zhen pa rnams la bdag myed pa dang / sems can myed pa yongs su brjod pa byed cing /

rtag par mngon par zhen pa rnams la 'du byed thams cad myi rtag par yongs su bstan pa dang / 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can rnams la myi sdug pa dang / zhe sdang gi spyod pa can rnams la byams pa dang / gti

mug gi spyod pa can rnams la rkyen las byung ba'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba brjod pa dang / cha mnyam pa'i spyod pa can rnams la ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa'i chos kyi mngon par bstan pa dang / yul
la mngon par dga' ba rnams la gnas med pa rab tu brjod pa dang / zhi ba la gnas su sems pa rnams la smon lam gyi khyad par gyis spro ba bskyed pa dang / phyogs kyi rgyud dang sgo thams cad du chos

kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i rgyud dang / sgo thams cad sems can thams cad kyi don du brjod par byed cing chos kyis dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo / /phrag pa'i lhun

gnyis las gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i dbang po dbyibs sna tshogs dang ldan zhing lus mi sdug pa kha dog dang chu zhing sna tshogs can spyod lam gyi rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ gzhon pa sna tshogs la
zhon pa/ 'khor sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ sems can gyi khams yongs su bskyang ba la brtson pa/ 'od sna tshogs kyis snang bar bya ba la brtson pa/ dbyangs sna tshogs rab tu sgrog

pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas thabs mngon par bsgrub pa sna tshogs ma 'dres pas phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun gyi nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs shing dge ba'i spyod pa
thams cad yongs su bsrung ba dang / 'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su bsrung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang / lag na rdo rje'i las kyis yang dag par
song ba dang / yang dag par zhugs pa thams cad yongs su bsrung ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la rim gror bya ba dang / sems can log par ltung ba rnams kyi ngan song gi lam gyi rgyud
thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad dang / gnod pa dang 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i don du brtson pa/ sems can gyi don bya bas 'jig rten yongasu bskyang ba la brtson

pa rnams bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi 'khor lo yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / phas kyi rgol ba'i 'khor tshar gcod par byed cing / chos kyi dbyings thams

cad rgyas par 'gengs par byed pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo / /mdun gyi lto nas myi 'am ci'i dbang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mi 'am ci'i dbang po'i

bu mo'i 'khor brgya stong grangs med pa can dang / dri za'i dbang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed/ dri za'i dbang po'i bu mo'i 'khor brgya stong grangs myed pa can dag byung nas/ lha'i

rol mo brgya stong grangs myed pa'i sgra snyan pa dang / glu'i dbyangs kyis chos kyi rang bzhin dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstod pa brjod cing / byang chub kyi sems yongs su bsngags pa dang / byang chub sems
dpa'i spyod pa yongs su brjod pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya ba'i sgo thams cad la mngon par bstod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgo thams cad du 'jug pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo
thams cad la mngon par spro bar bya ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo thams cad yongs su brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa'i sgo thams cad yongasu gzung ba dang / sems can gyi

sgo thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyis zhing gi sgo thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang / chos kyi sgo thams cad mngon par bstan par bya ba dang / sgrib pa'i sgo thams cad rnam par bzlog par

bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgo thams cad yongs su bskyed pa byed cing / chos kyis dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo / /kha'i sgo nas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rin

po che bdun dang ldan zhing stobs kyi yan lag bzhi'i tshogs kyis 'khor dang ldan pa byung ba nas/ sbyin pa chen po'i 'od zer gyi rgyan rab tu 'gyed cing rin po che'i 'byung gnas thams cad yongs su btang ba dang / nor

bu rin po che'i tshogs thams cad sbyin pa dang / dbul po rnams nor dang ldan par bya ba dang / srog gcod pa las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang / byams pa'i sems la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / ma byin par

len pa dang / rab tu dbral ba dang / rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan pa'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yongs su btang ba dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa las rnam par bzlog pa dang / tshangs pa'i spyod pa la rab tu dgod

pa dang / brdzun du smra ba las rnam par bzlog pa dang / bslu ba myed pa la gzhol bar rab tu dgod pa dang / phra ma'i tshig las rnam par bzlog pa dang / gzhan 'dum par brtson pa'i tshig rab tu brjod pa dang / zhe

gcod pa'i tshig gi las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba'i tshig rab tu brjod pa dang / gnod pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i byung rgyal du smra ba las sems can rnam par zlog pa dang / don

zab mo'i tshig rab tu dbye ba gdon mi za ba la yang dag par dgod pa dang / ngag gi nyes pa thams cad las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang / snying rje dang ldan pa'i tshig rab tu brjod par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi snying gi dri
ma yongs su sel cing 'dod pa chung ba dang / mchog shes pa la brtson par sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / chags sems las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang / gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud dga'

bar byed pa la rab tu dgod pa dang / lta ba'i dra ba thams cad las 'jig rten rab tu gdon pa dang / yid gnyis kyis ra ba thams cad rnam par gtor ba dang / the tsom gyi spros pa thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang / nem

nur dang som nyi'i rab rib yongs su gsal ba dang / chos rnam par dbye ba'i 'jig rten du rab tu dbye ba dang / rkyen las byung ba rab tu brjod pa dang / rang bzhin gyi dben pa'i tshul la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / sgrib

pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / sgrib pa med pa'i tshul la gzung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi don gyi tshul sna tshogs brjod pa byed cing / phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor

bzangs kyis mthong ngo / /myig gnyis nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor brgya stong sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po thams cad yongasu snang bar byed cing 'jig rten

gyi mun pa chen po sel ba dang / sems can rnams kyis gti mug gi rab rib sel ba dang / grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams kyi grang ba'i sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang /

sa'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od kha dog dkar po can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnamasu 'od bai DUr+ya'i kha dog rab tu 'gyed pa dang / bai DUr+ya'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnamasu 'od gser gyi kha dog

can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od shel gyi kha dog rab tu 'gyed pa dang / gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od mu tig dmar po'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / a sma garba'i

rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od gser gyi dra ba can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od a sma garba'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / in dra nI la'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od

rin po che'i rgyal po nyi ma'i snying po'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po nyi ma'i snying po'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che'i rgyal po in dra nI la'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / mu tig

dmar po'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che'i rgyal po zla ba'i 'od gzer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po zla ba'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil

'khor gyi snying po'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od mu tig dmar po'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / rin po che gcig gi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed

pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che gcig gi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du sems can

gyi don tshad med pa la brtson zhing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo / /smin 'tshams kyi mdzod spu nas zla ba mang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra

ba snyed byung nas/ lha'i dbang po thams cad zil gyis gnon cing / 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i dga' ba rnam par bzlog pa dang / sangs rgyas blta bar dga' ba la rjes su bsngags pa byed cing / sems

can tshad myed pa gdul ba la brtson par phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs par mthong ngo / /'phral ba nas tshangs pa chen po spyod lam rab tu zhi ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed

byung ba nas/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs su brjod de/ sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba gdab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rab tu dga' bar byed cing sems can gyi don tshad myed pa la brtson par phyogs

bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo / /mgo nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ kha dog dang dbyibs sna tshogs kyis

brgyan pa'i lus yongasu ston cing / dpe byad bzang pos rnam par bris pa'i lus rab tu ston pa dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin mtha' dang dbus med pa rab tu 'gyed ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa nas bzung ste/ gtong ba dang len pa dang / dngos po yongs su gtong ba'i sprin mang po rab tu dgye ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho yongasu bstan

pa dang / sbyin pa'i spyod pa 'jig rten du yongasu brjod pa dang / ser sna'i dri ma rnam par bzlog pa dang / chags pa thams cad spang ba la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / 'jig rten rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgyan gyi brgyan pa

par byin gyi brlab pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / mtshan thams cad kyi yon tan yang dag par brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan 'byung ba'i rgyu ston par byed pa mthong ngo / /yang byang chub sems dpa'

sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu brjod cing / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor

ba rgya mtsho yongasu bstan pa dang / sems can thams cad lam gyi rgyud dang yul las phyir phyogs par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la mngon du phyogs par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa la rnam par smad pa dang /

'jig rten gyi phyin ci log gis ling thog rnam par bsal ba dang / log pa'i rnam par rtog pa rab tu zhi bar byas nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims la yang dag par dgod pa dang / snying rje chen po'i tshul khrims

yongs su brjod cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi lam nan tan du bya ba'i tshul khrims la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud rmyi lam lta
bur sems can rnams la rab tu brjod cing / rmi lam gyi tshul dang mnyam par yongs su gzhol bar bya ba'i phyir yul yongs su 'dzin pa dang nyon mongs pa la dbang bsgyur bar sems can rnams rab tu

dgod pa byed pa mthong ngo / /yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ 'jig rten rnams la mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu mngon par ston cing / khro ba

med pa dang / 'khrug pa myed pa dang / sha gnyer ba myed pa dang / zhe sdang ba med pa dang / chud gastson pa med pa dang / khong khro ba myed pa'i sems la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas kyi

lam gyi rgyud thams cad yongs su gcod pa'i phyir/ ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i sprin rab tu 'gyed cing bzod pa'i stobs

la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / chos la dbang bsgyur ba la sems can rab tu snang bar byed pa mthong ngo / /yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ byang chub
sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs mtha' yas pa shin tu ston cing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsam pa las phyir myi ldog pa'i stobs kyis thos pa rgya mtsho yongs su
btsal bas mi skyo bar bya ba yongs su brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod cing rim gro bya ba la sems can rab tu gzud pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i

brtson 'grus chen po la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin lus thams cad las rab tu 'gyed cing byang chub sems dpa'i brtson

'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su bstan pa dang / sems can rnams kyi le lo'i ri rnam par gtor ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang las la dbang

bsgyur ba'i 'jig rten rab tu gzud pa dang / rgyun mi chad par brtson par byed pa mthong ngo / /yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams

kyi rjes su dran pa'i lam la sems can thams cad rab tu dgod cing sgrib pa dang / bar du gcod pa dang / rab rib thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / rlom pa dang bag myed pa thams cad las sems can rnam par
zlog pa dang / bag yod pa'i chos la rab tu dgod pa dang / khengs pa bgyid pa dang / nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan rab tu snyol ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi bsam gtan gyi yan lag rgya mtsho brjod pa dang /
'jig rten rnams la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsngags pa dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi tshul mang po'i sprin
rab tu 'gyed pa dang / sems la dbang bsgyur ba la sems can dgod pa byed cing skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo / /yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing

grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su tshol ba dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyin pa rab tu dgye ba dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho'i skad

thams cad kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra sgrog pa dang / yang dag par blta ba'i klog rab tu 'gyed pa dang / chos kyi rang bzhin gyi sgra dbyangs rab tu bsgrag pa dang / sems can rnams kyi bdag

tu lta ba'i ri'i lhun rab tu bzhig pa dang / lta ba thams cad kyi zug rngu dbyung ba dang / the tsom dang yid gnyis dang nem nur gyi rab rib bsal ba dang / ye shes kyi dbang yang dag par bsngags pa byed cing /

sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo / /yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
thabs mkhas pa'i tshul gyi dkyil 'khor rab tu brjod pa byed cing ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu dgye ba dang / 'jig rten rnams la

thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa rab tu brjod pa dang / theg pa chen po'i 'byung ba mngon par bstan pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor yang dag par bsngags pa dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das

pa tha myi dad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / 'jig rten rnams la byang
chub sems dpa'i dbang gi dkyil 'khor rab tu bstan pa byed cing / sems bskyed pa re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo / /yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med

pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtshan rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra sgrog cing / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas byang chub sems dpa'

sems can thams cad kyi smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu bkye ba dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsngags pa dang /

byang chub sems dpa'i dbang thams cad la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / smon lam chen po'i shing rta'i 'khor lo phyi ma'i mtha' mur thug par 'dril ba/ chos thams cad kyi rjesu 'brang ba nyon mongs pa thams cad

rnam par zlog pa mi shes pa'i rigs rnam par 'thor ba/ 'jig rten du rab tu brjod pa byed cing / smon lam sna tshogs kyi rnam par 'phrul pas/ sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs

pa mthong ngo // //sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po bcu pa'o/ /yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba byung ste/ byang chub

sems dpa'i stobs rab tu snang bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i stobs yongs su bsgrub pa'i sgra rab tu dbyung ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub cing 'byin pa'i sngon

gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu bkye ba dang / bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi thub pa'i stobs yongs su bstan pa dang / khor yug dang rdo rje'i ri thams cad lus kyi steng du rdzis kyang mi
nyams pa'i stobs rab tu brjod pa dang / bskal pas tshig pa thams cad kyi me rgya mtsho'i nang na gnas kyang lus la gnod pa med pa'i stobs yongs su bstan pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam
klas pa thams cad lag pa'i mthil gyis nam mkha'i dbyings su ston pa'i stobs yongs su ston pa byed cing / sems gyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings su 'gengs pas rgyun mi gcod pa mthong ngo / /yang

byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ sems can rnams la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ston cing / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu 'gyed pa dang / 'jig rten rnams la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan dang / ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis
rab tu brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis mngon par bstan pa dang / smon lam thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang

ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su brjod pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis shin tu yangs par bya ba dang /
sems can thams cad bdag myed pa'i rang bzhin la gzung ba mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par bstan pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho rnam par blta ba mngon par

shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rab tu brjod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rnam par dbye ba'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rab tu dbye ba dang / sems can thams cad
kyi bsam pa dang mos pa rnam par blta ba'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yang dag par brjod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes mngon par
shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par grol ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su bstan pa

byed cing / sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo / /spyi bo'i gtsug tor gyi gseb nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sangs rgyas kyi zhing

grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mtshan dam pa dang / dpe byad bzang po rnam par dag pas brgyan pa/ 'dzam bu chu glung gi gser gyi ri bo shin tu 'bar ba ltar snang ba 'od kyi dkyil 'khor phyogs bcur
spro zhing tshad med par 'bar ba dang / chos kyi dbyings tshul gyis rgyas par 'gengs pa'i dbyangs mnga' ba/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dbus med pa yongs su ston pa 'gro ba thams
cad la tha mi dad par chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bebs pa ste/ 'di ltar snying po byang chub mchog tu phyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos kyi dbyings gzhi'i bye brag mngon sum du

shes pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams la gzhi kun tu rten pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon
par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos chen po'i rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba rnams la sgo kun nas 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab pa dang / byang chub
sems dpa' gzhon nur gyur pa rnams la kun nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa rnams la snying rje chen po'i
tshogs shin tu brtan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pa rnams la chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi bye brag
shes bya'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa rnams la 'gro ba yongs su sdud pas kun nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi
char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' cher skyes pa rnams la dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon sum du dmigs pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi
sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor la spyod pa rnams la chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang gzhi rab tu sgrog pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par

dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa rnams la snying rje chen po'i tshul dang thabs kyi snying po'i sprin kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub
sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa rnams la dga' bar bgyi ba'i mdzod shin tu bstsags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
yangs pa la mos pa rnams la rnam par thar pa mi zad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i smon lam gyis dga' bar byed pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /
gzugs la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la gzhi kun tu mi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / tshangs pa'i ris kyi lha rnams la tshul rgya mtsho tshad myed
pa'i 'brug sgra'i dbyangs shes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / dbang bsgyur ba'i lha rnams la stobs 'byung ba'i chos kyi yo byad mi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i
chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs rgyal mtshan sna tshogs can yang dag pa bsgrub pa'i dbyangs shes

bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams la ye shes rin po che sna tshogs la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi dbyings kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /
dga' ldan gyi lha rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / mtshe ma'i lha rnams la de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad rjes su dran pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas dga' ba'i shugs

'byung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'i gnas su chos kyi dbyings kyi nam mkha' la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas rnam par 'phrul pas rgyas par 'gengs

pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / dri za'i dbang po'i gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos yang dag par bgro ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /

lha ma yin gyi gnas su ye shes kyi tshul rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'byung ba'i

thabs kyi sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / mi'am ci'i dbang po'i gnas su chos kyi sprin yang dag par 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbyangs shes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par

dbab pa dang / klu'i dbang po'i gnas su byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa sgrog cing srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud las skyo ba bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas

su dga' ba rgya mtsho rnam par 'phel bar byed pa'i shugs shes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / myi'i gnas su 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes rnam par 'byed
pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rten du 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi ba'i dbyangs dang / 'phags pa'i lam gyi tshig gi rgyud

kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas su las kyi lam kha na ma tho ba myed pa la nan tan du bya ba'i dbyangs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dran pa'i

sprin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lhun ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrags pa/ sems can thams cad
kyi gtong ba'i sems 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / sems can log par ltung ba rnams la sdug bsngal thams cad zhi ba rab tu 'thob pas dbugs 'byung ba'i

dbyangs kyi nga ro zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa mdzad cing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo / /ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i
bu ga'i sgo re re nas kyang 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi kha dog dang gzugs kyi klong dang rgyan grangs med pa can dgos pa sna tshogs grangs med pa la sta gon du gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi

zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ste/ 'di ltar ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor la la las ni sprin gyi

bkye ba'i spyod pa skyon med pas/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo'i dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor la la las ni dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad

kyi tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs dang / yi dam dang tshul khrims kyi dkyil 'khor du rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor la la las ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad

bzod pa'i spyod pa'i rnam pa dus gsum du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams rkang lag dang / yan lag gi dam pa bcad kyang nyams su bzod pa byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khu tshur dang dbyig pas bsnun

te/ mtshon gyis lus la btab kyang nyams su bzod par byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / lus thams cad bshags pa dang / snying dang myig phyung yang nyams su bzod pa byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngo / /
byang chub sems dpa'i dus gsum du byung ba rnam par brtags pa'i lus dang ldan pa gzhan dag gi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal ba'i ched du lus dang / sems la gnod pa thams cad dang /

yan lag dang nying lag bcad pa thams cad kyang snying rje chen pos dbang du byas pa'i phyir nyams su bzod par byas pa dang / bag la nyal zhi bar byas pa dang btang snyoms su bzhag pa'i byang chub sems

dpa'i bzod pa'i spyod pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi gzugs de lta bu dag mthong ngo / /ba spu'i bu ga'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor la la las ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi

brtson 'grus gyi spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa rnam par phye ba'i gzugs dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i brtson 'grus kyi rnam par 'phrul pa 'jig rten yongasu bskyod pa dang

rgya mtsho yongs su bskyod pa dang / sems can yongasu skyo bar bya ba dang / mu stegs can thams cad yongs su tshar gcad pa dang / bdud thams cad spa bkong ba dang / chos kyi phyogs snang bar bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i

mthu chen por rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor la la las ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa rnam par rgyu ba'i rnam grangs ji snyed pa dang lus nye bar

len pa ji snyed pa dang / rigasu skye ba yongs su gzung ba ci snyed pa dang / gzugs kyi lus yongs su grub pa ji snyed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi man ngag la nan tan du bya ba'i gnas ji snyed pa dang /
de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan gyi yan lag yongs su bsgrub pa dang / 'thun pa'i gtsug lag khang dang gnas dang / gzhal med khang dang yul dang ri'i sul ji snyed pa dang / bsam gtan gyi yan lag

de dag sus yongs su bsgrub pa'i drang srong gi lus ji snyed pa dang / rgyal po'i thabs ji snyed pa dang 'byung ba la mngon par mos pa ji snyed pa dang / brtul zhugs dang yi dam dang / tshul dang spyod lam ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi

mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor la la las ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa la rnam par spyod cing / chos thams cad yongasu tshol ba dang ldan pa'i lus yongasu bzung ba mthong ngo / /
lus gang gi chos kyi tshig gi don du yang ba dog pa thams cad yongs su btang ste/ sems can thams cad las yongs su btsal ba dang rim gro dang / bkur sti thams cad kyis dge ba'i bshes
gnyen thams cad las yongasu btsal ba dang / dad pa dang sri zhus lus rab tu btud de/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las yongs su btsal ba dang / chos kyi tshig gcig la ji lta ba de bzhin du shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi tshig thams cad la'ang de bzhin te/ 'gro ba thams cad du gzugs brnyan byung ba'i lus thams cad kyi yongasu btsal ba de dag thams cad kyang tshong dpon gyi bu nor
bzangs kyi ba spu'i sgo gcig gi 'od zer gyi dra ba dang dkyil 'khor las mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor la la las ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sems can
yongs su smin par bya ba'i thabs 'gro ba'i rgyud rgya mtsho thams cad du 'byam klas pa/ sems can thams cad yongasu bsdu ba'i sbyor bar mthong ngo / /sems can re re la yang lus dang spyod pa'i tshul
gyi sgo sems can gyi lus nye bar blangs pa thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa la brtson pa/ sems can thams cad kyi lus dang 'dra bas yongasu sdud pa yang ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor gcig
las mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la la las ni sngon bcom ldan 'das kyi bskal pa thams cad kyi smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i spyod pa dang / sems can thams cad
yongasu smin par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par sgrub pa'i spyod pa dang / zhing thams cad yongasu dag par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa mdzad pa ji snyed pa dang / smon lam thams cad
mngon par bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor ji snyed cig de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi zhabs kyi drung du bor ba'i skyon thams cad las so so'i re re'i gnyen por mngon par bsgrub par mdzad pa/ de dag thams cad

kyang tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer dra ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig las mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la la las ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa thams

cad dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la la las ni ye shes kyi spyod pa rnam par rgyu ba thams cad dang ldan pa myi shes pa'i gnyid kyi log pa'i

sems can sad par byed pa'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho mthong bar gyur to/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa la sems shing

rtogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor de rjes su dran par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba de la rjes su rnam par bsam pa dang /

sems can gyi don gyi tshul rgya mtsho de la 'jug par bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba'i sgo rgyud kun la mngon du gnas pa'i rgyan de'i rjes su 'brang zhing khong du chud par bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyan
rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi sgo de la 'jug par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs yang dag par gnon pa'i ye shes de la rab tu brtags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po'i stobs

de yongs su bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi stobs de bstan par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i stobs de shin tu rgyas par bya ba byed cing / dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan

gyi mdun du nyin zhag gcig kyang lon no/ /nyin zhag gnyis dang bdun yang lon no/ /zla ba phyed dang zla ba gcig dang / zla ba gnyis dang zla ba drug gi bar dang / nyin zhag kyang drug du dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan

gyi mdun du lon te/ de ltar zla ba drug dang / nyin zhag drug 'das nas dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan ting nge 'dzin de las langs so/ /de nas nor bzangs kyi smras pa/ 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin 'di de ltar

zab la/ de ltar rgya che zhing tshad ma mchis pa'i yul dang ldan pa dang / de ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa de ltar snang ba mtshungs pa ma mchis pa rgyan dang ldan pa dang / de ltar mi 'phrogs pa'i

spyod pa'i yul dang ldan pa dang / de ltar ma 'dres pa'i yul dang ldan pa dang / de ltar phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba dang / ting nge 'dzin 'di de ltar sems can gyi don tshad ma mchis pa rab tu bsgrub
par gyur pa ni ngo mtshar te/ de ni sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po tshad ma mchis pa rnam par zhi bar bgyi ba la sta gon du gnas pa ste/ 'di ltar dbul ba'i sdug bsngal zhi bar
bgyi ba la sta gon du gnas so/ /sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud rgyun bcad pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud las yongs su skyob pa dang / mi khom pa'i lam gyi rgyud kyi sgo thams

cad gcad pa dang / mtho ris kyi lam gyi rgyud du phyin par bgyi ba dang / lha dang mi'i dga' ba dang / bde ba 'byung bar bgyi ba dang / bsam gtan gyi yul gyis dga' ba nyams su myong bar bgyi ba dang /
'dus byas la spyod pa'i bde ba yongs su 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / khams gsum pa las 'byung ba'i sgo yongs su bstan pa la sta gon du gnas so/ /byang chub kyi sems yang dag par skye ba'i rgyu yongs su

brjod pa la sta gon du gnas so/ /bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yang dag par skye ba'i rgyu rnam par 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / snying rje chen po'i shugs rgya chen po rnam par 'phel bar bgyi ba dang /
smon lam rgya chen po'i stobs yongs su bskyed par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam snang ba rab tu thob par bgyi ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'i theg pa rnam par dgod pa dang /
theg pa chen po'i khyad par la 'jug pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa shes shing snang bar bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpas shes shing snang ba thob par bgyi ba dang /
byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam dang spyod pa dang / 'byung ba dang / rgyan rnam par dag pa yongs su bsgrub pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa gnan pa la thogs pa med par mchis
par bgyi ba la sta gon du gnas pa'o/ /'phags pa ting nge 'dzin de'i mying ci zhes bgyi smras pa/ rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun nas lta ba'i btang snyoms yongs su thob pa zhes

bya ba yod de/ ting nge 'dzin 'di ni de'i snang ba ste/ sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan ces bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun nas lta ba'i btang snyoms rab tu thob pa'i snang ba

las skyes pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan ces bya ba 'di shin tu bsgoms na sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan la stsogs pa ting nge 'dzin brgya stong grangs myed pa phrag bcu tshang ba
yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /smras pa 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin 'di'i yul der bsam so ma lags/ smras pa rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin 'di la snyoms par zhugs pa la ni 'jig rten gyi khams
rnam par dag pa dmigs pa la thogs pa med do/ /'jig rten gyi khams su 'jug par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /'jig rten gyi khams rnam par gnan pa la thogs pa med do/ /'jig
rten gyi khams yongs su brgyan pa la thogs pa med do/ /'jig rten gyi khams yongs su sbyangs pa la thogs pa med do/ /'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /
sangs rgyas kyi blta zhing rnam par dmyigs par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba brtags pa la thogs pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su shes
par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi stobs la 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtshor 'jug pa la thogs pa med do/ /
sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char yongs su bzung ba la thogs pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ma 'dres pa shes shing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sangs
rgyas kyi zhing 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho la 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /phyogs bcur 'jug cing rjes su 'brang bar bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos
bstan pa rjes su brtag par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi phyogs rjes su brtag par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /snying rje chen po'i phyogs rnam par mi spang ba la thogs pa med do/ /
byams pas phyogs rgyas par dgangs ba la thogs pa med do/ /sangs rgyas blta ba'i phyogs la 'jug pas myi ngoms par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sems can rgya mtsho thams cad du
'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sems can gyi dbang po rgya mtsho thams cad shes shing khong du chud pa la thogs pa med do/ /sems can gyi dbang po tha dad pa thams cad shes par
bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /rigs kyi bu kho bos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa 'di shes su zad na/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa
rgya mtsho la zhugs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi yul la blo gros rnam par dag pa/ chos thams cad la rigs pa rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes can/ blo shin tu yangs pas tshad med pa'i yul rgyas par 'gengs
pa gzungs chen po'i snang ba la dbang bsgyur ba/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba thams cad shin tu dag pa mngon par shes pa rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu 'byin pa la shin tu
byung ba so so yang dag par rigs pa mi zad pa'i rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/ ngag bsnyen pas sa'i snying po dang ldan par brjod pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa rnams kyi spyod pa shes pa 'am/
yon tan brjod pa 'am/ spyod yul bstan pa 'am/ yul rab tu brjod pa 'am/ smon lam chen po'i stobs yang dag par bsngags pa 'am/ 'byung ba'i sgo yongs su snang bar bya ba 'am/ yang dag
par bsgrub pa mngon par brjod pa dang / lam yongs su bstan pa 'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyun gyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba 'am/ sems kyi yul shes par bya ba 'am/ ye shes mnyam pa nyid khong du
chud par bya bar nus re skan/ /song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na phyogs kyi gnas rgya mtsho rnam par brlob pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na bza' shing gi ra bas kun nas rnam par brgyan pa

zhes bya ba zhig grong khyer 'od chen po zhes bya ba'i shar phyogs logs na yod de/ de na shed las skyes pa'i rgyal po 'od bzangs kyi chung ma dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin zhes bya ba yod kyi/ de'i gan du song

la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'as byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tu bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim

zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan las snying po yongs su blangs te/ chos kyi nye bar 'tsho ba byas pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi yul la zhugs pa/ snang ba thob pa ye shes kyi snang

bar gyur pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba rab tu thob pa/ mos pa rnam par dag pa khong du chud pa/ sems can chos kyi tshul gyis snang ba'i rjes su song ba/ rnam par dag pa'i sgos snang ba dang ldan par gyur pa/

phyogs bcu ye shes kyi snang bas rab tu 'dul ba des/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ dge slong

rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan la btud de phyag 'tshal nas/ yang dang yang lta zhing / yang dang yang mngon par blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / kun tu 'dud pa dang / gus par bya ba dang / rim gro bya ba dang / yid la bya

ba dang / bsam pa dang / bsgom pa dang / yongs su bsgom pa dang / legs par brjod pa dang / ngo mtshar du bya ba dang / yon tan mngon du bya ba dang / rjes su bsngags pa dang / rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang /
rjes su dran par bya ba dang / brten par bya ba dang / mi btang ba dang / yid la bsam pa dang / rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / smon lam gyi rjes su 'jug par bya ba dang / mthong bar dga' ba dang /

dbyangs kyi mtshan ma gzung ba dang / gzungs kyi rjes su bsam pa dang / ming yongs su gzung ba'i rjes su song ba'i sems dang ldan par bya ba dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs rjes su dran par bya ba dang / ye shes kyi yul

rjes su bsam pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi yul la rjes su 'jug par bya ba dang / smon lam gyi yul la rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / spyod yul gyi yul rnam par sbyang bar bya ba dang / ye shes kyi snang ba
yongs su gzung ba byed cing / dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi drung nas song ngo // //sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po bcu gcig pa/
de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi yon tan gyis ni mgu/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis ni yang dag par bsngags te btang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba'i byin gyis ni byin du
brlabs/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la ni nan tan du byed/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen yid du 'ong ba ni rjes su sems/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'byung gnas tsam du
lta/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ston pa yin par yang dag par lta/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos la rjes su lta/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni sangs

rgyas nam mkha' lta bu la mig tsam du zhib mthar gyis gnas rgya mtsho rnams par rlob pa'i bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par brgyan pa/ gang na ba der phyin nas de mthong nas/ bza' shing gi ra bas kun nas

bskor ba/ rin po che'i shing gi phreng ba spel ba legs pas yongs su brgyan pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi shing gi phreng ba'i me tog srab bu yid du 'ong ba'i sprin rab tu 'brul bas gzhi rgyas pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi

shing gis yang dag par brgyan pa/ shing thams cad kyi me tog shin tu rgyas pa sna tshogs kyi yongs su gang ba/ spos sna tshogs kyi shing gis phreng ba las phyogs kun tu spos kyi ngad zhim pa rin po che'i

phreng ba'i shing sna tshogs kyi phreng ba 'phyang ba/ rab tu 'byung zhing char ltar mngon par bab pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi shing dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis mdzes shing spa la/ rgya cher brgyan pa'i gzhi
can yid bzhin gyis gos kyi shing thams cad las kha dog sna tshogs kyi gos 'byung bas gam yo khebs shing mdzes par brgyan pa/ sil snyan gyi shing thams cad las lha rdzas las kyang 'phags pa'i sil

snyan rlung gis bskyod cing sgra 'byin pa'i dbyangs snyan 'byung ba/ sa'i gzhi mthon dman med par gnas pa rgyan gyi shing sna tshogs kyi gseb nas/ rgyan sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa rgyun tu 'byung zhing 'phyang bas/

rab tu brgyan pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa mthong ste/ bza' shing gi ra ba chen po kun nas rnam par brgyan pa de'i nang na khang pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun kyang nor bu rin po che dam pa sna tshogs kyi ba gam gyis sna

tshogs su brgyan pa dang / khang pa brtsegs pa brgya stong phrag bcu 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser las brtsegs pa'i bde dang ldan pa dang / gzhal med khang brgya stong phrag bcu sku gdung rin po che rnam pa
sna tshogs las bres pa/ rdzing bu brgya stong phrag bcu'i rin po che thams cad las gzhi blangs te/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi pha gus mu khyud byas pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi them skas btags pa/

rin po che sna tshogs kyi stegs bus bskor ba/ lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi dri dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba gser gyi bye mas kun tu bkram pa/ gzhi nor bu rin po che chu 'dang kun tu bkram pa/ phyogs bzhi

nas them skas rnam par bres pa/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba dang / ngur dang / rma bya dang / khu yug dang / khrung khrung dang / ka la ping ka dang / kun la'i sgra skad dang / snyan pa'i dbyangs

dang ldan pa/ rin po che ta la'i 'phreng bas kun nas brgyan pa/ gser gyi dril bu'i dra bas kun nas brgyan pa yog pa/ rlung gis bskyod pa'i sgras yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba/ steng nas rin po che'i bla re

chen po bres pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gi rabs brgyan pa/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan legs par bsgreng ba/ lu ma brgya stong phrag bcu dus dang 'thun pa'i tsan dan gyi 'dam gyis mtha' 'khor ba rin

po che sna tshogs kyi kha dogs du 'dug pa'i pad mos yongs su khyab pa/ rin po che'i pad mo'i 'od chen pos snang bar gyur pa'i chu dri ma med pa dang ldan pa yod pa ste/ bza' shing gi ra ba de'i dbus na gzhal

med khang chen po rgyal mtshan sna tshogs zhes bya ba dang sa'i gzhi rin po che rgya mtsho'i snying po las blangs pa/ nor bu rin po che'i ka ba bkye ba 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi lhun mngon par 'phags pa nor bu

rin po che 'og bag rnam par snang ba'i spang leb bkye bas brgyan pa/ gzhi nor bu rin po che 'bar ba grangs med pa'i dra bas bres pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po'i mi pham pa'i spos kyi dris gam yo kun nas bdug pa/

rin po che'i rgyal po sgra snyan pa 'byin pa 'di'i ngad kun tu ldang ba/ rin po che'i rgyal po dri rnam par gsal bar byed pas dbang po rno ba'i bag chags rnam par bsgrub pa dang ldan zhing gzhal med khang chen po rgyal mtshan sna

tshogs der stan grangs med pa gding bar gyur pa 'di la pad mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che phyogs snang bar byed pa'i pad mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i pad mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po

che 'gro ba yid du 'ong ba'i pad mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che mdzod sna tshogs kyis pad mo'i snying po can dang / rin po che seng ge'i shing thams cad kyi pad mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che dri ma myed pa'i pad mo'i

snying po can dang / nor bu rin po ches brgyan pa'i pad mo'i snying po dang / nor bu rin po che sgo kun nas brgyan pa'i pad mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che 'od kyis brgyan pa'i pad ma'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i

gnas rnam par dag pa'i rin po ches rnam par brgyan pa'i 'od zer kun tu 'byung ba'i pad mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che rdo rje'i seng ges gnon pa'i pad mo'i snying po can dag bshams shing bting ba ste/ gzhal med
khang chen po rgyal mtshan sna tshogs de'i ba gam mang po yang / rin po che sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa las byas pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi rnam par brgyan pa/ kha dog bsam gyis mi khyab par

mdzes shing gzugs yid du 'ong pa dag go/ /bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas brgyan pa/ de steng nas bla re chen po brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas khebs pa ste/ 'di ltar gos kyi bla re dang khri shing gi bla re dang /

me tog gi bla re dang / phreng ba'i bla re dang / spos kyi bla re dang / nor bu rin po che'i bla re dang / gser gyi bla re dang / rgyan gyi bla re dang / rin po che rdo rje snang ba'i bla re dang / glang po'i shugs dang ldan pas

sprul pa'i lha mo'i bla re dang / nor bu rin po che brgya byin mngon par dga' ba'i bla re dang / de dag la sogs pa bla re brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas kheb par byas pa'o/ /rin po che'i dra ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun

nas yog pa ste/ 'di ltar rin po che dam pa'i dril bu'i dra ba dang / rin po che'i gdugs kyi dra ba dang / rin po che'i 'bru'i dra ba dang / mu tig rgya mtsho'i snying po'i dra ba dang / nor bu rin po che bai DUr+ya sngon po'i dra ba dang /

seng ge'i khri shing gi dra ba dang / nor bu rin po che chu shel gyi dra ba dang / spos kyi gzugs kyi dra ba dang / rin po che'i cod pan dang / rin po che'i phreng ba dang / de dag la sogs pa rin po che'i dra ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun

nas yog pa'o/ /snang ba chen po brgya stong phrag bcus kyang kun nas yog pa ste/ 'di ltar nor bu rin po che skar ma'i 'od zer gyi snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che nyi ma'i snying po'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che zla ba'i

rgyal mtshan gyis snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che spos kyi dud pa 'od 'phro ba'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che pad mo'i snying po'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che skar ma'i rgyal

mtshan gyi snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che sgron ma chen po'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che spos kyi sprin chen po dang / klog gi 'phreng ba 'byung ba'i snang

ba dang / de dag la sogs pa nor bu rin po che'i snang ba chen po brgya stong phrag bcus rtags tu snang bar byas so/ /bza' shing gi ra ba de ni rgyan chen po'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcu'i char 'bab pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa ste/

dus dang 'thun pa'i tsan dan gyi sprin brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'brug sgra rab tu 'byung ba dang / lha rdzas las 'das pa'i phreng ba dang / lda ldi'i sprin chen po'i kun tu mched pas rab tu brgyan pa/ lha

rdzas las 'das pa'i go mtshon sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcu'i sprin mngon par 'bab pa/ lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rgyan gyi sprin brgya stong phrag bcus rnam par klub pa/ lha'i bu brgya stong phrag
bcu mngon par dga' ste/ 'og tu lta zhing rab tu 'dud pa'i phyag char bzhin du 'bab pa/ lha mo'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcu sngon gyi spyod pa'i bskal pa mnyam pas rang rang gi lus 'bul ba'i char
mngon par 'bab pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcu chos mnyan pas/ skom zhing 'ong ba'i char mngon par 'bab ste/ de na dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gser gyi snying po'i khri chen po
la 'dug cing / mu tig rgya mtsho'i snying po'i dra bas brgyan pa'i cod pan thogs pa lag pa la lha rdzas las 'das pa'i gser gyi dpung rgyan dang / gdub bu thogs pa/ lag pa nor bu rin po che dpal gyi

rang bzhin gyi 'od zer gyis rnam par mdzes par gyur pa/ rna cha rin po che mthon ting dri ma med pa rab tu 'phyang ba/ mgo nor bu rin po che'i dra bas mdzes par brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che seng ge'i gdong gi
rna ba'i gong rgyan thogs pa/ nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i mgul kor thog pa/ lus rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas yog cing 'od rab tu 'bar ba/ srog chags bye ba khrag khrig gi lus
rab tu btud de/ phyag bya ba zhig 'dug ste/ dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin de'i drung du shar phyogs nas tshangs pa chen po 'am/ tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun ris su gtogs pa 'am/ dbang byed
dam/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi ris su gtogs pa 'am/ rab 'phrul dga' 'am/ 'phrul dga'i ris su gtogs pa 'am/ rab dga' ldan nam/ dga' ldan gyi ris su gtogs pa 'am/
rab 'tshe ma 'am/ mtshe ma'i ris su gtogs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po 'am/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi ris su gtogs pa 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za'i
dbang po 'am/ dri za 'am/ grul bum gyi dbang po 'am/ grul bum 'am/ klu'i dbang po 'am/ klu 'am/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'am/ lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha' lding gis dbang po
'am/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ mi 'am ci'i dbang po 'am/ mi 'am ci 'am/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po 'am/ lto 'phye chen po 'am/ gshin rje 'am/ gshin rje'i bu mo 'am/ yid dgas rdzu 'phrul
chen po 'am/ yi dgas sam/ mi'i dbang po 'am/ mi 'ang rung ste/ sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag 'ong ba dang / de bzhin du shar phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang
phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtsham dang / shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs nas kyang /
tshangs pa chen po 'am/ tshangs lha nye phan nam/ tshangs pa'i ris su gtog pa 'am/ dbang byed kyi ris su gtogs pa nas/ mi'i dbang po 'am/ mi'i bar gyi sems can mang po 'ong ba/ de dag nad
sna tshogs zhig gis btab pa 'am/ nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyis kun nas 'khor tam/ lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la mngon par zhen tam/ las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs pa zhig yod na 'ang /
de dag gis dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin de mthong ma thag tu nad thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar gyur/ sems can kyi nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang yang bral bar gyur/ lta ba'i gsal shing yang phyin par gyur/
sgrib pa'i ri thams cad kyang rnam par bshig par gyur/ rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor sgrib pa med pa yang khong du chud par 'gyur te/ rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor de yod pas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba
thams cad kyang rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ dbang po'i myu gu thams cad kyang rnam par 'phel bar gyur/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshul rgya chen po la yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur/ gzungs

kyi sgo rgya mtsho thams cad du 'ang 'jug par 'gyur/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang tshul rgya mtsho thams cad kyang mngon sum du gyur/ smon lam gyi sgo thams cad kyang yang dag par skye bar 'gyur/ spyod pa'i
spyod pa thams cad kyang rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ yon tan mngon par bsgrubs pa'i sgo thams cad yang dag par 'gyur/ sems rgya chen po yang mngon par shes pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i tshul du 'byung
bar 'gyur ro/ lus thogs pa med pas kyang thams cad du rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshongs dpon gyi bu nor bzangs bza' shing gi ra bas kun nas rnam par brgyan pa'i nang du phyin te/ bltas

nas dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gang na ba der song ste/ phyin nas dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor
ba byas nas/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod par bslabs
par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do/ /zhes thos nas/ 'phags ma ji ltar byang chub

sems dpa'as byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ des smras pa rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa mya ngan
med pa bde ba'i rgyal mtshan thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu kho mo de'i mthus mthong na don yod pa'o/ /mnyan na don yod pa'o/ /rim gror byas na don yod pa'o/ /gnas gcig na 'grogs pa don yod pa'o/ /

rjes su dran par byas pa don yod pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu kho mo ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su ma zin pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ma dgongs pa rnams

kyis mthong zhing rnam par dmigs par mig lam du 'ong bar mi 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu kho mo mthong ba tsam gyis ni sems can rnams kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par

'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang rigs kyi bu kho mo'i drung du shar phyogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa byon cing / gdan rin po che'i khri 'di la bzhugs pas chos ston to/ /shar phyogs nas ji lta ba de bzhin du phyogs bcu nas

kyang de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na/ kho mo ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi bral ba'o/ /chos mnyan pa dang mi 'bral ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' dang 'grogs pa dang mi 'bral ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu kho mo dang

spyod pa'i bskal pa mnyam pa'i srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi po bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par brgyan pa 'di na gnas pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang

chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag go/ /rigs kyi bu sems can gzhan gang 'di na gnas pa de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun du gtogs pa sha stag

ste/ kho mo dang spyod pa'i skal ba mnyam pa dag go/ /smras pa 'phags ma khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yun ji srid cig nas thugs bskyed/ smras pa rigs kyi bu kho mo ni sngon gyi gnas

rjes su dran no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad ces bya ba byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa de'i drung du kho mos tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad do/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa de kho mos mchod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de las chos bstan pa kho mos yongs su bzung ngo / /de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba byung ste/ de'i bstan pa la 'ang kho mo

rab tu byung ngo / /chos kyi 'khor lo kho mos bzung ngo / /de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa dpal zhes bya ba byung ste/ de yang kho mos bsnyen bkur to/ /de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab dpal zhes bya ba

byung ngo / /de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i snying po zhes bya ba byung ngo / /de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba 'byung ngo / /de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa zhes

bya ba byung ngo / /de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa dag pa zhes bya ba byung ngo / /de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i gtsugs ces bya ba byung ngo / /de'i kun snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa chu bo'i lha zhes bya ba
byung ste/ rigs kyi bu gzhung de ltar tshe gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang / bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshams 'dab

chags su bsams te/ dran par byas nas/ gang kho mos rim gror byas te/ bsnyen bkur ba dang / mchod pa dang / sti stang du byas pa dang / gang gi spyan sngar kho mos chos thos par 'gyur pa dang / gang gi bstan

pa la kho mos tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang ga'i klung sum bcu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed rjes su dran te/ rigs kyi bu de phan chad du kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed gcig bsnyen bkur ba ni/ de bzhin

gshegs pa rnams kyis mkhyen to/ /rigs kyi bu sems dang po bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu snying rje chen po'i khongasu

'gro ba thams cad tshud pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu smon lam chen pos phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi zad zad du 'gro bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad
med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu byams pa chen pos 'gro ba thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas zhing
thams cad du bskal pa thams cad yongs su sdud pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i lam las phyir mi ldog
pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu gzungs kyi stobs kyis 'gro ba thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi tshul khong du chud par byed pas byang chub sems dpa'
rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu ye shes snang ba'i stobs kyis dus gsum gyi ye shes kyi tshul/ khong du chud par byed cing / yang dag par 'dzin pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni
tshad med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu mngon par shes pa'i stobs kyis zhing thams cad du sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang / mos pa ci lta ba bzhin du 'od kyi dra ba'i 'khor lo mngon par bsgrub pas byang chub
sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu so so yang dag par rig pa'i stobs kyis tshigs gcig brjod kyang 'gro ba thams cad shin tu tshim par byed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad
myed pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu lus rnam par dag pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rang gi lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs pas/ byang chub sems
dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /nor bzangs kyis smras pa/ 'phags ma khyod ji srid gcig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ smras pa rigs kyi bu
'di lta ste/ sems can gcig la dmigs shing gdul bar bya ba dang / smin par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin te/ sems can brgya'i phyir ma yin/ sems can

stong gi phyir ma yin te/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi phyir ma yin/ sems can bye ba'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bye ba brgya'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bye ba stong gi phyir ma yin/ sems
can bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi don du/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin no/ /sems can thams cad kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can khrag khrig gi phyir ma
yin/ sems can gang ya'i phyir ma yin/ sems can ban bun gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyar phyur gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can byang bying gi phyir ma yin/ sems can nyer 'jal gyi phyir ma yin/
sems can phyal phyol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can yal yel gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can ljad ljid kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyod zim gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyad phyod kyi phyir ma yin/
sems can ldam ldem gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can ya gangs kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can cho ma'i phyir ma yin/ sems can khram khrim gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can nab nub kyi phyir ma yin/
sems can rgyud byas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can btang yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bkra yar kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can gsal yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can gzhal brtag
gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mtshungs med kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lam yol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can rab rib kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can thab thib kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can
'grags yul gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can then 'phyod kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bsam phyo'i phyir ma yin/ sems can 'dra mnyam gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can breng breng gi phyir ma yin/
sems can bgrang yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can rgyas 'dal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bsngos yag gi phyir ma yin/ sems can zang yag gi phyir ma yin/ sems can phro bkye'i phyir ma yin/
sems can rtse 'phyo'i phyir ma yin/ sems can yong tang gi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'brug g.yos kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can sang yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can thing yug gi phyir
ma yin/ sems can snang yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can nan pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can yid 'phyo'i phyir ma yin/ sems can nab neb kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can khri thabs
kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can yal yol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can thug yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can yad yud kyi phyir ma yin/
sems can 'phyo ldog gi phyir ma yin/ sems can brda yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lhub be'i phyir ma yin/ sems can thag thug gi phyir ma yin/ sems can khrig khrig gi phyir ma yin/
sems can rigs yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can snyad med kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mchog phreng gi phyir ma yin/ sems can nyag 'bru'i phyir ma yin/ sems can spu 'phyes kyi phyir
ma yin/ sems can 'bru 'brel gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod 'os kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lhod yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod phul gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can

zhi snyed kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can gang thim gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'phyo 'gyur gyis phyir ma yin/ sems can nyar nyer gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyag phyig gi phyir ma yin/ sems can zal zul gyi phyir
ma yin/ sems can sal sal gyis phyir ma yin/ sems can g.yo ldeg gis phyir ma yin/ sems can phan phun gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can brnang ya'i phyir ma yin/ sems can rim grol gyi phyir
ma yin/ sems can rje ngad kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can rdzi rdul gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phun yol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'ol 'ol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can ngad ngad kyi phyir ma yin/
sems can bgrang rtsi'i phyir ma yin/ sems can zab bgrang gi phyir ma yin/ sems can dga' rkyang gi phyir ma yin/ sems can grangs mtha'i phyir ma yin/ sems can phyod yal gyi phyir ma
yin/ sems can 'ol phyod kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can gdab yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can gcal yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can byim 'phyo'i
phyir ma yin/ sems can yam me'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bsnyal yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can ldab ldob kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'ban chad kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phang phung gi phyir ma yin/
sems can mtha' rdul gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can rgyu lding gi phyir ma yin/ sems can yun 'gyangs kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mkha' yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bun lob kyi phyir ma yin/ sems
can lam lom gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bsnyad yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lang ling gi phyir ma yin/ sems can ldab ltib gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mi brtsal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can
'phyam yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can nga 'grang gi phyir ma yin/ sems can smos yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bkra chal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lo brgyas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'bum
rdib kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can la lo'i phyir ma yin/ sems can phyam phyam gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang phyos kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrangs phyos la bgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can
dpag yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can dpag yas la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can yal 'phyong gi phyir ma yin/ sems can yal phyong la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can mu yal gyi phyir ma yin/
sems can mu yal la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang yal la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can mi 'jal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mi 'jal
la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bsam phyod kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bsam phyod la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can mtha' 'byam gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mtha' 'byam la bsgres
pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can dpag thag gi phyir ma yin/ sems can dpag thag la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod du myed pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod du med pa la bsgres pa'i phyir ma
yin/ sems can brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du myed pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du myed pa la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can 'jig rten gyi khams
gcig tu gtogs pa rnams kyi phyir ma yin pa nas/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig

rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs
pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/ stong gsum gyi

stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin pa nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams brjod

du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du 'di lta ste yongs su smyin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin gyi/ 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa lhag ma med pa mtha' dag thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can gyi don du yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul
ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye'o/ /'di lta ste sangs rgyas gcig bsnyen bkur ba dang / mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems

dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa dang / sangs rgyas bcu bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa nas/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i

'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten

gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du myed pa'i rdul
shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i brgyud bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi

sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du myed

pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi bstan

pa yongs su gzung ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs

pa'i stan pa yongs su bzung ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sangs rgyas gcig rab tu zhugs pa'i smon lam rnam par thar pa la 'jug pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'

rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas rab tu zhugs pa'i smon lam rnam pa tha dad
pa la 'jug pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi brgyan la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems

dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan la 'jug par
bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig gi 'khor rnam par phye ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems

byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor phye ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su gzung ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi

zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su gzung ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/
sems rgya mtsho gcig khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul
shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sems rgya mtsho khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sems can gcig gi dbang po'i 'khor lo

yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sems can gyi

dbang po'i 'khor lo shes par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sems can gcig gi dbang po rgya mtsho khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'

rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sems can gyi dbang po rgya mtsho khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig gi bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub

tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu rtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba la 'jug par
bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi
khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba
ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye

ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug
par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i

phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i
sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad
