so/ /bsngo yas bsngo yas na zang yag go/ /zang yag zang yag na 'phro bkye'o/ /'phro bkye 'phro bkye na rtse 'phyo'o/ /rtse 'phyo rtse 'phyo na yong tan no/ /yong tan yong tan na brug g.yos so/ /
brug g.yos brug g.yos na sang yal lo/ /sang yal sang yal na 'thing yug go/ /'thing yug 'thing yug na yid 'phyo'o/ /yid 'phyo yid 'phyo na nab neb bo/ /nab neb nab neb na khrig
thams so/ /khrig thams khrig thams na yal yal lo/ /yal yal yal yal na bgrang yas so/ /bgrang yas bgrang yas na thug yas so/ /thug yas thug yas na shang shang ngo / /
shang shang shang shang na yag yag go/ /yag yag yag yag na tham thim mo/ /tham thim tham thim na rlom brlal lo/ /rlom brlal rlom brlal na gzhal 'phyos so/ /gzhal
'phyos gzhal 'phyos na gzhal yal lo/ /gzhal yal gzhal yal na gzhal med do/ /gzhal med gzhal med na gzhal 'khor to/ /gzhal 'khor gzhal 'khor na gzhal thim mo/ /
gzhal thim gzhal thim na gar gzhal lo/ /gar gzhal gar gzhal na gzhal sangs so/ /gzhal sangs gzhal sangs na gzhal thag go/ /gzhal thag gzhal thag na gzhal
phul lo/ /gzhal phul gzhal phul na gzhal zhi'o/ /gzhal zhi gzhal zhi na 'phyo 'gyur ro/ /'phyo 'gyur 'phyo 'gyur na nyar nyer ro/ /nyar nyer nyar nyer na phyag phyig go/ /phyag
phyig phyag phyig na zal zul lo/ /zal zul zal zul na sal sal lo/ /sal sal sal sal na g.yo ldeg go/ /g.yo ldeg g.yo ldeg na phan phun no/ /phan phun phan phun na

brnang ya'o/ /brnang ya brnang ya na rem 'drol lo/ /rem 'drol rem 'drol na rdzi ngad do/ /rdzi ngad rdzi ngad na rdzi rdul lo/ /rdzi rdul rdzi rdul na phun yol lo/ /phun yul phun yul na ngad ngad do/ /ngad ngad ngad

ngad na bgrang rtsi'o/ /bgrang rtsi bgrang rtsi na zab grang ngo / /zab grang zab grang na dga' brkyang ngo / /dga' brkyang dga' brkyang na gzhung 'dal to/ /gzhung 'dal gzhung 'dal na khrug phyed do/ /khrug
phyed khrug phyed na 'ol phyod do/ /'ol phyod 'ol phyod na gdab yas so/ /gdab yas gdab yas na gcal yas so/ /gcal yas gcal yas na bgrang yas so/ /bgrang yas bgrang
yas na byim 'phyo'o/ /byim phyo byim phyo na ya mye'o/ /ya mye ya mye na bsnyal yas so/ /bsnyal yas bsnyal yas na ldab ldeb bo/ /ldab ldeb ldab ldeb na 'ban chad do/ /

'ban chad 'ban chad na phang phung ngo / /phang phung phang phung na khe'u tshang ngo / /khe'u tshang khe'u tshang na zhung zung ngo / /zhung zung zhung zung na mchog yal lo/ /mchog yal mchog yal na mtha' rtul
to/ /mtha' rtul mtha' rtul na yun 'gyangs ngo / /yun 'gyangs yun 'gyangs na bun lob bo/ /bun lob bun lob na lam lom mo/ /lam lom lam lom na bsnyad yas so/ /bsnyad yas bsnyad yas

na lang ling ngo / /lang ling lang ling na ljab ljib bo/ /ljab ljib ljab ljib na myi brtsal to/ /myi brtsal myi brtsal na 'byam yas so/ /'byam yas 'byam yas na nga 'grang ngo / /nga 'grang nga 'grang na
smos yal lo/ /smos yal smos yal na bgra chal lo/ /bkra chal bkra chal na lo rgyas so/ /lo rgyas lo rgyas na bum rdib bo/ /bum rdib bum rdib na gang gum mo/ /gang gum gang gum na la lo'o/ /
la lo la lo na bgrang 'phyos so/ /bgrang 'phyos bgrang 'phyos na/ bgrang 'phyos la bsgres pa'o/ /bgrang 'phyos la bsgres pa bgrang 'phyos la bsgres pa na/ dpag yas so/ /dpag yas
dpag yas na dpag yas la bsgres pa'o/ /dpag yas la bsgres pa dpag yas la bsgres pa na yal phyong ngo / /yal phyong yal phyong na yal phyong la bsgres pa'o/ /yal phyong la bsgres pa
yal phyong la bsgres na mu yal to/ /mu yal mu yal na mu yal la bsgres pa'o/ /mu yal la bsgres pa mu yal la bsgres na bgrang yol lo/ /bgrang yol bgrang yol na
bgrang yol la bsgres pa'o/ /bgrang yol la bsgres pa bgrang yol la bsgres na myi mjal to/ /myi mjal myi mjal na mi mjal la bsgres pa'o/ /mi mjal la bsgres pa myi
mjal la bsgres pa na/ bsam phyod do/ /bsam phyod bsam phyod na bsam phyod la bsgres pa'o/ /bsam phyod la bsgres pa bsam phyod la bsgres pa na mtha' 'byam mo/ /mtha' 'byam
mtha' 'byam na mtha' 'byam la bsgres pa'o/ /mtha' 'byam la bsgres pa mtha' 'byam la bsgres pa na dpag thag go/ /dpag thag dpag thag na dpag thag la bsgres pa'o/ /dpag
thag la bsgres pa dpag thag la bsgres na brjod du myed pa'o/ /brjod du myed pa brjod du myed pa na brjod du myed pa la bsgres pa'o/ /brjod du med pa la bsgres pa brjod du myed pa la bsgres pa na/
brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du med pa la bsgres pa shin tu bstan pa'o/ /de'i mdun na bye ma'i phung po chen po dpag tshad du ma'i tshad dang ldan pa zhig 'dug 'dug pa las/ 'di la bye ma'i 'bru 'di

snyed gcig yod do zhes bya ba nas/ bye ma'i 'bru brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la bsgres pa 'di snyed gcig yod do zhes rab tu phye nas bsgrangs brtsis te grangs su bcad do/ /des bye ma'i phung
po de brtsis kyi brdar bstan te/ shin tu bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bgrang ba'i tshul 'di ni 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu
brgyud pa kun na 'ang yod ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bgrang ba'i tshul 'dis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa dag kyang bgrang zhing brtsi'o/ /de bzhin du lho
phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /
'og dang steng gi phyogs su yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams bgrang ba'i tshul 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa dang / bgrang zhing brtsi'o/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams
kyi bgrang ba'i tshul 'di ni/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mying du bya ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa thams cad na 'ang yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni
bgrang ba'i tshul 'dis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mying gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bgrang zhing brtsi'o/ /ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mying gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa
bstan du yod pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i bskal pa'i mying gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa dang / chos
kyi mying gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa dang / sems can gyi mying gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa dang / las kyi mying gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod
pa kun la'ang 'jug ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bgrang ba'i tshul 'di nyid ni/ phyogs bcu na mying du bya ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du rung ba ji snyed pa thams cad
la'ang 'jug ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bgrang ba'i tshul 'dis phyogs bcu na mying gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa ji snyed yod pa thams cad kyang bgrang zhing brtsi'o/ /de ltar rigs
kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi snang ba chos thams cad shes par bya ba'i bzo mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad
kyi grangs la zhugs pa/ chos kyi tshul thams cad kyi grangs la zhugs pa/ dus gsum gyi grangs la zhugs pa/ sems can thams cad kyi grangs la zhugs pa/ chos kyi phung po thams cad gyi grangs
la zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi grangs la zhugs pa/ chos thams cad kyi ming gi 'khor lo la dbang bsgyur ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod pa'am/
spyod yul smos pa'am/ yul brjod pa'am/ stobs bsngags pa'am/ bsam pa brtan pa'am/ tshogs yongs su brjod pa'am/ smon lam bshad par bya ba'am/ spyod pa yongs su bstan pa'am/ pha rol tu phyin
pa yongs su dag pa mngon par brjod pa'am/ yang dag par bsgrub pa yongs su dag pa'am/ yang dag par bstan pa'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par smos pa'am/ ye shes snang ba khong du chud par nus re skan/

drang srong rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na grong khyer rgya mtsho bstan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems
dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig thos nas spu g.yos te/ dga' ba
chen po'i shugs skyes nas/ rab tu dga' ba'i yid dang ldan par gyur pa ngo mtshar gyi bsam pa/ rin po che rab tu dkon pa thob pa/ 'gro ba mang po la phan pa'i sems dang bsam pas byung ba sangs rgyas

skyes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud par 'gro ba la dbang bsgyur ba/ chos kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i blo gros la rten pa/ thams cad du rjes su song ba'i rig pa rnam par phye bas byung ba bstan pa la brtson
pa dus gsum gyi dbyings su ma 'dres pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul dang ldan pa/ bsod nams mi zad pa'i rgya mtsho las byung ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi snang ba chen po la dbang bsgyur ba/ khams

gsum gyi khyim du sdud pa'i sgo shin tu gcod pa des/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug gi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba

byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug gi drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag gi sprin gyi char yongs su 'dzin pa byed cing /

gangs chen mtsho ltar sprin chen po'i char gyis ngoms myi shes pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi nyi ma'i ye shes kyi 'od gzer gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par byas pa'i sa gzhi las dbang po'i myu gu 'thon
cing skyes pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi zla ba nya zhing rgyas pa'i gdams ngag gi 'od gzer gyi dra bas lus dang / sems shin tu tshim par byas pa/ dbyings kyi nyi ma'i 'od kyis gdungs pa'i ri dgas

kyi tshogs gsal zhing bsil ba'i gangs chu la 'thung bar 'dod pa ltar/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag gi chu la 'thung bar 'dod pa/ bung ba mang po 'khor zhing lding bas rgyas par gyur pa'i pad mo dang

ldan pa'i pad mo'i mtsho ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag gis sems kyi me tog pun da ri ka kha phye ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su brgyan pa'i rin po che'i gling ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi
gdams ngag rin po che 'brel ba'i snang bas sems shin tu snang bar byas pa/ 'dzam bu'i shing chen po'i me tog dang / 'bras bu'i tshogs chen po dang ldan pa ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag

bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs su gyur pa/ phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa/ klu'i dbang po chen po rtsed mo dam pas rtse ba las byung ba'i nam mkha'i sprin chen po ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag

thos pa'i tshogs su gyur pa'i snang ba shin tu che ba/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i 'jig rten gyi brgyan pa sna tshogs kyi spo ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag las byung ba'i chos dri ma myed pa sna tshogs brtsegs
pa'i spor gyur pa/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi tshogs kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba'i brgya byin lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i tshogs rab tu 'joms pa ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag las byung ba'i yon

tan dri ma myed pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing zil gyis myi gnon la gzhan la zil gyis gnon pa de/ mthar gyis grong khyer rgya mtsho bstan pa gang na ba der phyin te/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba

yongs su tshol tshol ba las de la skye bo mang pos bsten te/ rigs kyi bu dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba grong khyer gyi dbus kyi rang gi khyim na 'dug go zhes nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge bsnyen

ma phul du byung ba'i gnas gang na ba der song ste/ thal mo sbyar nas sgo gang na sdod sdod pa dang / des dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i khyim de shin tu rgya che la yangs shing rin po che'i ra bas yongs su bskor cing

phyogs bzhi nas sgo shin tu mdzes pa rnam par phye ba/ rin po che tshad myed grangs myed pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pas mngon par grub pa mthong nas/ de khyim der song ste/

kun tu bltas nas dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba phyugs chung shin tu gzhon pa thog ma dar la bab pa/ gzugs mngon zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa kha dog dam pa/ pri ya ba shin tu rgyas pa dang ldan pa/
skra phye mar bzhag pa/ lus la rgyan myed pa/ gos dang smad g.yogs dkar po bgos pa/ rin po che'i khri la 'dug pa mthong ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ma gtogs par
de'i lus sam/ sems kyi dbang ngam/ gzi brjid dang / kha dog gis zil gyis ma non pa'i sems can ni khyim de na gang yang myed de/ lha 'am mi 'ang rung ste/ sems can gang gis dge bsnyen ma phul

du byung ba mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang / dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba la ston pa'i 'du shes su bsam pa zhig /rin po che'i khri la 'dug pa mthong ngo / /gzhan yang khyim de na stan lha
rdzas dang / myi'i rdzas las shin tu 'phags pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi rnam par smin pas yongs su grub pa bye ba stong phrag bcu bting ba/ mdun du phru ba gcig gcig bzhag pa las

kha zas dang skom gyi bgam/ gos dang rgyan gyi longs spyod kyi bag gzhan ci yang myi snang ngo / /bud myed stong phrag bcu tsam zhig 'dun du 'dug par mthong na 'ong de dag thams cad kyang lha'i bu mo'i

kha dog dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i tshul dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i spyod pa dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i longs spyod dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i tshul dang shes pa dang ldan pa/

lha rdzas kyi gos yid bzhin du gyon pa/ lha rdzas kyi lhab lhub kyis shin tu klubs pa/ lha'i bu mo'i skad lta bu'i dbyangs snyan pa dang / lha'i bu mo'i chu zheng mdzes pa dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ de'i 'khor
gyi bud myed kyang des ci bsgo ba bzhin du byed cing mdun na 'khod do/ /rim gror byed do/ /bkur sti byed do/ /gdong du blta'o/ /ci bsgo ba nyan cing gnas so/ /rje sar 'khod do/ /yongs su blta'o/ /
rnam par blta'o/ /'dod do/ /rab tu 'dod do/ /phyag 'tshal lo/ /de dag gi lus las spos kyi ngad ldang bas ni/ grong khyer de'i 'khor thams cad du dri zhim pos khyab par 'dug ste/ sems can gang
gis dri de tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang gnod sems myed pa'i sems dang / shar gnyer ba myed pa'i sems dang / 'tshe ba myed pa'i sems dang / phrag dog dang / 'jungs pa dang bral ba'i
sems dang / sgyu dang g.yo myed pa'i sems dang / chags pa dang / khong khro ba myed pa'i sems dang / zhum pa dang / gzengs mtho ba myed pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang /
sdom pa la gnas pa'i sems dang / gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba la re ba myed pa'i sems su gyur te/ gang gis de dag gi skad thos pa de dag thams cad kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / dul ba'i
sems dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /gang gis de dag mthong bar gyur pa de dag kyang / 'dod chags dang bral ba tsam du rang rang gis shes par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar mthong nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis
dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar
nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags ma bdag gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par
bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags ma ji ltar byang chub
sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ smras pa rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar
pa/ bsod nams kyi mdzod myi zad pa'i rgyan ces bya ba thob ste/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ni phru ba gcig po 'di las mos pa sna tshogs can rnams kha zas ci la dga' ba bzhin du tshod ma sna tshogs dang /

ro sna tshogs dang / kha zas sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs kyis tshim par byed de/ rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo ni phru ba gcig po 'di las ci dga' ba'i kha zas kyis sems can brgya 'ang yongs su tshim

par byed do/ /sems can stong dang sems can brgya stong dang / sems can bye ba dang / sems can bye ba phrag brgya dang / sems can bye ba phrag stong dang / sems can bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / sems

can bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong nas/ sems can brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed pa mos pa sna tshogs can rnams kyang ci la dga' ba'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byed do/ /yongs su stob
par byed do/ /yongs su dga' bar byed do/ /yongs su mgu bar byed do/ /yongs su spro bar byed do/ /shin tu tshim par byed do/ /yid bde bar byed do/ /'on kyang phru ba 'di las 'gong bar 'gyur ba med
do/ /'gri ba myed de dma' bar myi 'gyur ro/ /zad par myi 'gyur ro/ /'bri bar myi 'gyur ro/ /sa mtshams yod par myi 'gyur ro/ /mthar thug par myi 'gyur ro/ /mur thug par myi 'gyur ro/ /

rigs kyi bu gzhung de dang 'dra bar sems can 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / de bzhin du gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi

rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas sems can mos pa sna

tshogs can sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig 'ongs kyang / ci la dga' ba'i kha zas tshod ma sna tshogs dang / ro sna tshogs dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang /

dri sna tshogs kyis yongs su tshim par byed do/ /yongs su dga' bar byed do/ /nyams bde bar byed do/ /shin tu tshim par byed do/ /yid shin tu bde bar byed do/ /'on kyang phru ba 'di las 'gong bar 'gyur
ba myed do/ /'grib pa myed do/ /dma' bar myi 'gyur ro/ /zad par myi 'gyur ro/ /sa mtshams yod par myi 'gyur ro/ /mthar thug par myi 'gyur ro/ /mur thug par myi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu gal te
phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can mos pa sna tshogs can dang / bsam pa sna tshogs can thams cad 'ongs par gyur na yang / de dag thams cad ci la
dga' ba'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byed pa nas/ yid bde bar bya ba'i bar du byed do/ /kha zas sna tshogs kyis ji lta ba de bzhin du btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang / ro rnam pa sna tshogs

dang / stan sna tshogs dang / mal cha sna tshogs dang / bzhon pa sna tshogs dang / gos sna tshogs dang / phreng ba sna tshogs dang / spos sna tshogs dang / bdug spos sna tshogs dang / byug pa sna tshogs

dang / phye ma sna tshogs dang / rin po che sna tshogs dang / rgyan sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i shing rta sna tshogs dang / gdugs sna tshogs dang / rgyal mtshan sna tshogs dang / lha'i ba dan sna tshogs dang /
yo byad kyi yul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su tshim par byed pa nas/ yid dga' bar 'gyur ba'i bar du byed do/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na nyan

thos dang / rang sangs rgyas sku'i tha ma 'dzin pa gang ji snyed gcig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi 'bras bu brnyes
par mdzad do/ /shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong dang /

'jig rten gyi khams bye ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag

khrig brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul

shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas/ de bzhin du shar phyogs

kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas sku'i tha ma 'dzin pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag
thams cad kyang kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu bsnyes par mdzad do/ /shar phyogs na bzhugs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang /

byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs na ji snyed cig bzhugs
pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin no/ /rigs kyi bu shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na sku tshe gcig gi thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang

kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing / snying po byang chub tu bzhugs nas bdud sde dang bcas pa pham par mdzad de/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang brgya'o/ /shar phyogs
kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na bzhugs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong dang /

'jig rten gyi khams bye ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya

phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba

snyed dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang kho
mo'i kha zas las gsol zhing snying po byang chub la bzhugs pa dang / bdud sde dang bcas pa pham par mdzad do/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /

shar phyogs na bzhugs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /
nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og gi phyogs dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de
dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing snying po byang chub tu bzhugs te/ bdud sde dang bcas pa rab tu pham par mdzad nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na bzhugs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams

brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten

gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /

stong gcig gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul

shin tu phra ba snyed nas/ rigs kyi bu steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed na/ byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig

gis thogs pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing / snying po byang chub du bzhugs pas bdud sde dang bcas pa pham par mdzad de/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub du mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis kho mo'i 'khor bud myed stong phrag bcu po 'di dag mthong ngam/ smras pa 'phags ma bdag gis mthong ngo / /smras pa rigs kyi bu
bud myed 'di dag la stsogs pa brgya stong grangs myed pa phrag bcu kho mo dang bskal pa mnyam par spyod pa/ smon lam gcig pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig pa/ 'byung ba'i rgyan gcig pa/ mos pa'i lam
rnam par dag pa gcig pa/ kho mo dang skal ba mnyam par dran pa rnam par dag pa/ skal ba mnyam par blo rnam par dag pa/ skal ba mnyam par blo tshad myed par gyur pa/ bskal pa mnyam par dbang po
rab tu thob pa/ bskal pa mnyam par sems kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa/ bskal pa mnyam par spyod yul dang ldan pa/ bskal pa mnyam par chos kyi tshul la zhugs pa/ skal ba mnyam par don
nges par rtogs pa/ bskal pa mnyam par chos kyi don ston pa/ bskal pa mnyam par gzugs rnam par dag pa/ bskal pa mnyam par stobs tshad med pa/ bskal pa mnyam par brtan pa
gzhan gyis myi thub pa/ bskal pa mnyam par chos kyi sgra sgrog pa/ bskal pa mnyam par dbyangs rnam par dag pa/ tshad myed pa'i yon tan brjod du med pas rnam par spyod pa thams cad la bskal pa
mnyam par yon tan rnam par dag pa/ las kyi rnam par smin pa la kha na ma tho ba myed cing rnam par dag pas/ skal ba mnyam par las kyi rnam par smin pa rnam par dag pa/ 'gro ba thams
cad yongs su skyob pas/ bskal pa mnyam par byams pa chen pos rgyas par 'gengs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par byed pas/ myi skyo ba'i phyir bskal pa mnyam par snying rje chen pos
rgyas par 'gengs pa/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa'i lus yongs su ston pas/ skal ba mnyam par lus kyi rnam par dag pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi nges pa'i
tshig gi tha snyad la bskal pa mnyam par ngag gi las rnam par dag pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du bskal pa mnyam par 'dod pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod cing rim
gro bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skal ba mnyam par rgyu ba/ chos thams cad kyi tshul khong du chud par bya ba la bskal pa mnyam par mngon gsum du gyur pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/
byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad thob par bya ba la bskal pa mnyam par spyod pa/ rnam par dag pa sha stag cig kyang yod de/ rigs kyi bu bud med stong phrag bcu po 'di dag kyang skad cig gcig
du 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa rnams la zhal zas yongs su dbul ba'i phyir phyogs bcur rgyas par 'dong ngo / /phru ba 'di nyid nas kha zas blangs shing / srid pa
tha ma dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams la bsod snyoms dbul ba'i phyir phyogs bcu rgyas par 'dong ngo / /phru ba 'di nyid nas kha zas blangs shing phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang
ste yi dgas kyi tshogs thams cad kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mos ni phru ba 'di nyid nas lha rnams ni lha'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byed do/ /klu
rnams ni klu'i kha zas kyis/ gnod sbyin rnams ni gnod sbyin gyi kha zas kyis/ dri za rnams ni dri za'i kha zas kyis/ lha ma yin rnams ni lha ma yin gyi kha zas kyis/ nam mkha' lding rnams
ni nam mkha' lding gi kha zas kyis/ myi 'am ci rnams ni myi 'am ci'i kha zas kyis/ lto 'phye chen po rnams ni lto 'phye chen po'i kha zas kyis/ myi rnams ni myi'i kha zas kyis/ myi ma
yin pa rnams ni myi ma yin pa'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu yud tsam zhig sdod dang de'u re mngon du 'gyur ro/ /dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba des tshig de brjod ma

thag tu de'i mod la 'di lta ste/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung bas/ sngon gyi smon lam gyis bos pas sems can grangs myed pa zhig shar phyogs kyi sgo nas nang du 'ongs par gyur to/ /de bzhin du 'di lta ste/
dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis bos pas/ sems can grangs myed pa zhig /lho phyogs dang nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs kyi sgo nas nang du 'ongs par gyur te/ de ltar 'ongs

pa de dag dge bsnyen ma phul du byung bas/ stan de dag la bkod de/ so so nas ci dga' ba'i kha zas tshod ma sna tshogs dang / ro sna tshogs dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs dang ldan par
yongs su tshim par byas so/ /yongs su bstabs par byas so/ /yongs su dga' ba byas so/ /yongs su mgu bar byas so/ /yongs su spro bar byas so/ /shin tu tshim par byas so/ /yid bde
bar byas so/ /kha zas sna tshogs kyis ji lta ba de bzhin du btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang / ro rnam pa sna tshogs dang / stan sna tshogs dang / mal cha sna tshogs dang / bzhon pa sna tshogs

dang / gos sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs dang / phreng ba sna tshogs dang / spos sna tshogs dang / bdug spos sna tshogs dang / byug pa sna tshogs dang / phye ma sna tshogs dang / rin po che sna tshogs dang /

rgyan sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i shing rta sna tshogs dang / gdugs sna tshogs dang / rgyal mtshan sna tshogs dang / lha'i ba dan sna tshogs dang / yo byad kyi yul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su tshim par byas

pa nas/ yid dga' bar 'gyur ba'i bar du byas so/ /lha rnams ni lha'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byas so/ /klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang /

lto 'phye chen po dang / myi dang myi ma yin pa rnams kyang myi ma yin pa'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byas pa nas/ yid bde bar 'gyur ba'i bar du byas so/ /'on kyang phru ba de las 'gong bar gyur pa myed/
'grib pa myed dma' pa myed/ zad par gyur pa myed/ sa mtshams su gyur pa myed/ mthar thug pa myed/ mur thug pa myed do/ /de nas dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba des/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la
'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu kho mos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsod nams kyi mdzod mi zad pa'i rgyan ces bya ba 'di shes par zad na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams
chen po'i rgya mtsho myi zad pa'i bsod nams dang ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya chen po shin tu bstsags pa/ nam mkha' lta bur gyur pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs
par byed pas/ nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po lta bu/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsrung bas/ bsod nams chen po'i 'khor yug dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad du
rin po che snyim pa nas char ltar 'thong bas bsod nams chen po'i sprin du gyur pa/ chos kyi grong khyer gyi sgo 'byed pas/ bsod nams chen po'i mdzod la mngon sum lta ba/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi
phongs pa'i mun pa sel bas bsod nams chen po'i sgron mar gyur pa/ chos kyi grong khyer shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ drang srong rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na grong
khyer 'byung ba chen po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na khyim bdag mkhas pa zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /

ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba la lan brgya stong du mar
g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i drung nas blta bas myi ngoms bzhin du song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs bsod nams kyi mdzod
mi zad pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i rnam par thar pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa de bsod nams rgya mtsho de la ni rjes su sems/ bsod nams nam mkha' de la ni kun tu blta/ bsod nams kyi phung po de ni
yongs su 'dzin/ bsod nams kyi ri bo la ni mngon par 'dzeg /bsod nams kyi tshogs de ni yang dag par sdud/ bsod nams kyi chu bo de la ni 'bog /bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi mu stegs
de las rab tu 'bab/ bsod nams kyi dkyil 'khor de ni yongs su skyong / bsod nams kyi gter de la ni yang dag par blta/ bsod nams kyi tshul de ni rjes su dran par byed/ bsod nams

kyi tshogs de ni yongs su 'dzin/ bsod nams kyi rgyud de ni yongs su sbyong bar byed cing / mthar gyis grong khyer 'byung ba chen po gang na ba der phyin nas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'dod cing dge ba'i bshes
gnyen la blta bas skom pa'i sems kyi rgyud dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis byin gyi rlabs pa'i bsam pa can/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la thogs pa med pa'i sbyor ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la
rim gror bya bas skyo ba med pa'i brtson 'grus dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag lus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis nges par gyur par bsod nams kyi tshogs
thams cad dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis rnam par spel ba'i thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro bya ba la mkhas pa dang / rnam par
'phel ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / yang dag par 'phel ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po dang / yongs
su smin par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / yang dag par 'phel ba'i smon lam chen po mngon par bsgrub pa dang / shin tu yangs par 'gyur ba'i snying rje chen pos bdag nyid

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur par yang dag par mthong nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad las byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas chos kyi snang ba yang dag par blang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i

stobs bcu snang ba rnam par 'phel bar byed cing khyim bdag mkhas pa yongs su tshol tshol ba las/ grong khyer gyi dbus lam gyi bzhi mdo zhig na rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bu zhig la/ rin po che grangs med

pa las byas pa'i khri nor bu rin po che'i rkang pa rdo rje dang / in dra ni la sna tshogs kyis spras pa bkye ba/ gser gyi lcag pod kyi dra bas legs par blas pa/ nor bu rin po che dri ma med pa'i snying po can rin po

che lnga brgya tsam gyis gzugs legs par brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi stan sna tshogs bting ba/ bgam yo nas lha rdzas kyi gos kyi rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang po bsgreng ba/ rin po che du ma'i dra bas kun
nas g.yogs pa rin po che'i bla re chen po bres pa/ bla nas gser dang rin po che'i me tog gi lda ldi mang po bkye ba zhig la 'dug cing / 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi gdugs yu ba bai Dur+ya las byas
pa ni drung na bsgreng zhing bzung / g.yab rnga dri ma med pa'i rdul yab ngang pa'i rgyal po lta bus ni legs par g.yob/ spos kyi rim gro'i yo byad sna tshogs kyis ni gdugs shing bsangs rol mo
brdung ba dang / dkrol ba lha rdzas kyis dbyangs las 'das par sgra 'byin pa lnga brgya tsam gyis ni g.yas phyogs nas brdungs shing dkrol/ grong khyer 'byung ba chen po na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams

shin tu dga' bar bya ba'i don du lha rdzas kyis me tog gi sprin gyi char ni kun nas 'bab par gyur pa/ g.yog srog chags stong phrag bcu tsam sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskal pa mnyam par spyod spyod pa/ ngag
nyan cing dga' bar byed pa/ lha rdzas las 'das pa'i brgyan gyis shin tu brgyan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa yongs su grub pa/ lha dang mi'i gzugs las shin tu
'das pa sha stag gis kun nas bskor cing 'dug pa mthong nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs khyim bdag mkhas pa gang na ba der song ste/ phyin nas khyim bdag mkhas pa'i
rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ khyim bdag mkhas pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /
'phags pa bdag ni 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar bgyi ba dang / sems can thams cad shin tu bde ba la 'god pa dang / sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho
nas mngon par gdon pa dang / sems can thams cad chos rin po che'i gling du yang dag par bskyal ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sred pa'i brlan shin tu bskam pa dang / sems can thams
cad kyi snying rje'i brlan yang dag par bskyed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang / sred pa rnam par zlog pa dang / sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mos
shing bsgrub par bgyi ba dang / sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i bas mtha' dgon pa las yang dag par bzla ba dang / sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang chos la dga' zhing
mos pa yang dag par bskyed pa dang / sems can thams cad khams gsum gyi grong rdal nas gdon pa dang / sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i pho brang du gzud pa dang / sems can thams
cad kyi don du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs kyang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba
ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i
spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ de skad ces smras pa dang / khyim bdag mkhas pas tshong
dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu sems can gang

bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su tshol ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta bas myi ngoms pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi
drung du 'gro bas myi ngoms pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro bya bas sgyid lug pa myed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bas yid myi bde ba myi bskyed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes
gnyen btsal ba las phyir myi ldog pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mos shing dang ba'i yid las rnam par myi ldog pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi ngor blta ba las phyir myi zlog pa dang / dge ba'i
bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag gi tshul la zhum pa myed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bya bas myi skyo ba de lta bu ni shin tu dkon no/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis kho bo'i 'khor
'di dag mthong ngam/ smras pa 'phags pa mthong ngo / /smras pa rigs kyi bu 'di dag kun kyang kho bos bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
tu sems bskyed pa dag ste/ 'di dag ni kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su bskyed pa'o/ /'di dag ni kho bos pha rol tu phyin pas bsdus te gsos pa'o/ /'di dag ni kho bos chos
dkar po thams cad kyis bskyed pa'o/ /'di dag ni kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la rnam par bskyed pa'o/ /'di dag ni kho bos 'jig rten gyi rigs las gyen du bskyod pa'o/ /'di dag ni kho
bos de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la bkod pa'o/ /'di dag ni kho bos 'jig rten gyi lam gyi 'khor lo las bzlog pa'o/ /'di dag ni kho bos chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la btsud pa'o/ /'di dag ni

kho bos ngan song gsum gyi rgyud du ltung ba las yongs su bzung ba'o/ /'di dag ni kho bos chos nyid khong du chud par bya ba la bskod pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can thams

cad kyi skyabs su gyur pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu kho bos ni yid kyi mdzod nas byung ba'i bsod nams mang po thob pa ste/ de'i mthus kho bo ni zas 'dod pa rnams la zas kyi sbyin pa byed de/ btung ba 'dod pa
rnams la btung ba dang / ro'i dam pa 'dod pa rnams la ro'i dam pa dang / bza' ba 'dod pa rnams la bza' ba dang / bca' ba 'dod pa rnams la bca' ba dang / bldag pa 'dod pa rnams la bldag pa dang /
mur pa 'dod pa rnams la mur ba dang / gos 'dod pa rnams la gos dang / me tog 'dod pa rnams la me tog dang / phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la phreng ba dang / spos 'dod pa rnams la spos dang / bdug pa

'dod pa rnams la bdug pa dang / byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa dang / phye ma 'dod pa rnams la phye ma dang / rgyan dang lhab lhub 'dod pa rnams la rgyan dang lhab lhub dang / rin po che 'dod pa rnams la rin

po che dang / gser 'dod pa rnams la gser dang / dngul 'dod pa rnams la dngul dang / mu tig 'dod pa rnams la mu tig dang / rten 'dod pa rnams la rten dang / stan 'dod pa rnams la stan dang / mal cha 'dod
pa rnams la mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad 'dod pa rnams la na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad dang / bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhon pa dang / dga' ba 'dod pa rnams la dga' ba

dang / glang po dang rta dang / shing rta dang / ba lang dang / bong bu dang ma he dang / ra lug 'dod pa rnams la glang po dang / rta dang shing rta dang ba lang dang / bong bu dang ma he dang / ra lug dang / rgyal mtshan dang / gdugs dang /

ba dan 'dod pa rnams la rgyal mtshan dang / gdugs dang ba dan dang / bran pho dang bran mo 'dod pa rnams la bran pho dang bran mo dang 'khor gyi byis pa 'dod pa rnams la 'khor gyi byis pa dang / bud med 'dod
pa rnams la bud myed dang / bu mo gzhon nu 'dod pa rnams la bu mo gzhon nu dang / cod pan dang gtsug gi rin po che 'dod pa rnams la cod pan dang gtsug gi rin po che dang / thor dpag dang bcas pa'i

gtsug gi rin po che 'dod pa rnams la thor dpag dang bcas pa'i gtsug gi rin po dang / skra mthon ting dri ma myed pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dod pa rnams la skra mthon ting dri ma myed pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sbyin pa byed
pa nas/ yo byad sna tshogs thams cad 'dod pa rnams la yang yo byad sna tshogs thams cad kyi sbyin pa byed do/ /rigs kyi bu yud tsam zhig sdod dang / de'u re mngon gsum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /
de skad du khyim bdag mkhas pas/ tshig de brjod ma thag tu de'i mod la sems can grangs med pa zhig khyim bdag mkhas pa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis bos pas/ phyogs tha

dad pa dang / yul tha dad pa dang / gnas tha dad pa dang / grong dang / grong khyer tha dad pa dang / grong rdal tha dad pa dang / tshong 'dus tha dad pa dang / ljongs tha dad pa dang / 'or gyi grong tha dad pa dang / khyim

tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi rgyud tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi ris tha dad pa dang / sems can rnam pa myi 'thun pa tha dad pa dang / lam gyi rgyud tha dad pa dang / gnas kyi rnam pa dang / mying du bya ba tha dad pa
pa nas/ sems can skye mched rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ kha zas sna tshogs don du gnyer ba kha zas sna tshogs 'dod pa/ bsam pa tha dad pa bza' ba dang btung ba dang / gtsang ma 'dod

pa dang / sha 'dod pa dang / kha zas rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs don du gnyer ba/ lam gyi rgyud rnam pa sna tshogs kyi khyad par du skyes pa'i skye mched la gnas pa 'di lta ste/ mi'i nang nas 'bras can dang /

sran chan dang / khur ba dang / skyo ma dang nya dang sha la stsogs pa kham gyis bza' ba'i zas sna tshogs don du gnyer ba dang / mi'i nang nas ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba'i rgyud thams cad na rnam par spyod pa dag

las kyang / kha zas dang btung ba sna tshogs don du gnyer ba dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa thogs pa myed par gtong ba'i rnga'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi
smon lam gyis bos pas kun kyang 'ongs par gyur te/ 'ongs nas kyang khyim bdag mkhas pa la slongs mo 'debs so/ /gdong du blta'o/ /sdod do/ /gsol ba 'debs so/ /de nas khyim bdag mkhas
pas slong ba de dag kun nas 'dus par shes pas/ yud tsam du bsams te nam mkha' la bltas pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings nas/ kha zas dang btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ kha dog

sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ dri sna tshogs dang ldan pa mang po 'thon te/ lag mthil du 'ong bar gyur to/ /des de dag yongs su blangs shing de ltar kun nas 'dus pa'i slongs mo ba mos pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/

de dag ci 'dod pa'i zas dang / btung ba'i rnam pa dang / yo byad kyi khyad par thams cad kyis yongs su tshim par byas so/ /ci 'dod pa yongs su byin no/ /rab tu dga' bar byas so/ /shin tu tshim par byas
so/ /dga' ba shin tu skye bar byas so/ /nyams shin tu bde bar byas so/ /yid rab tu dga' bar byas so/ /de ltar de dag shin tu tshim par byas de des kyang mchog ste/ de'i 'og tu chos bstan pa

'di lta ste/ ye shes kyi tshogs rgya chen po bstsags pa'i rgyu yongs su brjod de chos ston to/ /phongs pa thams cad 'byung ba mi srid pa'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / skyid pa chen po yongs su 'grub par 'byung

ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / chos kyi ye shes kyi tshul thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya chen po bstsags pa'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / dga' ba bza'i zas

rab tu 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos shin tu brgyan pa'i lus thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / thub pa myed pa'i stobs rnam par dag pa thob pa
'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / bla na myed pa'i kha zas yongs su shes pa 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / bdud kyi dpung thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i bsod nams kyi stobs

myi zad pa rab tu thob pa byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa byas te chos ston to/ /des kha zas don du gnyer cing 'ongs pa rnams la nam mkha'i dbyings nas kha zas rnam pa sna tshogs blangs shing tshim par byas te/
de dag la tshe dang mdog dang / stobs bde ba dang / spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /des btung ba don du gnyer cing 'ongs pa rnams la btung ba mang po zhim pa
kha na ma tho ba med pa/ yid shin tu dga' bar byed pa dag gis tshim par byas nas/ de dag la 'khor bas skom zhing 'khor ba la dga' ba las rnam par bzlog pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la dga'

zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos pa yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir chos bstan to/ /des ro'i mchog don du gnyer cing 'ongs pa rnams la ro'i mchog sna tshogs dngar ba dang / skyur ba dang lan tsha dang tsha

ba dang / kha ba dang bska ba dang / rnam pa tha dad pas yongs su tshim par byas te/ de'i 'og du skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog thob par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to/ /des bzhon pa don du
gnyer cing phyogs kyi rgyud sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa rnams la bzhon pa sna tshogs kyi sbyin pas yongs su bsdud de/ de dag theg pa chen po la gnas par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /des gos don du
gnyer cing phyogs sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa kun nas 'dus par shes nas/ yud tsam du bsams te/ nam mkha'i dbyings la bltas pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings las gos sna tshogs sngon po dang ser

po dang / dmar po dang dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel gyi kha dog du 'dug pa kha dog sna tshogs can kha dog du mar rnam par dag pa dag 'thon cing lag pa'i mthil du 'ongs pas/ des de dag gis slongs

mo ba de dag la yongs su bsdud nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa bla na myed pa dang / mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu thob par 'gyur ba rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to/ /
de bzhin du yo byad sna tshogs thams cad kyis ji ltar 'ongs pa'i slongs mo ba rnams la bsdud pa byas nas/ ci rigs su chos bstan to/ /de ltar khyim bdag mkhas pas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam
par thar pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i yul bstan pa byas nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu kho bos ni yid kyi mdzod nas byung ba'i bsod nams kyi rnam par
thar pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa'i yo byad la dbang thob pa rin po che'i lag pa thob par gyur pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad lag pas yongs su khebs par

byas shing / sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa sna tshogs bsgrub pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du rin po che kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bebs pa de bzhin du rgyan

kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / cod pan kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / khang pa brtsegs pa kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / na bza' kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / lha rdzas las rol mo brdung ba dang

dkrol ba dang / glu yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs snyan pa sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / me tog kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / spos kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / bdug spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang / phye ma dang chos
gos dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan kha dog sna tshogs dang / rnam pa thams cad du sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa'i sprin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams
cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi gnas su sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing bsnyen bkur ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba dang / gdul bar bya ba'i phyir yo byad thams
cad kyi char 'bebs pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod pa 'am/ rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na grong khyer
seng ge'i gzugs shes bya ba yod de/ de na chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud ces bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab
par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas khyim bdag mkhas pa la chos kyi rim
gros slob ma'i tshul bstan te/ de'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad thob par 'gyur bar yongs su blta zhing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de la rag lus par blta ba dang /
dge ba'i bshes gnyen dben par sems pa rgyun myi 'chad par bstan pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bka' shin tu nyan pa'i sems dang ldan par bstan pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi
dbang du 'gyur ba'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag dang / tshig mnyan par bya ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen las byung ba'i dad pa'i dbang po la bsam pa
byed cing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis gtams te btang bas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen cing bkur ba dang / rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i sems kyis/ khyim bdag mkhas pa'i rkang pa
gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ khyim bdag mkhas pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ khyim bdag mkhas pa'i drung nas
song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi bsod nams kyi chu bo de la ni yid ches par sems/ bsod nams kyi zhing de la ni yang dag par blta/ bsod nams kyi ri bo de ni yongs su sbyong /
bsod nams kyi mu stegs de la ni yang dag par 'dzeg /bsod nams kyi mdzod de ni rnam par 'byed/ bsod nams kyi gter de la ni shin tu lta/ bsod nams kyi dkyil 'khor de ni yongs su
spyod/ bsod nams kyi phung po de ni yang dag par len/ bsod nams kyi stobs de ni yongs su bskyed/ bsod nams kyi shugs de ni rnam par 'phel bar byed cing / mthar gyis grong khyer seng
ge'i gzugs gang na ba der phyin te/ chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud yongs su tshol tshol ba las/ tshong 'dus kyi srang zhig na 'dug pa mthong nas/ des de'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos
phyag 'tshal te/ g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa bdag gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal na/ 'phags pa lam gang gis bdag thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi man ngag legs par myi bstsal tam/ de nas chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud kyis tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs
kyi lag pa nas bzung ste/ rang gi khyim gang na ba der khrid de khyim de bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu kho bo'i khyim la ltos shig ces nas/ des bltas na
khyim de dag cing 'od gsal la 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser las byas pa ste/ yangs shing mtho la dngul gyi ra bas bskor ba/ shel gyi rtsig pas shin tu legs par brtsigs
te/ mdzes par byas pa bai DUr+ya'i phung po brgya phrag stong gis rab tu brgyan pa/ mu sa ra gal pa'i ka ba bkye ba/ mu tig dmar po las byas pa'i seng ge'i khri shin tu bshams pa/
nor bu rin po che rang bzhin snang ba'i seng ge'i rgyal mtshan sgreng ba/ nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i bla re bres pa/ gser gyi dra ba yid bzhin gyi nor bus brgyan pas kun nas g.yog pa/
nor bu rin po che sna tshogs grangs myed pas rab tu brgyan pa/ a smar gar ba las brtsigs pa'i rdzing bu chu bsil bas gang ba dang ldan pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi shing gis bskor ba/
rgya che zhing yangs pa rim pa bcur brtsegs pa/ shin tu mtho ba/ sgo brgyad dang ldan par 'dug pa mthong nas/ des khyim de'i nang du phyin te/ kun tu bltas na rim khang tha ma'i nang na
bza' ba dang btung ba'i rnam pa yongasu gtong ba mthong ngo / /rim khang gnyis pa'i nang na gos kyi rnam pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba mthong ngo / /rim khang gsum pa'i nang na rin po che thams cad
kyi rgyan dang / lhab lhub yongs su gtong ba mthong ngo / /rim khang bzhi pa'i nang na btsun mo'i 'khor dga' ba'i yo byad du bya ba bud med rin po che sa chen po'i steng na bzung du bya ba yongs su
gtong ba mthong ngo / /rim khang lnga pa'i nang nas sa lnga pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chos yang dag par 'gro ba'i dga' ba la mos pa/ 'jig rten la phan pa dang /

bde ba'i sems kyi spyod pa dang ldan pa/ gtsug lag thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa gzungs kyi tshul dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang / ting nge 'dzin la rnam par ldang ba dang / ting nge 'dzin la

rnam par spyod pa dang / ye shes kyi snang ba mngon par bsgrub pa 'dus shing 'khod par mthong ngo / /rim khang drug pa'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa
rab tu thob pa shes rab shin tu zab pa/ rab tu zhi ba'i chos thams cad mngon par shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / snying po mang pos sgo kun nas byung ba/ bsgrib pa myed pa'i
spyod yul can myi gnyis pa la yang dag par spyod pa/ chos yang dag par 'gro ba la rnam par 'phrul ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brang zhing rnam par dbye ba dang /
rab tu gsal bar byed pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo mang po yang dag par 'gro bar byed pa rnams kun nas 'dus shing 'khod pa mthong ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
sgo zhi ba'i snying po zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo 'gro ba thams cad du ye shes rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo myi g.yo
ba'i glong zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo rdul dang bral ba'i 'od ces bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo thub par dka' ba zhes bya ba dang / shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo 'gro ba thams cad mos par byed cing rjes su 'brang ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes
bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo rgya mtsho snying po zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo kun nas lta ba'i btang snyom thob pa zhes pa dang / shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo mi zad pa'i mdzod dang ldan pa zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo chos thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa'i sgo 'gro ba thams cad kyi rgya mtsho rjes su song ba zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
sgo chos kyi sprin la dmyigs pas rim pas myi dmyigs pa'i gnas shes bya ba dang / de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo de dag la stsogs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba'i sgo
grangs myed pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang bar yang dag par 'gro ba byed cing / rgyan brjod du myed pa shin tu rnam par phye ba'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na 'khod pa mthong bar gyur to/ /rim khang
bdun pa'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' sgra brnyan lta bu'i bzod pa rab tu thob pa thabs dang ye shes rnam par gdon mi za ba la shin tu byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos
kyi sprin yang dag par 'dzin pa sha stag 'dus shing 'khod pa mthong ngo / /rim khang brgyad pa'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par 'gro ba'i mngon par shes pa rab tu thob pa/ 'jig rten
gyi khams thams cad du rnam par rgyu ba/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du gzug brnyan rab tu 'byung ba/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du lus shin tu rnam par phye ba/ de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung nas gud du mi 'phags pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa la yang dag par gzhol ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor
du sngon du brjod pa'i gtam gyi skyes bur gyur pa sha stag kun nas 'dus shing 'khod pa mthong ngo / /rim khang dgu pa'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag 'dus

shing 'khod pa mthong ngo / /rim khang bcu pa'i nang na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thog ma byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa dang / spyod pa dang / 'byung ba dang / smon lam rgya mtsho dang / sangs rgyas kyi
rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du bcas pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu sgrog pa dang bcas pa dang / sems can 'dul bar
mdzad pa'i byin kyis rlabs dang bcas par mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa khyod la 'di lta bu'i phun sum tshogs
pa mnga' na/ phun sum tshogs pa'i rnam pa de ji lta ba zhig du sbyang ba/ mdzod dge ba'i rtsa ba ni su zhig la yongs su bskyed bskyed/ des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho bos dran te/ 'das pa'i
dus kyi bskal pa sang+yas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i yang pha rol gcig na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'khor lo sna tshogs shes bya bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings
'od gzer mtha' yas pas yongs su brgyan pa'i chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na myed pa/
skyes bu 'dul ba/ kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ye shes rnam par snang ba la
stsogs pa nyan thos bye ba phrag brgya dang / ye shes nyi ma'i gzi brjid la stsogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / thabs gcig du rgyal po chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal
pos spyan drangs nas/ bza' shing gi ra ba chen po rin po rin chen rgyal mtshan rgyan kyis mdzes pa zhes bya bar gshegs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de grong khyer du gshegs nas/ tshong 'dus
kyi srang nas tshur bzhud pa'i tshe/ kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa de dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ sil snyan dang
rol mo'i sgra zhig kyang phyung / spos kyi ri lu zhig kyang bsregs te/ bdug spos kyis bsangs so/ /spos kyi ri lu gcig po de/ de ltar bsregs pas zhag bdun du 'dzam bu'i gling
thams cad kyang spos kyi na bun gyi sprin kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi lus dang 'dra bas yongs su khebs par gyur te/ spos kyi na bun gyi sprin de dag
las kyang sgra 'di skad du brjod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bsam gyis myi khyab ste/ dus gsum du dri ma myed pa'i ye shes kyi phung po dang ldan pa'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
sgrib pa thams cad myi mnga' ba'o/ /nyon mongs pa'i bag chags thams cad yongs su byang ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yon phul ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i
don chen po tshad myed pa bsgrub par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur ro zhes/ de skad du kho bo'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba las shugs yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir/ spos kyi na bun gyi sprin de las/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis sgra'i rnam pa de lta bu byung ngo / /
rigs kyi bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis/ bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang kho bos gnas gsum du yongs su bsngos te/ gsum gang zhe na/
'di ltar phongs pa thams cad shin tu rgyun gcad pa dang / dam pa'i chos mnyan pa dang myi 'bral ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mthong ba/
yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ /rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor thogs pa myed pa'i rgyan ces

bya ba 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rin po che tshad myed pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku rgya mtsho dang / tha myi dad pa la zhugs pa/ tha myi dad pa'i chos

kyi sprin gyi char yang dag par 'dzin pa/ tha myi dad pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/ kun tu bzangs po'i spyod pa'i dra ba rnam par rgyas par gyur pa/ ting nge 'dzin tha myi dad pa'i yul la zhugs pa
byang chub sems dpa' thams cad tha myi dad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyun gcig tu gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang tha myi dad cing rnam par myi rtog par spyod pa/ dus gsum tha myi dad pas
mnyam pa nyid la zhugs pa/ bskal pa thams cad tha myi dad par yongs su gnas par myi skyo ba/ kun tu lta ba tha myi dad pa'i yul gyi sa la gnas pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/
yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ /song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na yul spa'i rtsa ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i grong khyer kun nas sgo zhes bya ba na/ tshong dpon spos 'tshong kun tu
lta ba zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu
nor bzangs kyis chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor
ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud kyi drung nas song ngo // //sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po bcu bzhi pa/
de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa mthong ba la zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa dang 'grogs pa rab tu thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam mtha'
yas pa'i tshul gyis snang bar gyur pa/ chos kyi tshul mtha' yas pas mngon par brlan pas shin tu rtogs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa mtha' yas pa'i lam
gyis rnam par dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po'i mtha' yas pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa mtha' yas pa'i stobs la gnas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i
spyod pa mtha' yas pa'i rjes su song ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam mtha' yas pa'i stobs yongs su skyes pa/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyis thub pa myed
pa'i mtha' yas pa'i rgyal mtshan can/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes snang ba mtha' yas pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos mtha' yas pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa de mthar

gyis yul spa'i rtsa ba gang na ba der phyin nas/ grong khyer kun nas sgo yongs su tshol zhing phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams dang / yul phyogs nyen kor kun dang / sgang dang gshong dang / mnyam pa dang myi
mnyam pa thams cad du yongs su skyo ba myed pa'i bsam pa dang / 'jigs pa myed pa'i sems dang / ldog pa myed pa'i brtson 'grus dang / thub pa myed pa'i sems kyis/ dge ba'i
bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag ma brjed pa dang / rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi spyod pa ma nor bas sems rab tu bsgos pa dang / sgo kun nas rnam par dmyig pa'i dbang po dang ldan pa dang /

bag myed pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / myig dang rna ba g.yeng ba med par kun tu tshol tshol nas yul spa'i rtsa ba'i dbus shig na/ grong khyer kun nas sgo tshong 'dus kyi grong rdal stong phrag bcu'i gnas
su gyur pa/ de shin tu bzang por grub pa/ ra ba brtan pas bskor ba/ shin tu mtho ba bzhi mdo brgyad kyis brgyan pa 'dug par mthong ste/ de'i nang na spos 'tshong kun tu lta ba yang spos 'tshong gi
'khyams shig na 'dug pa mthong nas/ spos 'tshong kun tu lta ba gang na ba der phyin te/ spos 'tshong kun tu lta ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar
nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa bdag gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' spyod
pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma mtshal to/ /smras pa rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so/ /
rigs kyi bu kho bos ni sems can thams cad kyi nad shes te/ rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / cha mnyam par 'khrugs pa dang / gzhan gyis

gnod par byas pa dang / mi ma yin pa las gyur pa dang / dug 'thungs pa dang / sngags dang / mtshon dang / ro langs pa'i sbyor ba sna tshogs dang / me las gyur pa dang / chus bskyod pa las gyur pa dang /
bsngangs pa dang 'jigs pa sna tshogs las gyur pa thams cad kyang shes so/ /nad de dag thams cad shes par bya ba yang shes te/ 'di ltar bsnun par bya ba yang rab tu shes so/ /skyug par

bya ba dang / bkru ba dang gtar ba dang / sna'i mchog dang nya ra dang gdugs dang / lums dang / byug pa dang / dug gso ba dang / 'byung po'i gdon myed par bya ba dang / bcud dang khrus dang / gzhag pa

dang / bskyed pa dang / kha dog sbyang ba dang / nyam bsdod pa 'ang rab tu shes te/ rigs kyi bu phyogs bcu nas sems can gang ji snyed cig kho bo'i drung du 'ong ba de dag thams cad kyi nad thams cad kyang
rab tu zhi bar byed de/ nad sos nas kyang legs par bkru ba dang lus la byug pas byug pa byas nas/ ci'i tshul gyi rgyan gyis yan lag shin tu brgyan te/ ci rigs pa'i gos lus la bskon nas/
kha zas bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su tshim par byas te/ nor dpag tu med pas kyang phun sum tshogs par byed do/ /de'i 'og tu yang de dag la mi gtsang ba bstan cing / 'dod

chags spang ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /byams pa chen po yongs su bsngags shing zhe sdang spang ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /chos rnam par dbye ba'i bye brag bstan cing gti mug spang ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /

khyad par khong du chud pa'i tshul gyi sgo yang dag par bstan cing cha mnyam pa'i spyod pa dang / nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi chos dang ldan pa'i gtam thams cad
yongs su brjod cing byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to/ /'khor ba'i bsdug bsngal tshad gzung du myed pa yongs su ston to/ /snying rje chen po'i 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to/ /

bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rgya chen po bstsags pa yang dag par bsngags shing yon tan tshad med pa 'thob pa dang / 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to/ /sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba

dang / gdul bar bya ba yongs su bstan cing theg pa chen po'i smon lam 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang / bskal pa thams cad du gnas par bya ba'i spyod pa'i dra ba shin

tu rgyas par bshad cing byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa 'thob pa dang / 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsngags shing mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos

brgyan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku 'thob pa dang 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yongs su dag pa thams cad du 'gro ba 'thob pa dang
'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs dang / sku mdog rnam par dag pa bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i rgyu yongs su ston
to/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thob par dka' ba yongs su ston to/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i
sku zil gyis mi non la/ zil gyis gnon pa rnam par dag pa yongs su ston to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing chos kyi sku yongs su dag pa yongs su ston to/ /thabs mkhas pa'i

pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing 'gro ba thams cad la mngon du gyur pa'i sku gtsang zhing rnam par dag pa yongs su ston to/ /smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing bskal pa thams cad

kyi dus su 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dang 'grogs pa'i sku rnam par dag pa yongs su ston to/ /stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du mngon par 'byung ba'i sku rnam

par dag pa yongs su ston to/ /ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing 'gro ba thams cad bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshim par mdzad pa'i sku rnam par dag pa yongs su ston to/ /myi dge ba'i chos
thams cad las rnam par ldog pa yongs su brjod cing blta na phul du bzang ba'i sku rnam par dag pa yongs su ston to/ /de ltar de dag chos gyi sbyin pas yongs su bsdus te/ nor dang rin po che mtha' yas

pa'i tshogs kyis nye bar brten pa byas shing so sor 'gyed do/ /yang rigs kyi bu kho bos ni spos dang / bdug spos dang / bsgo ba dang / bsku ba sbyor shes te/ 'di ltar spos kyi rgyal po gzhal du med pa la stsogs pa

dang / spos kyi rgyal po sin 'du ra la stsogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po mi 'phags pa la stsogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po rnam par gsal byed la stsogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po nyi ma yod pa la stsogs pa

dang / spos kyi rgyal po dus dang 'thun pa la stsogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po sbrul gyi snying po'i tsan dan la stsogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po sprin gyi a ga ru la stsogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po dbang po mi
'khrug pa la stsogs pa/ spos sbyar ba thams cad kyang rab tu shes so/ /yang rigs kyi bu kho bo ni sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa dang / sgo thams cad nas sangs rgyas blta zhing
mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba'i spos kyi gzugs shes te/ rigs kyi bu kho bo ni sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa dang / sgo thams cad nas sangs rgyas blta zhing mchod pa dang / bsnyen
bkur ba'i spos kyi gzugs 'dis kho bo'i bsam pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ de'i mthus kho bos sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i rgyan gyi sprin byin gyi rlob pa byed

de 'di ltar spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyi rgyan nas rnam pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i rgyan gyi sprin gyi bar du byin gyis rlob pa byed do/ /rigs kyi bu kho bo ni nam
de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya bar 'dod pa de'i tshe/ kho bos sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa dang / sgo thams cad nas sangs rgyas blta zhing mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba'i spos
kyi gzugs 'di las spos kyi mdzod kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin tshad gzung du myed pa brton cing / phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor
chos kyi dbyings thams cad du spos thams cad kyi mdzod kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyi rgyan byin gyis rlob pa byed do/ /chos kyi dbyings thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su

sbyong ba'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi khang pa'i sprin gyi char dang / spos kyi ra ba'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi ba gam gyi sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi rta babs kyi sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi skar khung gi

sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi pu shu'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi zla bag gyi sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos gyi gdugs gyi sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng ba'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi lha'i ba dan

gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi bla bre'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi gzugs kyi dra ba'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi 'od kyi sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi snang ba dri ma myed pa'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos thams cad
kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan byin gyis rlob te/ rigs kyi bu kho bos ni sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa dang / sgo thams cad nas sangs rgyas blta zhing mchod pa dang /
bsnyen bkur ba'i spos kyi gzugs kyi chos kyi sgo 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po lta bur gyur pa/ blta na don yod pa/ 'grogs na don yod pa/
rjes su dran na don yod pa/ brtul zhugs rjes su byas na don yod pa/ mying thos na don yod pa/ mthong ba tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zhi bar 'gyur ba/ mthong ba tsam gyis
sems can rnams ngan song gi rgyud las ldog par 'gyur ba/ mthong ba tsam gyis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos la skabs phye ba thob par gyur pa/ mthong ba tsam gyis sems
can rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba mthong ba tsam gyis sems can rnams 'jigs pa dang / 'khor ba'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad kyi 'jigs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba
mthong ba tsam gyis sems can rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i phyogs la rten par 'gyur ba'i phyir myi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba/ mthong ba tsam gyis sems can rnams rga shi'i grog po dang g.yang
sar mi ltung ba/ mthong ba tsam gyis sems can rnams chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid la gnas pas mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba 'thob par 'gyur ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am yon tan
brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na grong khyer ta la'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na rgyal po me zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang
chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ tshong dpon spos 'tshong kun tu blta ba'i rkang
pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshong dpon spos 'tshong kun tu blta ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ tshong dpon spos 'tshong kun tu blta
ba'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge ba'i bshes gnyen gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa de dag rjes su dran par byed cing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag gi sgo
de dag rjes su dran par bya ba dang / bdag ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ngo / /zhes bya ba'i sems yongs su tshim par bya ba dang / bdag ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su
bsrungs pas/ da ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par yang myi 'gyur ro/ /snyam du rnam par sems shing / sems dga' ba ni rab tu thob/ sems
dang ba dang sems rab tu dga' ba dang / sems rangs pa dang / sems mgu ba dang / sems mos pa dang / sems kyi shugs dang / sems rnam par zhi ba dang / sems rgya chen po dang / sems kyi rgyan dang /
sems la thogs pa myed pa dang sems la sgrib pa myed pa dang / sems rnam par phye ba dang / sems yang dag par gzhol ba dang / sems kyi dbang dang / sems kyi dbang sgyur ba dang / sems kyi

chos khong du chud pa dang / sems kyi zhing rgyas par dgang ba dang / sems sangs rgyas mthong bas rgyan pa dang / sems stobs bcu'i yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba 'ang thob nas/ de mthar kyi ljongs nas

ljongs dang / grong nas grong dang yul nas yul du tshal zhing grong khyer ta la'i rgyal mtshan gang na ba der phyin te/ rgyal po me gang na bzhugs pa dris na/ de 'gro ba gzhan dag gis 'di skad ces bstan te/ rigs kyi bu
'dir rgyal po me ni rgyal po'i don bsgrub pa'i phyir seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs shing / rgyal po'i phrin las mdzad do/ /khams rab tu skyong ngo / /chad pas gcad par 'os pa ni chad pas gcad do/ /
bya dgas sdud par 'os pa ni bya dgas sdud do/ /g.yon yod pa rnams la gyong myed do/ /rtsod pa rnams kyi zhal ce ni yongs su gcod do/ /dma' ba rnams ni dbugs 'byin to/ /dregs pa
rnams ni 'dul ba mdzad do/ /srog gcod pa las ni rnam par zlog go/ /ma byin par len pa dang ni rnam par dbyen pa mdzad do/ /gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba la mngon par zhen pa ni rnam par

zhi bar mdzad do/ /rdzun du smra ba las phyir zlog pa mdzad do/ /phra ma'i tshig dang ni rnam par 'bral bar mdzad do/ /zhe gcod pa'i ngag ni rgyun gcod pa mdzad do/ /tshig khyal ba las ni yongasu glon no/ /

chags sems dang ni myi 'dre ba mdzad do/ /gnod sems dang ni rgyang ring ngo / /log par lta ba dang ni 'dre ba myed par mdzad do/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs rgyal po me gang na ba der phyin te/

des mthong ba rgyal po mye de ni rin po che'i seng ge'i khri chen po rdo rje mthu bo che'i nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa/ rin po che 'od gsal ba rnam pa sna tshogs grangs myed pa las byas pa'i rkang pa bkye ba/
rin po che gcig ma yin pas legs par spras shing brgyan pas yid du 'ong ba'i lhun dang ldan pa/ gser gyi lcag pod kyi dra bas legs par blangs shing chub par brtags pa/ nor bu rin po che du ma'i

sgron mas shin tu snang bar byas pa/ nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po las byas pa'i pad mo'i snying po can/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i stan rim pa du mar bting ba/ gam yo nas lha rdzas kyi spos sna tshogs kyis bdug

spos kyis shin tu bdugs pa/ rin po che'i rgyal mtshan sgreng ba/ brgya phrag stong gis mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i ba dan brgya phrag stong rnam par bres pas brgyan pa/ rin po che'i me tog gi chun po

sna tshogs kyi lda ldi rab tu bkye bas shin tu mdzes par byas pa/ steng nas lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i bla re sna tshogs bres pa zhig la 'dug cing / de ni gzhon zhing dar la bab pa/ gzugs mdzes shing blta na
yid du 'ong ba/ skra mthon ting g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang ldan pa/ mgo gdugs ltar 'dug pa gtsug tor spyi bo can/ 'phral ba yangs pa/ myig dkar nag 'byes shing ring la/ rdzi ma ba'i rdzi
ma ltar 'dug pa/ sna'i dbyibs legs shing bzang la rim par mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ mchu mtshal ltar mdog bzang zhing shin tu legs pa dang ldan pa/ so mnyam zhing thags bzang la shin tu
dkar ba bzhi bcu tshang ba dang ldan pa/ 'gram pa'i lha nga seng ge'i 'gram pa ltar 'dug pa khur ba shes rgyas pa/ smin tsugs gzhu ltar 'dug cing ring la shin tu mdzes pa/ mdzod spu zla ba'i kha dog
ltar 'dug pa'i thig le can/ rna ba'i shal ring zhing lhod par 'phyang ba/ zla ba nya ba ltar bzhin mdangs dang ldan zhing shin tu bzang ba/ mgul zlum zhing dung ltar mdzes pa/ snying ka dpal gyis be
'us brgyan pa/ ro stod seng ge'i ro stod ltar 'dug pa/ thal gong shin tu rgyas la/ dpung mgo'i lhun legs shing zlum pa/ lag pa ring ba dra bar 'brel ba'i sor mo can/ rkang lag 'khor los brgyan
pa/ rkang lag 'jam zhing gzhon la sha rgyas pa/ bdun shin tu mtho ba/ rked pa rdo rje ltar 'dug pa/ lus che zhing drang ba/ brla zlum pa/ pho mtshan gsang ba'i sbubs na 'dug pa/ byin pa ri dgas
e na ya'i byin pa ltar 'dug pa/ sor mo ring ba/ rkang pa'i rting ba yangs pa/ 'od 'dom gang ba dang ldan pa mdog gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa/ ba spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su gyen du 'khyil
ba/ shing n+ya gro da'i rgyal po ltar chu zheng gab pa/ lus mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos shin tu brgyan pa/ mgo la nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi cod pan thogs pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser
las byas pa'i dpral ba'i dbyen bla gam gyis mdzes par brgyan pa/ rna ba las rin po che in dra nI la'i rna cha dri ma med pa 'phyang ba/ nor bu rin po che rin thang myed pa'i se mo do'i 'od kyis snang
bar byas pa/ dri ma myed pa'i ro stod rgyas pa dang ldan pa/ lha rdzas kyi nor bu dam pa'i rin po che'i dpung rgyan dang / gdu bus lag pa mdzes par brgyan pa zhig ste/ rin po che'i gdugs chen

po rin po che bai DUr+ya dri ma myed pa'i yu ba can/ rin po che'i shar bu brgya phrag bcus rnam par phye ba/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi bla gab can nor bu rin po che sgra snang ba rnam par dag pa'i snying po

can/ rin po che'i dril bu'i phreng ba las sgra snyan cing / yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba/ nor bu rin po che'i 'od phyogs kun tu 'phro ba can drung nas bzung zhing bsgreng ba/ rgyal po'i gzi brjid dang dbang chen

po la gnas pa/ srid la gzhan gyi 'khor gyis gtse ba med pa/ dgra'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i dbang phyug dang ldan par 'dug pa mthong ngo / /de'i 'khor kun nas kyang blon po stong phrag bcu tshogs shing rgyal
po'i dgos pa bsgrub pa la brtson pa mthong ngo / /de'i mdun na chad pas bcod pa'i myi sems can dmyal ba'i srungs ma lta bu/ gshen rje'i g.yog 'khor lta bu 'jigs ltar go gyon pa/ gtum zhing

myi bzad la 'jigs pa chen po bskyed pa myig dmar ba so gtsigs pa/ gdong gi gnyer ma gsum khro gnyer du bsdus pa/ ral gri dang sta re dang / lcags kyi chang mdung dang / mda' dang be rga dang / mdung la stsogs
pa'i mtshon cha dang / lag cha thogs pa'i lus dang / bzhin gyi dbyibs myi sdug cing 'jigs su rung ba/ sprin nag po ltar 'dug pa/ myi snyan cing brlang la sdang ba'i sgra drag po 'byin pa/ gzi lta bar
dka' ba/ 'jigs pa chen po bskyed pa/ srog chags brgya phrag stong gi snying 'gems par byed pa/ de lta bu dag chad pas gcad par 'os pa'i sems can chad pas gcod pa la brtson pa mthong ngo / /
de na srog chags rku ba gzhan gyi nor la 'phrog pa/ sems can gyi longs spyod chud stsod pa/ lam sgugs shing 'phrog pa/ grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / lhas la myes gtor ba/
grong du chom po byed pa/ khyim phugs 'debs pa/ sdig sdig ltar byed pa/ dug ldud pa/ dkrugs ma byed pa/ thong mi byed pa/ byi bo byed pa/ log par zhugs pa/ gnod par sems pa/ 'dod chen mtshe

ba/ sdig pa sna tshogs kyi las myi bzad pa byed pa/ brgya stong mang po bcing ba dam po lngas bcings shing rgyal po mye'i drung du khrid pa dag kyang mthong ngo / /de dag la 'ang rgyal po myes ci rigs par chad

pas gcad par gyur pa mthong ngo / /des na rgyal po mes sgo zhing la la ni rkang lag bcad/ la la ni rna ba dang sna bcad/ la la ni myig phyung / la la ni yan lag dang nying lag dang / mgo gcod/ la la ni lus thams cad mes

btang / la la ni ba rtswa'i chu khol bas lus la gtor cing pags pa bsnyil ba la stsogs pa/ de lta bu'i chad pa sna tshogs du ma mi bzad pa drag po rlang ba yid du mi 'ong ba srog 'phrog pa dag kyang byed

par mthong ngo / /gsad pa'i sa de na 'ang bsad pa'i rkang lag dang / rna myig dang sna dang / mgo dang yan lag dang nying lag gi phung po ri rab tsam du spungs pa mthong ngo / /khrag gi mtsho dpag tshad
gsum tsam du zab la chu zhing du dpag tshad du ma yod pa yang mthong ngo / /de na shi ba'i rkeng rus yan lag dang nying lag dang / mgo dang bral ba brgya stong du ma la/ spyang ki dang wa dang /
khyi dang bya rog dang / bya rgod dang / khra dang bya ku ra ra mang pos gang ste/ 'drad cing 'thog pa mthong ngo / /de la 'ang la la ni kha dog du gyur te/ sngon por gyur pa tsam/ la la ni rnags
pa tsam/ la la ni bam pa tsam/ la la ni 'bu zhugs pa tsam du gyur te/ shin tu skyi g.ya' zhing 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo / /gsod pa de dag gis bsad pa'i tshe/
myi sdug pa cho dgur byas pas na 'jigs 'jigs skad dang / snying rje rje skad du sgra 'byin cing cho nges 'debs pa'i sgra chen po thos na/ skyi g.ya' zhing mi dga' ba chen po bskyed pa/
sems can dmyal ba chen po ris gzhom pa'i sgra lta bu 'ang thos so/ /des de ltar kha btags te brdungs pa dang / shin tu 'jigs pa'i drag shul mthong nas/ 'di snyam du gyur te
bdag ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon du zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su tshol zhing
'bad de/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la dge ba ni ci zhig bgyi/ mi dge ba ni gang zhig spang zhes 'dri na/ rgyal po me 'di la ni dge ba'i chos kyang myed de/ kha na ma tho ba chen po'i las la
spyod pa yid kyi yongs su rtogs pa shin tu gtum pa dang ldan pa/ sems can pha rol gyi srog gcod pa la zhugs pa/ sems can pha rol shin tu mnar ba la brtson pa/
tshe phyi ma la lta ba myed pa/ ngan song gi g.yang sa'i gad ka na 'dug pa/ zhig na 'di las ji zhig byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'ang thos par 'gyur ram snyam ste/ de de ltar sems
