du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs lus dang srog la ni mi
lta/ srid pa'i longs spyod dang yongs su zin pa dang / nye bar blangs pa la mngon par chags pa'i gnas thams cad la ni mi lta/ sems can gyi yul gyi dga' ba la ni mi lta/ gzugs
dang / sgra dang dri dang ro dang / reg bya thams cad la ni mi lta/ g.yog 'khor dang longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa thams cad la ni mi lta ste/ rgyal srid dang dbang phyug gi dbang gi bde ba
thams cad la ni mi lta sangs rgyas kyi zhing bla na med par yongs su dag pa mngon par bsgrubs pas sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba dang yongs su dag par bya ba
la lta ba/ mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur ba dang / rim gro bya bas mi ngoms pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la lta ba dang / rang bzhin med pa yongs su shes pa'i ye shes khong du chud par bya ba'i
phyir chos thams cad la blta ba yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad kyi don tu nan tan bya ba las nyam pa med par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan thams cad la blta ba dang / bskal pa
thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yang dag par gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam chen po la lta ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor
gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par bya ba la lta ba/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo re rer byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin grangs med pa thams cad gzung ba la rnam par 'phrul
par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad la lta ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par bzung bas mi ngoms par
bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi ye shes snang ba'i 'khor lo thams cad la lta ba/ de sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan 'di dag dang / gzhan dag kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen las
'byung ba ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni de dag thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin par yang dag par lta zhing mthar gyis yul khams chen po gang na ba der phyin nas/ spos

'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ud pa la yongs su rmed cing tshol tshol ba las mthong nas/ spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ud pa la gang na ba der phyin te/ de'i drung du song nas/ spos 'tshong
gi tshong dpon longs spyod ud pa la'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon long spyod ud pa la la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ spos
'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ud pa la'i mdun du 'dug te/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa bdag sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa'i ye shes 'tshal te/
sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar yang dga'/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sku yongs su grub par bgyi bar yang dga'/ sangs rgyas
thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku yongs su 'tshal bar bgyi bar yang dga'/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad yongasu dag par bgyi bar yang dga'/ byang chub sems dpa' ting
nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad snang bar bgyid par yang dga'/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su brtan par yang dga'/ sgrib pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad
rnam par gtor bar yang dga' zhing gi dkyil 'khor thams cad du rnam par rgyu bar 'tshal nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs na/ ji ltar byang chub
sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab pa dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba na

byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur bar ma 'tshal to/ /smras pa rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so
legs so/ /rigs kyi bu kho bo ni spos thams cad shes te/ spos sbyar ba thams cad dang / bdug spos thams cad dang / bdug spos sbyar ba thams cad dang / byug pa thams cad dang / byug pa
sbyar ba thams cad dang / phye ma thams cad dang / phye ma sbyar ba thams cad dang / spos byug pa dang / phye ma'i rnam pa thams cad kyang shes te/ lha'i spos kyang shes so/ /klu dang gnod sbyin
dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i spos kyang shes so/ /nad sel ba'i spos dang / yid mi bde ba bstsal ba'i
spos dang / 'jig rten gyi dga' ba yongs su bskyed pa'i spos dang / nyon mongs pa 'bor bar bya ba'i spos dang / nyon mongs pa zhi bar bya ba'i spos dang / 'dus byas kyi dga' ba dang / bde
ba sna tshogs yongs su bskyed pa'i spos dang / 'dus byas thams cad las skyo ba yongs su bskyed pa'i spos dang / bag bya ba'i gnas thams cad sel ba'i spos dang / sangs rgyas yid
la bya ba'i rgyud yang dag par 'byung ba'i spos dang / chos kyi tshul khong du chud par bya ba'i spos dang / 'phags pas spyad pa'i spos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spos rnam pa tha dad pa dang /
byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad rnam par dgod pa'i spos yang shes te/ spos kho bos de dag thams cad rnam pa ji lta bu 'ang rab tu shes so/ /'byung ba dang skye ba dang / 'grub pa dang /
yongs su rdzogs pa dang / yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su spang ba dang / rab tu sbyar ba dang / yongs su spyad pa dang / yul dang mthu dang las dang rgyu yang rab tu shes so/ /rigs gyi bu mi'i
'jig rten na spos glang po'i snying po zhes bya ba/ klu yongs su 'khrug par byed pa yod de/ de'i ri lu til gyi 'bru tsam kyis kyang yul khams chen po thams cad spos kyi sprin gyi dra ba shin tu stug
pas kun nas khebs par gyur te/ zhag bdun du spos chu'i rgyun shin tu phra ba'i char mngon par 'bab bo/ /de'i tshe sems can su'i lus las gos la spos chu'i rgyun de dag gis bab par gyur
pa de dag thams cad kyang me tog gser gyi kha dog du 'dug pas rnam par brgyan pa'i gos dang lus su 'gyur ro/ /khang pa dang gzhal med khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa gang du bab par gyur
pa de dag thams cad kyang me tog gser gyi kha dog lta bus rnam par brgyan par gnas so/ /sems can khyim gyi nang na gnas pa gang gis spos kyi sprin gyi dra ba de la rlung gi ldang ba'i dri tshor
bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang zhag bdun du dga' ba dang / mos pa chen pos yongs su rgyas par 'gyur te/ lus dang sems la/ bde ba dang dga' ba sna tshogs kyang rab tu myong bar 'gyur
ro/ /de dag gi lus la yang khams 'khrug pa las gyur pa 'am/ gzhan gyis gnod par byas pa las byung ba'i nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ba med do/ /sems kyi sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde
ba yang mi 'byung ngo 'jigs pa 'am/ sngang ba 'am bag tsha ba 'am/ yid 'khrug pa 'am/ gnod sems kyang mi rgyu ste/ de dag thams cad zhag bdun du dga' ba dang bde ba skyes te/
gcig la gcig byams pa'i sems su 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu kho bo ni de dag de ltar dga' ba dang / nyams bde ba skyes pa rnams la bsam pa dag par bya ba'i phyir ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba de ltar chos bstan to/ /gzhan yang rigs kyi bu ri ma la ya las 'byung ba'i tsan dan sa stegs dam pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de lus la bskus na me'i
'obs su 'chongs kyang tshig pa med do/ /rigs kyi bu rgya mtsho'i mtha' nas 'byung ba'i spos gzhan gyis thub pa med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de rnga 'am dung la bskus na de'i sgras gzhan gyi
'khor thams cad pham par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu mtsho ma dros pa'i ngogs nas 'byung ba'i a ga ru nag po pad mo'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i ri lu til gyi 'bru tsam gcig gi dris kyang
'dzam bu'i gling thams cad rgyas par gang bar 'gyur te/ sems can gang gis spos kyi dri de tshor ba de dag thams cad kyang sdig pa la smod cing sdom pa'i sems rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi

bu ri'i rgyal po kha ba can las 'byung ba'i spos kyi rnam pa 'od dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i dri tshor na sems can de dag 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems su 'gyur te/ kho bo ni de dag la ci nas
kyang rdul dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston to/ /rigs kyi bu srin po'i 'jig rten nas 'byung ba'i spos kyi rnam pa rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes
bya ba yod de/ de ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i longs spyod kyi don du 'byung ste/ des bdug ma thag tu 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa yang nam mkha'i
dbyings la gnas so/ /rigs kyi bu lha'i 'khor chos bzang po nas 'byung ba'i spos kyi rnam pa rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba yod de/ des bdug ma thag tu lha rnams sangs rgyas kyi
dri zhim po dran par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma'i gnas na spos kyi rnam pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba yod de/ des bdug ma thag tu mtshe ma'i lha'i bu thams cad
lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma'i drung du 'dong ngo / /de dag der phyin nas kyang lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma'i chos kyi gtam byed do/ /rigs kyi bu dga' ldan gyi gnas na/ spos kyi rnam pa sa'i 'du ba ra
zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i spos kyi dud pa byang chub sems dpa' tshe gcig gi thogs pa chos kyi stan la 'dug pa'i mdun du phyung na/ chos kyi sprin chen pos chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas
par gang zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i chos kyi sprin chen po'i char rab tu 'bab po/ /rigs kyi bu lha'i rgyal po
rab 'phrul dga'i gnas na/ spos kyi rnam pa yid 'phrog pa zhes bya ba yod de/ des lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga'i gnas su 'dug na/ zhag bdun du chos kyi sprin gyi char bsam gyis mi
khyab pa 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu kho bos ni spos sbyar ba de shes su zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' skyon gyi dri ma med pa 'dod pa'i 'jig rten thams cad nas gyen
du 'phags pa/ nyon mongs pa'i bdud kyi zhags pa dang bral ba/ srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ ye shes sgyu ma'i rnam pa dang / gzugs kyi rnam par spyod pa/
'jig rten thams cad kyis gos pa med pa/ chags pa med pa'i ngang tshul can/ sgrib pa med par ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/ thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang /
yul du ldan pa/ kun gyi gzhi'i gnas thams cad la mi gnas par/ srid pa'i kun gzhi dang gnas thams cad du rgyu ba rnams kyi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod pa 'am/ tshul khrims
kyi spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo yongs su smos pa 'am/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'i spyod pa brjod pa 'am/ gnod par spyod pa med pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi rgyud bstan par nus re skan/ /
song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ grong khyer khang pa brtsegs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na mnyan pa dpa' bo zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i drung du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas
byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod u pa la'i
rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ud pa la la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/
spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ud pa la'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs grong khyer khang pa brtsegs par 'gro ba'i lam du 'jug pa'i tshe/ lam gyi gyen
thur dang / lam mnyam pa dang / lam gyi thag thug dang / lam rdul yod pa dang / lam rdul med pa dang / lam bde ba dang / lam mi bde ba dang / lam dog pa dang / lam bgegs
med pa dang / lam 'khyog pa dang / lam 'khyog pa med pa la rnam par dpyad de ltas nas 'di snyam du bsams so/ /'di ltar bdag dge ba'i bshes gnyen de'i drung du 'gro ba 'di ni/
byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi nan tan gyi rgyur 'gyur ro/ /pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam gyi nan tan gyi rgyur 'gyur ro/ /sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i lam gyi rgyur 'gyur ro/ /sems
thams cad byams sdang dang / mthon dman du 'gyur pa'i g.yang sa las rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can thams cad mi mnyam pa'i nan tan las bsgyur ba dang / sems can gyi

nyon mongs pa'i rdul rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad gyi mi dge ba'i lta ba sna tshogs kyi sdom dum dang / tsher ma dang / gyo mo dang gseg ma brtsal ba dang / chos kyi dbyings sgrib pa
med pa la gzhol bar bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i pho brang du thogs pa med par bskyel ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni dge ba'i chos thams
cad kyi 'byung gnas so/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rag lus so zhes de ltar sems shing yid la byed pas spyod pa thub par dka' ba de mthar gyis grong khyer
khang pa brtsegs pa der phyin nas mnyan pa dpa' bo yongs su rmed cing tshol tshol ba las grong khyer chen po zhig gi sgo rgya mtsho chen po'i ngogs na/ mnyan pa dpa' bo de tshong pa brgya phrag stong
tsam dang / srog chags brgya stong du ma gtam sna tshogs mnyan par 'dod pa sha stag gcig gis kun nas bskor cing / rgya mtsho'i gtam yongs su brjod pas/ sangs rgyas kyi yon
tan rgya mtsho sems can rnams la ston cing 'dug pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang mnyan pa dpa' bo gang na ba der song ste/ phyin nas mnyan pa dpa' bo'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag
'tshal te/ mnyan pa dpa' bo la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ mnyan pa dpa' bo'i mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /
'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /
ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa ji
ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bka' bstsal du gsol/ smras pa rigs kyi bu khyod
kyi de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ ye shes chen po thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu 'dri ba dang / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyi
rgyud 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gling gi gnas su 'gro ba 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / dbyer med pa'i theg pa chen po 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / nyan thos dang rang
sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bas 'jigs pa dang 'bral bar 'gyur ba'i lam gyi nan tan 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / rgyud sna tshogs khong du
chud par bya ba'i ye shes kyi lam 'byung ba'i rgyud dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad du 'gro bas rnam par spyod pa'i smon lam gyis shing rta'i 'khor lo thogs
pa med pa'i lam 'byung ba dang / rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gzi brjid kyi dba' rlabs kyis rnam par rgyan pa thams cad kyi rang
bzhin dang / tshul gyi lam 'byung ba dang / rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang / chos kyi phyogs dang / sgo thams cad kyi phyi ma'i mtha'i lam 'byung ba dang / rnam par dag par
'gyur ba'i rgyu dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i lam 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu 'dri ba 'di legs so legs so/ /rigs
kyi bu kho bo ni rgya mtsho'i ngogs kyi grong khyer khang pa brtsegs pa 'di na/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa snying rje chen po'i rgyal mtshan yongs su sbyong zhing gnas te/ rigs kyi
bu kho bo ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can phongs pa rnams mthong nas/ de dag gi don du dka' ba spyod de/ de dag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /'jig rten gyi
zang zing gis yongs su bsdu bar bya'o/ /chos kyi longs spyod kyis de dag yongs su tshim par bya'o/ /de dag la bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi lam man ngag du bstan par bya'o/ /
ye shes kyi tshogs rnam par spel bar bya'o/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs yongs su spel bar bya'o/ /byang chub kyi sems bskyed par bya'o/ /byang chub kyi bsam pa rnam par dag
par bya'o/ /snying rje chen po'i stobs nye bar bstan par bya'o/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnam par zhi bar bya'o/ /'khor ba'i spyod pas yongs su mi skyo ba'i stobs shin tu bstan par bya'o/ /
sems can rgya mtsho bsdu ba la 'di dag sbyar bar bya'o/ /yon tan rgya mtsho'i nan tan gyi sgo la dgod par bya'o/ /'di dag la chos rgya mtsho'i ye shes snang ba nye bar bsgrub par bya'o/ /
sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad kyang 'di dag gis mngon par mthong bar bya'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtsho la yang 'di dag gzud par bya'o zhes de lta bu'i bsam pa
dang / yid la bya ba la brtson par kho bos rgya mtsho'i ngogs kyi grong khyer khang pa brtsegs pa 'di na gnas so/ /rigs kyi bu kho bo ni de ltar 'gro ba la phan pa dang / bde ba'i
brtson pa rgya mtsho chen po'i rin po che'i gling thams cad kyang shes so/ /rin po che'i 'byung gnas thams cad dang / rin po che'i rigs thams cad dang / rin po che'i gter
thams cad kyang rab tu shes so/ /klu'i gnas thams cad dang / klu'i 'khrug pa thams cad dang / gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad dang / gnod sbyin 'khrug pa thams cad
dang / srin po'i gnas thams cad dang / srin po'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po'i gnas thams cad dang / 'byung po'i bar chad thams cad
rnam par zhi bar bya ba yang rab tu shes ste/ glong yod pa thams cad dang / glong thams cad bkol ba dang dba' rlabs chen po yongs su spang ba dang / chu'i kha dog
rnam pa tha dad pa 'di rab tu shes so/ /nyi zla dang gza' skar kyi tshogs yongs su 'khor ba dang / nyin zhag dang skad cig dang / yud tsam dang thang gcig kyang rab tu shes so/ /phan tshun du 'gro

ba'i shol 'dums dang / bde mi bde dang / gru'i 'khrul 'khor brtan par bya ba dang / gru bzur ba dang / gru phul ba dang / rlung rdo ba dang / rlung bskyed pa dang / gru bsgyur zhing bzlog pa dang / gru bstod pa dang / gru

btang ba yang rab tu shes so/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bo ni shes pa de lta bu dang ldan pas rtag tu sems can gyi don dang dgos pa byed de/ tshong pa'i tshogs gru brtan pos lam bde zhing nye zhor mi 'gyur la mi
'jigs pa nas/ chos kyi gtams kyis dga' ba dang / spro ba bskyed cing bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rin po che'i gling du phyin par byas nas/ de dag rin po che thams cad kyis mchog ste/ phun sum
tshogs par gyur pa dang / phyir yang 'dzam bu'i gling du 'gyed 'gyed kyang rigs kyi bu kho bo yang bub pa'am/ nye zhor 'gyur ma myong ba ste/ sems can gang gis kho bo mthong bar gyur pa dang /
sems can gang gis kho bo'i chos bstan pa thos pa de dag kyang 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad du nye zhor 'gyur ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya
mtshor 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ /srid pa'i rgya mtsho bskam pa'i don du 'ang rab tu 'jug par 'gyur te/ dus gsum rgya mtsho'i ye shes snang ba rab tu thob po/ /sems can
thams cad sdug bsngal rgya mtsho zad par bya ba'i phyir mngon par mos par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho'i rnyog pa dang bar bya ba'i phyir yang rab tu brtson par 'gyur ro/ /

zhing rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yang brtson 'grus rtsom par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad rgyas par gang ba las kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /'gro ba thams cad kyi

dbang po rgya mtsho tha dad pa'ang khong du chud par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho'i rjes su 'ang 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /'gro ba'i bsam pa rgya mtsho ji lta ba bzhin du yang gzug rnyan

'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa mthong ba dang / thos pa dang 'grogs pa dang / rjes su dran pa'i chu klung gi dbyangs shes bya ba thob par zad na kho bos
byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad du rnam par spyod pa nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad kyis gos pa med pa/ lta ba'i rnam pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad kyi chags pa'i chu srin gyi

'jigs pa dang bral ba/ chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang / gzhi las rnam par rgyu ba/ 'gro ba rgya mtsho thams cad bsdu ba'i dngos pos yongs su bsdud par rgya mtsho dang ldan pa/ thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtsho dang 'grogs pa/ sems can gyi mngon par chags pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu bsrung ba/ dus rgya mtsho thams cad dang / tha mi dad par rnam par spyod pa/ 'gro ba rgya mtsho thams cad
yongs su smin par bya ba'i dmigs pa shes pa/ 'gro ba rgya mtsho thams cad kyi 'dul ba'i bres las mi 'da' bar de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho

phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na grong khyer dga' ba'i phreng ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa zhes bya ba 'dug gi/ de'i drung du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab

par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mnyan pa dpa' bo'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ mnyan pa dpa' bo la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su

bskor ba byas te/ yang dang yang bltas nas gdong mchi mas bkang ste/ ngu zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta bas ma ngoms bzhin du mnyan pa dpa' bo'i drung nas song ngo // //sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba
shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po bcu drug pa/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byams pa chen pos sems can gyi khams tshad med pa rgyas par dgang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ snying rje chen po'i

rlan gyi rgyun mi chad pa/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rgya chen po/ shin tu bstsags pa nyon mongs pa'i rdul dang mun pa dang dri ma dang 'dam thams cad dang bral ba/ chos mnyam pa nyid khong du
chud pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam gyen thur med pa la zhugs pa/ dge ba'i chos tshad med pa la 'jug pa'i sgor zhugs pa/ mi dge ba thams cad kyis mi shigs pa'i brtson 'grus

brtan pa'i mthu sngon du 'dor ba dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu byang ba/ rgya chen po'i bde ba rab tu thob pa/ shes rab kyi nyi ma'i 'od zer snang bas ma
rig pa'i mun pa ma lus pa bsal ba/ thabs kyi ser bu bde zhing bsil bas blags pa'i ye shes kyi me tog gis rgyas pa/ smon lam chen po'i rgya mtshor 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi tshul dang mthun pa/

chos kyi dbyings thams cad du thogs pa med par rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pho brang du thogs pa med par 'gro ba la mngon du gyur pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam la mngon

par mos pa de/ grong khyer dga' ba'i phre ba can gang na ba der phyin te/ tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa yongs su rmed cing tshol tshol ba las/ grong khyer dga' ba'i phreng ba'i shar phyogs logs kyi 'dab cig na/ shing a sho ka'i nags tshal

rgyal mtshan sna tshogs zhes bya ba 'dug pa de'i nang na khyim bdag stong phrag du ma zhig gis bskor te/ grong khyer gyi bya ba sna tshogs yongs su 'gro zhing de las brten te/ bdag tu bya ba thams cad yang dag par gzhom pa dang / yongs su

'dzin pa thams cad gtang ba dang / dngos por 'dzin pa thams cad rab tu spang ba dang / mngon par zhen pa thams cad kyi zhags pa dang / srid pa'i bcing ba thams cad gcad par bya ba dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad kyi

sgo glegs gcad pa dang / the tsom dang yid gnyis dang / nem nur gyi rab rib thams cad rnam par bsal ba dang / g.yo sgyu'i rnyog pa shin tu dang ba dang / phrag dog dang ser sna'i dri ma yongs su sbyang ba dang / sems kyi

mtsho shin tu gsal bar bya ba dang / sems rnyog pa med pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / dad pa rnyog pa med pa'i stobs bskyed de/ sangs rgyas blta bar mos pa bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i stobs

bsngags shing / sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par blang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa smos te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs yongs su bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i shes

rab kyi stobs yang dag par ston cing / byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa'i stobs rnam par dag pa'i mthar phyin par bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi gtam byed cing 'di lta ste/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la mngon

par mos par bya ba'i phyir chos ston cing 'dug pa mthong ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis gtam de'i rjesu chad chad du bsdad nas tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ ring mo zhig

du btud nas chos la shin tu gus pa'i bsam pas tshig 'di skad du brjod do/ /'phags pa bdag ni nor bzangs shes bgyi ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slob par 'gyur ba dang / bslabs nas kyang ji nas sems can

thams cad yongs su smyin par bgyi ba dang / gdul ba'i don la mngon du mos par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhal blta ba las mi 'phangs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos thos par 'gyur ba dang /

sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprin gyi char yongs su bzung ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul la nan tan du bgyi ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa dang / bskal pa

thams cad du gnas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas yongs su mi skyo ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su btsal bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs

yang dag par gnon pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs rnams la snang ba thob par 'gyur ba de ltar 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsol/ de nas tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor

bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu kho bo ni 'di lta ste/ dngos po med pa la gnas pas

mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul thob pa'i mthus/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo thams cad du 'gro ba yongs su sbyong ste/ de ltar kho bo byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i sgo thams cad du

'gro ba 'di la gnas shing / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / mtshe ma'i lha'i gnas thams cad dang / dga' ldan gyi lha'i 'jig rten

thams cad dang / 'phrul dga'i lha'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / bdud kyi gnas thams cad dang / 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i ris su gtogs pa thams cad dang / lha'i

gnas thams cad dang / klu'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / klu'i gnas thams cad dang / gnod sbyin gyi 'jig rten thams cad dang / gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad dang / srin po'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / srin po'i gnas thams cad

dang / grul bum gyi 'jig rten thams cad dang / grul bum gyi gnas thams cad dang / yi dgas kyi 'jig rten thams cad dang / yi dgas kyi gnas thams cad dang / dri za'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / dri za'i gnas thams cad dang / lha ma

yin gyi 'jig rten thams cad dang / lha ma yin gyi gnas thams cad dang / nam mkha' lding gi 'jig rten thams cad dang / nam mkha' lding gi gnas thams cad dang / mi 'am ci'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / mi 'am ci'i gnas thams cad dang / lto 'phye

chen po'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas thams cad dang / mi'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / mi'i gnas thams cad dang / grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang 'dod

pa'i khamasu gtogs pa'i sems can gyi rgyud thams cad du chos ni ston to/ /chos ma yin pa ni bzlog go/ /rtsod pa ni zhi bar byed do/ /'thab pa ni rnam par bzlog go/ /'khrug pa ni nye bar zhi bar byed do/ /g.yul du lhags pa ni rnam par bzlog

go/ /shags 'gyed pa ni zhi bar byed do/ /mdud pa 'dzin pa ni rab tu sel te/ bcings pa thams cad ni yongasu gcod do/ /btson ra thams cad ni mngon par 'dral lo/ /'jigs pa ni rnam par bzlog go/ /mi dge ba'i las kyi 'du byed ni rgyun gcod do/ /srog

gcod pa las ni sems can rnam par zlog go/ /ma byin par len pa dang 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / rdzun du smra ba dang phra ma dang zhe gcod pa dang / tshig khyal pa dang chag sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par

lta ba las ni sems can rnam par zlog go/ /mi bya ba thams cad ni byed du mi 'jug go/ /dge ba'i chos thams cad ni byed du 'jug go/ /sems can thams cad ni bzo thams cad la slob tu mdzud do/ /'jig rten thams cad rab tu dga'

bar bya ba dang sems can yongasu smin par bya ba dang / zhags pa thub pa thams cad la gong ma'i ye shes khyad par du 'phags pa brjod pa'i phyir rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / sangs rgyas

kyi chos thams cad brjod cing bstan pa'i phyir 'jig rten la phan par 'gyur ba'i gtsug lag thams cad kyang ston to/ /rnam par 'god do/ /rab tu gsal bar byed do/ /brtod do/ /de bzhin du tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du gzugs kyi khams

kyi lha thams cad zil gyis mnan te/ chos ston to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du phyogs bcur yang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag du chos ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang nyan thos kyi chos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi

chos kyang ston to/ /sems can dmyal ba yang ston to/ /sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'i lam dang / sems can dmyal ba'i sems can gyi mi bde ba 'ang ston to/ /byol song gi skye gnas kyang ston to/ /byol song

gis skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam du 'gro ba'i lam dang / byol song gi skye gnas su skyes pa'i sdug bsngal yang ston to/ /gshin rje'i 'jig rten yang ston to/ /

gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba'i lam dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal yang ston to/ /mtho ris kyi 'jig rten yang ston to/ /mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du 'gro ba'i lam dang / mtho ris kyi 'jig rten dga' bar

spyod pa dang / longs spyod kyang ston to/ /mi'i 'jig rten yang ston to/ /mi'i 'jig rten gyi rgyud du 'gro ba'i lam dang / mi'i 'jig rten gyi bde ba dang / sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba sna tshogs kyang ston to/ /

de ltar rigs kyi bu kho bo ni 'jig rten gyi chos kyang ston to/ /'jig rten kun 'byung ba dang / 'jig rten nub par 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten gyi kha na ma tho ba dang / 'jig rten gyi 'byung ba yang ston te/ de yang ji ltar byang chub sems

dpa'i lam yang dag par bstan pa dang / 'khor ba'i skyon rnam par bzlog pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yon tan yang dag par brjod pa dang / srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud du mgo 'khor ba dang / sdug bsngal du gyur pa yang dag par

ston pa dang / sgrib pa med pa'i chos nyid brjod pa dang / 'jig rten rgyu'i bya ba yongasu bstan pa dang / 'jig rten 'byung ba dang / lhag pa'i bde ba dang / sdug bsngal thams cad smos pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi gnas kyi ming du bya ba rnam par sgom

pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gnas pa med pa mngon par bstan pa dang / las dang nyon mongs pa'i 'khor lo thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba shin tu brjod pa'i phyir chos ston to/ /rigs kyi bu

kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo thams cad du 'gro ba dngos po med pa la gnas pas mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus brgyan pa 'di shes par zad na kho bos byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mngon par shes pa zhing gi dbyings

thams cad du sgyu ma lta bu'i ye shes kyi lus kyi rgyas par 'gengs pa kun tu lta ba'i ye shes kyi rab tu thob pa tshig gi lam dang / sgra thams cad rnam par dmyigs pa la shin tu gzhol ba'i rna ba dang ldan pa/ dus gsum rgyas par 'gengs pa'i chos kyi sgo snong ba la dbang rab tu

thob pa/ chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i ye shes la dbang gis dbang sgyur ba'i skyes bu dpa'o/ /sems can tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmyigs par bya ba la ma 'dres pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i

lce yangs shing srab la yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ bsam pa tha dad pa'i sems can rgya mtsho'i yid du 'ong ba'i kha dog dang / dbyangs su ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang mnyam pa'i lus sgyu

ma lta bu dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mi gnyis pa'i spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lus la gzhol ba/ dus gsum thams cad du rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa nam mkha'i dbyings ltar tshad

med pa'i spyod yul dpag tu med pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi yul shu ma phyi ma'i mtha' na/ grong khyer ka ling ga'i nags tshal

zhes bya ba yod te/ de na dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan tu bgyi ba dris shig /

de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang ltas te/

tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs mthar gyi yul shu ma phyi ma'i mtha'i grong khyer ka ling ga'i nags gang na ba der song nas/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa yongs su tshol zhing

sems can kun la rmed pa'i tshe/ gang nas gang du song ba de dang der grogs po brgya phrag du ma dang / bu mo brgya phrag du ma zhig srang dang lam gyi gzhi mdo dang / lam gyi sum mdo dag na tshogs te/ rjes su 'brang ngo / /skyes pa brgya phrag du

ma dang / bud med brgya phrag du ma zhig gis kyang rigs kyi bu der dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa ni/ grong khyer ka ling ga'i nags tshal 'di nyid kyi bza' shing gi ra ba chen po rgyal ba'i 'od kyis byin pa nyi ma'i mdog na sems can tshad

med pa'i don du chos ston cing 'dug go zhes ston to/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs bza' shing gi ra ba nyi ma'i mdog der phyin nas kun tu btsal te/ ltas na bza' shing gi ra ba de na/ shing zla ba shar ba zhes bya ba khang pa brtsegs

pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ 'od sna tshogs kyi kha dog can 'od kyi mdog dang ldan pa/ 'khor kun tu dpag tshad kyi khyon tsam du 'od kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa mang po dang / lo ma'i shing yongs su 'gengs pa zhes bya ba gdugs gyi rnam pa dang dbyibasu

'dug pa'i 'dab mas kun nas khebs pa/ bai DUr+ya sngon po'i kha dog ltar 'dug pa'i sprin gyi mdog dang ldan pa mang po dang me tog gi shing me tog mdzod ces bya ba/ ri'i rgyal po kha ba can ltar mdangs dga' ba'i dbyibs sna tshogs dang

ldan pa kha dog sna tshogs kyi me tog mi zad pa'i char 'bebs pa/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i pho brang gi rgyan gyi kun nas 'du ba dang / sus kyang mi shigs pa lta bu mang po dang / shing tog gi shing rtag tu smin pa'i ro dpe med pa'i 'bras

bu'i tshogs shes bya ba gser gyi ri bo'i lhun ltar 'dug pa/ rtag tu shing tog phun sum tshogs par gnas pa mang po rin po che'i rgyal po'i shing rnam par snang ba'i mdzod ces bya ba rin po che'i rgyal po dpe med pa'i dbyibs

ltar 'dug pa/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i phreng ba dang / se mo do dang / rgyan rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i mdzod nas byung ba ltar phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i kha dog grangs med pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa mang

po dang / gos gyi shing dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba lha rdzas kyi gos rin po che'i kha dog sna tshogs kyi tshogs rab tu 'gyed cing 'phyang bas shin tu brgyan pa mang po dang / rol mo'i shing dga' ba bskyed pa zhes bya ba lha rdzas las

kyang lhag pa'i rol mo yid du 'ong ba sgra snyan pa 'byin pa mang po dang / spos kyi shing kun tu zhim pas brgyan pa zhes bya ba phyogs thams cad du thogs pa med par rnam pa thams cad du yid du 'ong ba'i spos kyi ngad 'byung ba

mang po dag kyang yod par mthong / mtshe'u dang lu ma dang / lteng ka dang / rdzing bu rin po che bdun gyi pha gus mtha' brtsigs pa/ phyogs bzhi nas rin po che'i them skas btsugs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi khri 'phang dus dang

'thun pa'i tsan dan gyi dri zhim pos bskus pa/ kun nas bskor ba/ gzhi rin po che'i rgyal po bai DUR+Ya sngon po las legs par blangs pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi bye ma bdal ba yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu lha

rdzas kyi dri yid du 'ong ba can gyis yongs su gang ba/ rin po che'i pad mo dang / ut+pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / me tog pun+da dang / ri ka kha dog sna tshogs lha rdzas kyi bsung dang ldan pas/ chu kun nas yog pa/ bya bran sna tshogs kyi khyu

mchog lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i gzugs yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ sgra snyan pa 'byin cing brjod pas gang ba/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gi phreng ba legs par bkye bas/ yongasu brgyan pa dang ldan pa shing sna tshogs

de dag gi drung thams cad du'ang rin po che'i seng ge'i khri sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa du mas brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi stan rin po che sna tshogs

'brel bar bting ba/ lha rdzas kyi spos dang / bdug spos kyi rnam pa thams cad kyis bdug pa/ lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i dar rin po che mngon par spyangs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi bla re bgyi ba/ rin po che sna tshogs

dang 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi dra ba sna tshogs kun nas bres pa/ rin po che'i dril bu dra ba yid du 'ong zhing snyan pa'i sgra 'byin pa/ mang pos brgyan pa/ 'khor du lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i stan brgya stong phrag du ma bting zhing

bshams pa mthong ngo / /rin po che'i shing drung la lar ni seng+ge'i khri rin po che'i pad+mo'i snying po can bshams pa mthong ngo / /la lar ni seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che'i spos kyi rgyal po'i pad mo'i snying po byas pa

bshams pa mthong ngo / /la lar ni seng+ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po klu'i rgyan gyi pad mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo / /la lar ni seng+ge'i khri nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge'i bya ba'i pad mos snying po byas pa bshams

pa mthong ngo / /la lar ni seng+ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba'i pad mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo / /la lar ni seng+ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po phyogs rnam par snang ba'i pad mos snying po byas pa bshams pa

mthong ngo / /la lar ni seng+ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po dbang po'i rdo rje'i pad mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo / /la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po yid du 'ong ba'i pad mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo / /rin po

che'i shing drung la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po mdog dkar po'i pad mos byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo / /bza' shing gi ra ba de'i gzhi thams cad kyang rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongasu gang zhing rgya mtsho chen po ltar rin po che'i

gling gis yongasu gang ba mthong ngo / /bai DUR+Ya sngon po'i dam pas spras te/ rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i sa phyogs ka tsa lin da ltar reg na bde zhing 'jam pa yang ba gom pa bor zhing bteg pa'i tshe mtho dman med pa/ rdo rje rin po

che mchog gi pad+mo dri yid du 'ong bar zhim zhing reg na bde ba'i sil ma kun tu bkram pa/ ngang ngur dang / rma bya dang / khrung khrung dang / ku na la dang / ka la ping ka dang / ko ki la dang / dzi pan dzi ba ka sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i nga

ro 'byin pa mang pos gang ba/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i tsan dan gyi shing mang po nags tshal shin tu legs par 'grigs pas brgyan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi pad+mo'i sprin gyi char dang / rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs mi zad pa'i

char rgyun tu 'bab pa/ 'dres pa'i nags tshal las kyang khyad par du 'phags pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang bu brtsegs pa brgyan par bkod pa'i nang nas/ spos kyi rgyal po'i bdug spos rin thang med pa rtag tu 'thul zhing dri zhim pa
lha'i mdun sa chos bzang po'i rgyan las kyang lhag par brgyan pa/ lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i rin po che'i dra ba sna tshogs kyis kun tu bres pa/ mu tig rin po che'i me tog gi phreng ba dang /

lda ldi kun nas 'brel bas rab tu brgyan pa/ rin po che'i dril bu rnam pa sna tshogs su rnam par bkye ba'i gser gyi dra ba 'bar bas/ kun nas dkrigs pa/ rol mo'i shing dang / rin po che'i ta la las dril bu'i

dra ba rlung gis legs par bskyod pas yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan pa'i dbyangs 'byung ba dang ldan pa/ dbang bsgyur gyi lha'i rgyal po'i lha mo dpe tshul shin tu bzang ba rnams kyis glu snyan pa'i sgra rab tu yid du 'ong ba blang pa/

lha rdzas kyi yid bzhin gyi gos kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pas rnam par mdzes pa/ rgya mtsho chen po ltar kha dog dang / mdog sna tshogs su ldan pas blta na gtang myi bra ba/ khang pa brtsegs pa rin

po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa brgya stong grangs myed pas rab tu brgyan pa/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i pho brang ltar blta na bzang ba/ rin po che sna tshogs rnam par phye bas rnam pa thams cad du brgyan pa'i gdugs

shin tu legs pa/ rnam par bsgreng zhing bkram pas kun nas blta na mdzes pa dang / dbang po chen po'i 'jig rten ltar shin tu mdzes pa'i pha gu sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ yid du 'ong ba'i 'od snang ba chen po

rtag par 'byung ba/ tshangs pa chen po'i gzhal myed khang ltar nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba yid du 'ong ba'i 'od kyis 'bar ba ste/ bza' shing gi ra ba chen po nyi ma'i mchog ces bya ba de/ dge slong

ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu stobs dang / byin gyi brlabs che zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa'i gnas su gyur pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs

shing tshad med de/ rgya chen po dang ldan pa mthong ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang kyis de ltar yon tan tshad myed pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa tshogs pa'i bza' shing gi ra ba'i rgyan byang chub sems

dpa'i las kyi rnam par smin pas yongs su grub pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po las skyes pa/ sangs rgyas la mchod cing rim gror byas pa'i rgyu 'thun pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa las

byung ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ma lus pas myi 'phrogs pa/ chos kyi rang bzhin sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bus grub pa/ dge ba'i bsod nams dri ma myed pa rgya chen pos grub cing

byung ba/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i sngon gyi spyod pa bzang po legs par byas pa dang / rgyu 'thun pa'i stobs dang / shugs kyis byung ba nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / thun mong ma
yin pa/ mu stegs can dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa/ bdud kyi lam yongs su rgyu ba thams cad kyis myi tshugs pa/ byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis bltar med pa mthong ste/

shing sna tshogs de dag gi drung gi seng ge'i khri chen po de dag la 'ang dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa/ lus shin tu mdzes pa/ spyod lam zhi ba/ dbang po zhi ba/ yid zhi ba/ shin tu dben pa/ dbang po dul ba/

glang po ltar shin tu dul ba/ mtsho ltar dang zhing rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po yid bzhin gyi nor bu ltar 'dod pa thams cad bsgrub pa/ pad mo la chus mi chags pa ltar 'jig rten gyi chos kyis
ma gos pa/ seng ge ltar 'jigs pa dang / skyi g.ya' ba myed pa/ mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pas/ ri'i dbang po chen po ltar myi sgul ba/ tshul khrims rnam par dag pas yid du 'ong ba'i spos kyi rgyal po

ltar 'gro ba'i sems tshim par byed pa/ kha ba'i tsan dan ltar nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ sman gyi rgyal po blta na bzang ba ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rnam par byang ba/ chu'i

lha'i zhags pa ltar blta na don yod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'di ltar lus dang sems kyi bag yangs bde ba bskyed pa/ tshangs pa chen po ltar 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi kun nas ldang ba dang

bral ba/ rin po che'i rgyal po nor bu chu 'dang ltar nyon mongs pas rnyog pa can du gyur pa'i sems can gyi sems rab tu dang bar bya ba/ zhing gshin pa ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa 'dug
par mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan de dag la'ang 'khor sna tshogs 'khod par mthong ste/ 'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i bu dbang po chen po la stsogs pa/ gtsang ma'i gnas kyi rigs su gtogs pa'i

lha'i bu rnams 'khod cing dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo rnam par thar pa myi zad pa yang dag par 'byed pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni tshangs pa
yid du 'ong ba la stsogs pa/ tshangs pa'i ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams 'khod cing dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/ gzhi kun nas 'byung ba

zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur ba la stsogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dag 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge

rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i dbang gis rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po
rab 'phrul dga' la stsogs pa/ 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo thams cad dge bas rnam par brgyan pa zhes

bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan la stsogs pa rab dga' ldan gyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong

ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo rang gi sems kyi mdzod kyi glong zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma la stsogs pa lha'i bu mo 'khor dang bcas pa

rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo rgyan mtha' yas pa/ bya ba yang dag par bstan pa zhes bya ba mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po brgya byin la stsogs

pa sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo skye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa

mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni klu'i rgyal po gangs chen mtsho la stsogs pa klu'i rgyal po 'od brgya pa dang / dga' bo dang nye dga' bo dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / shugs ldan dang / ma dros pa la stsogs pa klu'i

bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa klu'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / yul gyi 'od kyi brgyan ces bya ba yang dag par

bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni rgyal po chen po ngal bsos la stsogs pa gnod sbyin gyi dbang po gnod sbyin gyi bu mo dang / gnod sbyin gyi byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge

slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i mdzod ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni dri za'i rgyal po gnas srun po la stsogs

pa dri za mang po dri za'i bu mo dang / dri za'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo dga' ba mi zad pa char rab tu 'beb pa zhes bya ba yang dag

par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan la stsogs pa lha ma yin rnams lha ma yin gyi bu mo dang / lha ma yin gyi byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing /

dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo chos kyi dbyings shes pa'i tshul gyi shugs kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni nam mkha' lding gi dbang po

shugs 'dzin chen po la stsogs pa nam mkha' lding gi dbang po nam mkha' lding gi bu mo dang / nam mkha' lding gi byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/

chos kyi sgo srid pa'i rgya mtshos 'jigs pa'i yul zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po la stsogs pa/ mi'am ci'i dbang po mi 'am ci'i bu mo dang /

mi'am ci'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa snang ba zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor

gyi stan la la la ni lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po khro gnyer gdong la stsogs pa/ lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo dang / lto 'phye chen po'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par

bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas la dga' ba skye ba zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang bu mo brgya stong mang po 'khod cing / dge slong ma

seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo khyad par du 'gro ba zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni srin po'i dbang po rtag tu mdangs 'phrog pa sdong ba'i rgyal po la stsogs pa srin po'i

bu mo dang / srin po'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo snying po 'byung ba zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la

la la ni sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa la mos pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo ye shes khyad par du 'phags pa'i mthu zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor

gyi stan la la la ni sems can rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mos pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya chen po'i 'od ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa

mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni sems can theg pa chen po la mos pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes snang ba'i sgo kun tu sgo zhes bya ba yang dag

par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' thog mar sems bskyed pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi smon lam gyi phung po zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/

ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rdul dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa gsum pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par

bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu zhi ba'i rgyan ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa bzhi pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par

bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad mkhyen pa'i shugs kyi yul 'byung ba zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa lnga pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod

cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sems kyi rgyud me tog gi snying po zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa drug pa la

gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnam par snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa'

sa bdun pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sa kun nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub

sems dpa' sa brgyad pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo chos kyi dbyings su lus shin tu rnam par phye ba'i yul zhes bya ba yang dag par bsten pa

mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa dgu pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo myi dmyigs pa'i stobs kyi gnas kyis brgyan pa zhes

bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sgrib pa med pa'i dkyil

'khor ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni lag na rdo rje'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo ye shes rdo rje mthu bo che'i rgyan ces bya ba

yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /de ltar skye ba'i skye mched rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad kyi sems can du gdags pa dang / sems can gyi lam gyi rgyud ji snyed pa de dag gi sems can yongs su smin pa rnam par 'dul ba/

snod du gyur pa ji snyed cig bza' shing gi ra ba der 'ongs shing / 'khor gyi stan la so sor 'khod pa/ bsam pa tha dad pa mos pa mi mtshungs pa/ bsam pa shin tu gzhol bar gyur pa/ dad pa'i ro rngams chen po dang ldan pa

rnams la/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba/ de lta de ltar chos bstan pa mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni

dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa des kun tu lta ba'i btang snyoms dang ldan pa la stsogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad shin tu bstan pa la stsogs pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi

tha dad pa la stsogs pa dang / sgrib pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'thor ba la stsogs pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i sems yang dag par 'byung ba la stsogs pa dang / khyad par yod pa'i rgyan la
stsogs pa dang / chags pa med pa'i tshul gyi snying po la stsogs pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la stsogs pa dang / sems kyi mdzod la stsogs pa dang / kun tu mos pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i

snying po la stsogs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo brgya stong grangs med pa gnon pa'i phyir te/ bza' shing gi ra ba nyi ma'i mdog der byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ sems can gzhan ji snyed cig dge slong

ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa la lta ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'ong ba de dag thams cad kyang sngon/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ dge ba'i chos yang dag par blang ba la shin tu bkod nas/ bla na

med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i bar du byas pa sha stag go/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i bza' shing gi ra ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /
nags tshal phun sum tshogs pa dang / gtsug lag khang phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'chag sa phun sum tshogs pa dang / longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang / mal cha phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'khor gyi

dkyil 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang / dbang chen po phun sum tshogs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / dbyangs kyi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa de lta bu mthong ste/ chos kyi

tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di thos nas/ chos kyi sprin gyi char chen pos sems mngon par brlan pa de'i yid la byed pa dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ bsam pa rnam par dag pa phun sum tshogs

par byas kyis da ni g.yas phyogs su bskor ba lan brgya stong du ma zhig bya'o snyam pa dang / de'i mod la dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ bza' shing gi ra ba dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du bcas pa

de dag thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /de ltar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba bya'o/ /snyam du bsams nas bskor ba byed pa'i tshe/ 'khor thams cad na'ang dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa
'dug pa mthong nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas
byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do/ /zhes bdag
gis thos na/ 'phags ma ji ltar na byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ des smras pa/ rigs kyi
bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rlom sems thams cad yongs su bcom pa zhes bya ba thob pa'o/ /smras pa/ 'phags ma byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rlom sems thams cad
yongs su bcom pa de'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/ smras pa rigs kyi bu de ni ye shes snang ba ste/ dus gsum du byung ba'i rgyan sems skad cig gi cha shas la rnam par dmigs pa'i rang bzhin no/ /

smras pa/ 'phags ma ye shes snang ba de'i yul yang ji lta bu zhig mchis/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ni ye shes snang ba 'di la sgrub pa dang yongs su bsgrub pa'i tshe chos thams cad rab tu 'thad pa zhes bya ba'i ting
nge 'dzin skyes te/ ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag du yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus kyis phyogs bcu thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa

dga' ldan gyi pho brang na bzhugs pa/ thams cad re re la yang lus sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mchod pa rnam pa tha dad pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul

shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mchod pa sbyar ba'i phyir 'gro ste/ 'di ltar lha'i lus dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang /

mi dang mi ma yin pa'i dbang po'i lus me tog gi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / spos kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / bdug spos kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / phreng ba'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / byug
pa'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / phye ma'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / na bza'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / gdugs kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rgyal mtshan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin

pa dang / ba dan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i lhab lhub kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i dra ba'i rgyan gyi sprin yongasu 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i gnam yol gyi rgyan gyi sprin

yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i rgyan rnam par phye ba'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i sgron ma'i rgyan kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i gdan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa mang
pos mchod pa sbyar ba'i phyir 'gro'o/ /dga' ldan kyi gnas na bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa rnams la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ ji ltar 'gro ba de bzhin du yum gyi
skur gshegs pa dang / bltam pa dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / snying po byang chub tu gshegs pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas shing snying po byang chub la bzhugs pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / de bzhin du lha'i gnas na bzhugs pa dang /
klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i gnas na bzhugs pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad

kyi sems dang bsam pa yongs su tshim par mdzad nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar de dag thams cad la'ang yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus rnam pa de lta bu dag gis rnam pa de lta bu'i mchod pa byed cing /
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'gro'o/ /sems can gang gis kho mo sangs rgyas mchod pa dang / rim gro byed pa'i las 'di shes par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro/ /sems can gang kho mo'i drung du 'ong ba de dag thams cad la'ang kho mo ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa 'di nyid ston ste/
rigs kyi bu kho mo ye shes kyi mig gis sems can thams cad la lta yang / sems can gyi 'du shes kyang mi bskyed la/ rlom sems kyang mi byed do/ /'gro ba thams cad kyi skad rgya mtsho yang
mnyan te/ tshig gi lam thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pas/ rlom sems su byed pa med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mthong ste/ chos kyi lus yongs su shes
pas rlom sems su byed pa'ang med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su 'dzin kyang / chos kyi rang bzhin khong du chud pas rlom sems su byed pa med do/ /sems
kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs kyang / chos nyid sgyu ma'i rang bzhin khong du chud pas rlom sems su byed pa myed do/ /rigs kyi bu kho mos ni byang chub sems dpa'i
rnam par thar pa rlom sems thams cad yongs su bcom pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa la zhugs pa/ chos thams cad la rlom sems med

par gnas kyang skyil mo dkrung gcig gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rang gi lus su 'dus par ston kyang / skad cig gcig gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung

du 'dong ba/ lus la sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul thams cad 'byung zhing rgyu ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa ba spu'i nyag ma gcig gis sbams shing mngon par 'phen pa/ rang gi ba spu'i bu gar
'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa 'du ba dang / 'jig pa'i bskal pa yongs su ston pa/ skad cig gcig la bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par gnas pa/ mnyam pa nyid

kyis yang dag par 'dzud pa/ skad cig gcig gis brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bskal par 'khor ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi

rgyud 'di nyid kyi yul bgrod dka' ba na/ grong khyer rin po che'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems

dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge slong

ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs

shes rab kyi snang ba chen po des sems snang bar gyur pa de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shes rab kyi snang ba de la ni sems/ chos nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi stobs snang ba de la ni yang dag par rjes su blta/ sems can

thams cad kyi skad rnam par dmyigs pa'i mdzod kyi gzungs kyi tshul de ni brtan par byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi tshul de ni shin tu rgya cher

byed/ snying rje chen po 'gro ba thams cad kyi skyabs su gyur pa'i stobs de ni nye bar ston/ chos thams cad kyi tshul snang ba'i sgo nas yang dag par 'byung ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs de la ni rab

tu rtog /chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor rgyas par 'gengs pa'i smon lam yongs su dag pa de'i rjes su ni 'brang / chos thams cad kyi phyogs snang bar byed pa'i ye shes kyi 'od de ni shin tu
gsal bar byed/ chos thams cad kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba rgyas par 'gengs pa'i mngon par shes pa'i stobs de ni mngon par bsgrub/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang /

dran pa thams cad nye bar blangs pas brtsams pa mthar dbyung ba'i smon lam de ni yongs su rdzogs par byed cing / mthar gyis yul bgrod dka' ba'i grong khyer rin po che'i rgyan gang na ba der phyin te/ bcom pa
ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma yongs su tshol tshol ba dang / de la bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen gyi yon tan mngon par mi shes la ye shes kyi spyod yul gyi tshul la mi mkhas pa'i mi ji snyed pa de dag 'di

snyam du sems te/ mi 'di de ltar zhi zhing dul ba'i dbang po dang ldan la de ltar shes bzhin dang ldan te/ de ltar 'khrul pa med cing de ltar yid 'khrug pa med la de ltar gnya' shing gang tsam du lta ste/

de ltar gnod pas mi tshugs shing de ltar mtshan mar mi 'dzin la/ gzugs kyi rnam pa thams cad la g.yeng ba med pa'i mig dang ldan te/ yid la brel ba med cing / bsam pa zab la mngon par mdzes te/ rgya mtsho

ltar 'dug cing sems mi nyams mi 'khrug pa de la bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen mas ko ci zhig bya/ 'di lta bu dag ni 'dod chags la dga' ba med de/ sems phyin ci log dang ldan yang mi srid do/ /'di lta bu dag ni sdug

cing gtsang ba'i 'du shes yongs su rgyu ba med de/ 'di lta bu dag ni 'dod pas 'khol kyang mi srid do/ /'di lta bu dag ni bud med kyi dbang du 'gyur ba med de/ 'di lta bu dag ni bdud kyi spyod yul la spyod kyang mi srid do/ /'di lta

bu dag ni bdud kyi spyod yul la chags pa med de/ 'di lta bu dag ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba yang mi srid do/ /'di lta bu dag ni bdud kyi zhags pas bcings par 'gyur ba med do/ /dogs pa byed kyang mi srid do snyam mo/ /gang

yang bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i yon tan gyi khyad par mngon par shes shing / ye shes kyi spyod yul mngon du gyur pa de dag ni 'di skad ces 'dzer te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma la yongs

su dri bar sems pa ni khyod kyang 'thob par bya ba legs par thob pa ste/ legs so legs so/ /khyod ni nges par sangs rgyas su smon pa'o/ /khyod ni bdag nges par sems can thams cad kyi gnas su 'gyur bar 'dod pa'o/ /

khyod ni nges par sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags kyi zug rngu dbyung bar 'dod pa'o/ /khyod ni nges par sdug cing gtsang ba'i 'du shes rnam par gtor bar 'dod pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu 'di re bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma ni

grong khyer gyi lam gyi sum mdo'i byang phyogs logs shig na rang gi khyim na 'dug go/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis tshig de thos nas dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom pa ma lha'i

bshes gnyen ma'i khyim gang na ba der phyin nas/ de'i khyim che zhing yangs la rin po che'i ra ba rim pa bcus bskor ba/ rin po che ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bcus kun nas bskor ba/ 'obs spos chus gang ba/ lha rdzas kyi

rin po che'i pad mo dang / ud pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / me tog pun da ri kas chu yongs su khebs pa yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang ba de'i gzhi gser gyi bye ma bdal ba/ spos yid du 'ong ba dang /

'dres pa'i dri zhim pas gang ba/ rin po che sil ma mang pos shin tu brgyan pa/ rim pa bcus kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che thams cad las byas pa'i khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pas rnam par

dkrigs shing ba gam dang rta babs dang / skar khung gi shar bu dang / zla gam seng ge'i shing tog dang / snang ba'i rgyal mtshan la stsogs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od kyis 'bar ba rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs grangs med pa'i 'byung

gnas kyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i dag ra bai DUr+yas spras pa'i gzhi dang ldan pa/ lha rdzas kyi spos zhim po thams cad kyis 'khor thams cad nas bdugs shing bsangs pa/ a ka ru nag po mchog gi bdug spos kyis dri zhim par bdug pa/

spos kyi byug pas 'khor kun nas byugs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi lan kun kyis rtsig ngos kun tu bres pa/ steng 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi dra ba rin po che sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pas kun nas bkab pa/

gser gyi dril bu dra ba brgya stong rlung gis bskyod cing 'khrol ba'i sgra yid du 'ong zhing snyan pa 'byung ba/ rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi sprin sil ma kun tu bkram pas/ rin po che'i me tog gi rgyan dang ldan pa/ rin po

che sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng bas sgo shin tu brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od kyi dra ba snang ba/ mu med par brjod du yod pa/ rin po che bai DUr+ya'i sdong po dang / rdo rje man shel la stsogs
pa'i gter brgya stong kun shes pa/ phun sum tshogs pas mdzod mi zad pa dang ldan pa/ bza' shing gi ra ba chen po bcus brgyan pa mthong ste/ de na bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma gzugs mdzes shing

bzang la blta na sdug pa/ gya nom pa'i kha dog dam pas rgyas pa dang ldan pa/ gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa'i mdog can skra mthon ting du 'dug pa/ lus kyi yan lag dang nying lag tshul dang 'dra bar rnam par grub
pa/ 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha dang mi thams cad las 'phags pa'i kha dog dang gzugs dang dbyibs mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ tshangs pa las kyang 'das pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad

kyi sgra skad kyi tshul la mkhas pa brgyan thams cad dang ldan zhing yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs can rnam par thar pa yi ge 'khor lo rgyan la mkhas pa dang ldan pa/ bzo dang gtsug lag thams cad la mkhas par byang ba/ chos kyi

ye shes sgyu ma la mkhas par bslabs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i thabs dang / tshul rnam pa thams cad thob pa/ rin po che'i lhab lhub sna tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan pa'i lus yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ rin po

che thams cad las byas pa'i dra ba 'od shin tu gsal bas lus rab tu brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che'i rgyan dang / lhab lhub grangs med pas rab tu brgyan pa/ lus shin tu 'bar ba/ nor bu rin po

che dam pa yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i cod pan thogs pa/ rin po che bai DUr+ya'i phreng ba mdo zungs rdo rje rin po che sna tshogs dang / nor bu rin po che seng ges mdzes pa sna tshogs bkye ba mgul na thogs pa/ dge ba'i

rtsa ba spyad pa la bskal pa 'thun pa dang / smon lam gcig pa'i 'khor mang po gzhan gyis mi phyed cing yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po'i gter mi zad pa'i mdzod dang ldan pa

'dug pa mthong ste/ de khyim de dag thams cad dang / rin po che'i gnas dang / gzhal med khang gi rgyan de dag thams cad kyang rang gi lus las byung ba'i 'od dga' bar byed pa/ lus bde ba dang sim pa bskyed

pa/ sems khong nas dga' bar byed pas gsal bar snang bar byas pa mthong ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mdun du

'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la
bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ ji ltar byang chub
sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba 'phags mas bdag la bshad du gsol/ des smras pa rigs kyi bu kho mos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam

par thar pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin pa zhes bya ba thob ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo ni lha rnams la lha mo'i gzugs dang kha dog dang / dbyibs dang chu zheng las kyang lhag par kha dog gsal ba dang /

rnam par dag pas ci la mos pa bzhin du snang bar byed do/ /de bzhin du klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma
yin pa rnams la yang bud med gyi gzugs dang / kha dog dang dbyibs dang / chu zheng lhag par 'od gsal zhing rnam par dag pas ci la mos pa bzhin du snang bar byed do/ /sems can gang 'dod chags

gyis kun nas 'khor ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag /kho mo'i drung du 'ong na'ang de dag thams cad la kho mo ni 'dod chags dang 'bral bar 'gyur ba'i phyir chos bstan te/ de dag gis chos de thos nas kyang 'dod

chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten la chags pa med pa zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob po/ /la la ni kho mo mthong ma thag tu 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur te/

byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dga' ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba rab tu 'thob po/ /la la ni gtam byas pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chags pa

med pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob po/ /la la ni lag nas bzung ba tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rjes su

'gro zhing gnas pa zhes bya ba rab tu 'thob po/ /la la ni gcig tu 'grogs pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bral bas snang ba zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob

bo/ /la la ni bltas pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu zhi ba'i rnam par brgyan ces bya ba yang rab tu thob po/ /la la ni glal ba tsam gyis 'dod

chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phas kyi rgol ba rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob po/ /la la ni mig btsums pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob

par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi yul snang ba zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo/ /la la ni pang du 'khyud pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba 'thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub

sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad yongs su sdud cing myi gtong ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob po/ /la la ni 'o byas pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba 'thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting

nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad bsod nams kyi mdzod la reg par byed pa zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob po/ /de ltar kho mo ni sems can gang ji snyed gcig kho mo'i drung du 'ong ba de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i rnam

par thar pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i chags pa med pa la mngon du gyur pa 'di nyid la rab tu 'god do/ /smras pa/ 'phags ma khyod de lta bu'i phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa de khyod kyis

dge ba'i rtsa ba ni gang du bskyed/ 'phrin las ni ji lta bu zhig bstsags/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho mos dran na 'das pa'i dus shig na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen
pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo bsgyur ba/ lha dang mi'i ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shin tu mtho bar gshegs pa
zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu mtho bar gshegs pa de sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i don tu rgyal po'i gnas sgo bzang po zhes bya bar gshegs nas sgo'i them pa la

zhabs kyis gnon pa'i tshe/ grong khyer de thams cad kyang / rab tu g.yos nas yangs shing rgya che la rin po che du ma las byas par yongs su gyur te/ steng gi bar snang yang rin po che mang po'i 'od kyis rnam par

brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rol mo sna tshogs kyi sgra rab tu 'byung ba dang / lha'i lus kyi sprin tshad med pa rgya che bas khebs par gyur to/ /

rigs kyi bu kho mo yang de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi chung ma zhig du gyur te/ blo gros bzang mo zhes bya'o/ /de nas kho mo cho 'phrul gyis yang dag par bskul nas khyim thab dang lhan cig tu 'dong dong ste/ de bzhin

gshegs pa grong bar gyi srang du gshegs pa la dad pa rgya chen po skyes te/ kho mos ni rin po che'i dril bu gcig gcig 'phul lo/ /de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu

mtho bar gshegs pa'i zham 'bring na 'dug ste/ des kho mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar

phyin pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i thabs dang ye shes mtha' yas pa la gnas pa/ bsod nams rgya che zhing yangs pa'i mdzod dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi yul la thub pa med pa de dag

gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na grong khyer dge ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na khyim bdag nan khugs shes bya ba de bzhin

gshegs pa'i mchod rten tsan dan gyi khri 'phang can la mchod pa byed pa zhig 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba

dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su

bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis grong khyer dge ba'i pha rol tu phyin par khyim bdag nan khugs kyi khyim
ga la ba der phyin nas/ khyim bdag nan khugs kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni
byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do/ /zhes bdag gis thos nas/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar
nan tan du bgyi ba 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsol/ des smras pa rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa yongs su mi zad pa thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu kho bo'i sems kyi rgyud
las ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas kyang / sems can 'dul ba'i dbang du mdzad pa ma gtogs par 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas kyang shin tu mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshul du de bzhin
gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa med do/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba med do/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba med do/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bo ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i

mchod rten tsan dan gyi khri 'phang gyi sgo 'byed pa ste/ kho bo mchod rten gyi sgo 'byed pas byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi zad pa'i rgyan ces bya ba thob bo/ /rigs kyi bu

kho bo ni ting nge 'dzin 'di la sems kyi skad cig skad cig du mnyam par gzhag ste/ sems kyi skad cig thams cad la'ang khyad par gyi rnam pa du ma rab tu thob bo/ /smras pa/ 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin de'i
yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/ smras pa rigs kyi bu kho bo ni ting nge 'dzin 'di la snyoms par zhugs pa'i tshe/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'di sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bsod bskyabs
la stsogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / gser thub dang log par dad sel dang / thams cad mnga' ba dang / gtsug tor dang rnam par gzigs dang rgyal ba dang / rdzogs mdzad dang / grags
mchog dang / pad mo'i blo la stsogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang sangs rgyas mthong ba'i mtshams 'brel bas/ sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i tshul gyis mngon

sum du mthong ste/ sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas brgya yang mthong ngo / /de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas stong yang mthong ngo / /de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas brgya phrag stong yang

mthong ngo / /de bzhin du sangs rgyas bye ba dang / sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgya dang / sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong dang / sangs rgyas bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dang / sangs rgyas

bye ba dung phyur dang / sangs rgyas bye ba thams cad dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dang / de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas 'byung ba gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa

dag kyang mthong ngo / /de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong ngo / /de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du

med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis thugs dang po bskyed pa'i tshogs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la'ang 'jug go/ /thugs dang po bskyed

pas 'thob pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la'ang 'jug go/ /smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa mngon par bsgrub pa rnam par dag pa la'ang 'jug go/ /spyod pa rnam par dag pa la'ang 'jug go/ /pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
par mdzad pa la'ang 'jug go/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa la'ang 'jug go/ /bzod pa brnyes pa rnam par dag pa la'ang 'jug go/ /bdud kyi dkrugs ma rnam par 'thor ba'i khyu

mchog gi mthu phyung ba la 'jug go/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan la 'jug go/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag par mdzad pa rnam pa tha dad pa la'ang 'jug go/ /sems can

yongs su smyin par mdzad pa rnam pa tha dad pa la'ang 'jug go/ /'khor kun nas 'dus pa rnam pa tha dad pa la 'jug go/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa la 'jug go/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i khyu
mchog gi mthu phyung ba la 'jug go/ /sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul la'ang 'jug go/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis chos bstan pa la 'ang shin tu rnam par gsal

ba dang / ma 'dres par dran te/ yang dag par 'dzin to/ /dran pas yongs su bcangs so/ /rig pas rab tu shes par byed do/ /blo gros kyis shin tu rnam par 'byed do/ /blos rtogs par byed do/ /shes rab kyis

snang bar byed do/ /ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa byams pa la stsogs pa dag kyang mthong zhing shes te/ sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas brgya yang mthong ngo / /de'i 'og ma'i sems

kyis sangs rgyas stong yang mthong ba nas/ de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag kyang mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs
pa de dag gis thugs dang po bskyed pa'i tshogs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la'ang 'jug go/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis chos bstan pa yang shin tu gsal ba dang / ma 'dres par rjes su dran
te yang dag par 'dzin to/ /dran pas yongs su bcangs so/ /rigs pas rab tu shes par byed do/ /blo gros rnam par 'byed do/ /blo gros kyis rtogs par byed do/ /shes rab kyis snang bar byed do/ /

ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'di sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mthar gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa mthong zhing shes pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'das pa

dang / ma 'ongs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa thams cad kyang shes shing mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis thugs

dang po bskyed pa'i tshogs gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa la'ang 'jug go/ /sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa de la'ang rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / mi zad pa dang / dad pas shes par bya ba dang / byang chub
sems dpa'i brtson 'grus dang / zhe non pas khong du chud par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi shugs rnam par 'phel bar byed pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad dang / nyan thos dang /
rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / de'i yul la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa shes shing khong du chud par byed do/ /rnam par snang mdzad la stsogs pa da ltar byung ba'i
de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad kyang mthong zhing shes te/ sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas brgya yang mthong zhing
