shes so/ /de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas stong yang mthong ba nas/ de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
kyi bar yang mthong ste/ nam de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi zhal blta bar dga' ba de'i tshe 'ang de bzhin du mthong ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bstan pa dang / bstan pa mdzad pa

dang / bstan par 'gyur ba de dag kyang thos so/ /thos nas kyang 'dzin to/ /dran pas yongs su bcangs so/ /rig pas rab tu shes par byed do/ /blo gros kyis rnam par byed do/ /blo gros kyis rnam par byed do/ /shes rab kyis
snang bar byed do/ /rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i mthar phyin pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum skad cig
gcig tu shes pa rab tu thob pa/ skad cig gcig gi cha shas la ting nge 'dzin rnam par phye ba la spyod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma 'byung ba rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa thams cad mnyam pa
nyid du khong du chud pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin rjes su rtogs pa/ bdag dang sems can dang / sangs rgyas mi gnyis par spyod pa/ rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i
chos kyi rgyan kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi 'khrul 'khor kyis 'jig rten gyi dra ba 'gengs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho thams cad dang / mi 'gal bar rnam par spyod pa/
chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rtogs par byed pa'i ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos bstan pa rnam par rig par byed pa'i ye shes kyi yul can de dag gi spyod pa
shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na ri gru 'dzin ces bya ba yod de/ de na byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po zhes
bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba dris shig ces nas de'i tshe/ tshigs su bcad
pa 'di gnyis smras so/ /song shig nor bzangs dpal gyi chu rgyal dbung zhig na/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis ri rgyal gru 'dzin mdzes pa yod/ /rin chen rgyus byas shing dang nags tshal me tog mang / /
bza' shing ra ba rdzing dang chu bran 'bab par bstan/ /ri mchog de la brtan par spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang / /'gro ba rnams la phan pa'i don du rnam par spyod/ /de'i gan song dang nor bzangs khyod
la mgon po yis/ /yon tan rgya chen tshul la 'jug pa ston par byed/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis khyim bdag nan khugs kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ khyim bdag
nan khugs la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ yang dang yang bltas nas khyim bdag nan khugs kyi drung nas song ngo // //
sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po bcu bdun pa/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs khyim bdag nan khugs kyi gdams ngag rjes
su sems shing / byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa'i mdzod de ni shes par byed/ byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su dran pa'i stobs de ni rjes su dran par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul gcig nas
gcig tu brgyud pa'i stobs ni yang dag par 'dzin to/ /sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i mtshams ni khong du chud par byed/ rnas thos pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan de dag gi rjes su 'brang /

sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pa'i tshul de dang ni 'thun par byed/ sangs rgyas kyis yang dag par bsgrub pa'i rgyan de ni khong du chud par byed/ sangs rgyas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu

phyung ba de la ni yid ches par byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las bsam gyis mi khyab pa de ni mngon du byed cing / mthar gyis ri gru 'dzin gang na ba der 'ongs nas/ ri gru 'dzin gyi steng du phyin te/

byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po yongs su rmed cing tshol tshol ba las/ nub phyogs logs kyi ri sman ljongs mtsho dang / 'tshe'u dang 'bab chus mdzes par gyur pa/ bai DUr+ya sngon po'i

dkyil 'khor ltar sngo zhing 'jam la/ gzhon pa'i spang nags tshal chen po'i mthongs na 'dug pa zhig na/ rin po che'i rdo rje'i rdo stegs shig la skyil mo dkrung bcas te 'dug cing / rin po che sna tshogs
kyi rdo stegs la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dpag tu med pas/ kun nas bskor cing chos ston te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'gro ba thams cad yongs su sdud pa'i yul byams pa chen po dang /

snying rje chen po'i sgo gsal bar ston pa zhes bya ba yang dag par ston cing 'dug pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang dga' rangs te mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas dga' bas rgyas zhing mi 'dzum
pa'i mig gis thal mo sbyar nas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la dad pa'i shugs dang ldan pas sems mi 'khrug pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'dzin pa/
dge ba'i bshes gnyen las byung ba'i chos kyi sprin thams cad yang dag par gzung ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang nan tan thams cad dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag lus pa'i 'du shes
can/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa shin tu dka' bar sems pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen las stobs bcu'i ye shes rin po che 'byung zhing thob par 'gyur ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i
bshes gnyen las snang ba mi zad pa 'byung ba'i 'du shes can/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rten gyi bsod nams kyi rgyud rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo yang dag par ston pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni ye shes kyi rgya mtsho chen po la 'jug pa'i yongs su ston par 'du shes pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs yang dag par 'dus pa/ yongs su bskyed pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po gang na ba der phyin to/ /de nas byang chub
sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs ring zhig nas tshur 'ong ba mthong nas/ smras pa/ tshur shog dpe med pa'i theg pa chen po yangs shing bsam gyis mi khyab pa la
zhugs pa/ skye ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtses shing skyabs med par gyur pa'i 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon
sum du gyur pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las 'das te dpe med tshad med pa la mngon par mos pa/ snying rje chen pos byin gyis brlabs pas/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i blo gros can/
blta na kun tu bzang po'i spyod lam mngon du bltas pa/ smon lam chen po'i dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyong ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yongs su gzung bar mos pa/ dge
ba'i rtsa ba bstsags pas ngoms mi shes pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdam ngag la yang dag par zhugs pa/ 'jam dpal gyi ye shes rgya mtsho las byung ba'i yon tan gyi 'byung gnas

sangs rgyas kyi byin kyis brlabs thob par bya ba la mngon du bltas pa/ ting nge 'dzin kyi snang ba dang shugs rab tu thob pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin kyi char yang dag par gzung ba la mngon par mos
pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong bas dga' ba dang / mos pa'i shugs kyis yid rab tu bde bar gyur pa/ legs par spyod pa tshad med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i shugs kyis mngon

par brlan pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ yon tan la nan tan du bya ba'i shugs kyis rnam par dag pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi mdzod bdag la mngon du gyur pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i lam gyi

shugs gzhan la yongs su bstan pa'i bsam pa can/ snying rje chen po'i shugs ma nyams pa'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes snang ba'i shugs yang dag par gzung ba'i blo gros can khyod 'ongs

pa legs so/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po gang na ba der song nas/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag
'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so 'phags pa bdag gis

bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan bgyi bar ma 'tshal te/ 'phags
pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar
nan tan du bgyi ba 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po mdog 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa/ 'od kyi dra ba rnam pa sna tshogs

tshad med pa 'phro ba'i rgyan kyi sprin rab tu 'gyed pa'i lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po las byung ba'i 'od gzer sna tshogs dri ma med pa/ lus dang sems kyi bde ba tshad med pa

rab tu bskyed pa'i tshogs kyis shin tu rgyas pa'i lag pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi spyi bo la bzhag ste/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu nga ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba shes te/ rigs kyi bu nga'i byang chub sems dpa'i

spyod pa'i sgo snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa de ni 'gro ba thams cad la dbye ba med par sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba dang / gdul ba la zhugs pa sgo kun nas thogs shing rnam par rig par 'gyur bas/
sems can yongs su bsdu ba dang / gdul ba la nye bar gnas pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar nga byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa la gnas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sems can thams cad kyi dgos pa la'ang sta gon du gnas te/ sbyin pas kyang sems can yongs su bsdud do/ /ngag snyan pa dang don bya ba dang / don 'thun pas kyang sems can

yongs su bsdud do/ /gzugs kyi lus rnam par bstan pas kyang / sems can yongs su smyin par byed do/ /kha dog dang dbyibs dang gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan te/ rnam par dmigs par bya ba dang / 'od gzer kyi

dra ba dgye bas kyang sems can rab tu tshim par byed cing yongs su smyin par byed do/ /bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dbyangs brjod pa dang / ci la dga' ba'i spyod lam yongs su bstan pa dang / mos pa sna tshogs dang / tshul

'thun par chos bstan pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dang / dge ba'i chos bstsags par bag myi byed pa'i sems can gyi sems yongs su bskul ba dang / bsam pa dang 'thun par sprul pa sna tshogs
tshad med pa yongs su bstan pa dang / rigs sna tshogs su skyes pa'i sems can rnams bskal pa 'thun pa'i gzugs yongs su bstan pa dang / gnas gcig tu 'grogs pas kyang sems can yongs su sdus shing yongs

su smyin par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar ngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa 'di yongs su sbyangs pas/ 'gro ba thams cad rab tu rten pa'i smon lam bskyed de/ 'di ltar sems can

thams cad kyi g.yang sa'i 'jigs pa dang / sems can thams cad rgyud kyi 'jigs pa zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad mgo rmongs pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bcings
pa'i 'jigs pa yongs su gcad pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi srog la bab par mi bde ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can thams cad yo byad kyis phongs pa'i 'jigs pa bsal ba dang / sems can

thams cad kyi 'tsho ba med pa'i 'jigs pa zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi grags pa med pa'i 'jigs pa las yongs su bzla ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /

sems can thams cad kyi 'khor du bag tsha ba'i 'jigs pa med par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa las rnam par bzla ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi ngan song gi 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /

sems can thams cad kyi lam mun pas nyam nga ba phyir mi ldog pa'i snang bas gsal bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bskal pa mi mnyam pa dang 'grogs pa'i 'jigs pa shin tu bsal ba dang / sems can

thams cad sdug pa dang bral ba'i 'jigs pa dag dang sems can thams cad kyi mi sdug pa dang / 'grogs pa'i 'jigs pa med par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad lus la mi bde ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral bar bya ba
dang / sems can thams cad sems la mi bde ba'i 'jigs pa las dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang 'khrugs pa las yongs su bzla ba'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad

rab tu rten pa'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa 'di byas so/ /sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa rnam par thar bar bya ba'i phyir yang 'jig rten du rjes su dran pa'i sgo byin kyis brlabs so/ /sems can thams cad

'jigs pa dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir/ rang gi mying 'khor lo yang 'jig rten du rnam par dmigs par byas so/ /dus ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro bas rnam par dmyigs par bya ba'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad kyi rnam pa'i bye ba mtha'

yas pa dang / mnyam par nga'i lus kyang byin kyis brlabs so/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar nga ni thabs 'dis sems can thams cad 'jigs pa las yongs su dkrol zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad thob par bya ba'i

phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i phyir mi ldog par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu ngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa 'di thob par zad na/ ngas byang

chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po rnams sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam kyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa khong du chud par rtogs pa/ dge ba'i chos mngon

par 'du bya ba rgyun mi gcod pa'i rgyun dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyud la rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa/ bskal pa thams cad du gnas shing spyod pa las phyir mi ldog pa'i rgyud dang
ldan pa/ dus gsum thams cad kyi tshul rjes su rtogs pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi klong yongs su 'khyil pa'i rgyud la mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi mi dge ba'i sems

rnam par zhi bar byed pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i sems yongs su 'phel ba'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i rgyud las phyir mi ldog par byed pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/

de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ /g.yas phyogs bskor ba byas te gus par bkur bstod nas/ /nor bzangs shin tu dul ba'i lho phyogs rgyud du song / /spyan

ras gzigs dbang drang srong snying rje rnams spyod pa/ /rin chen ri'i sul na gnas par des kyang mthong / /rin chen sna tshogs rdo rje ri yi sman ljongs na/ /pad ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri la brtan par 'dug /lha dang lha min

klu dang srin po mi 'am ci/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyis bskor cing de la chos kyang ston/ /mthong nas nor bzangs dga' ba tshad med skyes par gyur/ /bsnyen te yon tan rgya mtsho'i rkang la phyag 'tshal nas/ /
ci nas bzang po'i spyod pa bdag gis thos 'gyur bas/ /'phags pas thugs rje bskyed de gdams shing brlab du gsol/ /bsod nams brgya yis brgyan pa'i dri med lag brkyang ste/ /'od sprin dra ba rgya
chen bzang po rab bton nas/ /nor bzangs spyi bor bzhag ste sems can rnam dag pa/ /spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po mkhas pas tshig 'di smras/ /sangs rgyas sras po nga ni rnam thar gcig sgo shes/ /ye shes

snying po rgyal ba kun kyi thugs rjes bsdus/ /'gro ba thams cad bskyab cing yongs su bsdu phyir byung / /kun tu bdag nyid rang la byams pa bzhin du rgyu/ /'gro ba mang po thams cad sdug bsngal kun las skyob/ /gang

rnams dam du bcings shing dgra lag phyin pa dang / /lus la gzer cing de bzhin btson rar bcug pa yang / /nga'i ming thos bcings las bzung ba thar bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po dag la nyes pa'i skyon byas gsad spangs pa/ /

de tshe de dag nga yi ming yang dran gyur na/ /mda' 'phangs de yi lus la phog par mi 'gyur te/ /mtshon rnon btab kyang de dag mi 'dzug brgal bar 'gyur/ /dbang po'i 'khor du phyin kyang gang rnams brtsod gyur pa/ /dgra rnams

kun las rgyal 'gyur grags pa thob par 'gyur/ /grags dang grogs dang rigs dang nor rnams 'phel bar 'gyur/ /nga yi ming dran de dag thub pa med par 'gyur/ /gang gis nga yi ming ni rjes su dran byas pa/ /de dag
rkun pos 'jigs dogs dgras 'jigs nags phyin te/ /seng ge dom gzig gcan zan g.yag rgod sbrul gang yang / /dgra rnams kun las rgyal zhing 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/ /gang rnams la las nga yi ming zhig

dran byas na/ /sdang ba'i sems kyis rin chen ltongs su bor gyur tam/ /sol mdog me lce rab tu 'bar bar bor gyur kyang / /me rnams pad mos gang ba'i chu yi gter du 'gyur/ /nga yi ming ni skad 'ga' yud tsam rjes dran na/ /

rgya mtsho'i chur bor de yi nang du 'chi mi 'gyur/ /chu bos mi 'khyer me yi dbus su tshig mi 'gyur/ /don med kun tu mi 'gyur don rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /shing sgrogs dbyig chings lcag sgrog de bzhin ltung rnams dang / /

brnyas shing khyad bsad de bzhin bslus pa dang / /spyos shing brdegs te gshe dang sma phab rnam pa las/ /nga yi ming tsam dran par byas nas thar pa thob/ /gang rnams shar gnyer sna tshogs glags blta ji snyed dang / /gang

rnams rtag tu zhe sdang mi snyan brjod pa rnams/ /nga yi ming thos dran byas snyan par 'gyur/ /mthong ba tsam gyis mod la byams pa'i sems kyang skye/ /nga yi ming tsam la las gang gis dran byas nas/ /gnod pa'i don du ro

langs sngags dang byad byed pa'i/ /dgra rnams rtag tu de yi zil gyis non par 'gyur/ /ma lus dug gis de yi lus la mi tshugs so/ /la la gang gis nga yi ming tsam dran byas na/ /klu dbang srin tshogs mkha' lding

sha za thams cad dang / /grul bum srul po 'tshe byed gtum po'i sems dang ldan/ /mdangs 'phrog 'jigs byed rmi lam 'ong ba'ang zhi bar 'gyur/ /nga yi ming ni skad cig yud tsam dran byas kyang / /pha dang ma dang bshes

gnyen mdza' ba kun dang yang / /'bral bar mi 'gyur sdang dang 'grogs par de bzhin min/ /nor zad mi 'gyur phongs pa'i dngos su mi 'gyur ro/ /nga yi ming ni rjes su la la dran byed na/ /'di nas shi 'phos mnar
med sems dmyal mi 'gro ste/ /byol song skye gnas yi dgas mi khom gnas su min/ /sems can dag la lha dang mi yi gnas su skye/ /nga yi ming ni la la gang gis dran byas na/ /dmus long zhar ba
'on pa zha bor mi 'gyur te/ /mtheng po long bar mi 'gyur gsal smra blta sdug 'gyur/ /bskal pa bye ba mang por dbang por kun ldan 'gyur/ /la la gang gis nga yi mying ni

rjes dran na/ /sems can dag pa 'di nas shi 'phos phyogs bcu yi/ /'jig rten khams su sangs rgyas mngon sum skye bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas mthong 'gyur de dag chos kyang thos par 'gyur/ /'di dang de bzhin gzhan

dag thabs mang ji snyed kyis/ /'gro bar sems can nga 'dul gzhal dang zad mi nus/ /sangs rgyas sras po ngas ni rnam thar gcig bsgoms ste/ /yon tan can gyi yon tan thams cad ngas mi shes/ /de'i tshe byang chub sems

dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba zhes bya ba shar phyogs nas nam mkha'i dbyings las 'ongs te/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor yug gi rtse mor 'dug go/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro bas/ mi mjed kyi

'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor yug gi rtse mo la rkang pa gnyis bor ma thag du/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ rin po che du ma'i rang bzhin du kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /byang chub

sems dpa' gzhan du myi 'gro ba des/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od thams cad zil gyis non pa dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang

tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten kyi mgon po dang / me dang rin po che dang / glog dang / skar ma'i 'od kyang zil gyis non pa de lta bu'i 'od lus las bkye ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po dag kyang snang bar byas/ byol song gi skye gnas dang /

gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thibs po thams cad kyang snang bar byas te/ ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyang de ma thag du zhi'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa yang nyams su mi non par gyur te/ /mya ngan gyi

zug rngu dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyang rtse zhil bar gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad du'ang rin po che'i sprin kyi char phab ste/ me tog dang spos dang / bdug pa dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs

dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char yang mngon par phab ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ngo / /de'i lus de'i gzugs brnyan ni sems can thams cad gnas su snang

ba ste bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshim par byed pa la mngon par gzhol bas/ ri gru 'dzin de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i drung du yang phyin par snang ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos

tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir phyin pa mthong ngam/ smras pa 'phags pa mthong ngo / /smras pa rigs kyi bu byang

chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan tu bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis byang

chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang

yang bltas te/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i ye shes kyi gting ma rnyed pa'i sems kyis

spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po blta bas kyang ma ngoms bzhin du bsgo ba dang / mi 'gal bar byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba gang na ba der song ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi

bos phyag 'tshal nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i

spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams pa dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ ji ltar byang chub sems

dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsol/ des smras pa rigs kyi bu nga ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgo kun tu 'gro ba

thob po smras pa/ 'phags pa khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi zhabs kyi drung nas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo kun tu 'gro ba zhes bya ba 'di brnyes/ 'jig rten gyi khams de ni 'di nas ji srid gcig

na mchis/ 'jig rten gyi khams de nas bzhud nas ni ji srid gcig lags/ smras pa rigs kyi bu gnas 'di ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgus kyang

shes par dka' ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang / byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus mi ldog pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mi 'phrogs pa'i yul te/ de ni rigs kyi bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen
gyis yongs su ma zin pa/ sangs rgyas kyis ma dgongs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bstsags pa/ bsam pa yongs su ma dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po ma thob pa/ shes rab kyi mig dang mi ldan pa rnams

kyis thos pa 'am/ yongs su gzung ba 'am/ yid ches pa 'am/ khong du chud par bya bar mi nus so/ /smras pa/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gzungs kyi dad pa dang / mos par bgyi nas

'phags pas bdag la bka' mi bstsal tam/ des smras pa rigs kyi bu nga ni shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten kyi khams dpal gyi snying po dang ldan pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal kun nas yang dag par 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas

kyi zhing nas 'ongs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpal kun nas yang dag par 'byung ba'i zhabs kyi drung nas ngas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgo kun tu 'gro ba 'di thob po/ /rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams dpal

gyi snying po dang ldan pa de nas nga song nas ni bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed gcig 'das te/ sems bskyed pa re re zhing yang gom pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med

pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed gcig bor ro/ /gom pa re res kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan par shes te/ sangs rgyas

bcom ldan 'das de dag la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa bla na med pa yid kyis rang bzhin chos nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rgyas btab pa de bzhin gshegs pas gnang bas byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba yongasu

bskyed pas mchod pa byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ste/ de dag thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho yang khong du chud do/ /de dag thams cad kyi

dbang po'i 'khor lo yang yongs su shes shing bsam pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs kyi lus yongs su ston to/ /chos kyi dbyangs rab tu bsgrags so/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su bkye'o/ /yo byad sna

tshogs bas kyang nye bar btung ngo / /rang gi lus kyang de dag la byin gyis brlabs te/ de ni yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i sbyor ba rgyun mi gcod pa'i phyir ro/ /shar phyogs nas ji ltar 'ongs pa de bzhin du lho phyogs

dang nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs nas kyang de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu ngas ni byang chub

sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo kun nas 'gro ba zhes bya ba 'di shes par zad na/ ngas byang chub sems dpa' phyogs kun tu mngon par gzhol ba/ tha mi dad pa'i ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa chos kyi dbyings

thams cad du lus rnam par bkod pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthun par spyod pa/ zhing thams cad lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa/ chos thams cad kyi rgyud kyi rjes su song ngo / /

dus gsum gyi rgyud mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa/ chos kyi phyogs kyi rgyud dang mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba'i rgyud thams cad du rnam par ldang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud thams cad la rnam par rtog

pa med pa/ chags pa med pa'i rgyud thams cad khong du chud pa/ gnas med pa'i rgyud la rab tu gnas pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na grong khyer

sgo dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na lha lha chen po zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /

de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su

bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya chen po'i rjes su song ba'i bsam

pa dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i ye shes kyi spyod yul 'dod pa'i ngang tshul can mngon par shes pa chen po mngon par bsgrub pa'i yul la yon tan gyi khyad par du blta ba/ brtson 'grus brtan pa'i

go cha rab tu dga' ba'i khyad par thob po/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par brtse ba'i rjes su song ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/ de byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan kyi sa la ni nan tan byed/ ting nge 'dzin

gyi sa la ni rnam par dpyod/ gzungs kyi sa la ni rab tu gnas par byed/ smon lam gyi sa la ni 'jug par byed/ so so yang dag par rig pa'i sa la ni rjes su slob/ stobs kyi sa la ni yongs su bsgrub cing mthar gyis

grong khyer sgo dang ldan pa gang na ba der song ste/ lha lha chen po kun du dris pa dang / de la 'gro ba mang pos bstan pas/ rigs kyi bu 'di re/ lha lha chen po grong khyer gyi lam kyi mdo na bdag nyid shin tu che bas/ sems can

rnams la chos ston cing 'dug go/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs lha lha chen po gang na ba der song ste/ lha lha chen po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas
'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /
ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems
dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsol/ de nas lha lha chen pos lag pa bzhi phyogs bzhir brkyang ste/ rgya mtsho chen po bzhi las shin
tu myur ba'i shugs kyis chu blangs te/ bdag gis gdong bkrus nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la gser gyi me tog gis gtor te/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni

mthong bar shin tu dka' ste/ thos par yang rab tu dka'o/ /skyes bu mchog gi me tog pun da ri ka ni 'jig rten gyis phul du bya ba yin pas/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba yin te/ 'jig rten gyi gnas su gyur

pa'o/ /'gro ba'i rten du gyur pa'o/ /sems can rnams la snang ba chen po 'byin pa'o/ /lam la rmongs pa la lam bde bar ston pa'o/ /chos kyi tshul du gzung ba la mgon du gyur pa'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i

grong khyer du phyin par bya ba la ded dpon chen por gyur pa ste/ de la kho bo 'di snyam du sems so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ming ni sems dri ma med pa rnams la rang gi lus kyi gzugs ston cing

lus rnam par dag pa rnams la mngon par snang ba dang / ngag gi nyes pa spangs pa rnams la dbyangs kyi snang ba yongs su gnon par byed pa dang / bsam pa dag pa rnams la dus thams cad du mngon sum du gyur par

gnas pas/ lta ba ngan pa 'joms pa yin par bsam mo/ /rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sprin gyi dra ba thob bo/ /smras pa 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sprin

gyi dra ba de'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/ de nas lha lha chen pos tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi mdun du ri chen po tsam gyi gser gyi phung po dang / dngul gyi phung po dang / bai DUr+ya'i phung po dang / shel gyi phung po dang /

mu sa ra gal pa'i phung po dang / a sma gar ba'i phung po dang / nor bu rin po che ngang gis snang ba'i phung po dang / nor bu rin po che dri ma med pa'i snying po'i phung po dang / nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i phung po dang /

nor bu rin po che phyogs kun tu mngon pa'i phung po dang / gtsug gi nor bu rin po che dang / cod pan gyi phung po dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi se mo do'i phung po dang / dpung brgyan gyi phung po dang / gdu bu'i phung po dang /

ske rags kyi phung po dang / rkang gdub kyi phung po dang / mu tig dmar po'i dra ba'i phung po dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi phung po dang / yan lag dang nying lag thams cad kyi rgyan kyi phung po dang / nor bu rin po che

yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i phung po dang / me tog thams cad dang / spos thams cad dang / bdug pa thams cad dang / phreng ba thams cad dang / byug pa thams cad dang / phye ma thams cad dang / gos thams cad dang /
gdugs thams cad dang / rgyal mtshan thams cad dang / lha'i ba dan thams cad dang / rol mo brdung ba thams cad dang / rol mo dkrol ba thams cad dang / 'dod pa'i yul thams cad dang / bu mo bye ba thams

cad dang / bu mo bye ba brgya stong grangs med pa dag kyang nye bar bstan nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu 'di dag las khyer la/ sbyin pa mang po ni byin gcig /bsod nams
mang po ni gyis shig /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod cig /sems can mang po ni sbyin pas bsdu ba'i dngos pos yongs su bsdus te/ gtong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa la khod cig /'jig rten ni

sbyin pa la slobs shig /gtang bar dga' ba yongs su gtong ba ni ston cig /rigs kyi bu khyod la kho bos ji ltar yo byad kyi rnam pas bstan pa 'di bzhin du sbyin pa'i bstan pa dang / ma bral ba'i sems can

tshad med pa dag gi bsam pa'i rgyud kyang gtong bas yongs su bsgo ba byed do/ /sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed
cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byed do/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang kho bo ni sems can 'dod pa'i dga' bas myos pa/ yul gyi longs spyod la yongasu
chags pa rnams la yul de dag mi sdug par byin gyis brlabs so/ /khro bas non pa dang nga rgyal can dang rgyags shing dregs pa dang / rlom pa tshar gcad pas/ 'dul ba rnams la ni gtum zhing srin po

ltar mi sdug la 'jigs pa'i lus sha za zhing khrag 'thung ba'i tshul dang ldan par bstan te/ rlom pa dang snyems pas 'khrug pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byed do/ /le lo can brtson 'grus bor ba'i sems can rnams

la ni me dang chu dang / rgyal po dang rkun po dang / gnod pa'i 'jigs pa yongs su bstan cing skyo bar byas te/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa la dgod par byed de/ de ltar thabs de dang de dag pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi

phyogs dang mi mthun pa rab tu gzhom pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi tshogs bstsag pa dang / sgrib pa'i ri g.yang sa'i lam thams cad las yang dag par bzla ba dang / sgrib pa med pa'i chos la gzud pa'i phyir

mi dge ba thams cad las rnam par bzlog ste/ dge ba thams cad phun sum tshogs pa la yang dag par dgod pa byed do/ /rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sprin gyi dra ba 'di shes par zad

na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po ltar nyon mongs pa'i lta ba ma yin rab tu 'joms pa/ chu ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal kyi me'i phung po zhi bar byed pa/ me'i phung po ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi

sred pa'i chu skems pa/ rlung ltar 'dzin pa'i mngon par chags pa thams cad kyi ri rnam par 'thor ba/ rdo rje ltar bdag gi 'du shes sra ba'i brag rab tu rnyil ba/ de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am yon tan brjod par nus

re skan/ song rigs kyi bu 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid kyi yul ma ga d+ha'i snying po byang chub nas sa'i lha mo brtan ma zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la

bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis lha lha chen po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lha lha chen po la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su

bskor ba byas te/ yang dang yang bltas te/ lha lha chen po'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs mthar kyis yul ma ga d+ha'i snying po byang chub tu sa'i lha mo brtan ma gang na ba der song ba dang de 'gro ba'i tshe

sa'i lha mo brgya stong phrag bcu gcig la gcig 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /sems can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur ba zhig ni 'di nas tshur 'ong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i

sgo nga'i sbubs 'dral bar 'gyur ba zhig ni 'di nas tshur 'ong ngo / /chos kyi rgyal po'i rigs su byung ba chags pa med cing dri ma med pa'i chos kyi rgyal po'i go 'phang dam pa 'thob par 'gyur ba zhig ni 'di nas tshur 'ong

ngo / /ye shes kyi mthu bo che rdo rje'i mtshon cha can dpa' bo phas kyi rgol ba'i 'khor thams cad rab tu 'dul ba zhig ni 'di nas tshur 'ong ngo zhes nas/ de'i mod la lha mo brtan ma la stsogs pa/ sa'i lha mo brgya stong

phrag bcus sa chen po rab tu bskyod de/ 'brug sgra zab mo lta bu'i sgra chen po grag par byas nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'od chen pos snang bar byas te/ lus rin po che'i rgyan dang / lhab

lhub thams cad kyis shin tu brgyan pa/ glog gi phreng ba'i tshogs nam mkha'i dbyings las 'gyu zhing snang ba lta bu sha stag du byas te/ shing thams cad kyi myu gu ni skye bar byed/ me tog gi shing thams cad ni kha 'bu bar

byed/ chu klung gi rgyun thams cad ni 'bab par byed/ mtsho dang 'tshe'u dang lu ma thams cad ni rgyas par byed/ spos chu'i char ni rab tu 'bab par byed/ me tog gi sprin rab tu 'thor ba'i rlung chen po ni ldang bar byed/

sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni rab tu sgra sgrog par byed/ lha rdzas kyi gzhal med khang dang rgyan kyi tshogs mang po ni rab tu 'khrol bar byed/ ba lang dang khyu mchog dang / glang po dang / stag dang / ri dgas kyi

dbang po ni rab tu sgra 'byin par byed/ lha dang lha ma yin dang / klu dang 'byung po'i dbang po rnams ni 'brug sgra 'byin par byed/ ri'i dbang po chen po rnams ni phan tshun thug par byed/ gter gyi tshogs bye ba brgya stong

ni mngon du byung bar byed cing sa'i 'og nas 'thon to/ /de nas sa'i lha mo brtan mas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod 'dir 'ongs pa legs so/ /sa'i phyogs 'di ni sngon

khyod kyi gnas su gyur te/ kho mo'i mngon sum du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin na/ de'i rnam par smyin pa'i phyogs 'ga' tsam blta bar 'dod dam/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i rkang

pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ sa'i lha mo brtan ma la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /

'phags ma 'tshal lo/ /de nas sa'i lha mo brtan mas rkang pa'i mthil kyis sa chen po la brdabs te/ rin po che'i gter bye ba brgya stong grangs med pa rab tu brgyan pa bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu

rin po che'i gter bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di dag kyang khyod kyi rjes su 'brang ngo / /khyod kyi sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /khyod kyis ci dga' bar spyod par bya'o/ /khyod kyi bsod nams kyi rnam par smyin pa las byung ba'o/ /
khyod kyi bsod nams kyi stobs kyis bsrung ba'o/ /'di las long ste/ khyod kyis ci dgos pa de dag gyis shig /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ye shes thob

par dka' ba'i snying po can thob pa ste/ de ltar kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'di dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad tshun chad du byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su 'brang zhing / rtag tu bsrung

ba la zhugs pa ste/ de tshun chad du rigs kyi bu kho mo byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi spyod pa la rnam par spyod do/ /ye shes kyi yul la 'jug go/ /smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor khong du chud par byed do/ /byang chub sems

dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa rjes su rtogs par byed do/ /ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi tshul gyi rjes su 'gengs so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa thams cad dang / sems rgya chen pos rgyas par 'gengs so/ /
byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi stobs kyis dbang bsgyur ba dang / zhing gi dran pa thams cad rgyas par dgang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan pa yang dag par mnod pa dang /

dus thams cad du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba yang dag par bstan pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i tshul thams cad dang / mdo sde yang dag par brjod pa'i chos kyi sprin gyi tshul thams cad dang / chos snang

ba chen pos snang bar bya ba'i tshul dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba'i tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yang dag par bstan pa'i tshul yang rjes su rtogs par byed

do/ /yang dag par 'dzin to/ /yang dag par nod do/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ye shes thub par dka' ba'i snying po can 'di yang bskal pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi
pha rol de'i yang pha rol tu 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar bskal par snang bas rnam par brgyan pa la de bzhin gshegs pa spyan bzangs po las thob ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar

kho mo byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ye shes thub par dka' ba'i snying po can 'di la ni yongs su dpyod dpyod/ rnam par dpyod dpyod/ shin tu dpyod dpyod/ yang dag par 'phel bar byed byed/ shin tu

rgyas par byed byed pas/ bskal pa bzang po la thug gi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang ma bral lo/ /de srid kyi bar kyis kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med

pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig bsnyen bkur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad snying po byang chub tu gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa yang mthong ste/ kho mo ni de bzhin gshegs pa de dag

thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon sum du mthong ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ye shes thub par dka' ba'i snying po can 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa' de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zham ring du 'brang ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi rjes su 'brang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'jug par dka' ba la rab tu zhugs pa/ sems kyi skad cig gcig

gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa'i shugs dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa dri ma med pa'i snying por

gyur pa/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad rtag tu mngon par bsgrubs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las tha mi dad pa'i pho nyar gyur pa/ de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu 'dzam bu'i

gling 'di nyid kyi yul ma ga d+ha zhes bya ba na grong khyer ser skya'i gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod

pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ sa'i lha mo brtan ma la lan brgya stong du mar

g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i gdams ngag rjes su dran par byed cing / byang chub sems

dpa'i rnam par thar pa ye shes thub par dka' ba'i snying po can de rjes su dran par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa de rab tu goms par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes

shin tu phra ba de la rnam par blta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho de la 'jug par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes tha dad pa la yid ches bya ba dang / byang chub

sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes shin tu sbyang ba de rjes su rtogs par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho de la 'bab par bya ba byed cing / grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas gang na

ba der phyin te/ grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ shar phyogs logs kyi grong khyer gyi sgo nas song ste/ nyi ma nub nas ring po ma lon pa zhig du grong khyer gyi lam gyi sum mdo'i

dbus shig na/ byang chub sems dpa'i gdams ngag 'thun par len pa de mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa mthong bar 'dod cing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen yod na sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thob par 'gyur bar rings pa'i

blo gros dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi mig kun tu lta ba'i yul gyi rang bzhin byin gyis rlabs dang ldan pa/ phyogs thams cad du mngon par gzhol zhing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta ba'i sems kyis mos pa dang /

ye shes chen po'i snying por gyur pa'i 'du shes kyi sems dang ldan pa/ dmigs pa thams cad la rab tu zhugs pa'i ye shes kyi mig dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad du ye shes rgya mtsho 'byam

klas pas rgyas par 'gengs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyi mig gis phyogs thams cad du shes bya'i rgya mtsho la rnam par blta ba/ ye shes chen po'i mig 'thob par bya ba la rab tu gzhol zhing bsam pa rtse gcig

du bzhag nas 'dug 'dug pa dang / mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa der grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas kyi steng gi nam mkha'i dbyings las nor bu rin po che sna tshogs dpe med pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa zhig na/ rin po

che'i seng ge'i khri chen po spos zhim po thams cad kyi pad mo'i snying po can zhig la lus kyi mdog gser gyi kha dog du 'dug pa/ skra 'jam zhing mang la mthon thing du 'dug pa/ mig dkar nag 'byes pa/ gzugs bzangs

shin tu mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ lus rgyan dang lhab lhub thams cad kyis klubs shing brgyan pa/ kha dog bsgyur ba'i gos bgos pa tshangs pa'i gtsug tor gyi cod pan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa thogs pa

lus la rgyu skar dang / gza' dang skar chen dang / skar ma'i tshogs thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan snang bar gyur pa 'dug pa mthong ngo / /des sems can gyi khams yangs par mi khom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang /

log par ltung ba nas sems can ji snyed cig yongs su dgrol ba de dag kyang de'i ba spu'i sbubs su chud par mthong ngo / /ji snyed gcig mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du bkod pa dang / ji snyed gcig nyan thos dang / rang sangs
rgyas kyi byang chub dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su smyin par byas pa/ de dag thams cad kyang de'i ba spu'i sbubs su chud par mthong ngo / /gzugs mngon par bsgrub pa dang /

kha dog mngon par bsgrub pa'i thabs sna tshogs kyis ji snyed gcig yongs su smyin par byas pa de dag kyang de'i ba spu'i sbubs su chud par mthong ngo / /nga ro mngon par bsgrub pa dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag mngon par bsgrub pa dang /

skad kyi tshul sna tshogs yongs su sbyar ba ji snyed gcig gis yongs su smyin par byas pa de dag kyang de'i ba spu'i sgo nas rjes su brjod pa thos so/ /dus mngon par bsgrub pa dang / bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems gyi rjes

su 'brang bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i khyu mchog

gi mthu phyung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par blta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub

sems dpa'i skyes bu seng ge chen po'i rnam par bsgyings pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pas/ rnam par brtse ba ji snyed gcig gis des sems can yongs su smyin par byas pa de dag kyang de'i ba spu'i sbubs

su chud par mthong ngo / /des thabs sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho de dag mthong zhing thos nas dga' rangs te mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa de la lus

thams cad kyis phab nas phyag 'tshal te/ langs nas mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa'i mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar
nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha mo bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ de ltar bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis byin gyis rlabs kyis
sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad 'byung bar yang dag par mthong bas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi phyag du bdag nyid bor ba lags na/ lha mo shul gang la brten na/ byang chub sems dpa'i stobs bcu'i sar

'byung bar 'gyur ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i shul bdag la bshad du gsol/ de skad ces smras pa dang / mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs

kyi bu de ltar khyod dge ba'i bshes gnyen kyi byin gyis rlab nod te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen kyi tshig mnyan par 'dod pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la nan tan du byed pa legs so legs so/ /rigs

kyi bu khyod ni de ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la nan tan du byas pa/ gdon mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par

thar pa sems can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi snang ba 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo thob pa ste/ bsam pa mi mnyam pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ /mi dge
ba'i las kyi lam la zhugs pa rnams la snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ /dge ba'i las kyi lam la zhugs pa rnams la dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ /sems mnyam pa dang mi mnyam par ldan pa'o/ /sems

can rnams la mi gnyis pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa rnams la rnam par byang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ /nyam nga bar gyur pa rnams la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ /dma' ba la mos

pa rnams la yangs pa la mos pa yongs su bskyed pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ /dbang po zhum pa rnams la brtson 'grus chen po'i shugs rnam par spel ba'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ /'khor ba la mngon par mos pa rnams la

'khor ba'i rgyud kyi 'khor lo las rnam par bzlog pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mngon par mos pa'i sems can rnams la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam la dgod pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ /

rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo de lta bu'i sems yid la bya bar ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sems can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo 'di dang yang ldan pas

sems can gang ji snyed gcig mun nag smag du gyur pa'i nam la mi ni nyal bar gyur/ 'byung po'i tshogs ni rgyu bar gyur/ rkun chom mang pos rgyas par gyur/ sems can mi bsrun pa'i tshul can ni phyogs su rgyu

bar gyur/ sprin stug po nag pos ni kun nas khebs par gyur/ dud pa dang rdul gyi tshogs kyis ni 'grogs par gyur/ rdzi char mi bzad pas ni rab tu gtags par gyur/ zla skar kyi tshogs ni mi snang bar gyur/ mig

gis bya ba'i mthu ni med par gyur pa'i mun pa la sems can gang ji snyed gcig rgya mtsho la spyod dam/ thang la spyod dam/ ri la spyod dam/ nags tshal gzhan na spyod dam/ yul gzhan na spyod dam/ grong gzhan na spyod dam/

phyogs gzhan na spyod dam/ phyogs mtshams gzhan na spyod dam/ lam gzhan na spyod kyang rung ste/ rgya mtsho la spyod spyod pa las gru bub par gyur pa 'am/ thang la spyod spyod pa las nyam nyes pa 'am/ ri la spyod spyod
pa las g.yang sa chen por ltung bar gyur pa 'am/ 'brog dgon pa la spyod spyod pa las kha zas kyis 'phongs par gyur pa 'am/ nags tshal thibs por sba'i zang zing la thogs sam/ tshul ma yin pa'i nyam

nyes shig tu gyur tam/ yul gzhan na spyod spyod pa las chom pos bcom pa 'am/ grong gzhan na spyod spyod pa las mi srun pa'i tshul can gyis gtses pa 'am/ phyogs gzhan na spyod spyod pa las 'brog rmis pa 'am/

phyogs mtshams gzhan na spyod spyod pa las mgo rmongs pa 'am/ lam gzhan na spyod spyod pa las nye zhor gyur kyang rung ste/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ni sems can de dag la thabs sna tshogs kyi sgo nas skyabs su gyur par byed pa

ste/ 'di ltar rgya mtsho chen po la spyod pa rnams kyi rlung sprin nag po gtor ba dang / chu'i rnyog pa dang ba dang / rlung mi zad pa'i dkyil 'khor bzlog pa dang / rlabs kyi shugs chen po zhi bar bya ba dang / grong gi 'jigs
pa las thar bar bya ba dang / phyogs bstan pa dang / chu'i lam legs par dmigs pa dang / 'gram bstan pa dang / rin po che'i gling du phyin par bya ba'i phyir lam yongs su bstan te/ yongs su sdud pa'i

gzugs dang / ded dpon gyi gzugs dang / rta'i rgyal po rngog chen gyi gzugs dang / glang po'i rgyal po'i gzugs dang / ru sbal kyi rgyal po'i gzugs dang / lha ma yin gyi rgyal po'i gzugs dang / nam mkha'

lding gi rgyal po'i gzugs dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i gzugs dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs dang / rgya mtsho'i lha'i gzugs dang / mnyan pa'i gzugs kyis skyabs su 'gyur bar byed do/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba de

yang 'di ltar sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad las yongs su bzlog pa'i phyir skyabs su gyur par shog shig ces yongs su bsngo'o/ /thang la spyod pa'i sems can shin tu gnag pa'i nam la/

sa gzhi 'od ma dang / tsher ma dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mos gang ba/ sbrul sdug pa gtum po shin tu mang ba/ thag thug dang / mi bde ba'i lam can rdul dang phyag dar shin tu 'thul ba/ rdzi char drag pos

gtags pa/ tsha ba dang / grang ba'i sdug bsngal yod pa/ sbrul dang gcan zan kyis bag tsha ba yod pa/ mthong mi dang / chom po rgyu bar gyur pa zhig na/ mgo 'khor bar gyur pa'i sems can rnams la/ nyi ma'i gzugs dang /

zla ba'i gzugs dang / skya rings 'char ba'i gzugs dang / skar mda' chen po'i gzugs dang / glog gi phreng ba 'byung ba'i gzugs dang / rin po che'i 'od kyi gzugs dang / gza'i 'khor gyi gzugs dang / rgyu skar
dang skar ma'i tshogs kyi gzhal med khang gi 'od kyi gzugs dang / lha'i gzugs dang byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyis skyabs su 'gyur bar byed do/ /sems kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis nyon mongs pa'i mun

pa thams cad rnam par bsal ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi skyabs su shog shig par bskyed do/ /ri'i g.yang sa la spyod cing 'chi bas 'jigs skrag pa rnams kyi sro gang bya ba dang / grags pa 'dod pa'i

dbang du gyur pa dang / snyan pa dang / sgra'i rgyal mtshan 'dod pa dang / longs spyod tshol ba dang / 'dod pa'i zil gyis non pa dang / yo byad yongs su btsal ba la brtson pa dang / 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa 'dod cing

brtson pa dang / bu dang chung ma gtong mi phod pas thogs par gyur pa dang / lta ba'i thibs por 'khyams pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 'jigs pa sna tshogs kyis gtses pa rnams la yang thabs sna tshogs kyi

sgo nas skyabs su gyur par byed de/ 'di ltar ri phug dang / bya skyibs mngon par bsgrub pa dang / shing thog dang / rtsa ba bzar rung ba mngon par bsgrub pa dang / chu'i lam dang / chu mig mngon par bsgrub pa

dang / tsha ba dang / grang ba'i gnyen po mngon par bsgrub pa dang / lam bstan pa dang / ka la ping ka'i sgra skad bsgrags pa dang / rma bya'i rgyal po'i skad 'byin pa'i dbyangs dang / sman 'bar bas snang ba'i
gzugs dang / ri'i lha'i 'od kyi gzugs dang / ri'i phug dang sul dang / ltongs su rlag ste/ sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtses pa'i sems can rnams kyi mun pa'i rab rib rnams par sal ba dang / sa'i
gzhi mnyam par mngon par bsgrub pas skyabs su gyur par byed de/ sems kyang ji ltar bdag gis sems can ri la spyod pa 'di dag yongs su skyob pa de bzhin du 'khor ba'i ri'i lam rgyud g.yang sa la

gnas shing rga shi'i gdon kyis zin pa de dag gi skyabs su'ang bdag 'gyur bar shog shig par bskyed do/ /nags tshal thibs po'i dra bas thogs pa'i sems can mtshan mo mun pa mun nag gis chod de/ shing dang shing

'phran 'dzings pa'i gseb shin tu nyam nga ba/ chu dang rtsa dang / sdong po dang 'khri shing gis lam chod de/ shing dang shing phran sna tshogs kyi nags tshal thibs pa'i nang du phyin te/ stag gi sgra thos pas skrag pa'i snying
can don ma grub pas/ sems 'khrugs par gyur pa dang / 'jigs pa dang 'tshe ba dang / mi dga' ba sna tshogs kyis nyams mi dga' ba nags tshal stug po nas 'byung ba'i phyogs mi shes pa rnams la/ kho mo ni

bde bar 'gro ba'i lam yongs su ston pa byed de/ sems kyang 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can lta ba'i thibs po sna tshogs la gnas pa/ sred pa'i dra bas 'khris par gyur pa/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal
sna tshogs kyis gtses pa rnams sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su 'bral bar shog shig par bskyed de/ 'brog dgon pa la spyod pa'i sems can mun pa'i nang na/ 'thoms pa rnams kyang thabs kyi sgra
sna tshogs kyis bde ba yongs su bskyed cing lam bstan te/ de dag 'jigs pa med pa dang / bde ba la rab tu bkod nas/ sems kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa na 'thoms pa ngan
song thams cad kyi lam du zhugs pa rnams sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su dkrol te shin tu phun sum tshogs pas/ bde ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam la rab tu bkod par bya bar shog shig par bskyed de/

rigs kyi bu yul dang ljongs la chags pa'i sems can mngon par chags pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar gyur pa rnams la'ang kho mo ni skyo bar bya ba'i thabs sna tshogs kyis yul la mngon par chags

pa de las gyen du bskyod par byed de sems kyang 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad phung po la mngon par chags pa las gyen du bskyod de/ gnas med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dgod

par bya bar shog shig par bskyed do/ /rigs kyi bu kho mo ni grong na spyod pa'i sems can khyim dang gnas kyis bcings pas glags pa rnams mtshan mo mun pa shin tu gnag pas chod pa'i nang na khyim gyi don sna tshogs
nyams su gnod pas/ sdug bsngal bar gyur pa rnams kyang skyo bar 'gyur ba'i sgo sna tshogs kyis skyo bar byas te/ chags pa med pa'i sems yongs su bskyed nas/ chos kyi sbyin pas yongs su
gzung ste/ tshim par byas nas brtan pa med pa'i chos la bkod do/ /sems kyang 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can skye mched drug gi grong la gnas pa rnams 'khor ba'i lam gyi rgyud kyis
spyod yul las gyen du bskyod de/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul la dgod par bya bar shog shig par bskyed do/ /rigs kyi bu gang yang mtshan mo mun pa shin tu gnag pa'i nang na/
shar phyogs la stsogs pa'i phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams re rer phyogs bslad par gyur pa/ sa'i phyogs mnyam pa la mi mnyam pa'i g.yang sar 'du shes pa dang / sgang bu
la gshong du 'du shes par gyur te/ phyogs kyi lam dang sa tshod la mgo 'khor bar gyur pa de dag la'ang kho mo ni thabs sna tshogs kyis snang bar byas te/ phyir 'byung ba rnams la ni sgo
ston to/ /rgol bar 'dod pa rnams la ni mu stegs yongs su ston to/ /rgol bar 'dod pa nams la ni gru yongs su ston to/ /khyim du 'gro bar 'dod pa rnams la ni khyim yongs su
ston to/ /rnam par blta bar 'dod pa rnams la ni phyogs yongs su ston to/ /sa gzhi mtho ba dang / dma' ba yang yongs su ston to/ /sa'i phyogs mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang / gzugs kyi rnam

pa sna tshogs kyang yongs su ston to/ /lam gyis dub pa rnams la grong dang grong khyer dang ljongs dang khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor kyang yongs su ston to/ /tsha ba dang skom pas mnar ba rnams la yang mtsho dang

mtshe'u dang / lu ma dang rdzing dang rdzing bu dang chu klung dang / nags tshal dang bza' shing gi ra ba dang / kun dga'i ra ba yid du 'ong ba yongs su ston to/ /sdug pa dang bral zhing phrad par rnams la pha dang ma dang bu dang chung ma dang /

mdza' bo dang / blon po dang / gnyen bshes dang yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs kyang rnam pa sna tshogs yongs su ston to/ /sems kyang ji ltar bdag gis sems can mtshan mo mun pa mun nag gis chod pa/ mig rab rib kyis

nyams pa phyogs bslad pa/ lam 'khor ba rnams la gzugs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i phyir snang ba bskyed de/ 'od byas pa de bzhin du bdag gis yun ring po nas 'khor ba'i mun pa na gnas pa'i

sems can yang dag pa nyid kyi phyogs la bslad pa ma rig pa'i mun par 'thoms pa ye shes kyi mig mi shes pa'i ling tog gis chod pa/ 'du shes dang sems dang lta bas phyin ci log tu gyur pa/ mi rtag pa la rtag par
'du shes pa dang / sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes pa/ bdag med pa la bdag du 'du shes pa/ mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa/ bdag dang sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / gang zag du
'dzin pa dam po la gnas pa/ phung po dang khams dang skye mched la gnas pa/ rgyu dang 'bras bu la mgo 'khor ba/ mi dge ba'i las kyi lam kyi phyogs su zhugs pa/ srog gcod pa/ ma byin par len pa dang /

'dod pas log par g.yem pa/ rdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma zer ba dang / ngag rtsub po 'byin pa/ tshig khyal pa smra ba dang / chags sems dang ldan pa/ gnod sems dang ldan pa/ log par lta ba can/ phar mi shes pa/

mar mi shes pa/ dge sbyong dang / bram zer mi shes pa/ dbang po mi shes pa/ skyes bu dam pa mi shes pa/ chos ma yin pa la chags shing zhen pa/ mi tshul ba'i 'dod pas zil kyis gnon pa/ log pa'i chos kyis
yongs su 'khris pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa la skur ba 'debs pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo nub par bya ba la zhugs pa/ bdud kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' la gnod par byed pa/ theg pa chen po la
zhe sdang ba/ byang chub kyi sems la mos pa spyod par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' la mi snyan du brjod pa/ snod ma skams par snying ring ba/ gnod pa ma byas par dgrar len pa/ 'phags pa la skur ba

'debs pa/ skyes bu dam pa ma yin pas/ spyod pa'i chos kyi spyod yul can/ mchod rten dang / dge 'dun gyi dngos po la 'khu ba/ pha ma la log par sems pa/ mtshams med pa'i las byed pa/ g.yang sa chen po la

mngon par ltas pa'i sems can rnams kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa shes rab kyi snang ba chen pos bsal te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul nas/ theg pa chen po kun tu bzang
pos stobs bcu'i ye shes kyi lam yongs su ston par gyur cig /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshul rgya mtsho dang /

sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi spyod yul dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul dang / stobs bcu yongs su grub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzungs kyi stobs dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gcig tu gyur pa/ yongs su

ston par shog shig /yongs su bstan pas kyang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas la rab tu dgod par shog gcig par bskyed do/ /rigs kyi bu kho mo ni sems can yun ring po nas na zhing nad kyis

yongs su skyo bas/ lus nyam chung ba dang / rgas pa dang / rga bas zil gyis non pa dang / mgon med pa dang / phongs shing dbul ba dang / log par ltung ba dang / yul gzhan du phyin pa dang / phyogs logasu zhugs pa dang /

btson ra na 'dug pa dang / chad pas bcad pa dang / nyes pa byung ste/ rgyal pos gsad par bkri ba rnams kyang srog dang bral gyi 'jigs pa las yongs su bskyob pa'i phyir gnas so/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo

ni sems can nad pa rnams kyi nad thams cad ni thabs thams cad kyis gso bar nan tan du byed do/ /rgas pa dang rga bas zil gyis non pa rnams la ni bsnyen bkur ba dang / rim gro dang yo byad kyi mi 'phongs
par yongs su bsdud pa byed do/ /mgon med pa'i sems can rnams la mgon byed do/ /'phongs shing dbul ba rnams la ni nor dang / gser gyi phung pos yongs su bsdud do/ /log par ltung ba rnams
ni don 'thun pas yongs su bsdud do/ /yul gzhan du phyin pa rnams ni rang gi yul du phyin par byed do/ /phyogs log par zhugs pa rnams ni phyogs ma nor bar 'dzud do/ /brtson ra na 'dug pa rnams ni

brtson ra nas thar par byed do/ /chad pas gcad pa ni chad pa'i sdug bsngal las grol bar byed do/ /nyes pa byung ste/ rgyal pos gsad par bkris pa rnams ni srog gi dbugs phyin pa thob par byed do/ /sems kyang

bdag ji ltar sems can 'di dag 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa sna tshogs las yongs su skyob cing / mgon byed pa de bzhin du bdag gis 'di rnams bla na med pa'i chos kyi yongs su bsdu bas yongs su bsdus te/ nyon mongs

pa thams cad yongs su dkrol bar byed do/ /skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yang dag par bzla bar bya'o/ /ngan song dang log

par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su dkrol bar bya'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gzungs la rab tu dgod par bya'o/ /chos rin po che sbyin pa yongs su bsdu bas yongs su bsdu bar bya'o/ /kha na ma tho ba

med pa'i las la rab tu dgod par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnam par dag par bskul bar bya'o/ /rga shi yongs su med pa'i dbyings shin tu rtogs pa la rab tu dgod par bya bar bskyed do/ /rigs kyi bu kho mo ni sems

can log pa'i lam la zhugs pa'i rnam pa thibs po sna tshogs la mngon par zhen pa/ log par lta ba'i spyod yul can lus dang / ngag dang yid kyi las nyams nga bar 'gyur ba la yongs su spyod pa/ brtul zhugs dang

dka' thub sna tshogs la gnas pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin pa la/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'du shes pa lus gdung ba dang / yongs su gdung ba la rab tu brtson pa/ mtsho dang 'tshe'u dang /

lu ma dang rdzing bu dang chu klung dang / ri'i gzar dang / phyogs dang phyogs 'tshams la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal ba mos pa/ sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang du gyur pa rnams la yang thabs sna tshogs kyis mgon du gyur par byed do/ /

de dag sdig pa'i lta ba'i rnam pa dang / ngan song thams cad kyi g.yang sar ltung ba'i lam las rnam par bzlog go/ /'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba la rab tu bkod cing / lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa la yongs su
'god de/ de bas kyang ji ltar bdag gis sems can 'di dag nyam nga ba'i nan tan dang / sdug bsngal las yongs su bkrol ba de bzhin du bdag gis sems can thams cad kyang / 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das

pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam la bkod de/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las phyir mi ldog par byas la kun tu bzang po'i smon lam chen pos thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /sems can gyi khams thams cad

ma dul gyi bar du byang chub sems dpa'i sa las kyang mi g.yo bar bya bar bskyed do/ /de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pas de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i phyogs sems can thams cad kyi mun pa

rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo 'di mnan te/ bstan par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la tshigs su bcad

pa 'di dag smras so/ /gti mug ma rig mun nag bstsal don du/ /sems can phan phyir kho mos chos bstan te/ /dus la bsdad cing 'gro ba bde bar byas/ /'di ni rnam thar tshul mchog zhi ba yin/ /kho mos byams

yangs shin tu spyad pa byas/ /bskal pa mtha' yas sngon cad shin tu bsgoms/ /des ni 'jig rten rgyas bkang snang bar byas/ /nor bzangs bstan pas tshul 'di shes par gyis/ /kho mo'i snying rje rgya mtsho tshad med do/ /

'di las dus gsum rgyal ba 'jig rten 'byung / /des ni 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byed/ /nor bzangs bstan pa'i tshul 'di shes par gyis/ /'jig rten bde ba mngon par bsgrub pa dang / /ma byas 'phags pa'i bde ba

mngon bsgrub cing / /des ni kho mo dga' mgu rangs par byed/ /rgyal sras khyod kyis tshul 'di shes par gyis/ /sangs rgyas stobs rnams yongs su sbyong byed cing / /nyan thos ye shes rnam thar 'bras bu dang / /'dus

byas skyon las rtag tu phyir phyogs kyis/ /rgyal sras khyod kyis tshul 'di shes par gyis/ /kho mo'i mig ni rgya che yongs su dag /des ni phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams mang po mthong / /zhing dbyings de dag kun gyi rang

byung rnams/ /byang chub shing dbang drung na bzhugs pa mthong / /sangs rgyas sku ni mtshan gyis yongs brgyan cing / /'od bzang rnam pa sna tshogs kun 'gyed de/ /ba spu kun nas 'od gzer mang 'gyed pa/ /sangs rgyas 'khor

dang bcas pa kho mos mthong / /zhing dbyings de dag kun gyis sems can rnams/ /shi 'pho skye ba'i sgor yang kun mthong ste/ /byis pas de dag 'gro rgyud rgya mtsho na/ /'khor zhing rang rang las kyang myong bar byed/ /kho mo'i rna ba

rgya mtsho rnam dag ste/ /der ni sgra rnams ma lus yongs su 'du/ /'gro ba kun gyi sgra skad rgya mtsho dag /kun kyang thos nas dran pas yongs su 'dzin/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag sgra skad thams cad kyis/ /dpe zla med pa'i

gsung ni rab brgyan te/ /des ni rgyal ba 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /de dag kho mos thos shing dran pas 'dzin/ /kho mo'i sna yi mthu yang rnam dag ste/ /chos tshul rgya mtsho dag la thogs pa med/ /rnam thar gnas rnams

kun tu rab 'jug pa'i/ /tshul 'di rgyal sras khyod kyis shes par gyis/ /kho mo'i lce ni rgya che rab tu yangs/ /srab cing mdog dmar rin chen 'od du dag /sems can bsam pa ji bzhin de shes byed/ /rgyal sras

khyod kyis tshul 'di shes par gyis/ /kho mo'i chos lugs shin tu rnam dag ste/ /dus gsum kun tu 'od gsal rab tu gnas/ /gzugs lus sems can bsam pa ji bzhin te/ /de dag kun gyi dad pa'i dbang pos mthong / /

kho mo'i sems ni chags med zag pa med/ /sgra dbyangs sprin gyi nga ro ji bzhin te/ /de yi khongasu mi mchog kun chud kyang / /de la kho mo rnam dag rtog pa med/ /zhing gi dbyings kyi sems can bsam mi khyab/ /de dag sems

kyi rgya mtsho kho mos shes/ /de dag dbang po bsam pa rab shes kyang / /de la kho mo rnam par rtog pa med/ /kho mo'i rdzu 'phrul rab yangs shin tu grub/ /des ni bsam yas zhing yang rab tu bskyod/ /lus kyi
'od dang mthu yang de bzhin te/ /des ni sems can gdul dka' shin tu 'dul/ /kho mo'i bsod nams rnam yangs yongs su dag /kun tu rgyan byed zad pa med pa'i mdzod/ /des ni rgyal ba rnams la mchod pa

byed/ /'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba 'ang yin/ /kho mo'i shes rab rnam yangs shin tu dag /des ni chos mang rgya mtsho rab tu shes/ /'gro ba kun gyi the tsom yongs su gcod/ /rgyal sras khyod kyis tshul 'di shes
par gyis/ /dus gsum kun la kho mos zhugs gyur pas/ /sangs rgyas rgya mtsho kun kyang mthong zhing shes/ /de dag smon lam la yang rab tu zhugs/ /tshul 'di dpag yas rab tu rdzogs pa yin/ /rdul mang kun

la zhing rnams rgya mtsho mthong / /de dag dus gsum 'jug pa de bzhin te/ /de dag kun gyi sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong / /'di ni kun tu gnas pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /rnam par snang mdzad byang chub sangs rgyas te/ /

phyogs bcu rnams kyi zhing rnams yongs bkang zhing / /rdul sbubs kun gyi byang chub shing drung na/ /zhi ba'i chos rnams gsung du sgrogs pa ltos/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gyis mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid

dang ldan pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha mo khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs nas/ ji srid cig lags/ de ltar khyod tshul 'di lta bus sems can gyi don bgyi ba la sta gon tu zhugs

pa'i rnam par thar pa de ni khyod kyis brnyes nas ji srid lags/ de skad ces smras pa dang / mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu sngon 'das pa'i

dus ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bskal pa'i yang / pha rol gcig tu bskal pa rab tu zhi ba'i 'od ces bya ba la/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag lnga brgya skyes pa byung ste/ de'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni rin po che

dpal 'byung zhes bya bar gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de'i gling bzhi po 'bring po rin chen zla ba sgron ma'i 'od ces bya ba de na/ rgyal po'i gnas pad mo'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ rgyal po'i gnas der rgyal po

chos rab mu stegs zhes bya ba chos dang mthun pa'i rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur ba'i gling bzhi la dbang ba rin po che bdun dang ldan pa byung ste/ des sa chen po de yang ri dang rgya mtshor bcas pa'i mthas gtugs par chos

kyis rgyas par byas nas/ bde bar gnas par byas so/ /rgyal po chos rab mu stegs de'i btsun mo chos kyi blo gros zla ba zhes bya ba byung ste/ de srod la 'dod pas mos shing dga' bar rtse rtse snyam du bsam nas nam gyi

gung la btsun mo'i 'khor gyi gnas su phyin te nyal lo/ /de nas rgyal po'i gnas pad mo'i 'od de'i shar phyogs kyi nags tshal chen po zhi ba'i dpal 'byung ba zhes bya bar rin po che'i rgyal po rgyan thams cad kyi 'od dang ldan pa'i

lhun can/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba'i byang chub kyi shing chen po'i drung du/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad rab tu sgrogs pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ de'i mthus 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen dpal 'byung ba thams cad 'od chen po de dag du ma can gyis rgyas shing gang bar gyur to/ /rgyal po'i gnas pad mo'i 'od ces

bya ba de na mtshan mo'i lha mo zla ba shin tu rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba 'dug 'dug ste/ des rgyal po'i btsun mo chos kyi blo gros zla ba'i gan du song nas/ rgyan bkrol ba'i sgras sad par byas ste/
'di skad ces smras so/ /'di ltar rgyal po'i btsun mo shes par gyis shig /nags tshal chen po zhi ba'i dpal 'byung bar de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad rab tu sgrogs pa'i rgyal po

zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /de nas des rgyal po'i btsun mo de'i mdun du sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsngags pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam rgya cher bshad do/ /rigs kyi bu rgyal po'i btsun mo de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyis snang bar gyur te/
bsam pa thag pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas/ des de bzhin gshegs pa de dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun du bcas pa la mchod

pa dang / rim gro cher byas so/ /rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po'i btsun mo chos kyi blo gros zla ba zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems na ni de ltar myi blta ste/ kho mo

ni de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po'i btsun mo chos kyi blo gros zla ba zhes bya bar gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu kho mo ni mos pa'i sems bskyed pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des/
bskal pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed tshun chad du nam yang ngan song log par ltung bar ma skyes te/ sems can dmyal bar ma yin no/ /byol song gi skye gnas su ma yin/ yi dgas su ma yin no/ /

nam yang rigs dma' bar ma skyes so/ /nam yang dbang po dang mi ldan par ma gyur to/ /nam yang sdug bsngal bar ma gyur te/ de ltar kho mos rtag par lha'i nang du lha'i bdag nyid che ba nyid thob/ mi'i nang

du ni/ mi'i bdag nyid che ba nyid thob ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang yang ma bral lo/ /dus ngan par yang ma skyes so/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mos sangs rgyas

gcig nas gcig tu dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de bskal pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig tu lam bde zhing mnyam pa nas nye zho med par phyin kyang de tsam gyis kho mo'i byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po yongs su dub

par ma gyur te/ ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bskal pa de dag ni 'das/ bskal pa bzang po 'di'i snga rol gyi ni bskal pa chen po stong phrag bcu'i thog ma la bab pa de'i tshe/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzi

brjid rdul gyi dri ma med pa zhes bya bar bskal pa mya ngan med cing / rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba byung ste/ rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams gzi brjid rdul gyi dri ma med pa'i dpal de ni kun nas nyon mongs la rnam par dag par

gyur te/ der sangs rgyas lnga brgya byung ngo / /sangs rgyas lnga brgya po de dag gi thog ma la de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa/ skyes bu

'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ lha dang mi'i ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ri rab rgyal mtshan spyan yangs shing zhi ba'i dpal zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i tshe kho mo yang tshong dpon snyen pa rnam par grags pa'i

bu mo shes rab snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba gzugs mdzes shing bzang la blta na sdug pa/ kha dog shin tu mdzes shing rgyas pa dang ldan pa zhig du gyur te/ mtshan mo'i lha mo zla ba shin tu rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba de

yang smon lam gyi dbang gis gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba'i rgyal po'i gnas rgyal mtshan sna tshogs su mtshan mo'i lha mo mig rnam par dag pa zhes bya bar gyur te/ des kho mo mtshan mo mi nyal tsam
zhig na/ pha ma nyal bar gyur pa dang / khyim de yang yongs su bskyod de 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas rang gi gzugs bstan te/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsngags pa brjod nas/ de bzhin gshegs

pa thog ma mngon par sangs rgyas nas zhag bdun lon te/ snying po byang chub la zhugs pa de bstan to/ /de nas kho mo pha ma gnyen bshes kyi tshogs chen po dang 'grogs te/ mtshan mo'i lha mo shin tu rnam par dag

pa'i zla ba'i 'od sngon du bdar nas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spyan sngar phyin to/ /de nas kho mo de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhal mthong ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba 'dul

zhing sangs rgyas mthong bar byed pa zhes bya ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dus gsum gyi dbyings ye shes kyis snang ba'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yang thob par gyur to/ /de thob pas kyang kho mos bskal pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba

snyed po de dag kyang rjes su dran par gyur to/ /kho mo'i byang chub kyi sems de yang mngon du gyur te/ de ltar kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa de las chos bstan pa thos te/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa

sems can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo 'di yang thob par gyur to/ /de thob pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu

phra ba snyed lus kyi rgyas par 'gengs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i mig lam du snang zhing bdag nyid kyang de dag thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung na 'dug

par shes so/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i mig lam du snang ste/ de dag gi sgra skad rnam pa tha dad pa'i brda yang rab tu shes so/ /sems dang bsam pa dang / dbang po dang mos pa
yang rab tu shes so/ /sngon gyi mtha'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyi drung du yongs su smyin par gyur pa'ang rab tu shes so/ /de dag la bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshim par gyur pa'i lus kyang

yongs su ston to/ /kho mo'i rnam par thar pa de yang sems kyi skad cig re re la rnam par 'phel te/ rnam par thar pa'i sems de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams brgya'i rdul shin

tu phra ba snyed lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs so/ /de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams stong gis rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs so/ /de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis

sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs so/ /de bzhin du sems kyi skad cig re re zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang

brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bar dag lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i mig lam du snang ste/

bdag nyid kyang de dag gi zhabs kyi drung na 'dug par shes so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang len to/ /'dzin to/ /yongs su 'dzin to/ /nye bar 'dzin to/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa de dag gi sngon gyi tshul rgya mtsho dang / smon lam rgya mtsho la yang 'jug go/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa de dag thams cad kyang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par

bya ba'i phyir/ mngon par bsgrub bo/ /sems can ji snyed cig 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag du skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / kho mo'i myig lam du snang ste/ sems can de dag gi bsam pa dang dbang po dang

mos pa'i bye brag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi bye brag du de dag yongs su smyin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i phyir lus byin gyis brlob ste/ de ltar kho mo'i rnam par thar pa de ni sems kyi skad cig re re la yang chos kyi

dbyings 'byam klas pa rgyas par 'gengs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par 'phel lo/ /rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sems can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba

rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa' mtha' dang dbus med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam gyis byung ba dang / chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho'i tshul
'byam klas par bdal ba la 'jug par dbang bsgyur ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin ye shes rdo rje'i dpal gyis rnam par rtse ba/ 'jig rten gyis khams thams cad du/
de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad yang dag par bzung ba la smon lam chen pos byung ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad sems kyi skad gcig cig gis yongs su dag par bya ba'i bsod nams

kyi rgya mtsho chen po yongs su grub pa/ sems kyi skad cig re re la sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i ye shes la dbang bsgyur ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can

thams cad kyi sgrib pa'i mun pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i ye shes kyi nyi ma'i mig dang ldan pa/ sems can gyi khams thams cad la theg pa chen po tha dad par dmyigs par bya ba'i mthu dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams

cad kyi the tsom dang / nem nur dang / yid gnyis kyi rab rib rnam par sel ba'i blo gros kyi zla ba dang ldan pa/ srid pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad la mngon par chags pa las gyen du bskyod pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor

rnam par dag pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyis rdul gyi cha shas la rnam par 'phrul pa/ yongs su ston pa la dbang bsgyur ba/ dus gsum gyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la ye shes dbyer med pa/ de dag gi spyod pa

shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod pa 'am/ spyod yul la 'jug pa 'am/ rnam par thar pas rnam par rtse ba yongs su bstan par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu yul ma ga d+ha 'di nyid kyi snying po byang chub la kho mo bla

ma med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed bskyed pa/ yang dang yang bskul bskul ba'i mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la/

ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig dang / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa la tshigs su
bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /khyod sku shin tu rnam par dag pa mthong / /mtshan gyis rnam brgyan ri bo ji bzhin du/ /'jig rten kun las mngon 'phags 'jig rten du/ /phun sum tshogs sku

'jam dpal bzhin du mdzes/ /khyod kyi chos sku shin tu rnam dag ste/ /dus gsum kun tu mnyam zhing rnam mi rtog /der ni 'jig rten ma lus kun 'dus ste/ /'byung zhing rnam par 'jig kyang chags myi mnga'/ /

lam rgyud 'byam klas thams cad kun tu yang / /khyod kyi sku ni gzugs brnyan rnam par phye/ /skar chen gza' skar tshogs pa ji bzhin du/ /spu rtse kun la 'ang khyod ni bdag gis mthong / /khyod kyi thugs yangs

shin tu rnam dag ste/ /phyogs rnams kun tu nam mkha'i dbyings su rgyas/ /der ni mi mchog kun kyang yongs su 'du/ /khyod la ye shes myi rtog dam pa mnga'/ /zhing gi rdul snyed rnam pa sna tshogs sprin/ /khyod kyi
spu rtse kun nas mngon mthon cing / /rgyan mangs sna tshogs char pa mngon 'bebs shing / /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhabs drung rgyas par 'gengs/ /'gro ba kun snyed lus rnams mtha' yas pas/ /

khyod kyi spu rtse kun nas mngon mthon cing / /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rgyas par yongs bkang nas/ /sna tshogs thabs kyi sems can rnam par spyod/ /spu rtse kun la bsam yas zhing gi rnams/ /sna tshogs rgyan ldan

rnam pa tha dad mthong / /lam rgyud sems can khyod kyis rnam sbyangs pa/ /ji snyed de dag de bzhin kun kyang 'byung / /gang zhig khyod kyi mtshan thos dga' gyur pa/ /de dag thob bya legs thob legs par 'tsho/ /

sems can gang gis khyod kyi sku mthong ba/ /byang chub lam la mngon du bltas par gyur/ /de ltar thos na rab tu sems dga' la/ /mthong ba tsam gyis nyon mongs zhi mdzad pas/ /bskal pa bsam yas ngan song
